text.body:
dharmakarmatraividhye tasyaiva śrutismṛtivākyānatikramābhimāna ॰ ॰ pravṛttiparigrahaprastārāt aṣṭaprakaparigrahādasādhāraṇasādhāraṇaśca | tadetat vṛttipravṛttirītināyikānāyakaprabheda— jātametallakṣaṇodāharaṇaiḥ pūrvameva1 nirṇītam |
athedānīṃ nāyakapade vyapadeśahetuḥ vicāryate | taddhi indriyāvikārakāraṇaṃ cittadharmaḥ, yena satā satyapi garvadihetau jātyādiguṇasamūhe nāyakasya notsekādayo jāyante | tac‍caturdhā, udāttam, uddhataṃ, lalitaṃ śāntaṃ ca |
(udāttadhairyam)
tatra dharmaśṛṅgārādhikāriṇo dhīrodāttasya udāttaḥ; yatprabhāvāt abhyudayādibhirnotsekaḥ, śokādibhirna vaiklavyam, vyasanādibhirna dīnatvam, rāgādibhirna dharmabādhā | cariteṣu uttamaspardhā, nīceṣvartheṣu jugupsā, śaktisadbhāve kṣāntiḥ, pramādaskhaliteṣvanuśayaḥ, sadācāriṣvādaraḥ, paraguṇeṣvamātsaryama, paravyasaneṣu na praharṣaḥ, parāpavādeṣu na pravṛttiḥ, asthāneṣu na krodhaḥ, prārambheṣu nānirvāhaḥ, karmatiśayairna vismayaḥ, jātyādibhirnābhimānaḥ, iti || tatra
1. abhyudayādibhirnotseko yathā—(raghu. 15.27)
tasya saṃstūyamānasya caritārthaistaparisvibhiḥ |
śuśubhe vikramodagraṃ vrīḍayā 'vanataṃ śiraḥ || 40 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 4.29)
kā te stutiḥ stutipathādatiriktadhām‍naḥ kiṃ dīyatāmavikalakṣitidāyino vā |
śāntasya kiṃ parijanena munestathāpi putraiḥ samaṃ daśaratho 'dyaṃ vaśaṃvadaste || 41 ||
2. śokādibhirna vaiklavyaṃ; yathā—(urāca. 3.30)
idaṃ viśvaṃ pālyaṃ vidhivadabhiyuktena manasā priyāśoko jīvaṃ kusumāmiva gharmo glapayati |
svayaṃ kṛtvā tyāgaṃ vilapanavinodo 'pyasulabha— stadadyāpyuccha‍vāso bhavati; nanu lābho hi ruditam || 42 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 6.33)
k‍va tāvānānando niratiśayavisrambhabahulaḥ k‍va te 'nyonyaṃ yatra k‍vacana gahanāḥ kautukarasāḥ |
1. ālambanavibhāvaprakāśe dra. pṛ. 861 |
sukhe vā duḥkhe vā k‍va nu khalu tadaikyaṃ hṛdayayo— stathā 'pyeṣa prāṇaḥ, sphurati; na tu pāpo viramati || 43 ||
3. vyasanādibhirna dīnatvaṃ ; yathā—(nīti. 89)
vipadi mahatāṃ dhairyadhvaṃsaṃ yadīkṣitumīhase virama viramāyāsādasmād duradhyavasāyataḥ |
ayi hatavidhe! kalpāpāye 'pyapetanijakramāḥ kulaśikhariṇaḥ kṣudrā naite navā jalarāśayaḥ || 44 ||
yathā vā—
asāvanāgataḥ śreyānāgacchan vatsa! vāryatām |
praveśayanti suhṛdaṃ na dhīrāḥ svārthasaṃṅkaṭe || 45 ||
4. rāgādibhirna dharmabādhā ; yathā—
pituḥ śāsanamatyetuṃ na śaśāka sa rāghavaḥ |
yo rāvaṇaśiraś‍chedakārye 'bhavadaviklabaḥ || 46 ||
yathā vā—(urā. 1.15)
kaikeyyā mama vipriyaṃ vihitamityetat kutaste hṛdi s‍nehārdaṃ ca mano mayīva bharate 'pyastyeva kiṃ prārthyase |
śrutvā 'smānapi kānane nivasataḥ śokena paryākulā tātājñāṃ prati mā kṛthāḥ śithilatāmetad bhuvi jñāpyase || 47 ||
5. cariteṣu uttamaspardhā ; yathā—(urā. 6.3)
prāgevāryavicintināt sukṛtinā baddhāstathā 'gre jaṭāḥ taccheṣaiḥ phalamūlakandaśakalaiḥ ślāghyā sthitiḥ kalpitā |
nirvyājaṃ raṇadurmadena ca guruḥ prāṇaiḥ samārādhito bhrātṛtvena kimanyathā mama yathā saumitriṇā nāpyate/vāpyate || 48 ||
yathā vā—(urā. 6.8)
pāda/pāpastavāmba! nijajīvavisarjanāya vijñāpayāmyaśaraṇaḥ śaraṇāgatastvām |
mātasthatā kuru yathā 'nya/dyabhavāntare 'pi saumitriṇā mama karoti janassamatvam || 49 ||
6. nīceṣvartheṣu jugupsā ; yathā—(mavīca. 1.37)
uttālatāṭakotpātadarśane 'pyaprakampitaḥ |
niyuktastatpramāthāya straiṇena vicikitsati || 50 ||
yathā vā—(bārā. 3.4)
strī rākṣasī; kathamivātra patantu bāṇā ? bhaktasya te kuśikanandana! tat prasīda |
ādiś‍yatāmiha hi ko 'pi tapasvivarge mantrākṣaraiḥ karipayairya imāmapāsyet || 51 ||
7. śaktisadbhāve 'nutsekaḥ kṣāntiḥ ; yathā—
vọdhā tanno daśāmantyāṃ jyāyāneva guṇapriyaḥ |
sulabho vidviṣāṃ bhaṅgo durlabhā satsvavācyatā || 52 ||
yathā vā—
abhilaṣata upāyaṃ vikramaṃ kīrttilakṣmyoranuyugamarisainyairaṅkamabhyāgatasya |
janaka iva śiśutve saṃpriyasyaikasūnorna vinayamupasehe pāṇḍavasya smarāmi || 53 ||
8. pramādaskhaliteṣvanuśayo yathā—
tato 'pi ca dahatyuc‍caisrapājvālā tu māṃ parā |
yada‍ vanaukasi nirvaire mukto vālini mārgaṇaḥ || 54 ||
yathā vā—
kartavyopakṛtiḥ sadbhiryatra tatra vipad‍gate |
avimṛś‍ya kṛto 'smābhiḥ sa punaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ sadā || 55 ||
9. sadācāre(/ ri)ṣvādaro yathā—(urāca. 2.2)
priyaprāyā vṛttirvinayamadhuro vāci niyamaḥ prakṛtyā kalyāṇī matiranavagītaḥ paricayaḥ |
puro vā paścād vā tadidamaviparyāsitarasaṃ rahasyaṃ sādhūnāmanupadhi viśuddhaṃ vijayate || 56 ||
yathā vā—(nīti. 66)
asanto nābhyarthyāḥ, suhṛdapi na yācyastanudhanaḥ priyā vṛttirnyāyyā, malinamasubhaṅge 'pyasukaram |
vipadyuc‍caiḥ stheyaṃ, padamanuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ satāṃ kenoddiṣṭaṃ viṣamamasidhārāvratamidam || 57 ||
10. paraguṇeṣvamātsaryaṃ yathā—
rathasthamālokya rathāṅgapāṇiṃ sthāne sthitā śrīriti so 'bhyanandat |
vairāṇi kāryopanibandhanāni nirmatsarā eva guṇeṣu santaḥ || 58 ||
. . (yathā vā)—(mavīca. 1.33)
yada‍ vidvānapi tādṛśo 'pyabhijane dharmyāt patho vicyutaḥ kiṃ brūmo 'tra tadanyadeva na vasantyekatra sarve guṇāḥ |
helānirjitaṣaṇmukhād bhagavataḥ śrījāmadagnyādṛte nirvigh‍napratipannaviśvavijayo vīrastu kastādṛśaḥ? || 59 ||
11. paravyasaneṣu apraharṣaḥ ; yathā—(mavīca. 5.56)
aprākṛtābhijanavīryayaśaścaritrān pratyaka‍chriyaḥ kulamahīdharabhūrisārān |
evaṃvidhānapi nipātya kaṭurvipāke sarvaṅkaṣaḥ kaṣati hī viṣamaḥ kṛtāntaḥ || 60 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.28)
suhṛdi guṇanivāse preyasi prāṇanāthe kathamiva sahapāṃsukrīḍanaprauḍhasakhye |
priyajanavirahādhivyādhivegaṃ dadhāne hatahadaya! viśīrya tvaṃ dvidhā na prayāsi || 61 ||
12. . . . . parāpavādeṣu na pravṛttiḥ ; yathā—
daivāt prasūte na himetarāṃśorūrjasvalaistaiḥ sakhibhirvṛtena |
udāradehadyutinā 'smadarthe niratyayaṃ tena tamaḥ prapannam || 62 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 5.48)
priye hā hā k‍vāsi prakira madhurāṃ vācamathavā parābhūtairitthaṃ vilapanavinodo 'pyasulabhaḥ |
anindyaḥ paulastyo vrajatu parivādo mayi jarāṃ yato rụ̄dhe vaire bahuguṇamanena pratikṛtam || 63 ||
13. asthāneṣu na krodho yathā—(urāca. 4.24–25)
etad vaiśasaghoravajrapatanaṃ śaśvanmamā 'bhyasyataḥ/mamotpaś‍yataḥ krodhasya jvalituṃ dhagityavasaraś‍cāpena śāpena vā |
śāntaṃ vā raghunandane tadubhayaṃ tatputrabhāṇḍaṃ hi me bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dvijabālavṛddhavikalastraiṇaśca pauro janaḥ || 64 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 3.42)
kāmaṃ hi naḥ svajana eṣa tathā 'pi darpā— c‍cāpaṃ vyavasyati kathaṃ na bhavedavakhyā |
sandūṣitena ca mayā muhurīkṣitasya krud‍dhaśca/mugdhaśca bhārgavaśiśurduritaṃ hi tat syāt || 65 ||
14. ārambheṣu nānirvāhaḥ ; yathā—(seba. 3.25)
ṇijjaṃti cirapaattā samuddagahirā vi paḍivahaṃ ṇaïsottā |
tīraṃti ṇiatteuṃ asamāviapesaṇā ṇa uṇa sappurisā || 66 ||
(nīyante cirapravṛttāni samudragabhīrāṇi api pratipathaṃ nadīsrotāṃsi |
tīryante nivartayituṃ asamāpitapreṣaṇā na punaḥ satpuruṣāḥ ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 3.18)
avvocchiṇṇapasario ahiaṃ uddhāi phuriasūracchāo |
ucchāo suha/bhaḍāṇaṃ visamakkhalio mahāṇaīṇa va sotto || 67 ||
(avyavacchinnaprasṛto 'dhikamuddhāvayati sphuritasūracchāyaḥ |
utsāhaḥ subhaṭānāṃ viṣamaskhalito mahānadīnāmiva strotaḥ ||)
15. karmātiśayairna vismayaḥ ; yathā—(bārā. 3.83)
bhag‍naṃ nirīkṣya harakārmukamityathaite romāñcakañcukamimaṃ vapuruda‍vahāmaḥ |
āryastu kaṇṭhadhṛtapāṇivilakṣabhāvānnāsāniṣaṇṇanayanaṃ vadanaṃ bibharti || 68 ||
yathā vā—
pātre purovartini viśvanāthe kṣodīyasi kṣmāvalaye ca deye |
vrīḍāsmitaṃ tasya tadā tadāsīt camatkṛto yena sa eva devaḥ || 69 ||
16. jātyādibhirnābhimānaḥ ; yathā—
kulamamalinaṃ, bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ, sphītā lakṣmīḥ, prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam |
prakṛtisubhagā hyete bhāvā madasya ca hetavo vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ || 70 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 4.20)
vīraśriyā ca vinayena ca rocamāno mānye munāvavanataśca guṇonnataśca |
lajjāṃ vahan bhṛgupatau hatavīradarpe śiṣyo gurāviva kṛtaprathamāpacāraḥ || 71 ||
(dhairyodāttatvahetavo viśeṣaguṇāḥ —8)
dhairyodāttatvahetavo viśeṣaguṇāḥ — śīlaṃ, dākṣiṇyaṃ, sthairyaṃ, gāmbhīryaṃ, prāgalbhyam, śobhā, kṛtajñatā, avikatthanatā iti | teṣu
1. susvabhāvatā śīlam; yathā—(raghu. 1.23)
anākṛṣṭasya viṣayairvidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ |
tasya dharmaraterāsīd vṛ(ddhatvaṃ jara)sā vinā || 72 ||
yathā vā—
vikramābharaṇāṃ kīrtiṃ vinayābharaṇāṃ śriyam |
babhāra śīlābharaṇo yaḥ satyābharaṇāṃ giram || 73 ||
2. dākṣiṇyam ; yathā (vā)—(mavīca.5.34)
prārthya mālyavatā vālī yuṣmad‍ghāte niyokṣyate |
tenāpi rāvaṇe maitrīmanurudhya hyupekṣyate || 74 ||
yathā vā—(urāca.7.1)
rājyāśramanivāse 'pi prāp‍takaṣṭamunitrataḥ |
vālmīkergauravādārya ita evābhivartate || 75 ||
3. a(vicalitatvam) sthairyam; yathā—(hanumannā0)
kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam |
muhuḥ paś‍yan śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ paribṛḍhaḥ || 76 ||
yathā vā—
aṅke nyasyottamāṅgaṃ plavagakulapateḥ pādamakṣasya hantuḥ kṛtvotsaṅge salīlaṃ tvaci kanakamṛgasyāṅgaśeṣaṃ nidhāya |
bāṇaṃ rakṣaḥkulag‍naṃ praguṇitam anujenādarāt tīkṣṇamakṣṇaḥ koṇonodvīkṣamāṇastvadanujavadacane dattakarṇo 'yamāste || 77 ||
4. iṅgitākāragup‍tiḥ gāmbhīryam; yathā—(raghu. 12.9 samānārtham)
āhūtasyābhiṣekāya visṛṣṭasya vanāya ca |
na mayā lakṣitastasya svalpo 'pyākāravibhramaḥ || 78 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 1.20)
tasya saṃvṛtamantrasya gụ̄dhākāreṅgitasya ca |
phalānumeyāḥ prārambhāḥ saṃskārāḥ prāktanā iva || 79 ||
5. prayoganissādhvasatā prāgalbhyam ; yathā—(raghu. 3.51)
athāpahasyāha punaḥ purandaraṃ vyapetabhīrbhūmipurandarātmajaḥ |
gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalvanirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān || 80 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 5.49)
ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo 'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ tu kuto 'sya saṃprati mama tvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ |
tvatsāṅgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastat kiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛte— rasmin viśrutajāmadagnyavijaye bāhau dhanurjambhatām || 81 ||
6. aucityāparityāgaḥ śobhā; yathā—(mavīca. 5.50)
diṣṭyā yadadya dṛṣṭo 'si sarvametac‍ca yujyate |
kiṃ na śastreṣu yuṣmāsu vā sāmānyaṃ mahātmanā || 82 ||
. . . . tena parigaṇanasthinaḥ(?)
8. svaguṇāgrahaṇam avikatthanam; yathā—
ukte 'pyuddhavarāmābhyāṃ vaktuṃ sadasi na spṛhā |
kiṃ candrārkasanāthā dyauḥ khadyotenāvagāhyate || 83 ||1
yathā vā—(māgha. 2.75)
viśeṣaviduṣaḥ śāstraṃ yat tavoda‍grāhyate puraḥ |
hetuḥ paricayasthairye vakturguṇanikaiva sā || 84 ||
1. na spṛhā jośeraḥ, me spṛhā rāghavaḥ | 'me—'pāṭhe 'khadyotairnā ॰' iti vṛthābahuvacanaḥ pāṭhaḥ parikalpyaḥ' niṣedhasya vivakṣitatvāt |
(dhīrodāttasya bhāvāḥ —25)
so 'yamasya viśeṣaguṇayogaḥ svābhāviko niratiśayaḥ āntaro nityaścālaṅkāraḥ yatprabhāvādasya anukūleṣu ratiḥ, anavagīteṣu prītiḥ, uttameṣūtkaṇṭhā, dharmārthakāmeṣu cintā, uttarapakṣe matiḥ, avyāhatakramā smṛtiḥ, tattvānuvādī/pātī vitarkaḥ, phalānusāriṇī śaṅkā, vivikteṣu nidrā, niśīthe svāpaḥ, apararātre prabodhaḥ, svaślāghādiṣu vrīḍā, sarvatraivāvahittham, saṃbhavādhikye dhṛtiḥ, parārthasiddhau harṣaḥ, parāpadāne romāñcaḥ, smitamātrakārī hāsaḥ, mahārambheṣūtsāhaḥ, tratātiśayādiṣu na glāniḥ, svaśaktidharṣaṇeṣu krodhaḥ, mahāduḥkheṣu śokaḥ, duḥkhādyatiśayayoge aśrūdgamaḥ, prārambhātireke svedaḥ, āyāsātiśayayoge śramaḥ, prahārātiyoge mūrcchā iti | na caite 'syotpannā avijñāyante | nacāyametairabhibhūyate, gambhīrāśayatayā mahāsattvatayā ca | yathocyate—
vajrādapi kaṭherāṇi mṛdūni kusumādapi |
lokottarāṇāṃ cetāṃsi ko hi vijñātumarhati ? || 85 || (urāca. 2.1)
1. anukūleṣu ratiryathā— (śāku. 2.1)
kāmaṃ priyā na sulabhā manastu tadbhāvadarśanāyāsi |
akṛtārthe 'pi manasije ratimubhayaprārthanā kurute || 86 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 2.2)
ādarśanāt praviṣṭā sā me suralokasundarī hṛdayam |
bāṇena makaraketoḥ kṛtamārgamavandhyapātena || 87 ||
2. anavagīteṣu prītiḥ; yathā—(mavīca. 1.21)
utpattirdevayajanād brahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā |
suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ s‍nehaṃ karoti me || 88 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 6.17)
atha ko 'yamindramaṇimecakacchavirdhvaninaiva baddhapulakaṃ karoti mām |
nava-nīla-nīradhara-dhīragarjita-kṣaṇabaddha-kuḍ‍mala-kadamba-ḍambaram || 89 ||
3. uttameṣūtkaṇṭhā; yathā—(urāca. 6.21)
amṛtādhmātajīmūtas‍nigdhasaṃhananasya te |
parīrambhāya vātsalyādayamutkaṇṭhate janaḥ || 90 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 1.20)
eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrāt pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī |
surāṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrāt sūtraṃ mṛṇālādiva rājahaṃsī || 91 ||
4. dharmārthakāmeṣu cintā; yathā—(śāku. 3.2)
jāne tapaso vīryaṃ sā bālā paravatīti me viditam |
alamasmi tato hṛdayaṃ tathā 'pi nedaṃ nivartayitum || 92 ||
yathā vā—(śāku. 6.21)
darśanapathamāyātā sākṣādiva tanmayena hṛdayena |
smṛtikāriṇā tvayā me punarapi citrīkṛtā kāntā || 93 ||
5. uttarapakṣe matiryathā —(śāku. 3.12)
unnamitaikabhrūlatamānanamasyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ |
kaṇṭakitena prathayati mayyanurāgaṃ kapolena || 94 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 2.3)
ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe! pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 95 ||
6. avyāhatakramā smṛtiryathā—(urāca. 1.21)
iṅ‍gudīpādapaḥ so 'yaṃ śṛṅgiverapure mayā |
niṣādapatinā yatra s‍nigdhenāsīt samāgamaḥ || 96 ||
yathā vā—
kaṭu kṣipanto vayamatra dṛṣṭāstātena pṛṣṭhe nihitaḥ karo me |
asmiṃstvakasmādapi toṣitena vicumbitastvaṃ bahuśaḥ kapole || 97 ||
7. tattvānupātī vitarko yathā—(kirātā. 16.19)
puṃsaḥ padaṃ madhyamamuttamasya dvidhaiva kurvan dhanuṣaḥ praṇādaiḥ |
nūnaṃ tathā naiṣa yathā 'sya veṣaḥ pracchannamapyūhayate hi ceṣṭā || 98 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 13.6)
na mṛgaḥ khalu ko 'pyayaṃ jighāṃsuḥ skhalati hyatra tathā bhṛśaṃ mano me |
vimalaṃ kaluṣībhavac‍ca cetaḥ kathayatyeva hitaiṣiṇaṃ ripuṃ vā || 99 ||
8. phalānusāriṇī śaṅkā; yathā—(śāku. 3.9)
pṛṣṭā janena samaduḥkhasukhena bālā neyaṃ na vakṣyati manogatamādhihetum |
dṛṣṭo vivṛtya bahuśo 'pyanayā satṛṣṇamatrāntare śravaṇakātaratāṃ gato 'smi || 100 ||
yathā vā—
(kathayatitarāṃ seyaṃ kācid) dhanurgurutā (mama) na khalu viṣamaḥ panthā yātaṃ tathā (pra)visaṃsthulam |
ayamapi hi (yo) bāṣṣāpīḍo ruṇaddhi vilocane sphurati ca yathā vāmaṃ cakṣustathaiva śaṭho ripuḥ || 101 ||1
9. vivikteṣu nidrā ; yathā—(raghu. 13.6)
nābhiprarụ̄dhāmburuhāsanena saṃstūyamānaḥ puruṣeṇa dhātrā |
amuṃ yugāntocitayoganidraḥ saṃhṛtya lokān puruṣo 'dhiśete || 102 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 13.35)
atrānugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttastaraṅgavātena vinītakhedaḥ |
rahastvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu suptim || 103 ||
10. niśīthe svāpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.84)
kevalaṃ priyatamādayālunā jyotiṣāmavanatāsu paṅ‌ktiṣu |
tena tatparigṛhītavakṣasā netramīlanakutūhalaṃ kṛtam || 104 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 5.64)
tatra svayaṃvarasamāhṛtarājalokaṃ kanyālalāma kamanīyamajasya lipsoḥ |
bhāvāvabodhakaluṣā dayiteva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayanābhimukhī babhūva || 105 ||
11. apararātre prabodho yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.85)
sa vyabudhyata budhastavocitaḥ śātakumbhakamalākaraiḥ samam |
mūrcchanāparigṛhītakaiśikaiḥ kinnarairuṣasi gitamaṅgalaḥ || 106 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 9.71)
uṣasi sa gajayūthakarṇatālaiḥ paṭupaṭahadhvanibhirvidhūtanidraḥ |
aramata madhurasvarāṇi śṛṇvan vihagavikūjitavandimaṅgalāni || 107 ||
1. jośere 'sya gandho 'pi nāsti | aś‍vatthām‍na iveyamāśaṅkā |
12. svaślāghādiṣu vrīḍā; yathā—(mavīca. 4.20)
vīraśriyā ca vinayena ca rocamāno mānyo 'munā vacanataśca guṇonnataśca |
lajjāṃ vahan bhṛgupatau hatadhīradarpe śiṣyo gurāviva kṛtaprathamāparādhaḥ || 108 ||
yathā vā—
te sarvathā vajramayā manuṣyāḥ saṃgrāmayajñe hṛtabhartṛkābhiḥ |
suhṛd‍vadhūbhiḥ kṛpaṇāssametāssuduḥkhitā santi hṛtākhilārthāḥ || 109 ||
13. sarvatraivāvahitthaṃ yathā—(śāku. 2.19)
kva vayaṃ? kva parokṣamanmatho mṛgaśāvaiḥ samamedhito janaḥ |
parihāsavijalpitaṃ sakhe! paramārthena na gṛhyatāṃ vacaḥ || 110 ||
yathā vā—(kāvyāda. 2.266)
rājakanyānuraktaṃ māṃ romodbhedena rakṣakāḥ |
avagaccheyurāḥ jñātamaho! śītānilaṃ vanam || 111 ||
14. sambhavādhikye dhṛtiryathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ parīkṣakairahaṃ yutaḥ |
dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣād bhagavān devī prāp‍tā priyaṃ kimataḥ || 112 ||1
yathā vā—(urā. 4.20)
sambhāvanātirikte kārye saṃpādite trapāvanataḥ |
harṣāśrupūritadṛśā dhanyaḥ parirabhyate prabhuṇā || 113 ||
15. parārthasiddhau harṣo yathā—
tatraiva gamanādeśo (yatra me vartate priyā |
śīghraṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi hyanukūlo galagrahaḥ) || 114 ||2
yathā vā—(mavīca. 1.33)
rakṣogh‍nāni ca maṅgalāni sudine kalpyāni dārakriyā vaidehyāśca raghūdvahasya kuśalairdīkṣāpraveśaśca naḥ |
āsthāpyāni ca tāni tāni jagatāṃ kṣemāya rāmātmano daityāreścaritādbha‍utānyatha khalu vyagrāḥ pramodāmahe || 115 ||
1–2. naiṣāṃ gandho 'pi jośere | koṣṭhakapūrttirasmatkṛtā |
16. parāpadāne romāñco yathā—
(kāmaṃ pracchāditātmā 'smi taṃ prati grāmasundaram |
hṛṣṭāni kintu romāṇi sarāgāṃ gama)yanti mām || 116 ||1
yathā vā—(urāca. 5.18)
etasmin masṛṇitarājapaṭṭakānte moktavyāḥ kathamiva sāyakāḥ śarīre |
yatprāp‍tau mama parirambhaṇābhilāṣādunmīlatpulakakadambamaṅgamāste || 117 ||
17. smitamātrakārī hāso yathā—
ś‍yāmā bhadrā svapiṣi na śiśo! neti māmamba! nidrā; nidrāhetostava śṛṇu kathāṃ; kāmapūrvāṃ vadasva |
rāmo nāma kṣitipatirabhūnmānanīyo raghūṇā— mityuktyaiva smitamavatu vo devakīnandanasya || 118 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 2.7)
dyotitāntassabhaiḥ kundakuṭ‍malāgradataḥ smitaḥ |
s‍napitevābhavat tasya śuddhavarṇā sarasvatī || 119 ||
18. mahārambheṣūtsāho yathā—(śāku. 6.32)
tvanmatiḥ kevalā yāvat paripālayatu prajāḥ |
adhijyamidamanyatra karmaṇi vyāpṛtaṃ dhanuḥ || 120 ||
yathā vā—(rāca. 15.67)
mūrdh‍nā jāmvavato 'bhivādya caraṇāvāpṛcch‌ya senāpatī— nāśvāsyāśrumukhān muhuḥ priyasakhān preṣyān samābhāṣya ca |
ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendraśikharādambhonidherlaṅghane raṃhasvī raghunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaran mārutiḥ || 121 ||
19. vratātiśayādiṣu na glāniḥ; yathā—(raghu. 2.73)
tamāhitautsukyamadarśanena prajāḥ prajārthavratakarśitāṅgam |
netraiḥ papustṛp‍timanaś‍nuvadbhiḥ navodayaṃ nāthamivauṣadhīnām || 122 ||
1. naiṣāṃ gandho 'pi jośere | koṣṭhakapūrttirasmatkṛtā |
yathā vā—
prakṛtyā ramaṇīyo 'pi kṣīyamāṇaḥ pratikṣapam |
duḥkhamāvahati prātaḥ śaśīvāpāṇḍuracchaviḥ || 123 ||
20. svaśaktidharṣaṇeṣu krodho yathā—
yāñcāṃ dainyaparigrahapraṇayinīṃ nekṣvākavaḥ śikṣitāḥ sevāsaṃvalitaḥ kadā raghukule maulau nibaddhoñjaliḥ |
tat sarvaṃ vihitaṃ; tathā 'pyudadhinā naivoparodhaḥ kṛtaḥ pāṇiḥ saṃprati me haṭhāt kimaparaṃ spraṣṭuṃ dhanurvāñchati || 124 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 3.27)
bhṛgorvaṃśo jātastapasi ca kilāyaṃ sthita iti dviṣatsvapyasmābhiściramiha titikṣaiva hi kṛtā |
yadā bhūyobhūyastṛṇavadavadhūnotyanibhṛta— stadā vipre 'pyasmin namatu dhanuranyā 'sti na gatiḥ || 125 ||
21. mahāduḥkheṣu śoko yathā—(urāca. 3.1)
anirbhinno gabhīratvādantargūḍhaghanavyathaḥ |
puṭapākapratīkāśo rāmasya karuṇo rasaḥ || 126 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 7.7)
dahyamānena manasā daivād vatsāṃ vihāya saḥ |
lokottareṇa dhairyeṇa prajāpuṇyaiśca jīvati || 127 ||
22. duḥkhādyatiśayayoge aśrūdgamo yathā—(urāca. 6.29)
bāṣpa‍varṣeṇa vo nītaṃ jaganmaṅgalamānanam |
avaśyāyāvasiktasya puṇḍarīkasya cārutām || 128 ||
yathā vā—(śāku. 6.22)
prajāgarāt khilībhūtastasyāḥ svap‍ne samāgamaḥ |
bāṣpastu na dadātyenāṃ draṣṭuṃ citragatāmapi || 129 ||
23. prārambhātireke svedo yathā—(kirātā. 17.8)
tasyāhavāyāsavilolamauleḥ saṃrambhatāmrāyatalocanasya |
nirvāpayiṣyanniva roṣatap‍taṃ pras‍nāpayāmāsa mukhaṃ nidāghaḥ || 130 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 9.68)
tasya karkaśavihārasambhavaṃ svedamānanavilag‍najālakam |
ācacāma satuṣāraśīkaro bhinnapallavapuṭo vanānilaḥ || 131 ||
24. āyāsātiśayayoge śramaḥ; yathā—
manthitvā dūracāraśramaśithilatanoścāpamālambya mūrdha— nyūrdhvaṃ yasya sthitasya dviradamadajalāsārasaurabhyagarbhāḥ |
khaḍgakṣuṇṇāvanībhṛd‍galavigaladasṛkchīkarālīkarālāḥ kurvanto gātramaitrīṃ samarajamarujan gharmanīraṃ samīrāḥ || 132 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 7.66)
sa cāpakoṭīnihitaikabāhuḥ śirastraniṣkarṣaṇabhinnamauliḥ |
lalāṭabaddhaśramavāribindurbhītāṃ priyāmetya vaco babhāṣe || 133 ||
25. mahāprahārādiṣu mūrcchāgamaḥ; yathā—(raghu. 3.61)
raghurbhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāśrubhiḥ |
muhūrtamātrādavadhūya ca vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣanisvanaiḥ || 134 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 18.6)
nipatite 'dhiśirodharamāyate samamarat‍niyuge 'yugacakṣuṣaḥ |
tricatureṣu padeṣu kirīṭinā lulitamauli madādiva caskhale || 135 ||
garvādayaśca satyapi garvādihetau jātyādiguṇasamūhe tasya notpadyante; dhairyādhāratāyāḥ tatpratyanīkaguṇayogitvāt | tatra—
1. garvānutpattiḥ yathā— (śāku. 5.17)
bhavanti namrāstaravaḥ phalodgamairnavāmbubhirbhūrivilambino ghanāḥ |
anuddhatāḥ satpuruṣāḥ samṛddhibhiḥ svabhāva evaiṣa paropakāriṇām || 136 ||
2. madānutpattirmadyapānapratiṣedhenaiva siddhā |
3. amarṣānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 4.64)
apanītaśirastrāṇāḥ śeṣāstaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ |
praṇipātapratīkāraḥ saṃrambho hi mahātmanām || 137 ||
4. asūyānutpattiryathā—
tasya sandhāstha yadi vā rāmo vā yadi vā priyaḥ |
tat prasīdatu mātā naḥ pūrṇakāmā 'stu madhyamā || 138 ||
5. īrṣyānutpattiryathā—(mavīca. 1.31)
sādhāraṇyānnirātaṅkaḥ kanyāmanyo 'pi yācate |
kiṃ punarjagatāṃ jetā prapautraḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ || 139 ||
6. ugratānutpattiryathā—(kirātā. 14.11)
yadi pramāṇīkṛtamāryaceṣṭitaṃ kimityadoṣeṇa tiraskṛtā vayam |
ayātapūrvā parivādagocaraṃ satāṃ hi vāṇī guṇameva bhāṣate || 140 ||
7. jugupsānutpattiryathā—
akāryaṃ ca samastaistairupanyastamidaṃ tathā |
paranindāṃ yathā kartuṃ vayamete 'dya śikṣitāḥ || 141 ||
8. vismayānutpattiryathā—(kirātā. 6.28)
mahate phalāya tadavekṣya śivaṃ vikasannimittakusumaṃ sa puraḥ |
na jagāma vismayavaśaṃ, vaśināṃ na hi hanti dhairyamanubhāvaguṇaḥ || 142 ||
9. capalatānutpattiryathā—(śāku. 1.25)
anuyāsyan munitanayāṃ sahasā vinayena vāritaprasaraḥ |
sthānādanuc‍calannapi gatveva punaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ || 143 ||
10. ālasyānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 2.6)
sthitaḥ sthitāmuc‍calitaḥ prayātāṃ niṣeduṣīmāsanabandhadhīraḥ |
jalābhilāṣī jalamādadānāṃ chāyeva tāṃ bhūpatiranvagacchat || 144 ||
11. bhayānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 2.4)
vratāya tenānucareṇa dhenornyaṣedhi śeṣo 'pyanuyāyivargaḥ |
na cānyatastasya śarīrarakṣā svavīryagup‍tā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ || 145 ||
12. trāsānutpattiryathā—
yasyendreṇodyate vajre nidrālokye vaśe sthite |
lebhe 'vakāśaṃ hṛdaye na santrāso na vismayaḥ || 146 ||
13.kampānutpattiryathā—(kirātā. 15.44)
vilaṅghya patriṇāṃ paṅktīrbhinnaḥ śivaśilīmukhaiḥ |
jyāyo vīryamupāśritya na cakampe kapidhvajaḥ || 147 ||
14. stambhānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 2.42)
pratyabravīc‍cainamiṣuprayoge tatpūrvasaṅge vitathaprayat‍naḥ |
jaḍīkṛtastryambakavīkṣitena vajraṃ mumukṣanniva vajrapāṇiḥ || 148 ||
15. śokānutpattiryathā—(mavīca. 5.7)
tasya vidyātapovṛddhasaṃyogaḥ svā ca dhīratā |
nyāye rakṣādhikāraśca daurmanasyaṃ vyapohati || 149 ||
16. unmādānutpattiryathā—
śabdaṃ ca māhātmyaviśeṣasūcakaṃ vadanti cihnaṃ mahatāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ |
mano yadeṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasamplave prayāti nonmādaviṣādavaś‍yatām || 150 ||
17. viṣādānutpattiryathā—
yadi dahatyanalo 'tra kimadbha‍utaṃ? yadi ca gauravamadriṣu kiṃ tataḥ? |
kalilamambu sadaiva payonidheḥ prakṛtireva satāmaviṣāditā || 151 ||
18. vaivarṇyānutpattiryathā—(śāku. 6.6)
pratyādiṣṭaviśeṣamaṇḍanavidhirvāmaprakoṣṭhe ślathaṃ bibhrat kāñcanamekameva valayaṃ śvāsoparaktādharaḥ |
cintājāgaraṇaprakā/tāntanayanastejoguṇādātmanaḥ saṃskārollikhito mahāmaṇiriva kṣīṇo 'pi nālakṣyate || 152 ||
19. dainyānutpattiryathā—(nīti. 89)
vipadi mahatāṃ dhairyadhvaṃsaṃ yadīkṣitumīhase virama viramāyāsādasmād duradhyavasāyataḥ |
ayi hatavidhe! kalpāpāyavyapetanijakramāḥ kulaśikhariṇaḥ kṣudrā naite navā jalarāśayaḥ || 153 ||
20. svarabhedānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 3.43)
śataistamakṣṇāmanimeṣavṛttibhiḥ hariṃ viditvā haribhiśca vājibhiḥ |
avocadenaṃ gaganaspṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayanniva || 154 ||
21. āvegānutpattiryathā—(māghaḥ 2.79)
ārabhante 'lpamevājñāḥ kāmaṃ vyagrā bhavanti ca | mahārambhāḥ kṛtadhiyastiṣṭhanti ca nirākulāḥ || 155 ||
22. mohānutpattiryathā—
muhyanti nāpatsu, vadanti satyaṃ, pṛcchanti vṛddhān, sukṛtaṃ, smaranti |
bhavantyamāyākapaṭāḥ kilaite santaḥ satoṣā na tu dīrgharoṣāḥ || 156 ||
23. jāḍyānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 9.63)
vyāghrānabhīrabhimukhotpattitān guhābhyaḥ phullāsanāgraviṭapāniva vāyurugṇān | śikṣāviśeṣalaghuhastatayā nimeṣāt tūṇīcakāra śarapūritavaktrarandhrān || 157 ||
24. nirvedānutpattiryathā—(raghu. 2.24)
tāmantikanyastabalipradīpāmanvāsya gop‍tā gṛhiṇīsahāyaḥ |
krameṇa sup‍tāmanu saṃviveśa sup‍totthitāṃ prātarudanvatiṣṭhat || 158 ||
25. śramānutpattiryathā—
vaṃśalakṣmīmanuddha‍ṛtya samucchedena vidviṣām |
nirvāṇamapi manye 'hamantarāyaṃ jayaśriyaḥ || 159 ||
tadetad dharmaśṛṅgāre dhīrodāttasya ceṣṭitam |
manovākkāyaceṣṭābhiḥ spaṣṭamevopavarṇitam || 160 ||
pāñcālī bhāratī prācyā rītivṛttipravṛttayaḥ |
svakīyā nāyikā cāsmin dhīrodāttaśca nāyakaḥ || 161 ||
sa eṣa dharmadrumabālapallavo lavoccayaḥ sūnṛtamukti/sūktisampadām |
padaṃ dadhānaḥ śrutimārgagocare cirāya yā vā 'nabhisaṃmataṃ satām || 162 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe dharmaśṛṅgāraprakāśano nāma
|| aṣṭādaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 18 ||
chinnacchinnatanuḥ prakāśa upadīcarkarttyayaṃ dhīmatāṃ varyebhyo nanu dharmatattvamiha yat sāraḥ śrutīnāṃ tu saḥ |
asmin dattadṛśo bhavantu kuśalāḥ svaṃ cāritīsaubhagaṃ citraṃ vīkṣitumātmanaiva viśadaiś‍cakṣurbhiruc‍caistarām ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe ekonaviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
arthaśṛṅgāraprakāśaḥ
(arthaḥ)
artho nāma ātmanaḥ sukhasādhanānāṃ kalatramitrādīnāmarjanam |
sa tredhā navaḥ, bhūtapūrvaḥ, pitryaśca | tatra—
(1) svavīryārjito navaḥ;
(2) pranaṣṭānīto bhūtapūrvaḥ;
(3) kulakramāgataḥ pitryaḥ |
(1. navaḥ —10)
tatrādyo daśadhā— 'vidyā, bhūmiḥ, paśavaḥ, dhānyaṃ, hiraṇyaṃ, bhāṇḍam, upaskaraḥ, kalatraṃ, putraḥ, mitrami'ti |
śeṣau tu kalatraputravarjamaṣṭadhā | tatra—
vidyā— 'ānvīkṣikyādayaḥ | bhūmiḥ — kṛṣyā cākṛṣyā ca | paśavo— hastyaś‍vagomahiṣādayaḥ | dhānyaṃ 'śamīdhānyaṃ, śūkadhānyaṃ' ca | hiraṇyaṃ — suvarṇarajatādi | bhāṇḍaṃ — rat‍nājinavastra—kastūrikādi | upaskaro — gṛhopavanaśayanāsanādiḥ | kalatraṃ— ratyarthamapatyārthaṃ ca......| putrāḥ aurasādayaḥ | mitraṃ sahajādiḥ | teṣu—
1. vidyā yathā—(sūmu. 6)
dattaṃ samastamapi tiṣṭhati yat tathaiva jñātirna yada‍ vibhajate, hriyate na coraiḥ |
janmāntare 'pi yadupaiti, yadatra pūjyaṃ vidyādhanaṃ yadi tadasti, dhanaiḥ kimanyaiḥ? || 1 ||
2. bhūmiryathā—
māṣairmāṃsalitāṃ tilaistilakitāmuddha‍ūsarāṃ dhūsaraiḥ vallairvallimatīmamīladavaṭāṃ vāṭairvṛtāṃ vrīhibhiḥ |
kārpāsoda‍dhuṣitāmudārakavanodārāṃ kulutthākulā— mastopadravakodravāmiha mahīṃ dṛṣṭ‍vā jano nandati || 2 ||
3. paśupraśaṃsā yathā—
bhayeṣu durgāṇi, jaleṣu setavo, gṛhāṇi mārgeṣu, raṇeṣu rākṣasāḥ |
manaḥprasādeṣu vinodahetavo gajā ivānyat kimihāsti vāhanam? || 3 ||
yathā vā—
vastuṃ (vap‍tuṃ?) protsahamānapāmarakarakṣip‍tekṣukāṇḍaiḥ saha dvedhākṛtya nitamba! (pāvanava)nakṣetraṃ viśantyāṃ halau |
helodastahalīṣamīṣadalasaṃ romanthamabhyasyato dhanyā dhūrdhurapuṅgavasya vahataḥ paś‍yanti līlāyitam || 4 ||
4. dhānyapraśaṃsā yathā—
durlabhā yasya niṣpattirvyayo yasya dinedine |
dharmakāmārthamūlasya dhānyasya kuśalaṃ gṛhe || 5 ||
5. hiraṇyapraśaṃsā yathā—
bubhukṣitairvyākaraṇaṃ na bhujyate pipāsitaiḥ kāvyaraso na pīyate |
na vidyayā kenacidud‍dhṛtaṃ kulaṃ hiraṇyamevārjaya niṣphalāḥ kalāḥ || 6 ||
6. bhāṇḍapraśaṃsā yathā—(māgha. 3.76)
vikrīya diś‍yāni dhanānyurūṇi dvaipyānasāvuttamalābhabhājaḥ |
tarīṣu tatratyamaphalgu bhāṇḍaṃ sāṃyātrikānāvapato 'bhyanandan || 7 ||
7. upaskaraṇapraśaṃsā yathā—
gṛheṇa śayanīyena bhojanena janena ca |
caturbhireva jānīyānnaro jīvati vā na vā || 8 ||
8. kalatrapraśaṃsā yathā—(sūmu. 1)
proṣitāyāṃ vrajantyastaṃ prajā dharmo yaśaḥ sukham |
nivartante nivṛttāyāmaho bandhuḥ kulāṅganā || 9 ||
9. putrapraśaṃsā yathā—
na vāsasāṃ na rāmāṇāṃ navā sparśastathā sukham |
śiśorāliṅgyamānasya sparśaḥ sūnoryathāsukham || 10 ||
10. mitrapraśaṃsā yathā—(kirātā. 13.52)
labhyamekasukṛtena durlabhā rakṣitāramasurakṣabhūtayaḥ |
svantamantavirasā jaḍīyatāṃ mitralābhamanu lābhasaṃpadaḥ || 11 ||
ta(syārtha)syārjanamalabdhalābhaḥ; yathā— labdhaparirakṣaṇaṃ, rakṣitavivardhanaṃ, rakṣitopayogaśca | tatropayogyo daśadhā— deśa—kāla—śakti—sādhana—kāryānarthapratighāta— vairanivṛtti—vṛtti—māna—khyāti—nimittaḥ | tatra—
deśanimittaḥ aihika āmuṣmikaśca |
kālanimittaḥ (tadā—)tvārtha āyatyarthaśca |
śaktinimittaḥ śaktitrayopacayārthaḥ |
sādhananimittaḥ senāsannāhayantrāyudhanicayabheṣajārthaḥ |
kāryanimittastrivargārthaḥ |
anarthapratighātanimitto durgādyarthaḥ |
vairanivṛttinimittaḥ śatrūcchedārthaḥ |
vṛttinimittaḥ paśupālyakṛṣivāṇijyārthaḥ |
mānanimittaḥ pūjārthaḥ |
khyātinimittaḥ kīrttyartha iti ||
atrārjane tu pravartamānasya vinayādaya upāyaskandhāḥ — 'vinayaskandhaḥ, vārtāskandhaḥ, vyavahāraskandhaḥ, rakṣāskandhaḥ, mantraskandhaḥ, upāyaskandhaḥ, vikramaskandhaḥ, yuddhaskandhaḥ, upaniṣatksandhaḥ, praśamaskandha' iti | teṣu—
1. śuśrūṣāśravaṇādibhiryathāvad vidyopavidyāgrahaṇaṃ tadabhyāsaśca, durgasetuvaṇikpatha— śūnyaniveśagṛhanirmāṇavyayahastivanavāṇijyapāśupālyakṛṣyādibhiḥ vinayaskandhaḥ |
2. svapravṛtticintanaṃ vārtāskandhaḥ |
3. vyavahārasthāpanāvivādapadanibandhanādibhirlokānāṃ mātsyanyāyanivāraṇaṃ vyavahāraskandhaḥ |
4. bāhyebhya āntarebhyaśca kaṇṭakebhyaḥ prajāprakṛtyātmarakṣaṇaṃ rakṣāskandhaḥ |
5. rahasi ṣāḍguṇyacintā mantraskandhaḥ | anupalabdhasya jñānam, upalabdhasya niścayabalādhā(na)marthadvaidhasya saṃśayacchedanamekadeśadṛṣṭasyāśeṣopalabdhirviparyaya— cikitsā ceti mantrakarmāṇi | karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ, puruṣadravyasaṃpat, deśakālapravibhāgaḥ, vinipātapratīkāraḥ, kāryasiddhiśceti tatrāṅgāni |
6. uddha‍ṛtamantrasya sāmabhedapradānadaṇḍaprayoga upāyaskandhaḥ |
7. caturthopāyasādhye tu avyasanārisaṃpadyogāt parasya tadabhimukhaprayāṇaṃ vikramaskandhaḥ. ........(yuddhaskandhāṃśastruṭitaḥ) |
9. yuddhāsiddhau durbalasya balavato vā jigīṣorauṣadhamaṇimantrādiprayoga upaniṣskandhaḥ |
10. parasmādavāp‍tānāmadātu.......mikāṇāmātmasātkṛtya bhayādipraśamanaṃ praśamanaskandhaḥ | so 'yaṃ vidyādirarjito rakṣito, vardhita upayuktaścārthaḥ| yathocyate—
yadanarthāvahaṃ/yanaṃ dravyaṃ trivargāvāp‍tisādhakam |
(dīnānāthaparitrāṇa)kṣamaṃ so 'rtho 'padiś‍yate || 12 ||
(arthaśṛśrṛṅgāraḥ)
upāyataḥ pravṛttau tadavāptyabhimāno 'rthaśrṛṅgāraḥ; yathā—(mavīca. 1.30)
kanyāratnamayonijanma bhavatāmāste; vayaṃ cārthino ratnaṃ yat kvacidasti tat pariṇamatyasmāsu śakrādapi |
kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā; tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā; pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca saṃbandhinaḥ || 13 ||
ārabhaṭī vṛttiḥ, anu(u)̣dhramāgadhī pravṛttiḥ, gauḍīyā rītiḥ, sarvā nāyikāḥ, dhīroddhato nāyaka iti| tatra—
ārabhaṭī vṛttirarthārjanānurūpāṅgatvāt| tathāhi āviddhagatirārabhaṭī; yataḥ— (nāśā. 20.65)
pustāvapātaplutalaṅghitāni chedyāni māyākṛtamindrajālam |
citrāṇi yuddhāni ca yatra vṛttiṃ/nityaṃ tāṃ tādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti || 14 ||
saṃkṣip‍takaḥ, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanaṃ, saṃpheṭa iti tadaṅgāni |
āviddhagatirārabhaṭītyanenārthaśrṛṅgāre dhīroddhatavyāpāraṃ niyamayati |
pustāvapātābhyāṃ svasainyadurgādirakṣāmupalakṣayati| vicitrāṇāṃ hi śilāmṛdvidaladārucarma—(śa)ṇa?) sūtrāyomayasannahatā/straṃśastrādīnāṃ pustasaṃjñā1, parikhākūpavṛdhāvitikādīnāṃ cā 'vapātasaṃjñeti |
plutalaṅghitābhyāṃ paradurgoparodheṣu tadabhiyogaceṣṭāmācaṣṭe| plutairhi prākārādayo vilaṅghayante| laṅghanaiśca prākārādaya iti |
chedyāni| 'kūṭayuddhacaturviṃśatiścitrayuddhāni' iti bruvate |
1. nāṭyaśāstre 21 adhyāye pustavidhānaṃ savistaraṃ darśitam dra. 21.5–211 paryantam|
māyākṛtamindrajālamiti| (anena?) ebhyaḥ svasainyaprotsāhanaparabalastambhanādibhiḥ kāryasiddhaye 'vaskandakālan sūcayati| . . . . . . . . . .
saṃkṣip‍takena māyādibhiḥ parātra(stra?)saṃdhānādanāyāsasiddha(ddhiṃ) kāryaśarīrasya brūte | avapātenākasmikeṣu bhayādyupanipāteṣu tadapasarpaṇopasarpaṇāprakāraṃ prakaṭayati |
vastūtthāpanena svāsthyāsvāsthyayorviruddhakāryopanipāte mantracintāmādriyate |
saṃpheṭena buddha(yuddha?)—kāle 'vaśyocchedyārinigrahaṃ pratipādayati, tallakṣaṇānāṃ tathāvidhārthayogāt| tathāhi—
1. māyendrajālaśilpanepathyādibhiḥ kāryavastusaṃkṣepaḥ saṃkṣip‍takaḥ|
2. bhayādibhiḥ vidravādikarmasu praveśanirgamo 'vapātaḥ|
3. avidravaḥ savidravo vā sarvarasabhāvasamāso vastūtthāpanam|
4. nānāstrayuddhaniddhādibhiḥ sasaṃrambhasaṃprahāraḥ saṃpheṭa iti|
ụdhramāgadhī pravṛttiḥ| dhīroddhataceṣṭānurūpavilepanamālyabhūṣaṇolbaṇaviśeṣa— veṣatvādarthaśrṛṅgāraḥ| yathā—
ārdrāḥ strajo malayajodakamacchamekaṃ vāsaśca vāsavaripurmamṛṣe 'lasāṅgaḥ |
sañcikliśe kalitarudraniketanādribhariṇa tatkṣaṇamasau maṇibhūṣaṇānām || 15 ||
gauḍīyā rītiḥ, dīrghaviddhoddhatasvarūpavākyatvāt| yato yadatidīrghasamāsam, anatisphuṭārakṣarabandhaṃ, nātyupacāravṛttimat, pādānuprāsayogi, yogavṛttiparamparāgarbhavacaḥ, sā gauḍīyā| sā ca prāyo 'rthaśāstreṣu dhīroddhataceṣṭāsu cāvalokyā, ityarthaśrṛṅāgarāṅgam |
sarvā nāyikāḥ; arthaśrṛṅgārādhikāriṇo dhīroddhatanāyakasyānavasthitacittatvāt dharmārthabādhena kāmasevābhyupagamāt| kriyāmithyāyogācca naikā nāyiketyataḥ sarvā arthaśrṛṅgārāṅgam |
dhīroddhataśca nāyaka iti| yatra hi trayo 'dhikāriṇaḥ (dhīrodātto), dhīroddhato dhīralalitaśca, tatra yathoktānāṃ vidyādyarthānāmadharmakāmabādhayā yathā vā arjuno dhīrodāttaḥ pravartata ityanupadeś‍yaḥ dhīrapraśānto 'pi tulyatvādanupadeśyaḥ| dhīralalitastu dharmārthāvabhibhūya kāma eva pravartate| so 'pyanupadeś‍yaḥ| dhīroddhatastu dharmakāmāvanapekṣamāṇaḥ sarvadā 'rthamevānurudhyata ityarthaśrṛṅgāre tadadhikāritvenāsya vyapadeśaḥ| prāguktavidyādyārjane tadupāyapūrvikāyāṃ pravṛttau tasyaiva tadanatikramābhimānāt saguṇaprakṛtipravṛttiparigraha— bhedāccatuścatvāriṃśatprakāraḥ |
tatra guṇabhoga/bhedajātyādiguṇasaṃpadapādā 'rdhahānyā madhyamaḥ, kaniṣṭhaśca| prakṛtitastāmasaḥ, pravṛttitaḥ anukūlo, dakṣiṇaśśaṭho dhṛṣṭaśca; parigrahādasādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇaśca| tadetatpravṛttirvṛttirityādikametallakṣaṇodāharaṇaiḥ pūrvameva nirṇītam|1 idānīṃ nāyakavyapadeśaheturdhairyaṃ vicāryate |
(uddhata—dhairyam)
tatra dhīroddhatasya dhairyamuddhataṃ bhavati| yatprabhāvādabhyudayādibhirutsekaḥ, śokādibhirvaiklavyaṃ, vyasanādibhirdīnatvaṃ, rāgādibhirdharmabādhā, cariteṣvasadṛśaspardhā, nīcārtheṣvapyajugupsā, aśaktāveva kṣāntiḥ, skhaliteṣu nānuśayaḥ, sadācāreṣvanādaraḥ, paraguṇeṣu mātsaryaṃ, paravyasaneṣu praharṣaḥ, parāpavādeṣu prītiḥ, asthāneṣu krodhaḥ, prārabdheṣvanirvāhaḥ karmātiśaye vismayaḥ, svajātyādibhiścābhimāna iti| tatra—
1. abhyudayādibhirutseko yathā—(raghu. 7.67)
itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrān vaidarbhi! paś‍yānumatā mayā 'si |
evaṃvidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ || 16 ||
yathā vā—(bārā. 8.74)
kiṃ śacyāṃ parato ratirdhanapaterdūre bhavantu striya— ścandrāntaḥpurametadastu parataḥ ko vairiṇīṣūtsavaḥ |
sākaṃ śakrajitaḥ kalatranivahaiḥ sardhaṃ ca dārairmama prītyullāsitapāṇipallayugaṃ mandodarī nṛtyati || 17 ||
2. śokādibhirvaiklavyaṃ yathā—(mavīca. 4.55)
prāṇāḥ prayānti paritastamasā vṛto 'smi marmacchido mama rujaḥ prasarantyapūrvāḥ |
akṣṇormukhendumupadhehi giraṃ ca dehi hā vatsa! mayyakaruṇo sahasaiva mā bhūḥ || 18 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.20)
mātarmātardalacati hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviratajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅ‍mohaḥ sthagayati kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi || 19 ||
1. pañcadaśe prakāśe pṛ. 861–878 |
3. vyasanādibhirdainyaṃ yathā—(mavīca. 5.30)
viśliṣṭabhāgadheyānāṃ dvayī naḥ paramā gatiḥ |
dharmaḥ prakṛṣyamāṇo vā gop‍tā dharmasya vā bhavān || 20 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 4.22)
puṇyā brāhmaṇajātiranvayaguṇaḥ śāstraṃ/ślāghyaṃ caritraṃ ca me yenaikena hṛtānyamūni haratā caitanyamātrāṃ mayi |
ekaḥ sannapi bhūridoṣagahanaḥ so 'yaṃ tvayā preyasā vatsa! brāhmaṇavatsalena śamitaḥ kṣemāya darpāmayaḥ || 21 ||
4. rāgādibhirdharmabādhā yathā—(raghu. 9.74)
nṛpateḥ pratiṣiddhameva tat kṛtavān paṅktiratho vilaṅghaya yat |
apathe padamarpayanti hi śrutavanto 'pi rajonimīlitāḥ || 22 ||
yathā vā—(vesaṃ. 3.11)
aśvatthāmā hata iti pṛthāsūnunā spaṣṭamuktvā svairaṃ śeṣe gaja iti kila vyāhṛtaṃ satyavācā |
tacchurutvā 'sau dayitatanayaḥ pratyayāt tasya rājñaḥ śastrāṇyājau nayanasalilaṃ ceti tulyaṃ mumoca || 23 ||
5. cariteṣu teṣvasadṛśaspardhā yathā—(hanumannā. 12.2)
kṣudrāḥ! santrāsamenaṃ vijahitaharayo bhinnaśakrebhakumbhā yuṣmādgātreṣu lajjāṃ dadhati paramamī sāyakāḥ saṃpatantaḥ |
saumitre! tiṣṭha pātraṃ tvamasi na hi ruṣāṃ, nanvahaṃ meghanādaḥ kiñcitsaṃrambhalīlāniyamitajaladhiṃ rāmamanveṣayāmi || 24 ||
yathā vā—
tadunnataṃ śārṅgadharasya rukmiṇīstanābhighātapravilup‍tacandanam |
upaitu tāvad yudhi gṛdhrakāminīniratyayāśleṣavidheyatāmuraḥ || 25 ||
6. nīcārtheṣvapyajugupsā yathā—(urā. 2.4)
patnīṃ kṣatriyapuṅgavasya śaminaḥ svīkartumicchan guṇai— rākṛṣṭo daśakandharaḥ svasṛdhiyā dhīstāvadeṣā mama |
satyaṃ nāma tadastu tatra balavad vidveṣiṇaḥ kiṃ kṣamaṃ māyāsādhyamidaṃ vihāya sahajaṃ vīrakramaṃ vikramam || 26 ||
yathā vā—(bhaṭṭi. 14.1)
tato daśāsyaḥ smaravihvalātmā cāraprakāśīkṛtaśatruśaktiḥ |
vimohya māyāmayarāmamūrdhnā sītāmanīkaṃ prajighāya yoddhum || 27 ||
7. aśaktāveva kṣāntiryathā—(mavīca. 3.27)
bhṛgorvaṃśe jātastapasi ca kilāyaṃ sthita iti dviṣatyapyasmābhiściramiha titikṣaiva hi kṛtā |
yadā bhūyobhūyastṛṇavadavadhūnotyanibhṛta— stadā vipre 'pyasmin namatu dhanuranyā 'sti na gatiḥ || 28 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 3.20)
rājāno munayaścaite mahimnaiva mahākṣamāḥ |
kṣamantāṃ nāma, na tveva śatānandaḥ kṣamiṣyate || 29 ||
8. skhaliteṣu nānuśayo yathā—
krīḍatāṃ mṛgavaneṣu dhanvināṃ rūpakoṭikadane 'pyakampinām |
(kā priyā bhavati kā ca vipriyā sundarīṣu bata kāmakāminām || 30 ||1)
yathā vā—(vesaṃ. 2.2)
āśastragrahaṇādakuṇṭhaparaśostasyāpi jetā mune— stāpāyāsya na pāṇḍusūnubhirayaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śaraiḥ śāyitaḥ |
praụdhānekadhanurdharādivijayaśrāntasya caikākino bālasyāyamarātilūnadhanuṣaḥ prīto 'bhimanyorvadhāt || 31 ||
9. sadācāreṣvanādaro yathā—(kirātā. 3.14)
jahātu nainaṃ kathamarthasiddhiḥ saṃśayya karṇādiṣu tiṣṭhate yaḥ |
asādhuyogā hi jayāntarāyāḥ pramāthinīnāṃ vipadāṃ padāni || 32 ||
yathā vā—
na sūrayo na sthavirā na dhīrāḥ, puraḥ sthitāḥ prāśnikatāṃ prayānti |
sa2 tiṣṭhate saṃsadi saṃśayānaḥ pṛṣṭhopaviṣṭāsu vilāsinīṣu || 33 ||
1. uttarārdhantvasmābhirnirmitam| 2. santiṣṭhata iti yāvat|
10. paraguṇeṣu mātsaryaṃ yathā—(urāca. 5.32)
siddhaṃ hyetad vāci vīryaṃ dvijānāṃ bāhvorvīryaṃ yattu tat kṣatriyāṇām |
śastragrāhī brāhmaṇo jāmadagnya— stasmin dānte kā stutistasya rājñaḥ || 34 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 5.34)
vanyā/vandyāste hyavicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate sundīstrīdamane 'pyakuṇṭhayaśaso loke mahānto hi ye |
yāni trīṇi/ṇyakutomukhānyapi padānyāsan kharāyodhane yadvā kauśalamindrasūnudamane tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 35 ||
11. paravyasaneṣu praharṣo yathā—
upatāstu śatrūṇāṃ svayamanyena vā kṛtaḥ |
ratiṃ karoti mahatīmapakāro 'pakāriṇām || 36 ||
yathā vā—(vesaṃ. 5. 28)
cūrṇitāśeṣakauravyaḥ kṣībo duśśāsanāsṛjā |
bhaṅktā suyodhanasyorvorbhīmo 'yaṃ śirasā 'ñcati || 37 ||
12. parāpavādeṣu prītiryathā—(mavīca. 3.19)
mātureva śiraśchedo garbhāṇāṃ cāvakartanam |
rājñāṃ ca savanasthānāṃ brahmahatyāsamo vadhaḥ || 38 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 3.44)
tvaṃ brahmavarcasadhano yadi vartamāne yadvā svajātisamayena dhanurdharasya |
ugreṇa bhostava tapastapasā dahāmi pakvāntarasya sadṛśaḥ paraśuḥ karoti || 39 ||
13. asthāneṣu krodho yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.44)
yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe, yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham || 40 ||
yathā vā—(vesaṃ. 1.18)
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 41 ||
14. prārabdheṣvanirvāho yathā—(bārā. 3.30)
dordaṇḍacaritoccaṇḍo haracintācamatkṛtaḥ |
kārmukāropaṇāyaiṣa samutthāya punaḥ sthitaḥ || 42 ||
yathā vā—(bārā. 3.33)
rabhasādayamādāya kodaṇḍaṃ madanadviṣaḥ |
vrīḍāmayo 'pi yo 'straṃ vo vanditā punarujjhati || 43 ||
15. karmātiśayairvismayo yathā—(seba. 2.43)
pecchaṃtāṇa samuddaṃ caḍulo vi aüvvavimhaarasatthimio |
haṇumaṃtaṃmi ṇivaḍio sagoravaṃ vāṇarāṇaṁ loaṇaṇivaho || 44 ||
(prekṣamāṇānāṃ samudraṃ caṭule 'pi apūrvavismayarasastimitaḥ |
hanūmati nipatitaḥ sagauravaṃ vānarāṇāṃ locananivahaḥ ||)
yathā vā—(seba. 2.44)
uahiṃ alaṃbahi/ghaṇijjaṃ daṃṭhūṇa gaāgaaṃ ca māruataṇaaṃ |
vimhaaparaase saṃmud‌dho/mohaṃdhanāriesu vi mụ̄dho/gụ̄dho bhamaï hiaesu siṃ ucchāho || 45 ||
(udadhimalaṅghanīyaṃ dṛṣṭavā gatāgataṃ ca mārutatanayam |
vismayaparavaśeṣu saṃmugdho/mohāndhakāriteṣu api mụ̄dho/gụ̄dho bhramati hṛdayeṣu teṣāmutsāhaḥ ||)
16. svajātyādibhiścābhimāna iti| tatra jātyādayo guṇāścaturviṃśatiḥ| caturṇāmapi nāyakānāmuttamatvādihetava ityabhihitaṃ purastāt1| tatra—
1. pṛ. 1001, 1005 |
dhīroddhataḥ pādaguṇasaṃpadā ardhaguṇasaṃpadā ca hīno madhyamaḥ kaniṣṭhaśca syāt| tatra— madhyamasya prabhāvabhāvadeśakālajñānamahārambhatāsauhārdāni syuḥ |
kaniṣṭhasya tu aṣṭādaśabhyo yadṛcchayā 'nye 'pi jātyādayaḥ ṣaḍ na bhavanti| teṣu—
1. jātyabhimāno yathā—(kirātā. 14.22)
vayaṃ kva varṇāśramarakṣaṇocitāḥ? kva jātihīnā mṛgajīvitacchidaḥ? |
sahāpakṛṣṭairmahatāmasaṅgataṃ bhavanti gomāyusakhā na dantinaḥ || 46 ||
2. anvayābhimāno yathā—(mavīca. 3.11)
brahmaikatānamanaso 'pi vasiṣṭhamukhyāstvaṃ brūhi vīracariteṣu guruḥ purāṇaḥ |
vaṃśe viśuddhimati yena bhṛgorjanitvā śastraṃ gṛhītamatha tasya yadatra yuktam || 47 ||
3. abhijanābhimāno yathā—(bārā. 1.3)
ahameṣa hariṣyāmi pariṇetuḥ pure 'pi tām |
nārīparibhavaṃ sọdhuṃ dākṣiṇātyā na śikṣitāḥ || 48 ||
4. nivāsābhimāno yathā—(raghu. 5.60)
evaṃ tayoradhvani daivayogādāseduṣoḥ sakhyamacintyahetu |
eko yayau caitrarathapradeśān saurājyaramyānaparo vidarbhān || 49 ||
5. āspadābhimāno yathā—(bārā. 8.2)
tvatkāṅkakāravijaye tava rāma laṅkā sītā ca te punariyaṃ bhavato 'stu dārāḥ |
matkāṅkakāravijaye tu mamādhipatyaṃ tasyāṃ ca te puri kalatrajane ca tatra || 50 ||
6. padābhimāno yathā—(raghu. 4.1)
sa rājyaṃ guruṇāṃ dattaṃ pratipadyādhikaṃ vabhau |
dinānte nihitaṃ tejassavitreva hutāśanaḥ || 51 ||
7. pitrabhimāno yathā—(vikra. 4.19)
sūryācandramasau yasya mātāmahapitāmahau |
svayaṃvṛtaḥ patirdvābhyāmūrvaś‍yā ca bhuvā ca yaḥ || 52 ||
8. śāstrābhimāno yathā—
paccakkhā hi parokkhaṃ kahavi tugga(jjha)/tulaggaghaḍiāhi āgamasud‌dhaṃ |
saṃcāliaṇikkappaṃ aṇuhūāhi vi mahaṃ suaṃ mipi tulāgracaa garuaṃ || 53 ||
(pratyakṣata‍‍ddhiṃ parokṣaṃ kathaṃ vā tava ghaṭitāddhi āgamaśuddham |
sañcālitā niṣkampamanubhūtāddhi api mama śrutameva gurukam ||)
9. vāggmitābhimāno yathā—(kirātā. 14.3)
viviktavarṇā 'bharaṇā sukhaśrutiḥ prasādayantī hṛdayānyapi dviṣām |
pravartate nā 'kṛtapuṇyakarmaṇāṃ prasannagambhīrapadā sarasvatī || 54 ||
10. kalāvaidagdhyābhimāno yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.10)
tava prasādāt kusumāyudho 'pi sahāyamekaṃ madhumeva labdhvā |
kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇerdhairyacyutiṃ, ke mama dhanvino 'nye? || 55 ||
11. caturatābhimāno yathā—(harivijaye)
bahumaṇṇasi harippaṇaaṃ saṃdāṇesi tiasesa pāaavaaṇaṃ |
ojaha mud‌dhasabhāvaṃ saṃbhāvesu suraṇāha! jāavaloaṃ || 56 ||
(bahumanyase haripraṇayaṃ sandānayasi tridaśeśapādaparatnam |
apajahihi mugdhasvabhāvaṃ sambhāvaya suranātha! yādavalokam ||)
12. rūpasaṃpadabhimāno yathā—(rāca. 11.87/88)
mlānākṛtī malinacīradharau narau tau nīrājanārthamiva yasya kṛtau/me vihitau vidhātrā |
devadrumastabakabaddhajayāvataṃsa— stvāṃ devaro namatu maithili! kumbhakarṇaḥ || 57 ||
13. saubhāgyābhimāno yathā—
ekasmiñ śayane mayā mayasutāmāliṅgya nidrālasā— munnidaṃ śayitena maccaraṇayoḥ saṃvāhanavyāpṛtām/tā |
pādāgreṇa tilottamā stanataṭe sasnehamāpīḍitā harṣāvegasamarpitāni pulakānyadyāpi no muñcati || 58 ||
14. tyāgābhimāno yathā—
kettiametta vva dharā, maha baliṇo tuṃttha/tujjha? patthamāṇassa/maggamāṇassa |
appā ṇa kevalaṃ cia ahaṃ vi lahuīkao kaṇha! || 59 ||
{kiyanmātreva dharā mahābalinaḥ(taḥ) tava prārthayamānasya (mṛgyamāṇasya) |
ātmā na kevalameva ahamapi laghukīkṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa! ||}
15. śauryābhimāno yathā—(māmā. 5.32)
dhairyaṃ nidhehi hṛdaye hata eṣa pāpaḥ kiṃ vā kadācidapi kenacidanvabhāvi |
sāraṅgasaṅgaravidhāvibhakumbhakūṭakuṭṭākapāṇikuliśasya hareḥ pramādaḥ || 60 ||
16. adīnavākyatābhimāno yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.3)
mātaḥ! kimapyasadṛśaṃ vikṛtaṃ vacaste sukṣatriyā kva bhavatī? kva ca dīnataiṣā? |
nirvatsale! sutaśatasya vipattimetāṃ tvaṃ nānucintayasi rakṣasi māmayogyam || 61 ||
17. śaktyabhimāno yathā—(bārā. 1.44)
sārdhaṃ hareṇa haravallabhayā ca devyā herambaṣaṇamukhavṛṣapramathāvakīrṇam |
kailāsamuddhatavato daśakandharasya keyaṃ jaraddhanuṣi durdama/durmada—doḥparīkṣā || 62 ||
18. dakṣatābhimāno yathā—(bābhā. 1.83)
kasya droṇo dhanuṣi na guruḥ svasti devavratāya cchannābhyāsaḥ kurupatirayaṃ śrīsamutthairvilāsaiḥ |
bhoḥ karṇādyāḥ! śrṛṇuta tadimāṃ brāhmaṇasyāsya vāṇīṃ rādhāyantraṃ racayata punarviddhamapyastvaviddham || 63 ||
dhairyoddhatyahetavaścāsyāṣṭau viśeṣaguṇāḥ — mānaḥ, tejaḥ, śauṇḍīryaṃ, vilāsaḥ, vikatthanā, asthiratvam, agambhīratā, sāhasamiti| tatra—
1. paribhavāsahiṣṇutvaṃ mānaḥ; yathā—(hanumannāṭake 14.6)
dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ, prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā? svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ? |
nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasabhaṭān; jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ || 64 ||
yathā vā—
vyasanaṃ tāta! sā lakṣmīrvarjanīyaiva sā nṛbhiḥ |
prāpyate viṣamaṃ kṛtvā yā dainyadhvajamañjalim || 65 ||
2. adhikṣepādanalpodgāraviśeṣastejaḥ ; yathā—(kirātā. 15.46)
viphalīkṛtayat‍nasya kṣatabāṇasya śambhunā |
gāṇḍīvadhanuṣaḥ khebhyo niścacāra hutāśanaḥ || 66 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 15.47)
sa piśaṅgajaṭāvaliḥ kirannurutejāḥ parameṇa manyunā |
jvalitauṣadhijātavedasā himaśailena samaṃ vididyute || 67 ||
3. garvaprakarṣaḥ śauṇḍīryam; yathā—(rāca. 19.87–88)
cakraṃ vā madhuhā kṛtāntagṛhiṇīdattāśrapañcāṅgulaṃ vajraṃ bhūdharapakṣaśoṇitasurāpānonmadaṃ vā vṛṣā |
śūlaṃ vā 'ndhakaraktabindunicitaṃ gṛh‍ṇātu śūlāyudho dhṛṣṭadyum‍namahaṃ nihanmi samare, kaścit paritrāyatām || 68 ||
yathā vā—(mavīca. 3.24)
tapo vā śastraṃ vā vyapadiśati yaḥ kaścidiha vaḥ sa darpād durnāmaṃ dviṣamasahamānaḥ skhalayatu |
arāmāṃ nissīradhvajadaśarathīkṛtya vasudhā— matṛp‍tastatkulyānapi paraśurāmaḥ śamayati || 69 ||
4. garvajanitā dṛṣṭyādiceṣṭā vilāsaḥ ; yathā—(urāca. 6.19)
dṛṣṭistṛṇīkṛtajagattrayasattvasārā dhīroddhatā namayatīva gatirdharitrīm |
kaumārake 'pi girivad gurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eva || 70 ||
yathā vā—(mahānāṭake 12.2)
kṣudrāḥ! santrāsamenaṃ vijahita harayo bhinnaśakrebhakumbhā yuṣmaddeheṣu lajjāṃ dadhati paramamī sāyakāḥ saṃpatantaḥ |
saumitre! tiṣṭha, pātraṃ tvamasi nahi ruṣāṃ, nanvahaṃ meghanādaḥ kiñcitsaṃrambhalīlāniyamitajaladhiṃ rāmamanveṣayāmi || 71 ||
5. svaguṇaślāghā vikatthanā ; yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.33)
deśaḥ so 'yamarātiśoṇitajalairyasmin hradāḥ pūritāḥ kṣattrādeva tathāvidhaḥ paribhavastātasya keśagrahāt |
tānyevāhitaśastraghasmaraguṇyastrāṇi bhāsvanti me yad rāmeṇa kṛtaṃ tadeva kurute drauṇāyanaḥ krodhanaḥ || 72 ||
yathā vā—(vesaṃ. 5.27)
sakalaripujāyāśā yatra baddhā sutaiste tṛṇamiva paribhūto yasya garveṇa lokaḥ |
raṇaśirasi nihantā tasya rādhāsutasya praṇamati pitarau vāṃ madhyamaḥ pāṇḍavo 'yam || 73 ||
6. prārambheṣvakālapratīkṣā 'sthiratvaṃ ; yathā—(vesaṃ. 6.1)
tīrṇe bhīṣmamodadhau, kathamapi droṇānale nirvṛte karṇāśīviṣabhogini praśamite, śalya़e ca yāte divam |
bhīmena priyasāhasena rabhasādalpāvaśeṣe jaye sarve jīvitasaṃśayaṃ vayamamī vācā samāropitāḥ || 74 ||
yathā vā—(837–38 pṛ.)
ūrū nipīḍya gadayā yadi nādya tasya pādena rat‍namukuṭaṃ śakalīkaromi |
dehaṃ nipītanijadhūmavijṛmbhamāṇajvālājaṭālavapuṣi jvalane juhomi || 75 ||
7. rāgādibhirāśayaprakāśanam agambhīratā; yathā—(daa. 2.9)
etāṃ paś‍ya puraḥ sthalīmiha kila krīḍākirāto haraḥ kodaṇḍena kirīṭinā sarabhasaṃ cūḍāntare tāḍitaḥ |
ityākarṇya kathādbha‍utaṃ himanidhāvadrau subhadrāpate— rmandaṃ mandamakāri yena nijayordordaṇḍayormaṇḍanam || 76 ||
yathā vā—
tadunnataṃ śārṅgadharasya rukmiṇīstanābhighātapravilup‍tacandranam |
upaitu tāvad yudhi gṛdhrakāminīniratyayāśleṣavidheyatāmuraḥ || 77 ||
8. kāryeṣvavimṛśya pravṛttiḥ sāhasaṃ ; yathā—
haddha‍uṃ gāhiamoliṃ ad‍dhacchiṇṇasidhilaṃ a moṃttūṇa siraṃ |
kaṃṭhapaḍiāsadhāro uvvaṃteūṇa vāhio jeṇa asi || 78 ||
{hantuṃ gṛhīcamaulim ardhacchinnaśithilaṃ ca muktvā śiraḥ |
kaṇṭhapatitāsradhāro (raṃ nabhasthale) vāhito yenāsiḥ ||}
yathā vā—
ācāryaṃ kiṃ nihanmi pracaladasilatāpañjaraprāvṛtāśaṃ nāgānāṃ vṛndabandhaṃ kimuta ghanaghaṭābhogabhīmaṃ bhinadmi |
asmin nānāstraśastrāvaliśabalac‍cāpacakrāndhakāre rājñāṃ tāvat samāje bhayalulitasitacchatraṣaṇḍe patāmi || 79 ||
(dhīroddhatasya bhāvāḥ)
so 'yamanayorviśeṣaguṇayogaḥ svābhāviko niratiśayaḥ āntaraḥ, nityaṃ cālpoparāgaḥ, yatprabhāvāt tadanurūpā eva ratyādayo1 jāyante | tatra mdash;
1. madhyamasya ratiryathā—(kirātā. 3.37)
akṛtrimapremarasābhirāmaṃ rāmārpitaṃ dṛṣṭivilobhi dṛṣṭam |
manaḥprasādāñjalinā nikāmaṃ jagrāha pātheyaminendrasūnuḥ || 80 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 1.40)
nirmālyaṃ nayanaśriyaḥ kuvalayaṃ, vaktrasya dāsaḥ śaśī kāntiḥ prāvaraṇaṃ tanūrmadhumuco yasyāśca vācaḥ kila |
viṃśatyā racitāñjaliḥ karatalaistvāṃ yācito rāvaṇa— stāṃ draṣṭuṃ janakātmajāṃ hṛdayaṃ! he netrāṇi mitrīkuru || 81 ||
2. madhyamasya ratiḥ (prītiḥ); yathā—(urāca. 6.19)
dattendrābhayadakṣiṇairbhagavato vaivasvatādāmano— rdṛp‍tānāṃ dahanāya dīpitanijakṣātrapratāpāg‍nibhiḥ |
ādityairyadi vigraho nṛpatibhirdhanyaṃ mamaitat tato dīp‍tāgrasphuradugradīdhitiśikhānīrājitajyaṃ dhanuḥ || 82 ||
saiva kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 1.30)
yenāropaṇakarmaṇā 'pi bahavo vīravrataṃ tyājitāḥ kāryaṃ sajjitabāṇamīśvarastuddorbhirebhirmā |
strīrat‍naṃ tadagarbhasambhavamito labhyaṃ ca līlāyitaṃ tenaiṣā mama phullapaṅkajavanacchāyā dṛśāṃ viṃśatiḥ || 83 ||
1. dra atraiva pṛ. 614 |
3. madhyamasyeti (utkaṇṭhā) yathā—(vikramo. 1.20)
eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrāt pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī |
suraṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrāt sūtraṃ mṛṇāladiva rājahaṃsī || 84 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 3.9)
induḥ sītāvadanasadṛśo, jānakīnetrahṛdyaṃ līlāmbhojaṃ, visakisalayā maithilīhāsabhāsaḥ |
samyak sāmyāditi hi bahavastasya jātā jagatyāṃ laṅkābharturjanakatanayāvipralambhe vinodāḥ || 85 ||
4. madhyamasya cintā yathā—
taṃ ṇatthi jaṃ sahiaṇo ṇa bhaṇejja pecchakkha mantu dūmiahiaaṃ |
aṇuṇejaa jappaṃto jaï ṇavaraṃ vammaho miaṃkoṃvaviaṃo || 86 ||
(tannāsti yat sakhī sakhijano na bhaṇet prekṣasva kṣamatāṃ mantudūnahṛdayam |
anunayet jalpan yadi kevalaṃ manmatho mṛgāṅkopetaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(seba. 11.27)
abbhatthaṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï tīraï tihuaṇasirīa vi ṇa loheuṃ |
ṇa gaṇei sarīrabhaaṃ kaha maṃteṇa/maṇṇe hojja jāṇaī sāṇuṇaā || 87 ||
(abhyarthanā na gṛh‍ṇāti śakyate tribhuvanaśriyā 'pi lobhayitum |
na gaṇayati śarīrabhayaṃ kathaṃ mantreṇa manye bhavejjānakī sānunayā ||)
5. madhyamasya smṛtiryathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yat sarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅgaiḥ || 88 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(urā. 5.11)
gaṇḍūṣāśoṣitābdhipracalajalacarotphālajātasmitānāṃ helākṛṣṭārkacandradviguṇakṛtamahākuṇḍalābhogabhājām |
pīnāṃsasthāpitāśādviradamadamaṣīmāṃsalāṃsasthalānāṃ dūraṃ yātasya vatsa! smarati daśaśirāstvacchiśukrīḍitānām || 89 ||
6. madhyamasya matiryathā—(māmā. 1.32)
mā mūmuhat khalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikāraghanā marirbhūt |
ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmin kāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca || 90 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(seba. 11.28)
paï-māhappa-ṇisaṇṇā avamaṇṇia-sesa-purisasoṃḍīrā |
jaï ṇavaraṃ hojja vase luarāhavasīsadaṃsaṇe jaṇaasuā || 91 ||
(patimāhātmyaniṣaṇṇā 'vasānita(mānita)śeṣapuruṣaśauṇḍīryā |
yadi kevalaṃ bhaved vaśe lūnarāghavaśīrṣadarśane janakasutā ||)
7. madhyamasya vitarko yathā—(śāku. 6.10)
svap‍no nu māyā nu matibhramo nu kliṣṭaṃ nu tāvat phalameva puṇyam |
asannivṛttyai tadatītamete manorathā nāma taṭaprapātaḥ || 92 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kirātā. 16.18)
māyā svideṣā mativibhramo vā dhvastaṃ nu me vīryamutāhamanyaḥ |
gāṇḍīvamuktā hi yathā purā me parākramante na śarāḥ kirāte || 93 ||
8. madhyamasya śaṅkā yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.9)
kiṃ śiṣyād gurudakṣiṇāṃ gurugadād bhīmapriyaḥ prāp‍tavān antevāsidayālurujjhitaghṛṇenāsādito jiṣṇunā |
govindena sudarśanasya niśitaṃ dhārāpathaṃ prāpitaḥ śaṅke nāpadamanyataḥ khalu gurorebhyaścaturthādaham || 94 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.9)
kiṃ kaṇṭhe śithilīkṛto bhujalatāpāśaḥ pramādānmayā nidrācchedavivartaneṣvabhimukhaṃ nādyāpi sambhāvitā |
anyastrījanasaṅkathālaghurahaṃ svap‍ne tvayā lakṣito doṣaṃ paś‍yasi kiṃ priye! parijanopālambhayoge mayi || 95 ||
9. madhyamasya nidrā yathā—(māgha. 11.10)
gatamanugatavīṇairekatāṃ veṇunādaiḥ kalamavikalatālaṃ gāyakai(nai)rbodhahetoḥ |
asakṛdanavagītaṃ gītamākarṇayantaḥ sukhamukulitanetrā yānti nidrāṃ narendrāḥ || 96 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(pṛ. 895)
vrīhiḥ stambakariḥ, prabhūtapayasaḥ pratyāgatā dhenavaḥ pratyujjīvitamikṣuṇā bhṛśamiti dhyāyannapetānyadhīḥ |
sāndrośīrakuṭumbinīstanabharavyālup‍tagharmaklamo deve nīramudāramujjhati sukhaṃ śete niśi grāmaṇīḥ || 97 ||
10. madhyamasya sup‍taṃ yathā—(urā. 1.2)
jṛmbhāvijihmita/vijṛmbhita-dṛśaḥ prathamaprabuddha— lakṣmīkarāmburuhalālanalālasasya |
gātrāpravṛtti/vartibharasasmita/kharvita-śeṣamavyā— davyāhataṃ murajitaḥ kṛtakaprasup‍tam || 98 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 8.27)
nistandrairdigdvipendrairyugapadupagate bodhanāyādhivakṣaḥ prārabdhe dvandvayuddhe pracuramadacayoc‍caṇḍagaṇḍaiścaturdhā |
nidrāmudrāṃ na muñcatyapi tu khurukhurāghoṣagarbhorughoṇā— ghūtkārairghoratāraiḥ svapiti pihitadṛṅ nirbharaṃ kumbhakarṇaḥ || 99 ||
11. madhyamasya prabodho yathā—(raghu. 9.71)
uṣasi sa gajayūthakarṇatālaiḥ paṭupaṭahadhvanibhirvidhūtanindraḥ |
aramata madhurasvarāṇi śṛṇvan vihagavikūjitavandimaṅgalāni || 100 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(seba. 12.40)
tāva a rakkhasaṇāho pāāraṃtaria—kaḍaïaṃ kaïseṇṇaṃ |
raṇamahiaṃ agaṇeṃto ṇiae ṇiddāparikkhaaṃmi viuddho || 101 ||
(tāvac‍ca rākṣasanāthaḥ prākārāntaritakaṭakitaṃ kapisainyam |
raṇamahitamagaṇayan nijake nidrāparikṣaye vibuddhaḥ ||)
12. madhyamasya vrīḍā yathā—(bārā. 2.28)
serṣyaṃ paś‍yati ṣaṇmukhe bhagavatī kodaṇḍaśikṣāślathaṃ dhammillaṃ viracayya cumbitavatī yaṃ vatsalā mūrdhani |
sọdhā so 'pi hi bhārgavo gurutanurnirbhartsanāṃ rāvaṇā— dityākarṇya gaṇairvṛtaḥ smitamukhairīśo 'pi lajjiṣyate || 102 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.26)
bhūyaḥ paribhavakṣāntilajjābandhuritānanam |
aniśśeṣitakauravyaṃ na paś‍yasi vṛkoradaram || 103 ||
13. madhyamasya harṣo (/ dhṛtiḥ) yathā—(bārā. 5.9)
na prīte parameśvare 'pi śirasāṃ chedena homena vā jyāvallīnahanena cāmarapatau dvārārgalāsaṅgini |
saṃpratyailabilāt1 tathā naca hṛte viśvātithau puṣpake draṣṭavyā janakātmajetyatha yathā laṅkeśvaro modate || 104 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.13)
diṣṭyā 'rdhaśrutavipralabdhavacanakrodhādahaṃ no gato diṣṭyā no paruṣaṃ ruṣā 'rdhakathite kiñcinmayā vyāhṛtam |
māṃ pratyāyayituṃ vimūḍhahṛdayaṃ diṣṭyā kathā 'ntaṃ gatā mithyādūṣitayā 'nayā virahitaṃ diṣṭyā na jātaṃ jagat || 105 ||
14. madhyamasya romāñco yathā—(urāca. 5.18)
etasmin masṛṇitarājapaṭṭakānte moktavyā kathamiva sāyakāḥ śarīre |
yatprāp‍tau mama parirambhaṇābhilāṣādunmīlatpulakakadambamaṅgamāste || 106 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(seba. 15.66)
pulaaṃ jaṇeṃti dahakaṃdharassa rāhavasarā sarīrammi aḍaṃtā |
jaṇaataṇaāpaoharapphaṃsamahagghā via karaalāaṭṭhia vimukkā || 107 ||
(pulakaṃ janayanti daśakandharasya rāghavaśarāḥ śarīre patantaḥ |
janakatanayāpayodharasparśamahārghā iva karatalākṛṣṭavimuktāḥ ||)
15. madhyamasya hāso yathā—(urāca. 5.33)
ko 'pyeṣa samprati navaḥ puruṣāvatāro vīro na yasya bhagavān bhṛgunandano 'pi |
paryāp‍tasap‍tabhuvanābhayadakṣiṇāni puṇyāni tātacaritāni ca yo na veda || 108 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.28)
duśśāsanasya hṛdayakṣatajāmbupāne duryodhanasya ca yathā vyathitorubhaṅge |
tejasvināṃ samaramūrdhani pāṇḍavānāṃ jñeyā jayadrathavadhe 'pi tathā pratijñā || 109 ||
1. ailabilaḥ kuberaḥ |
16. madhyamasyotsāho yathā—(urāca. 6.16)
āyuṣmataḥ kila lavasya narendrasainyairāyodhanaṃ nanu kimāttha sakhe! tatheti |
adyāstametu bhuvaneṣvapi rājaśabdaḥ kṣatrasya śastraśikhinaḥ śamamadya yāntu || 110 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 4.58)
lūnakṣatriyakaṇṭhakandalagalatkīlālanirvāpitaḥ pratyuda‍bhūtaśikhākalāpahutabhugjhaṅkāribhirmārgaṇaiḥ |
etad vai suravaktrakālakabalavyāpāramabhyasyatu krośastambanikuñjapuñjitaghanajyāghoṣamasmaddhanuḥ || 111 ||
17. madhyamasya glāniryathā—(śāku. 2.4)
anavaratadhanurjyāsphālanādeva pūrvaṃ ravikariṇasahiṣṇu svedaleśairabhinnam |
apacitamapi gātraṃ vyāyatatvādalakṣyaṃ giricara iva nāgaḥ prāṇasāraṃ bibharti || 112 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kirātā. 10.10)
yamaniyamakṛśīkṛtasthirāṅgaḥ paridadṛśo vidhṛtāyudhaḥ sa tābhiḥ |
anupamaśamadīp‍tatāgarīyān plutapadapaṅktiratharvaṇeva vedaḥ || 113 ||
18. madhyamasya krodho yathā—(mavīca. 3.40)
antardhairyabhareṇa vṛddhavacasā saṃpaṇḍyi piṇḍīkṛto hṛnmarmāntritaśalyavat paridahan manyuściraṃ yaḥ sthitaḥ |
sphūrjatyeṣa sa eva saṃprati mama nyakkārabhinnasthitiḥ kalpāpāyamarutprakīrṇapayasaḥ sindhorirvaurvānalaḥ || 114 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—
tṛp‍tiryasya na vairimāṃsakabalairbhakṣyairivotpadyate yenāsthīni na carvitāni suciraṃ kṛtvā mṛṇālaspṛhām |
yenāsṛk parimathya dorbhiramitaṃ pītaṃ na śatroḥ kṣaṇād yuktāyuktavicāraṇākṣamavataḥ ṣaṇḍasya kopena kim ? || 115 ||
19. madhyamasya śoko yathā—(urāca. 2.26)
cirād vegārambhī prasṛta iva tīvro viṣarasaḥ kutaścit saṃvegāt pracala iva śalyasya śakalaḥ |
vraṇo rūḍhagranthiḥ sphuṭita iva hanmarmaṇi punaḥ purāvṛttaḥ śoko vikalayati māṃ nūtana iva || 116 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā— (māmā. 9.12)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ, dvidhā na tu bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ, na muñcati cetanām |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ, karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī, na kṛntati jīvitam || 117 ||
20. madhyamasyāśru yathā—
tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairātaṅkaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā |
vinā vācaṃ naitat kṣamamiti nidhāyānanamadhaḥ patad‍bāṣpāmbhobhirlikhitamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 118 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.10)
tyaktaprājanaraśmiraṅkitatanuḥ pārthāṅkitairmārgaṇai— rbāhyauḥ syandanavartmanāṃ paricayādākṛṣyamāṇaḥ sanaiḥ |
vārtāmaṅ‍gapatervilocanajalairāvedayan pṛcchatāṃ śūnyeneva rathena yāti śibiraṃ śalyaḥ kurūn śalyayan || 119 ||
21. madhyamasya svedo yathā—(raghu. 9.68)
tasya karkaśavihārasambhavaṃ svedamānanavilag‍najālakam |
ācacāma satuṣāraśītalo bhinnapallavapuṭo vanānilaḥ || 120 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māgha. 2.18)
dadhat sandhyāruṇavyomasphurattārānukāriṇīḥ |
dviṣad‍dveṣāparaktāṅgasaṅginīḥ svedavipruṣaḥ || 121 ||
22. madhyamasya śramo yathā—
kadalatalaniṣaṇṇaṃ sadmani śrāntiheto— rvyajani janakaputrīvāsasaḥ pallavane |
agaṇitanijakhedaḥ sādhu saṃvāhanābhiḥ paricarati ca hṛṣyan lakṣmaṇo rāmabhadram || 122 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(mavīca. 5.4)
visraṃsayantī parigṛhya pakṣau jātā mamāpyutpatanaśramārtiḥ |
śaktirhi kālasya vibhorjarākhyā śaktyantarāṇāṃ pratibandhahetuḥ || 123 ||
23. madhyamasya mūrchā yathā—(mavīca. 4.55)
prāṇāḥ prayānti paritastamasā ' 'vṛto 'smi marmacchido mama rujaḥ prasarantyapūrvāḥ |
akṣṇormukhendumupadhehi giraṃ ca dehi hā vatsa ! mayyakaraüṇaḥ sahasaiva mā bhūḥ || 124 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kirātā. 13.30)
ata dīrghataraṃ tamaḥ pravekṣyan sahasā rugṇarayaḥ sa sambhrameṇa |
nipatantamivoṣṇaraśmimurvyāṃ valayībhūtadhanurdharāṃ ca mene || 125 ||
24. madhyamasya garvo yathā—(mavīca. 3.37)
dharmye karmaṇi/dharme brahmaṇi kārmuke ca bhagavānīśo hi me śāsitā sarvakṣatrinibarhaṇasya vinayaṃ kuryuḥ kathaṃ kṣatriyāḥ ? |
sambandhastu vasiṣṭhamiśraviṣaye mānyo jarāvāniti spardhāyāmadhikaḥ, samaśca dhanuṣi jñāne ca nāstyeva me || 126 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 1.60)
pariṣadiyamṛṣīṇāmeṣa vṛddho narendraḥ kathamiva tadamuṣmin maithilīlālaso 'pi |
nijabhujabaladṛpyad‍vīrasarge samāje haṭhaharaṇavinodaṃ rākṣasendraḥ karotu || 127 ||
25. madhyamasya mado yathā—
aṃsasraṃsigajendrakṛttivasanaṃ sannaddhameghaprabhaṃ prabhraṣṭapraṇayopanītaśaśabhṛllekhāvataṃsaṃ ca tat |
lolallohitalocanāmbupihitatvad‍vaktranirvarṇanaṃ vande 'rdhāsanasaṃsthitaṃ tava madhukṣībaṃ mahābhairavam || 128 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—
āghūrṇad‍vapuṣaḥ skhalanmṛdugira; kiñcillasad‍vāsaso revatyaṃsaniṣaṇṇanissahabhujasyātāmranetradyuteḥ |
śvāsāmodamadāndhaṣaṭ‍padakulavyālup‍takaṇṭhastrajaḥ pāyāsuḥ parimantharāṇi halino mattasya yātāni vaḥ || 129 ||
26. madhyamasyāmarṣo yathā—(urāca. 4.3)
apatye yat tāvad duritamabhavat tena mahatā viṣaktastīvreṇa vraṇitahṛdayena vyathayatā |
paṭurdhārāvāhī nava iva cireṇāpi hi na me nikṛntan marmāṇi krakaca iva manyurviramati || 130 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 9.43)
laṅkādhīśasya māyācayacaturamatermaithilīnāthacāpa— vyāpārod‍vāntabāṇavraṇanadhṛtaruṣaḥ svāṃ pratijñāṃ vivakṣoḥ |
grīvāgarbhapraṇālīsaraṇisamuditaikaikavarṇakrameṇa cchinnodbhinnairmukhābjaiḥ kathamapi hi girāmeti paṅ‌ktiḥ samāp‍tim || 131 ||
27. madhyamasyāsūyā yathā—(raghu. 9.64)
nirghātograiḥ kuñjalīnān jighāṃsurjyānirghoṣaiḥ kṣobhayāmāsa siṃhān |
nūnaṃ teṣāmabhyasūyāparo 'bhūd vīryodagre rājaśabde mṛgāṇām || 132 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(mavīca. 2.29)
yat kṣatriyeṣvapi punaḥ sthitamādhipatyaṃ taireva samprati dhṛtāni punardhanūṃṣi |
unmādyatāṃ bhujabalena mayā 'pi teṣā— mucchṛṅkhalāni caritāni punaḥ śrutāni || 133 ||
28. madhyamasyerṣyā yathā—(raghu. 3.48)
yadāttha rājanyakumāra! tat tathā yaśastu rakṣyaṃ parato yaśodhanaiḥ |
jagatprakāśaṃ tadaśeṣamijyayā bhavad‍guruṃ laṅghayituṃ mamodyataḥ || 134 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māgha. 15.1)
atha tatra pāṇḍutanayena sadasi vihitaṃ madhudviṣaḥ |
mānamasahata na cedipatiḥ paravṛddhimatsari mano hi māninām || 135 ||
29. madhyamasyogratā yathā—(mavīca. 3.16)
ekasya rāghavaśiśoḥ kṛtacāpalasya kṛtvā śiro mayi vanāya punaḥ prayāte |
svasthāścirāya raghavo janakāśca santu mā bhūt punarbata kathañcidatiprasaṅgaḥ || 136 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(bārā. 1.61)
kurvan maurvī—niveśa—kramanamadaṭaniṣṭhyūta—ṭaṅkāra—ṭaṅkaṃ śambhoḥ kodaṇḍadaṇḍaṃ ḍamaritabhuvanaṃ bhūrbhuvassvastrayo 'pi |
yastāmenāṃ varītā rasayati tadasṛk candrahāso mamāsiḥ kaṇṭhāsthi—granthi—śuklīkaraṇa—bhava—raṇatkāravācāladhāraḥ || 137 ||
30. madhyamasya jugupsā yathā—(bārā. 2.37)
cāpācāryaḥ paśupatirabhūt kārttikeyo vijeyaḥ śastravyastaḥ sadanamudadhirbhūriyaṃ hantakāraḥ |
astyevaitat kimu kṛtavatā reṇukākaṇṭhabādhāṃ baddhaspardhastava paraśunā lajjate candrahāsaḥ || 138 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(vesa. 2.25)
hastākṛṣṭavilolakeśavasanā duśśāsanenājñayā pāñcālī mama rājacakramabhito gaurgauriti vyāhṛtā |
tasminnamba! tatajyakārmukadharo nāsīt pṛthānandano yūnaḥ kṣatriyavaṃśajasya kṛtinaḥ krodhāspadaṃ kiṃ na tat? || 139 ||
31. madhyamasya vismayo yathā—(mavīca. 2.39)
aprākṛtasya caritātiśayasya bhāgairatyad‍bhutairmama hṛtasya tathā 'pyanāsthā |
ko 'pyeṣa vīraśiśukākṛtiraprameyo māhātmyasārasamudāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ || 140 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(mavīca. 1.54)
dorlīlāñcitacandraśekharadhanurdaṇḍāvabhaṅgodyata— ṣṭaṅkāradhvanirāryabālacaritaprastāvanāḍiṇḍimaḥ |
prākpratyup‍takapālasampuṭamitabrahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodara— bhrāmyatpiṇḍitacaṇḍimā kathamaho nādyāpi viśrāmyati || 141 ||
32. madhyamasya capalatā yathā—(raghu. 6.13)
kaścit karābhyāmupagūḍhanālamālolapatrābhihatadvirepham |
rajobhirantaḥ—pariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāñcakāra || 142 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—
dhāvati tarumārohati kūpaṃ laṅghayati śakaṭamutkṣipati |
tinavati tinavati gāyati dṛṣṭvā parayoṣitaṃ ṣiṅgaḥ || 143 ||
33. madhyamasyālasyaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.20)
gamanamalasaṃ ramyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kiñcaitat syāt kimanyadato 'tha vā |
bhramatu bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām || 144 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(pṛ. 891)
ārdrāḥ srajo malayajodakamacchamekaṃ vāsaśca vāsavaripurmamṛṣe 'lasāṅgaḥ |
sañcikliśe kalitarudraniketanādrirbhāreṇa tatkṣaṇamasau maṇibhūṣaṇānām || 145 ||
34. madhyamasya bhayaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.20)
nādastāvad vikalakurarīkūjitas‍nigdhatāra— ścittākarṣī paricita iva śrotrasaṃvādameti |
antarbhinnaṃ bhramati hṛdayaṃ vihvalatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ dehastambhaḥ skhalayati gatiṃ, kaḥ prakāraḥ? kimetat? || 146 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.51)
smarastathābhūtamayugmanetraṃ paś‍yannadūrānmanasā 'pyadhṛṣyam |
nālakṣayat sādhvasasannahastaḥ srastaṃ śaraṃ cāpamapi svahastāt || 147 ||
35. madhyamasya trāso yathā—
ajja vi harī camakkaï jaṃ kaha kaha vi ṇa maṃdareṇa daliāi |
caṃdakalākaṃdalakomalāi lacchie aṃgāe || 148 ||
{adyāpi hariścamatkṛto yat kathaṃ kathamapi na mandareṇa dalitāni |
candrakalākandalakomalāni lakṣayitvā lakṣmyā aṅgāni ||}
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kirātā. 1.24)
kathāprasaṅgena janairudāhṛtādanusmṛtākhaṇḍalasūnuvikramaḥ |
tavābhidhānād vyathate natānanaḥ sudussahānmantrapadādivoragaḥ || 149 ||
36. madhyamasya kampo yathā—(urāca. 5.35)
krodhenoddhatadhūmasaṃkulakaraḥ sarvāṅgajo vepathuḥ kiñcitkokanadacchadasya sadṛśe netre svayaṃ rajyataḥ |
vaktre kāntimidaṃ ca vaktramanayorbhaṅgena bhīmabhruvo— ścandrasyodbhaṭalāñchanasya kamalasyoda‍bhrāntabhṛṅgasya ca || 150 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(mavīca. 3.43)
brahmakṣattrasamājamākṣipasi yad vatse ca ghorāśaya— stenātikramaṇena duḥkhayasi naḥ pālyo 'pi sambandhataḥ |
ātastvāṃ prati kopakampataralaḥ śāpodakaṃ dakṣiṇaḥ prāksaṃskāravaśena cāpamitaraḥ pāṇirmamānviṣyati || 151 ||
37. madhyamasya stambho yathā—(raghu. 2.31)
savyetarastasya bhujaḥ praharturnakhaprabhārūṣitakaṅkapattre |
saktāṅguliḥ sāyakapuṅkha eva citrārpitārambha ivāvatasthe || 152 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 1.35)
vāraṃ vāraṃ tirayati dṛśāvud‍vaman bāṣpapūra— statsaṅkalpopahitajaḍima stambhamabhyeti gātram |
sadyaḥ svidyannayamaviratotkampalolāṅgulīkaḥ pāṇirlekhāvidhiṣu nitarāṃ vartate, kiṃ karomi? || 153 ||
38. madhyamasya vyādhiryathā—(raghu. 8.93)1
tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ plakṣapraroha iva saudhatalaṃ bibheda |
prāṇāntahetumapi taṃ bhiṣajāmasādhyaṃ lābhaṃ priyānugamane tvarayā sa mene || 154 ||
1. raghu. 6.93 iti rāghavaḥ HOS.
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 1.42)
abhihanti hanta kathameṣa mādhavaṃ sukumārakāyamanavagrahaḥ smaraḥ |
acireṇa vaikṛtavivartadāruṇaḥ kalabhaṃ kaṭhora iva kūṭapākalaḥ || 155 ||1
39. madhyamasyonmādo yathā—(vikramo. 4.1)
navajaladharaḥ sannaddho 'yaṃ na dṛp‍taniśācaraḥ suradhanuridaṃ dūrākṛṣṭaṃ na nāma śarāsanam |
ayamapi paṭurdhārāsāro na bāṇaparamparā kanakanikaṣas‍nigdhā vidyut priyā na mamorvaśī || 156 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 9.27)
naveṣu lodhraprasaveṣu kāntirdṛśaḥ kuraṅgeṣu gataṃ gajeṣu |
latāsu namratvamiti pramathya vyaktaṃ vibhaktā vipine priyā me || 157 ||
40. madhyamasya viṣādo yathā—
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile mag‍naṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye! tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
ye 'pi tvada‍gamanānusārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā— stvatsādṛś‍yavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 158 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 4.3)
cirādāśātantustruṭatu bisinīsūtrabhiduro mahānādhirvyādhirniravadhiridānīṃ prasaratu |
pratiṣṭhāmavyājāṃ vrajatu mayi pāriplavadhurā, vidhiḥ svāsthyaṃ dhattāṃ, bhavatu kṛtakṛtyaśca madanaḥ || 159 ||
41. madhyamasya vaivarṇyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 11. 80)
tena bhūminimitaikakoṭi tat kārmukaṃ ca balinā 'dhiropitam |
prāpa varṇavikṛtiṃ ca bhārgavo vṛṣṭidhauta iva vāsavadhvajaḥ || 160 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 161 ||
1. kūṭapākalo hastijvaraḥ |
42. madhyamasya dainyaṃ yathā—(māmā. 9.42)
bhramaya jaladānambhogarbhān, pramodaya kokilān kalaya śikhinaḥ kekotkaṇṭhān kaṭhoraya ketakān |
virahiṇi jane mūrcchāṃ labdhvā vinodayati vyathā— makaruṇa! punaḥ saṃjñāvyādhiṃ vidhāya kimīhase? || 162 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 4.6)
dayā vā s‍neho vā bhagavati! nije 'smin śiśujane bhavatyāḥ saṃsārād viratamapi cittaṃ dravayati |
ataśca pravrajyā sulabhasamayācāravimukhaḥ prasaktaste yat‍naḥ prabhavati punardaivamaparam || 163 ||
43. madhyamasya svarabhedo yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadaṃ sahajāmapyavadhūya dhīratām |
abhitap‍tamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate, kaiva kathā śarīriṣu? || 164 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(raghu. 9.76)
tenāvatīrya turagāt prathitānvayena pṛṣṭānvayaḥ sa jalakumbhaniṣaṇṇadehaḥ |
tasmai dvijetaratapasvisutaṃ skhaladbhirātmānamakṣarapadaiḥ kathayāṃbabhūva || 165 ||
44. madhyamasyāvego yathā—
sampratyeva hi gograhe yadabhavat tat tāvadākarṇyatā— metat te hṛdayaṃ spṛśāmi yadi vā sākṣī tavaivātmajaḥ |
ekaḥ pūrvamudāyudhaiḥ sa bahubhirdṛṣṭastato 'nantaraṃ yāvanto vayamāhavapraṇayinastāvanta evārjunāḥ || 166 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(urāca. 5.1)
nanvetat tvaritasumantranudyamānaproda‍valgatprajavitavājinā rathena |
utkhātapracalitakovidāraketuḥ śrutvā 'tha prathanamupaiti candraketuḥ || 167 ||
45. madhyamasya moho yathā—(urā. 2.23)
vatsasyābhayavāridheḥ pratibhayaṃ śaṅke kathaṃ rākṣasāt? trastaścaiṣa munirvirauti; manaso 'pyastyeva me sambhramaḥ |
mā hāsīrjanakātmajāmiti gurus‍nehānmuneryācate prasthātuṃ na ca gantumākulatayā mūḍhasya me niścayaḥ || 168 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māmā. 9.8)
na yatra pratyāśāmanupatati no vā rahayati pratikṣip‍taṃ cetaḥ praviśati ca mohāndhatamasam |
akiñcit kurvāṇāḥ paśava iva tasyāṃ vayamaho vidhāturvāmatvād vipadi parivartāmaha ime || 169 ||
46. madhyamasya jāḍyaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.41)
karapallavaḥ sa tasyāḥ sahasaiva jaḍātmanaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ |
parikampinaḥ prakampī karānmama svidyataḥ svidyan || 170 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(urā. 3.27)
pihitanayano bāṣpāmbhobhirmuhuḥ srutisaṃbhṛtai— rdhanuṣi vinamanmadhye khinnāṃ nidhāya tanuṃ tataḥ |
śithilacaraṇoddhāraḥ kṛcchrāt padāt padamāvahan kathamayamaho cintāśūnyo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 171 ||
śamāvahitthadhṛtinirvedāścānayornotpadyante |
47. śamānutpādo madhyamasya yathā—(mavīca. 3.9)
yato vimukterapi mānarakṣaṇaṃ priyaṃ viśeṣeṇa tathā hi yasya me |
sanābhayo yūyamahaṃ ca karkaśaḥ śarāsanajyākiṇalāñchano bhujaḥ || 172 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(kirātā. 11.69)
vaṃśalakṣmīmanuddha‍ṛtya samucchedena vidviṣām |
nirvāṇamapi manye 'hamantarāyaṃ jayaśriyaḥ || 173 ||
48. avahitthānutpattirmadhyamasya yathā—
kaṇḍūtivyājasācīkṛtagalasaraṇiryeṣu jāto garutmā— nantarmālyaṃ nililye kila dayitaguṇādicchayā/ditsayā yeṣu śeṣaḥ |
ye ca dhyānānubandhacchalamukuladṛśā vedhasā naiva dṛṣṭā— ste lakṣmīrnodayanto nidhuvanavidhayaḥ pāntu vo mādhavasya || 174 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(seba. 11.9)
pacchāaṃtassa vi se bahuso hiaaṭhṭhio piāṇa vi purao |
samaaṃ dasasu vi muhesu sīāmaïo paaṭṭaï samullāvo || 175 ||
(pracchādayato 'pyasya bahuśo hṛdayasthitaḥ priyāṇāmapi purataḥ |
samakaṃ daśasvapi mukheṣu sītamayaḥ pravartate samullāpaḥ||)
49. madhyamasya dhṛtyanutpattiryathā—(kāvyādarśe 2.165)
citramākrāntaviśvo 'pi vikramaste na tṛpyati |
kuto vā dṛś‍yate tṛp‍tirudīrṇasya havirbhujaḥ || 176 ||
kaniṣṭhasya yathā—(māgha. 2.32)
sampadā susthitammanyo bhavati svalpayā 'pi yaḥ |
kṛtakṛtyo vidhirmanye na vardhayati tasya tām || 177 ||
dhīroddhatasya vṛtte 'sminnarthaśṛṅgārasaṃśraye |
mayā lokaprasiddhe 'pi diṅa‍mātramupadarśitam || 178 ||
uddhato nāyakaḥ, sarvā strī, pravṛttistu māgadhī |
vṛttirārabhaṭī ceha gauḍīyā gīyate gatiḥ || 179 ||
vidyādīnāmupāyairadhigatiravanaṃ vardhanaṃ saṃprayoga— stīrtheṣvartho ya uktaḥ samadhigatacarā pūrvapūrvāgatānām |
tasmin dhīroddhatāderya iha viharato nāyakasyābhimāno— nmānocchaṅko 'pi mukhyāstamiha matimatāmarthaśṛṅgāramāhuḥ || 180 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe arthaśṛṅgāraprakāśano nāma
|| ekonaviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 19 ||
tadidamiha vitīrṇaṃ sahitīkoṣarat‍naṃ vipulati khalu yasmin bhāratī bhāratīyā |
rahayati nijaśokaṃ kāvyapāke prarūḍhaṃ praviralamiti rụ̄dhyā mithyayā jāyamānam ||
revāprasādasya mamāsti bhāgyaṃ vaipulyayogena dṛḍhaṃ parāmbā |
dadau yadetaṃ nanu mahyamadya sāhityasevā 'vasaraṃ praśastam ||
atha śṛṅgāraprakāśe viṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ kāmaśṛṅgāraprakāśaḥ
(kāmaḥ)
kāmo nāma ātmanaḥ sukhābhidhāno viśeṣaguṇaḥ |
sa dvedhā, sāmānyarūpo viśeṣarūpaśca | tatra—
(1) sāmānyarūpo manaḥṣaṣṭhānāmindriyāṇāṃ sveṣu viṣayeṣvānukūlyataḥ pravṛttāvātmanaḥ sukhabuddhiḥ |
(2) viśeṣarūpaḥ priyatamādau tadanurāgāviddheṣu viṣayasaṅkalpādiṣu sadā saṅgātiśayaḥ | so 'pi dvedhā, pradhānamapradhānaṃ ca | tatra—
apradhānaṃ tada‍vilāsasmaraṇalāvaṇyavada‍‍‌rūpanirvarṇanādiṣu tadabhimānānubandhinī sukhāsvādabuddhiḥ |
pradhānaṃ tu sparśaviśeṣābhimānikasukhānuviddhā phalavataḥ sukhapratītiḥ |
sukhaṃ kāma iti vaktavye 'bhidhānagrahaṇam — upacārādarādinā manaśśarīrendriyaviṣaya- sannikarṣānukūlye sati janmāntarānubhavasaṃskāraprabodhāt | sukhārthatāyāmindriyapravṛtti- viṣayasaṃprayoga-tatsaṃpratyaya-sukhotpāda-tadanubhava-saṃskāra-smaraṇa-tadabhilāṣa-manaḥpravṛtti- saṅkalpānāṃ sukharūpāṇāmiva duḥkharūpāṇāmapyupasaṃgrahārtham | tenendriyapravṛttyādayo 'pi kāmavyapadeśabhājo bhavanti | tatra—
1. indriyapravṛttau kāmavyapadeśo yathā—
'śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāmātmasaṃyuktena manasā 'dhiṣṭhitānāṃ sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣvānukūlyataḥ pravṛttiḥ kāmaḥ' (kāsū. 1.2.12) |
2. viṣayasaṃprayoge yathā— 'sparśaviśeṣaviṣayāndhasyābhimānikasukhānuviddhā phalavatyarthapratītiḥ prādhānyāt kāmaḥ' (kāsū. 1.2.13) |
3. tatsaṃpratyaye yathā—
yā tvayā sukhasaṃvittiḥ smaraṇīyā 'dhunātanī |
iti svap‍nopamān matvā kāmān mā gāstadaṅgatām || 1 ||
3. saṃskāro yathā—(kāsū.jayamaṅgalā 1.2.18)
vinopadeśaṃ siddho hi kāmo 'nākhyātaśikṣitaḥ |
svakāntāramaṇopāye ko gururmṛgapakṣiṇām || 2 ||
4. smaraṇe yathā—
kāma! jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṅkalpāt kila jāyase |
saṅkalpaṃ na kariṣyāmi tena me na bhaviṣyasi || 3 ||
5. tadabhilāṣe yathā—
saṅkalparamaṇīyasya prītisambhogaśobhinaḥ |
rucirasyābhilāṣasya nāma kāma iti smṛtam || 4 ||
6. manaḥpravṛttau yathā—(urā. 2.14)
iyaṃ sā lolakṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svayamupakṛtaṃ yena mama tat |
itastīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kuto(kṛto) veṣaścāyaṃ kathamiti mama bhrāmyati manaḥ || 5 ||
7. saṅkalpe yathā—(śāku. 2.2)
s‍nigdhaṃ vīkṣitamanyato 'pi nayane yat preṣayantyā 'nayā yātaṃ yacca nitambayorgurutayā mandaṃ vilāsādiva |
mā gā ityuparuddhayā yadapi sā sāsūyamuktā sakhī sarvaṃ tat kila matparāyaṇamaho kāmī svatāṃ paś‍yati || 6 ||
sa dvirūpo dvidhā, hetubhūtaḥ phalabhūtaśca || tatra—
hetubhūtaḥ janmāntarānubhavasaṃskāraprabodhādātmano viṣayopabhogecchānubandhinī gandhādiṣu yathāsvamindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttiviṣayasaṃbhogaḥ tatsaṃpratyayaśca |
phalabhūtastu sukhotpādastanubhavasaṃskārasmaraṇaṃ tadabhilāṣaḥ manaḥpravṛtti— tatsaṅkalpaśca |
te 'pi pravṛttyādayo dvedhā, adhiṣṭhānasaṃyogādyarthā aṅgasaṃprayogādyarthāśca | tatra— adhiṣṭhānamaṅganādi |
aṅgāni srakcandanādinī | yathocyate—(kāsū. jayamaṅgalā 1.2.18)
sukhaṃ kāmastadaṅgāni bhūṣaṇālepanasrajaḥ |
tathopavanaharmyāgravallakīmadirādayaḥ || 7 ||
tasyāyatanamuddāmarūpayauvanavibhramāḥ |
ramaṇyaścāṭudākṣiṇyairākṛṣṭajanamānasāḥ || 8 || iti ||
tatra—
āyatanasaṃprayogādyarthapravṛttyādayo viśeṣakāmasyaiva hetavo bhavanti |
aṅgasaṃprayogādyarthāstu viśeṣakāmasāmānyakāmayoḥ | kevalaṃ viśeṣakāme prādhānyāprādhānyakṛto viśeṣaḥ |
saṃprayogastu dvirūpo dvividhaḥ | tatra—
(1. āyatanasaṃprayogaḥ)
āyatanasaṃprayogastāvaducyate | sa bāhya ābhyantaraśca |
bāhyaḥ samāgamalakṣaṇo 'labdhalābhārthaḥ |
ābhyantaro ratākhyaḥ, sa labdhaparirakṣaṇārthaḥ |
tatra samāgamalakṣaṇaḥ paratantrayoranyatarānicchāyāṃ lajjayā bhayād vā na ghaṭate |
āntaro 'pyāntaracatuṣṣaṣṭiprayogānabhijñayorna syādityubhayarūpo 'pyupāyamapekṣate |
tatra—
alabdhalābhārtham āvāpa upāyaḥ | sa 'kanyāsaṃprayukta—bhāryādhikārika— pāradārika—vaiśeṣikeṣu caraṇād vidhānam' ityādibhirupadiṣṭaḥ (kāsū. 1.1.10) | labdhaparirakṣaṇārthaṃ tu tantram, tat sāṃprayogike 'pramāṇabhāvakālebhyo ratāvasthāpanam (kāsū.jayamaṅgalā 2.1.1)' ityādibhiḥ prakāśitam | aupaniṣadikaṃ tu tantrāvāpābhyāmasiddhe 'rthe vyāpriyate; tadiha neṣṭam, abhimānābhāvāt |
(2. aṅgasaṃprayogaḥ)
aṅgasaṃprayogastu sāmānyakāmasyāpi nimittam (kāsū. jayamaṅgalā 1.2.18)|
so 'pi dvirūpaḥ — samāharaṇalakṣaṇa upabhogalakṣaṇaśca | tatra labdhalābhārthaḥ samāharaṇalakṣaṇaḥ | sa upāyāpekṣāyāṃ sādhāraṇādhikaraṇoktaṃ nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānamapekṣate, 'sa prātarutthāya kṛtaniyatakṛtyaḥ' (kāsū. 1.4.5) ityādi | so 'yamubhayarūpo 'pi kāmaḥ saṃprayogaparādhīnatvādupāyāpekṣī | upāyapramāpakaṃ tu kāmasūtram |
(kāmaśṛṅgāraḥ)
tatra sāmānyaviśeṣakāmārthino dhīralalitādernāyakasya tadanukūlāyāṃ pravṛttau tadupāyānatikrameṇaitadanubhavābhimānaḥ kāmaśṛṅgāraḥ | tatra—
kaiśikī vṛttiḥ, (paurastyā pravṛttiḥ), rvaidarbhī rītiḥ sarvā nāyikā dhīralalitaśca nāyaka iti | teṣu—
kaiśikī vṛttistadanurūpasvarūpāṅgatvāt | tathāhi śṛṅgāraprāyā kaiśikī | yathocyate—
yā ślakṣṇanaipathyaviśeṣacitrā strīpuṃsayuktā bahugītanṛttā |
kāmopacāraprabhavopayogyā/ bhogaprabhavapracārā tāṃ kaiśikīṃ vṛttimudāharanti || 9 ||
tadaṅgāni narma, narmasphuñjaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha iti (nāśā. 20.45) | sā tu śṛṅgāraprāyetyanena uttamayuvaprakṛtitāṃ pratipādayati |
ślakṣṇanaipathyaviśeṣacitretyanena sambhogayogyān ābhigāmikavaihārikādiviśeṣān upadiśati |
strīpuṃsayuktetyanenāyatanasaṃprayogasya prādhānyaṃ nigamayati | . . .
bahugītanṛttetyanena goṣṭhīsamavāyasabhā—pāna—pradoṣasaṅgītakādīn nirdiśati |
kāmopacāraprabhavopayogyetyanena samastasāṃprayogikādhikaraṇoktacātuṣṣaṣṭika— prayogān anubadh‍nāti || aṅgeṣu
narmaṇā rahaḥparihāsavisranbhādibhiḥ śṛṅgārāvasthāmavasthāpayati |
narmasphañjena prathamānurāge dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇābhisaraṇapremātirekānubhāvavyabhicāri— sāttvikānāṃ puṣṭimabhidhatte | narmagarbheṇa dakṣiṇeśadhṛṣṭaceṣṭitaṃ vyācaṣṭe | tallakṣaṇānāṃ tathāvidhārthaviśeṣayogāt | tathā hi—
āsthāpitaśṛṅgāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā saparihāsaṃ narma | (nāśā. 20.46–48)
prathamasaṅgame bhayāvasānaṃ sambhogaveṣavākyādikarma narmasphañjaḥ|(nāśā.20.49)
āvirbhūtābhilāṣo narmasphoṭaḥ |
tasya kāryahetoḥ svarūpavijñānādipracchādanaṃ narmagarbha iti | (nāśā.20.51)
dākṣiṇātyā pravṛttiḥ; śṛṅgāropayogividagdhādṛtamahārhavilepābharaṇapeśalaviśeṣa— yogitvāt | yathā—(raghu. 6.60)
pāṇḍyo 'yamaṃsārpitalambahāraḥ klṛp‍tāṅgarāgo haricandanena |
ābhāti bālātaparaktasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ || 10 ||
vaidarbhī rītiḥ; śṛṅgārānurūpasaṃdarbhatvāt | yato yadasamastamatisukumāra— bandhamanupacāravṛttimat sthānānuprāsayogi yogavṛttigarbhaṃ vacaḥ sā vaidarbhī |
asamastamityanena sukhabodhanatvāt vilāsinīcittamāvarjayati |
atisukumārabandhamityanena śrutiramaṇīyatāṃ kathayati |
anupacāravṛttimadityanena (sukhāvabodhyatāṃ brute) |
sthānānuprāsayogītyanena sukhodāharaṇīyatāmāha |
yogavṛttigarbhamityanena grāmyatāṃ pratyācaṣṭe | tacca sarvanāṭakākhyāyikādiṣu saprabandheṣu prāyo dṛś‍yata iti sā 'pi dharmaśṛṅgāraṅgam ||
sarvā nāyikā ityanena etadadhikāriṇo dhīralalitanāyakasya kāmasevāyāmiti abhiyogaṃ niyamayati |
dhīralalitaśca nāyakastatkṛtyasyaiva dharmārthānapekṣayā kāmaśṛṅgāre kāmasūtrapratipāditopāyapūrvikāyāṃ pravṛttau tasyaiva tadanubhāvābhimānāt | sa guṇaprakṛtipravṛttiparigrahaprastārabhedāccatuścatvāriṃśatprakāraḥ |
tatra guṇataḥ samastajātyādiguṇasaṃpada‍yogāt pādenaguṇasaṃpadyogācca uttamo madhyamaśca | prakṛte rajaüdrekād rājasaḥ | pravṛtteranukūlo dakṣiṇaḥ śaṭho dhṛṣṭaśca | parigrahādasādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇaśca | tadetad vṛttiḥ pravṛttirityādikametallakṣaṇodāharaṇaiḥ pūrvameva nirṇītam |
(lalitadhairyama)
athedānīṃ nāyakavyapadeśaheturdhairyaṃ vicāryate | taddhīndriyavikārakāraṇaṃ cittadharmaḥ | taddhīralalitasya lalitaṃ bhavati | yatprabhāvādabhyudayādibhiḥ pramodaḥ, śokādibhiḥ vaiklavyaṃ, vyasanādibhirdīnatvaṃ, vilāseṣu vyasanam, vyasaneṣvabhiniveśaḥ, viṣayeṣvatyāsaṅgaḥ, dharmārthayornātyādaraḥ, anarthajanaiḥ saṃsargaḥ, hāseṣu/sāhaseṣu pravṛttiḥ, śarīre 'pi nāpekṣā, sarvanāśe 'pi nānuśayaḥ, sulabheṣvavamānaḥ, durlabheṣvākāṅkṣā, svavarṇanāsūtkarṣaḥ, cādūktiṣu prāgalbhyaṃ, jātyādibhiścābhimāna iti | tatra—
1. abhyudayādibhiḥ pramodo yathā—(raghu . 19.5)
kāminīsahacarasya kāminastasya veśmasu mṛdaṅganādiṣu |
ṛddhimantamadhikarddhiruttaraḥ pūrvamutsavamapohadutsavaḥ || 11 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 1.36)
jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilokanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaṃ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 12 ||
2. śokādibhirvaiklavyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadaṃ sahajāmapyavadhūya dhīratām |
abhitap‍tamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate, kaiva kathā śarīriṣu? || 13 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.18)
taruṇatamālanīlabahulonnamadambudharāḥ śiśirasamīraṇāvadhutanūtanavārikaṇāḥ |
kathamavalokayeyamadhunā harimatīrmadakalanīlakaṇṭhakalahairmukharāḥ haritaḥ || 14 ||
3. vyasanādibhirdīnatvaṃ, yathā—(megha. 6)
jātaṃ vaṃśo bhuvanavidite puṣkalāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ |
tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhurgato 'haṃ yāñcā moghā varamadhiguṇe; nādhame labdhakāmā || 15 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.30)
kekābhirnīlakaṇṭhastirayati vacanāt tāṇḍavāducchikhaṇḍaḥ kāntāmantaḥpramodādanusarati madabhrāntatāraścakoraḥ |
golāṅgūlaḥ ka(po)laṃ churayati rajasā kausumena priyāyāḥ kaṃ yāce yatra tatra dhruvamanavasaragrasta evārthibhāgaḥ || 16 ||
4. vilāseṣu vyasanaṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.44)
tāḥ svamaṅkamadhiropya dolayā preṅkhayan parijanapravṛddha/baddhayā |
muktarajju nibiḍaṃ bhayacchalāt kaṇṭhabandhanamavāpa bāhubhiḥ || 17 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 8.24)
rāvaṇa/vāraṇadhvanitabhītayā tayā kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanam |
ekapiṅgalagirau jagadguruḥ nirviveśa viśadāḥ śaśiprabhāḥ || 18 ||
5. vyasaneṣvabhiniveśo yathā—(raghu. 19.12)
sātirekamadakāraṇaṃ rahastena dattamabhileṣuraṅganāḥ |
tābhirapyupahitaṃ mukhāsavaṃ so 'pibad vakulatulyadohadaḥ || 19 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 9.69)
iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ dharādhipam |
parivṛddharāgamanubandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī || 20 ||
6. viṣayeṣvatyāsaṅgo yathā—(raghu. 19.6)
indriyārthapariśūnyamakṣamaḥ sọdhumekamapi na kṣaṇāntaram |
antareva viharan divāniśaṃ na vyapaikṣata samutsukāḥ prajāḥ || 21 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 19.13)
aṅkamaṅkaparivartanocite tasya ninyaturaśūnyatāmubhe |
vallakī ca hṛdayaṅgamasvanā mañjuvāgapi ca vāmalocanā || 22 ||
7. dharmārthayornātyādaro yathā—(gāsa. 6.29)
loo jjhūraï jjhūraï vaaṇijjaṃ hoi hou taṃ ṇāma |
ehi ṇimajjasu pāse puṃppavaï! ṇa ei me ṇiddā || 23 ||
{lokaḥ khidyate khidyatu vacanīyaṃ bhavati bhavatu tannāma |
ehi nimajja/niṣīda pārśve puṣpavati! naiti me nidrā ||}
yathā vā—(gāsa. 3.61)
gharaṇighaṇatthaṇapellaṇasuhellipaḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃgāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā suhāveṃti || 24 ||
(gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhayanti ||)
8. anarthajanaiḥ saṃsargo yathā—(rāca. 3.28)
na sūrayo na sthavirā na dhīrāḥ purassthitāḥ prāśnikatāṃ bhajante |
sa tiṣṭhate saṃsadi saṃśayānaḥ puṣpopaviṣṭāsu vilāsinīṣu || 25 ||
yathā vā—(vaiśa. 56)
na naṭā na viṭā na gāyanā na ca sabhyetaravādacuñcavaḥ |1
nṛpa! vīkṣitumatra ke vayaṃ stanabhārānamitā na yoṣitaḥ || 26 ||
