9 . sāhaseṣu pravṛttiryathā—(māmā. 5.5)
kuvalayadalaśyāmo 'pyaṅgaṃ dadhat paridhūsaraṃ lalitavikaṭanyāsaḥ śrīmān mṛgāṅkanibhānanaḥ |
harati vinayaṃ vāmo yasya prakāśitasāhasaḥ pravigaladasṛkpaṅkaḥ pāṇirlalannarajāṅgalaḥ || 27 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 5.27)
tvatpādapaṅkajaparigrahapuṇyajanmā bhūyāsamityabhiniveśakadarthyamānaḥ |
bhrāmyan nṛmāṃsapaṇanāya paretabhūmāvākarṇya bhīru! ruditāni tavāgato 'smi || 28 ||
10 . śarīre 'pi nāpekṣā yathā—(māmā. 3.12)
dhatte cakṣurmukulini raṇatkokile bālacūte mārge gātraṃ kṣipati vakulāmodagarbhasya vāyoḥ |
dāvapremṇā sarasabisinīpatramātrāntarīyā tāmyanmūrtiḥ śrayati bahuśo mṛtyave candrapādān || 29 ||
yathā vā—(rat‍nā. 4.16)
virama virama vahne! muñca saṃrambhamenaṃ viracayasi kimuccairarciṣāṃ cakravālam |
virahahutabhujā 'haṃ yo na dagdhaḥ priyāyāḥ pralayadahanabhāsā tasya kiṃ tvaṃ karoṣi || 30 ||
11. sarvanāśe 'pi nānuśayo yathā—(gāsa. 3.29 )
savvassaṃmi vi daḍ‍̣dhe taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvudi ccea |
jaṃ tīe gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthī kuḍo gahio || 31 ||
{sarvasve 'pi dagdhe tathā 'pi khalu hṛdayasya nirvṛttireva |
yat tayā grāmadāhe hastāhasti (kayā) kuṇḍo gṛhītaḥ || }
1. prasiddhastu pāṭhaḥ 'na gāyanāḥ, na paradrohanibaddhabuddhayaḥ | nṛpasadmani nāma ke vaya'—miti |
yathā vā—(raghu. 8.93)
tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ plakṣapraroha iva saudhatalaṃ bibheda |
prāṇāntahetumapi taṃ bhiṣajāmasādhyaṃ lābhaṃ priyānugamanatvarayā sa mene || 32 ||
12. sudurlabheṣvavamāno yathā—(raghu. 19.21)
prātaretya paribhogaśobhinā darśanena kṛtakhaṇḍanavyathāḥ |
prāñjaliḥ praṇayinīḥ prasādayan so 'dunod grahaṇamantharaḥ punaḥ || 33 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 8.4)
ghanāni kāmaṃ kusumāni bibhrataḥ karapraceyāna/nyapahāya śākhinaḥ |
puro 'bhisastre surasundarījanaiḥ yathottarecchā 'pi/vi guṇeṣu kāminaḥ || 34 ||
13. durlabheṣvākāṅkṣā yathā—(raghu. 19.29)
laulyametya gṛhiṇīparigrahānnartakīṣvasulabhāsu tad‍vapuḥ |
vartate sma sa kathañcidālikhannaṅgulikṣaraṇasannavartikaḥ || 35 ||
yathā vā—
apetavyāhāraṃ dhutavividhaśilpavyatikaraṃ karasparśārambhapragalitadukūlāntaśayanam |
muhurbaddhotkampaṃ diśidiśi muhuḥ preritadṛśo— rahalyāsutrāmṇoḥ kṣaṇikamiha tat saṅgatamabhūt || 36 ||
14. svavarṇanāsūtkarṣo yathā—(vikramo. 2.16)
mayā nāma sthitaṃ(jitaṃ) yasya tvayā 'yaṃ samudīryate |
jayaśabdaḥ sahasrākṣādā/dagataḥ puruṣāntaram || 37 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 5.26)
maraṇasamaye tyaktāśaṅkaṃ pralāpanirargala— prakaṭitanijas‍nehaḥ so 'yaṃ sakhā pura eva te |
sutanu! visṛjotkampaṃ saṃpratyasāvapi pāpmanaḥ phalamanubhavatyugraṃ pāpaḥ pratīpavipākinaḥ || 38 ||
15. cāṭūktiṣu prāgalbhyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.86)
adyaprabhṛtyanavamāṅgi! tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau |
ahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte || 39 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 8.76)
ārdrakesarasugandhi te mukhaṃ mattamattanayanaṃ svabhāvataḥ |
atra labdhavasatirguṇāntaraṃ kiṃ vilāsini! madaḥ kariṣyati || 40 ||
16. 'jātyādibhirabhimānaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ1 tad vibhajyate | dhīralalitasya hi dvau bhedau— madhyamaḥ uttamaśca | tatra— madhyamasya jātyabhimānādayo dhīroddhatenaiva vyākhyātāḥ, pādaguṇasambandhīddhatāyā ubhayatra tulyatvāt |
uttamasya prajñāprabhāvadeśakālāvabodheṅgitākārajñānamahārambhatāsauhārdābhimānāḥ ṣaḍapare 'pi saṃbhavanti | sa hi samastaguṇasaṃpadyogāduttama ityucyate | tatra—
prajñābhimāno yathā—(māmā. 4.9)
pramathya kravyādaṃ maraṇasamaye rakṣitavataḥ pariṣvaṅgaṃ labdhvā tava kathamivānyatra ramatām |
tathā 'bhud vyāpāraḥ kamalanayanāyā nayanayo— stvayi vyaktas‍nehaḥ stimitaramaṇīyaściramabhūt || 41 ||
prabhāvābhimāno yathā—(śāku. 6.4)
cūtānāṃ ciranirmi/rgatā 'pi kalikā badh‍nāti na svaṃ rajaḥ sannaddhaṃ yadapi sthitaṃ kuravakaṃ tat korakāvasthayā |
kaṇṭheṣu skhalitaṃ gate 'pi śiśire puṃskokilānāṃ rutaṃ śaṅke saṃharati smaro 'pi cakitastūṇārdhakṛṣṭaṃ śaram || 42 ||
deśakālāvabodhanābhimāno yathā—
taṃ tiasakusumadāmaṃ hariṇā ṇimmahiasurahibahalaparimalaṃ |
ampa—ṇaïaṃ pi dūmiapaṇaïṇihiaeṇa ruppiṇīe viiṇṇaṃ || 43 ||
(tat tridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirgacchatsurabhibahulaparimalam |
ātmana ānīta/ātmīyamapi dūnitapraṇayinīhṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam || )
1. etasyaiva rūpāntaramidaṃ jātyādibhiścābhimāna iti yaduktaṃ, tadvibhajyate'—iti | pṛ॰ 1023 paṃ. 1
iṅgitākārajñānābhimāno yathā—(śāku. 2.11)
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam |
vinayavāritavṛttirato 'nayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 44 ||
mahārambhatābhimāno yathā—(havi.)
aïrā āṇemi tuhaṃ amaāsava-lola-bhamara-laṃghia-kusumaṃ |
tiasa-gaa-dāsa-sīara-tusāra-taṇṇāa-pallavaṃ saggadumaṃ || 45 ||
(acirādānayāmi tavāmṛtāsavalolabhramaralaṅghitakusumam |
tridaśagajadānaśīkaratuṣārārdritapallavaṃ svargadrumam || )
sauhārdābhimāno yathā—(māmā. 9.28)
suhṛdi guṇanivāse preyasi prāṇanāthe kathamiva sahapāṃsukrīḍitaprauḍhasakhye |
priyajanavirahādhivyādhikhedaṃ dadhāne hatahṛdaya! vidīrya tvaṃ dvidhātvaṃ na yāsi || 46 ||
dhairyalālityahetavaścābhinaye 'ṣṭau viśeṣaguṇāḥ — suveṣatā, saṃpriyatā, yauvanaṃ, sthūlalakṣatā, priyaṃvadatvaṃ; lālityaṃ, mādhuryaṃ, dṛḍhabhaktitā | teṣu —
1. udāranaipathyaprayogaḥ suveṣatā; yathā—(raghu. 6.60)
pāṇḍyo 'yamaṃsārpitalambahāraḥ klṛp‍tāṅgarāgo haricandanena |
ābhāti bālātapalip‍tasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ || 47 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 17.25)
āsīdabhimukhaprekṣyaḥ sa rājyaśrīvadhūvaraḥ1 || 48 ||
2. sarvajanamanohāritvaṃ sampriyatā; yathā—(māmā. 2.10)
tata udayagirerivaika eva sphuritaguṇadyutisundaraḥ kalāvān |
iha jagati mahotsavasya heturnayanavatāmudiyāya bālacandraḥ || 49 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 2.11)
asau vidyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanā— dihāyātaḥ sampratyavikalaśarac‍candramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 50 ||
1. 'ākaro mṛgyaḥ; mātṛkāsu uttarārdhaṃ na lakṣyate nāpi truṭisūcakaṃ cihnaṃ vartate |' iti rāghavaḥ HOS. 'āmuktā॰' ityasya pūrvārdhasyedameva tūttarārdham |
3. tāruṇyāvatāro yauvanam; yathā—(raghu. 3.32)
mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśanniva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayanniva |
raghuḥ kramād yauvanabhinnaśaiśavaṃ/vaḥ pupoṣa gāmbhīryamanoharaṃ vapuḥ || 51||
yathā vā—(raghu. 3.34)
yuvā yugavyāyatabāhuraṃsalaḥ kavāṭavakṣāḥ pariṇaddhakandharaḥ |
vapuḥ—prakarṣādajayad guruṃ raghustathā 'pi nīcairvinayādadṛś‍yata || 52 ||
4. analpadātṛtvaṃ sthūlalakṣatā; yathā—(raghu. 5.30)
taṃ bhūpatirbhāsurahemarāśiṃ labdhaṃ kuberādabhiyāsyamānāt |
dideśa kautsāya samastameva pādaṃ sumeroriva vajrabhinnam || 53 ||
yathā vā—
śloko 'yaṃ 1hariṣābhidhānakavinā devasya tasyāgrato yāvadyāvadudīritaḥ śakavadhūvaidhavyadīkṣāguroḥ |
tāvattāvadupoḍhasāndrapulakodbhedaḥ sa tasmai dadau lakṣaṃ lakṣamakhaṇḍitaṃ madajalapraklinnagaṇḍaṃ gajam || 54 ||
5. manojñabhāṣitā priyaṃvadatvam; yathā—(māmā. 4.1)
yad‍vyālaprahitasuhṛtpramohadagdhaṃ saujanyād vihitavatī gatavyathaṃ mām |
tatkāmaṃ prabhavati pūrṇapātravṛttyā svīkartuṃ mama hṛdayaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca || 55 ||
yathā vā—(śāku. 3.18)
kiṃ śītalaiḥ klamavinodibhirārdravātaṃ sañcālayāmi nalinīdalatālavṛntaiḥ |
aṅke nidhāya karabhoru! yathāsukha te saṃvāhayāmi caraṇāvuta padmatāmrau || 56 ||
6. abuddhikṛtā śṛṅgārākāraceṣṭā lālityam; yathā—(kusaṃ. 2.64)
atha sa lalitayoṣidbhrūlatācāpaśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajya kaṇṭhe |
sahacaramadhuhastanyastacūtāṅkurāstraḥ śatamakhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā || 57 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 12.20)
kakude vṛṣasya kṛtabāhumakṛśapariṇāhaśālini |
sparśasukhamanubhavantamumākucayugmaṇḍala ivārdracandane || 58 ||
1. laukikī svarabhaktiriyaṃ harṣapade yathā 'triyambakaṃ saṃyaminaṃ dadarśe'—ti kusaṃ. 3.44 |
7. sarvāvasthāsvanugratā mādhuryaṃ; yathā—(kirātā. 1.21)
na tena sajyaṃ kvacidud‍dhṛtaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtaṃ na vā kopavijihmamānanam |
guṇānurāgeṇa śirobhiruhyate narādhipairmālyamivāsya śāsanam || 59 ||
yathā vā—
yo hi dirghāsitākṣasya vilāsalalita/valitabhruvaḥ/ṇaḥ |
kāntāmukhasyāvaśagastasmai nṛpaśave namaḥ || 60 ||
8. sthirānurāgatvaṃ dṛḍhabhaktitā; yathā—(raghu. 14.87)
sītāṃ hitvā daśamukharipurnopayeme yadanyāṃ tasyā eva pracikṛtisakho yat kratūnājahāra |
vṛttāntena śravaṇaviṣayavyāpinā tena bhartuḥ sā durvāraṃ kathamapi parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe || 61 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 1.53)
yadaiva pūrvaṃ jvalane śarīraṃ sā dakṣaroṣāt sudatī sasarja |
tadāprabhṛtyeva vimuktacandraḥ/saṅgaḥ patiḥ paśūnāmaparigraho 'bhūt || 62 ||
(dhīralalitasya bhāvāḥ)
1so 'yamanayorviśeṣaguṇayogasvābhāvikayorniratiśaya āntaro nityaśrcātmanaḥ saṃskāraḥ, yatprabhāvānniratiśayā (ratiḥ) prītiḥ |
1. uttamasya (ratiḥ) pratīryathā— (urāca. 1.38)
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo— rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaścandanarasaḥ|
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadiparamasahyastu virahaḥ || 63 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.7)
premārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayādudgāḍharāgodayā— stāstā mugdhadṛśo nisargamadhurāśceṣṭā bhaveyurmayi |
yāsvantaḥkaraṇasya bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī kṣaṇā— dāśaṃsāparikalpitāsvapi bhavatyānandasāndro layaḥ || 64 ||
1. paṅktidvayamidaṃ truṭitabhūyiṣṭhahastalekhamiti rāghavaḥ HOS. mūlaṃ jośeraklṛp‍tam|
2. uttamasya prītiryathā—
te kecinnijakāntisundaratayā cetaścamatkāriṇo dṛś‍yante paramotsavaṃ nayanayoḥ sampādayanto janāḥ |
antarye manasaḥ praviś‍ya manasā taistaiḥ svakīyairguṇaiḥ (smṛtyārūḍhavapurbhireva janayantyāhlādanāmutkaṭām) || 65 ||1
madhyamasya yathā—
nādhanyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiñcid‌vinidrālasa— śrotraiḥ savraṇamugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchadāyāsinaḥ |
śrūyante mṛdupītavaktramarutaḥ paurālirītikrama— vyālolāṅguliruddhamuktasuṣiraśreṇīravā veṇavaḥ || 66 ||
3. uttamasyotkaṇṭhā yathā—
kālakramaṃ pratyakathaiva tāvat (khaṇḍitam) |
hi ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ vighna ॰ ॰ ॰ eva || 67 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.9)
sambhūyeva sukhāni cetasi paraṃ bhūmānamātanvate yatrālokapathāvatāriṇi ratiṃ prastaiti netrotsavaḥ |
yad bālendukaloccayādavicalaiḥ sārairivotpāditaṃ tat paś‍yeyamanaṅgamaṅa‍galagṛhaṃ bhūyo 'pi tasyā mukham || 68 ||
4. uttamasya cintā yathā—(gāsa. 2.83)
khaṇamettaṃ pi ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiaha—vidiṇṇagarua—saṃtāvā |
pacchaṇṇapāvasaṃka vva sāmalī majjha hiaāo || 69 ||
(kṣaṇamātramapi nāpagacchatyanudivasamapi dattagurukaṃsatāpā |
pracchannapāpaśaṅkeva ś‍yāmalāṅgī mama hṛdayāt ||)
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.10)
līneva pratibimbiteva likhitevotkīrṇarūpeva ca pratyup‍teva ca vajralepaghaṭitevāntarnikhāteva ca |
sā naścetasi kīliteva viśikhaiścetobhuvaḥ pañcabhi— ścintāsantatitantujālanibiḍastrasteva lagnā priyā || 70 ||
1. caturthaś‍caraṇo 'smābhirupakalpitaḥ|
5. uttamasya matiḥ yathā—(sūmu. 6)
madhu ca vikasitotpalāvataṃsaṃ śaśikarapallavitaṃ ca saudhapṛṣṭham |
madanajanitavibhramā ca kāntā sukhamidamarthavatāṃ; vibhūtayo 'nyāḥ || 71 ||
madhyamasya yathā—
yadetad dhanyānāmurasi ramaṇīsaṅgasamaye samudbhūtaṃ kiñcit pulakamidamāhuḥ kila janāḥ |
matistveṣā 'smākaṃ kucayugataṭīcumbakaśilā— niveśādākṛṣṭasmaraśaraśalākotkara iti || 72 ||
6. uttamasya smṛtiryathā—
tathā gṛhītastanvaṅgayā vijayopārjitaḥ paṇaḥ |
yathā dhanyādharoṣṭhena hārite 'pi jitaṃ mayā || 73 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 9.48)
ānandamiśramadanajvaradīpanāni gạ̄dhānurāgarasavanti tadā tadā ca |
snehāṅkanāni mama mugdhadṛśastu kaṇṭhe kaṣṭaṃ smarāmi tava tāni gatāgatāni || 74 ||
7. uttamasya vitarko yathā—(śāku. 2.10)
citre niveś‍ya parikalpitasattvayogā rūpoccayena vidhinā manasā kṛtā nu |
strīratnasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyāḥ || 75 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(vikramo. 1.10)
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śrṛṅgāro nu rasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ |
vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ sa viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ || 76 ||
8. uttamasya śaṅkā yathā—(māmā. 8.14)
yātā nu tad‍bhagavatībhavanaṃ sakhī no jīvantyupeṣyati tavetyabhiśaṅkito 'smi |
prāyeṇa bāndhavasuhṛtpriyasaṅgamādi saudāmanīsphuraṇacañcalameva saukhyam || 77 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 8.13)
kimapi kimapi śaṅke maṅgalebhyo yadanyad viramatu parihāsaścaṇḍi! paryutsuko 'smi |
kalayasi kalito 'haṃ vallabhe! dehi vācaṃ bhramati hṛdayamantarvihvalaṃ nirdayā 'si || 78 ||
9. uttamasya nidrā yathā—(raghu. 5.64)
tatra svayaṃvarasamāhṛtarājalokaṃ kanyālalāma kamanīyamajasya lipsoḥ |
bhāvāvabodhakaluṣā dayiteva rātrau nidrā cireṇa nayanābhimukhī babhūva || 79 ||
madhyamasya yathā—
ūṣmāyamāṇastanamaṇḍalībhirvarāṅganābhiḥ sphuṭavibhramābhiḥ |
āliṅgitā rātriṣu śaiśirīṣu te śerate yaiḥ praṇato vṛṣāṅkaḥ || 80 ||
10. uttamasya sup‍taṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.84)
kevalaṃ priyatamādayālunā jyotiṣāmavanātāsu paṅktiṣu |
tena tatparigṛhītavakṣasā netramīlanakutūhalaṃ kṛtam || 81 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(saka. 5.470)
āśleṣiṇaḥ pṛthurataklamapītaśītamāyāminīṃ ghanamudo rajanīryuvānaḥ |
ūrvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ svapanti || 82 ||
11. uttamasya prabodho yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.85)
sa vyabudhyata budhastavocitaḥ śātakumbhakamalākaraiḥ samam |
mūrcchanāparigṛhītakaiśikaiḥ kinnarairuṣasi gītamaṅgalaḥ || 83 ||
madhyamasya yathā—
unnidrito 'smi vigalanmadhuvārahāri— vyākośakokanadagandhisamīraṇena |
1(āndolitāsu latikāsvamunā tuṣāra— saṃghāta eṣa viluṭhan vikirĕśca bhāti) || 84 ||
12. uttamasya vrīḍā yathā—(sūmu. 31)
kanakakalaśasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharacchāyāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām |
asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipañ jayati janitavrīḍāhāsaḥ priyāhasito hariḥ || 85 ||
1. uttarārdhamidamatra yojitamasmābhiḥ|
madhyamasya yathā—(gāsa. 4.51)
jāo so vi vilakkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍhamuvaụ̄dho |
paḍhamosariassa ṇiaṃsaṇassa gaṃṭhiṃ vimaggaṃto || 86 ||
(jātaḥ so 'pi vilakṣo mayā 'pi hasitvā gāḍhamupagūḍhaḥ |
prathamāpasṛtasya nivasanasya granthiṃ vimārgayamāṇaḥ ||)
13. uttamasyāvahitthaṃ yathā—(śāku. 2.19)
kva vayaṃ? kva parokṣamanmatho mṛgaśāvaiḥ samamedhito janaḥ |
parihāsavijalpitaṃ sakhe! paramārthena na gṛhyatāṃ vacaḥ || 87 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.264)
rājakanyānuraktaṃ māṃ romodbhedena rakṣakāḥ |
avagaccheyurājñātamaho śītānilaṃ vanam || 88 ||
14. uttamasya dhṛtiḥ yathā—(ratnā. 4.20)
nīto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāp‍teyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāptyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe yasmai karomi spṛhām || 89 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 1.39)
jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilocanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaṃ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 90 ||
15. uttamasya harṣo yathā—(raghu. 3.11)
surendramātrāśrita/yitagarbhagauravāt prayatnamuktāsanayā gṛhāgataḥ |
tayopacārāñjalikhinnahastayā nananda pāriplavanetrayā nṛpaḥ || 91 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 6.8)
mlānasya jīvakusumasya vikāsanāni santarpaṇāni sakalendriyamohanāni |
ānandanāni hṛdayaikarasāyanāni diṣṭayā mayā 'pyadhi/parigatāni vaco 'mṛtāni || 92 ||
16. uttamasya romāñco yathā—(raghu. 7.22)
abhūd varaḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ svinnāṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī |
asmin dvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena || 93 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 3.7)
prathamapriyāvacanasaṃśravasphuratpulakena samprati mayā 'valambyate |
ghanarājinūtanapayassamukṣaṇakṣaṇabaddhakuṭmalakadambaḍambaraḥ || 94 ||
17. uttamasya hāso yathā—(raghu. 19.28)
darpaṇeṣu paribhogavāsi/darśi—nīṃ narmapūrvamanupṛṣṭhasaṃśrayaḥ |
chāyayā smitamanojñayā vadhūṃ hnīnimīlitamukhīṃ cakāra saḥ || 95 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(sumo. 26)
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṅkaro bibharti vapuṣā 'dhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm |
anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ || 96 ||
18. uttamasyotsāho yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.9)
prasīda viśrāmyatu vīra vajraṃ śarairmadīyaiḥ katamaḥ surāriḥ |
bibhetu moghīkṛtabāhuvīryaḥ strībhyo 'pi kopasphuritādharābhyaḥ || 97 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.26)
maraṇasamaye tyaktāśaṅkaṃ pralāpanirargala— prakaṭitanijasnehaḥ so 'yaṃ sakhā pura eva te |
sutanu visṛjotkampaṃ sampratyasāviha pāpmanaḥ phalamanubhavatyugraṃ pāpaḥ pratīpavipākinaḥ || 98 ||
19. uttamasya glāniryathā—(pṛ. ॰ 1012)
prakṛtyā ramaṇīyo 'pi kṣīyamāṇaḥ pratikṣaṇam/kṣapam |
duḥkhamāvahati prātaḥ śaśīvāpāṇḍuracchaviḥ || 99 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 3.9)
yadindāvānandaṃ praṇayini jane vā na bhajane vyanaktyantastāpaṃ tadayamativīro 'pi viṣamam |
priyaṅguś‍yāmāṅgaprakṛtirapi cāpāṇḍumadhuraṃ vapuḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣāmaṃ vahati, ramaṇīyaśca bhavati || 100 ||
20. uttamasya krodho yathā—(śāku. 1.21)
kaḥ paurave vasumatīṃ śāsati śāsitari durvinītānām |
ayamācaratyavinayaṃ mugdhāsu tapasvikanyāsu || 101 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(śāku. 6.20)
akliṣṭabālatarupallavalobhanīyaṃ pītaṃ mayā sadayameva ratotsaveṣu |
bimbādharaṃ daśasi ced bhramara! priyāyāstvāṃ kārayāmi kamalodarabandhanastham || 102 ||
21. uttamasya śoko yathā—
aṅgeṣu candanarase madha(?)stvadāsīt (sairmadhuratvamāsīt) tanvyā mradīyasi vapuṣyupagūhite yat |
(uddhṛtya) kāmakamanīyamakāṇḍa eva(/etat)1 kālena jīvitamivoddharatā hato 'smi || 103 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(urāca. 3.31, māmā. 9.12)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā tu na bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanām |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam || 104 ||
22. uttamasyāśru yathā—(saka. 5.212)
sītāveś‍ma yato nirīkṣya harate dṛṣṭiṃ jhaṭityākulā— manyonyārpitacañculagnakabalaiḥ pārāvatairdūyate |
indordūrata eva naś‍yati viśatyantargṛhaṃ duḥkhitaḥ pracchādyānanamañcalena rajanīṣvastatrapaṃ roditi || 105 ||
1. truṭyāṃ dvitīyatṛtīyapādaikadeśo lup‍taḥ rā.| jośere tu nāstyasya gandho 'pi| koṣ‍ṭhakapūrttayastvasmatkṛtā|
madhyamasya yathā—(megha. 103)
tvāmālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyā— mātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvadicchāmi kartum |
astraistāvanmuhurupacitairdṛṣṭirālipyate me krūrastasminnapi na sahate saṅgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ || 106 ||
23. uttamasya svedo yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.77)
romodgamaḥ prādurabhūdumāyāḥ svinnāṅguliḥ puṅgavaketurāsīt |
tasmin dvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena || 107 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(śāku. 6.15)
svinnāṅguliviniveśo rekhopānteṣu dṛś‍yate malinaḥ |
aśru ca kapolapatitaṃ lakṣyamidaṃ varṇikocch‌vāsāt || 108 ||
24. uttamasya śramo yathā—(raghu. 7.66)
sa cāpakoṭīnihitaikabāhuḥ śirastraniṣkarṣaṇabhinnamauliḥ |
lalāṭabaddhaśramavāripūrṇāṃ bhītāṃ priyāmetya vaco babhāṣe || 109 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(raghu. 9.68)
tasya karkaśavihārasambhavaṃma svedamānanavilagnajālakam |
ācacāma satuṣāraśītalo bhinnapallavapuṭo vanānilaḥ || 110 ||
25. uttamasya mūrcchā yathā—(urāca. 3.9)1
antarlīnasya duḥkhāgneradyoddāmaṃ jvaliṣyataḥ |
utpīḍa iva dhūmasya mohaḥ prāgāvṛṇoti mām || 111 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 9.21)
bandhutā nayanakaumudīmaho mālatīnayanamugdhacandramāḥ |
so 'yamadya makarandanandano jīvalokatilakaḥ pralīyate || 112 ||
1. atra rāghavaḥ—'ākaro mṛgyaḥ; pūrṇaḥ śloko na jñāyate' —iti| jośeraḥ punarna hyeva spṛśati padyamidam, tata eva ca sainī| rāghavo 'pi mohasya sthāne 'loha'—padaṃ paṭhati HOS.|
26. uttamasya garvo yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.10)
tava prasādāt kusumāyudho 'pi sahāyamekaṃ madhumeva labdhvā |
kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇerdhairyacyutiṃ, ke mama dhanvino 'nye? || 113 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.32)
dhairyaṃ nidhehi hṛdaye, hata eṣa pāpaḥ, kiṃ vā kadācidapi kenacidanvabhāvi |
sāraṅgasaṅgaravidhāvibhakumbhakūṭakuṭṭākapāṇikuliśasya hareḥ pramādaḥ || 114 ||
27. uttamasya mado yathā—(māgha. 2.16)
āghūrṇaman madirāsvādamadapāṭalitadyutī |
revatīdaśanocchiṣṭaparipūtapuṭe dṛśau || 115 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(raghu. 19.46)
yat sa bhagnasahakāramāsavaṃ raktapāṭalasamāgamaṃ papau |
tena tasya madhunirgamāt kṛśaścittayonirabhavat punarnavaḥ || 116 ||
28. uttamasyāmarṣo yathā—(bārā. 9.45)
yanmūlato daśaśirāṃsi bhavanti yacca cchedeṣu tāni śataśo 'tha sahasstraśaśca |
tat sādhu rākṣasapate! kathamanyathā 'yamutsṛjyatāṃ janakajāharaṇāparuddhaḥ || 117 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.34)
kaṭhorāsthigranthivyatikaragaṇātkāramukharaḥ kharasnāyucchedakṣaṇavihitavegavyuparamaḥ |
nirātaṅkaḥ paṅkeṣviva piśitakhaṇḍeṣu vilāsa— nnasirgātraṃ gātraṃ sapadi lavaśaste vikiratu || 118 ||
29. uttamasyāsūyā yathā— (raghu. 4.61)
yavanīmukhapadmānāṃ sehe madhumadaṃ na saḥ |
bālātapamivābjānāmakālajaladodayaḥ || 119 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(raghu. 7.2)
senāniveśān pṛthivīkṣito 'pi jagmurvibhātagrahamandabhāsaḥ |
bhojyāṃ prati vyarthamanorathatvād rūpeṣu veṣeṣu ca sābhyasūyāḥ || 120 ||
30. uttamasyerṣyā yathā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnastirayati ca bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe! na tu vayam || 121 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.11)
tad bhīrutvaṃ tava mama puraḥ sāhasānīdṛśāni ślāghā sā 'smadavapuṣi vinayavyutkrame 'pyeṣa rāgaḥ|
taccaudāryaṃ mayi jaḍamatau cāpale ko 'pi panthāḥ khyāte tasmin vitamasi kule janma kaulīnametat || 122 ||
31. uttamasyogratā yathā—(vikramo. 5.1)
ātmano vadhamāhartā kvāsau vihagataskaraḥ |
yena tat prathamaṃ steyaṃ gop‍tureva gṛhe kṛtam || 123 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.32)
praṇayasakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatau— rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat |
vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 124 ||
32. uttamasyānādaro yathā—(urāca. 1.46)
apūrvakarmacaṇḍalamayi mugdhe! vimuñca mām |
śritā 'si candanabhrāntyā durvipākaṃ viṣadrumam || 125 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 9.35)
dhiguccha‍vasitavaiśasaṃ mama yaditthamekākino dhigeva ramaṇīyavastvanubhavād vṛthābhāvinaḥ |
tvayā saha na yastayā ca divasaḥ sa vidhvaṃsatāṃ pramodamṛgatṛṣṇikāṃ dhigaparatra kā mānuṣe || 126 ||
33. 1uttamasya vismayo yathā—
(aho śaratsinīvālī tiraskārasukhaṃ) mukham |
aho/maho (mandataraṃ) madhyamasyāḥ sāraṅgacakṣuṣā/(ṣaḥ) || 127 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(sūmu. 16)
kamalamanambhasi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām |
sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam? || 128 ||
34.uttamasya capalatā yathā—(pṛ. 876)
kaṇṭhe hāralatāyogye yena pāśastavārpitaḥ |
gṛhītaḥ sāparādho 'yaṃ mucyate sa kathaṃ karaḥ? || 129 ||
35. uttamasya/madhyamasya? yathā—(ratnā. 3.17)
alamalamamunā te sāhasenātimātraṃ caritamayi! vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam |
calitamiva niroddhuṃ jīvite jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi || 130 ||
36. uttamasya ālasyaṃ yathā—
jujjaï savvaṃ siriputtiseṇa! jaha bhaṇiaṃ taha vi kaṃtaṃ |
esā ramaṇīā ṇaaṇacaṃcarī taṃ ca bollei || 131 ||
{yujyate sarvaṃ śrīputti/buddhisena! yathā bhaṇitaṃ tathā 'pi kāntam |
eṣā ramaṇīyā nayanacañcarī tadeva kathayati ||}
madhyamasya yathā—(gāsa. 3. 61)
ghariṇighaṇatthaṇapellaṇasuhellipaḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃgāraavāraviṭhṭhidiahā suhāveṃti || 132 ||
{gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhāpayanti ||}
37. uttamasya bhayaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.20)
1. aṃśamimaṃ jośero nāspṛśat| koṣṭhakāṃśapūrttistvasmatkṛtā| tatsarvaṃ khaṇḍitamiti rā.
nādastāvad vikalakurarīkūjitasnigdhatāra— ścittākarṣī paricita iva śrotrasaṃvādameti |
antarbhinnaṃ bhramati hṛdayaṃ vihvalatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ dehastambhaḥ skhalayati gatiṃ, kaḥ prakāraḥ? kimetat? || 133 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(raghu. 19.23)
klṛp‍tatuṣpaśayanān latāgṛhānetya dūtigṛha/kṛtamārgadarśanaḥ |
anvabhūt parijanāṅganārataṃ soparodha/so 'varodhabhayajātavepathuḥ || 134 ||
38. uttamasya trāso yathā—(pṛ. 1043)
ajja vi harī camakkaï jaṃ kaha kaha vi ṇa maṃdareṇa daliāiṃ |
caṃdakalākaṃdala komalāi lacchīe aṃgāi || 135 ||
(adyāpi hariścamatkṛto yat kathamapi na mandareṇa dalitāni |
candrakalākandalakomalāni lakṣmyā aṅgāni ||)
madhyamasya yathā—(śāku. 3.8)
pṛṣṭā janena samaduḥkhasukhena bālā naiṣā na vakṣyati manogatamādhihetum |
dṛṣṭo vivṛtya śataśo 'pyanayā satṛṣṇa— matrāntare śravaṇakātaratāṃ gato 'smi || 136 ||
39. uttamasya kampo yathā—(urāca. 3.41)
karapallavaḥ sa tasyāḥ sahasaiva jaḍātmanaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ |
utkampataḥ prakampī karānmama svidyataḥ svidyan || 137 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(sūmu. 14)
mā garvamud‌vaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti |
anyā 'pi kiṃ sakhi! na bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na ced bhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 138 ||
40. uttamasya stambho yathā—(māmā. 1.38)
vāraṃ vāraṃ tirayati dṛśāvuda‍vamada‍bāṣpapūra— statsaṅkalpopahitajaḍima stambhamabhyeti gātram |
sadyaḥ svidyannayamaviratotkampalolāṅgulīkaḥ pāṇirlekhāvidhiṣu nitarāṃ vartate, kiṃ karomi? || 139 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.20)
nādastāvad vikalakurarīkūjitasnigdhatāra— ś‍cittākarṣī paricita iva śrotrasaṃvādameti |
antārbhinnaṃ bhramati hṛdayaṃ vihvalatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ gātrastambhaḥ skhalayati gatiṃ, kaḥ prakāraḥ? kimetat? || 140 ||
41. uttamasya vyādhiryathā—(māmā. 1.23)
santāpasantatimahāvyasanāya tasyāmāsaktametadanapekṣitahetu cetaḥ |
prāyaḥ śubhaṃ ca vidadhātyaśubhaṃ ca jantoḥ sarvaṅkaṣā bhagavatī bhavitavyataiva || 141 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(raghu. 8.93)
tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ' ityādi || 142 ||
42. uttamasyonmādo yathā—(vikramo. 4.17)
haṃsa! prayaccha me kāntāṃ gatistasyāstvayā hṛtā |
sambhāvitaikadeśena deyaṃ yadabhiyujyate || 143 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 9.29)
bhavadbhiḥ sarvāṅgaprakṛtiramaṇīyā kulavadhū— rihasthairdṛṣṭā vā viditamiha vā 'syā yadabhavat |
vayo 'vasthāṃ tasyāḥ śrṛṇuta sṛhṛdo yatra madanaḥ pragalbhavyāpāraścarati hṛdi, mugdhaśca vapuṣi || 144 ||
43. uttamasya viṣādo yathā—(māmā. 4.7)
suhvadiva prakaṭayya sukhapradāṃ prathamamekarasāmanukūlatām |
punarakāṇḍavivartanadāruṇaḥ pariśinaṣṭi vidhirmanaso rujam || 145 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 8.12)
mama hi kuvalayākṣīṃ pratyaniṣṭaikabuddhe— raviratamanubaddhotkampa evāntarātmā |
sphurati ca khalu cakṣurvāmametacca kaṣṭaṃ vacanamiha bhavatyoḥ sarvathā hā hato 'smi || 146 ||
44. uttamasya vaivarṇyaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.22)
navakuvalayasnigdhairaṅgairdadannayanotsavaṃ satatamapi te svecchādṛś‍yo navo nava eva yaḥ |
vikalakaraṇaḥ pāṇḍuḥ so 'yaṃ śucā paridurbalaḥ kathamapi sa ityunnetavyastathā 'pi dṛśo priyaḥ || 147 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 5.5)
kuvalayadalaś‍yāmo 'pyaṅgaṃ dadhat paridhūsaraṃ lalitavikaṭanyāsalaḥ śrīmān mṛgāṅkanibhānanaḥ |
harati vinayaṃ vāmo yasya prakāśitasāhasaḥ pravigaladasṛkpaṅkaḥ pāṇirlalannarajāṅgalaḥ || 148 ||
45. uttamasya dainyaṃ yathā—(megha. 6)
'jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkalāvartakānām' ityādi || 149 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 9.45)
prayāntīva prāṇāḥ sutanu! hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsata iva javalantīvāṅgāni, prasarati samantādiva tamaḥ |
tvarāprastāvo 'yaṃ na khalu parihāsasya viṣaya— stadakṣṇorānandaṃ vitara, mayi mā bhūrakaruṇaḥ || 150 ||
46. uttamasya svarabhedo yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
'vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadam' ityādi || 151 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(ratnā. 3.17)
'alamalamamunā te sāhasenātimātram' ityādi || 152 ||
47. uttamasya moho yathā—(urāca. 1.35)
'viniścetuṃ śakyo na sukhamiti vā duḥkhamiti vā' ityādi || 153 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 1.44)
prasarati parimāthī ko 'pyayaṃ dehabhāja— stirayati karaṇānāṃ grāhakatvaṃ pramohaḥ |
raṇaraṇakavivṛddhiṃ vibhramāvartamānaṃ jvalati hṛdayamantastanmayatvaṃ ca dhatte || 154 ||
48. uttamasya jāḍyaṃ yathā—(pṛ.॰ 877)
snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā, vāro 'ṅgarājasvasu— rdyūte rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā, devī prasādyā 'dya ca |
ityantaḥpurasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāya vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitā nāḍikāḥ || 155 ||
madhyamasya yathā—(māmā. 1.33)
paricchedātītaḥ sakalavacanānāmaviṣayaḥ punarjanmanyasminnanubhavapathaṃ yo na gatavān |
vivekapradhvaṃsādupacitamahāmohagahano vikāraḥ ko 'pyantarjaḍayati ca tāpaṃ ca kurute || 156 ||
sa eṣa kāmaśrṛṅgārastadetat kāvyadaivatam |
tadetad, viśvasarvasvaṃ tadetajjanmanaḥ phalam || 157 ||
lalito nāyakaḥ, sarvā yoṣid, vṛttistu kaiśikī |
pravṛttirdākṣiṇātyeha vaidarbhī kāvyapaddhatiḥ || 158 ||
janmāntarānubhavavāsanayā sukhārthamicchāpravṛttiviṣayendriyasamprayogaiḥ |
sampratyayānubhavanūtanavāsanābhimānā1/rātmābhilāṣasukhavismaraṇāni kāmaḥ || 159 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe kāmaśrṛṅgāraprakāśo nāma
|| viṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ samāp‍taḥ || 20 ||
kāmaśrṛṅgāramātrasya śrṛṅgavatvād yathārthatā |
dharmārthamokṣaśrṛṅgārastvaśrṛṅgā hi viṣāṇinaḥ ||
sanātanakavereṣā lokadraṣṭuḥ sthirā matiḥ |
kāmaśrṛṅgāramātre hi bhojarājamatiḥ śukī ||
1. i. sampratyayānubhavanūtanayā sanābhirātmābhilāṣasukhavi॰ jośeraḥ | ii. sampratyayānubhavanūtanayā(?)sanābhirātmābhilāṣasukhavi॰ rāghavaḥ HOS. | iii. mūlaṃ tvasmābhirupakalpitam |
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe ekaviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
mokṣaśrṛṅgāraprakāśaḥ
(mokṣaḥ)
tattvajñānānniḥśreyasādhigamo mokṣaḥ |
duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānāmuttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvāt| tathāhi tattvajñānānmithyājñānāpāye doṣā apayānti| doṣāpāye pravṛttirapaiti| pravṛttyapāye duḥkhamapaiti| seyamātyantikī dukhaprahāṇiḥ| tattvajñānānniścitaśreyasaḥ tadupāyāt tu tadadhigamo mokṣa iti|
duḥkhaṃ tu ṣaḍindriyāṇi viṣayā buddhayaścaḥ duḥkhahetutvāt| śarīraṃ duḥkhāyatanatvāt| duḥkhaṃ tu svarūpā 'svarūpamiti| bhāvayataḥ kvacidapi manassaṅgaḥ syāt| anāsaṅgāccāyamapūrvaṃ nārjayati| pūrvārjitaṃ ca icchābhogaiḥ kṣapayati| sarvakarmoda‍bhūtāni phalāni ca jagad‍gurau maheśvare saṃnyasyati pratyavāyaparihārārthaṃ ca nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānamādriyate| uktaṃ ca,
nityanaimittikaireva kurvāṇo duritakṣayam |
jñānaṃ ca nirmalīkurvannabhyāsena vipācayet || 1 ||
abhyāsāt pakvavijñāvaḥ kaivalyaṃ labhate naraḥ |
ānandaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ kaivalye tat prakāśate || 2 ||
yogaśca dharmamarjayan samādhinā sarvakarmāṇi dahati| uktaṃ ca, 'yogī khalu buddhau prādurbhūtāyām adhikaraṇadharmaṃ vinirmāya sondriyāṇi śarīrāṇi yugapad bhogān bhuṅkte' iti|
'tattvajñānānniḥśreyasādhigamaḥ' (nyā. sū. 1.1) iti yaduktaṃ tad vyākhyāyate| tatra yathāvasthitapadārthādhigatistattvajñānam| tasmin sati yathāvasthitapadārthānadhigatiḥ, ayathāvasthitapadārthādhigatirvā mithyājñānaṃ na syāt; jñānasya jñānāntaravirodhitvāt| mithyājñānavināśe rāgadveṣādayo doṣā na bhavanti| idaṃ sukhasādhakam idaṃ duḥkhasādhakam, etanmadīyam adaḥ parakīyam, iti hi mithyājñānaṃ rāgadveṣahetuḥ| yathā tu nivṛttau
duḥkharūpatayā jagatsvarūpamavagacchataḥ svaśarīrādāvapi sarvaṃ duḥkhamiti tattvajñānaṃ syāt, tadā audāsīnyād rāgadveṣādayaḥ svayameva pralīyante| uktaṃ ca,
bhayaṃ bhāvayataḥ samyagjñānād doṣasamākulam |
avaś‍yaṃ rāgiṇo 'pyāśu virāga upajāyate || 3 ||
virāgāt kṣīyate 'vidyā vidyā cāntaḥ prabudhyate |
tataḥ prakāśate jñānaṃ tato nirvāṇamṛcchati || 4 ||
doṣābhāve tu dharmapravṛttiradharmapravṛttirvā na syāt| sarvo 'pi sukhārthameva pravartate| duḥkhārthaṃ tu na pravartata iti| yadā tu 'sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivekinaḥ' (yogasū. 2.15) iti jñānāt sukhameva nāstīti jānīyāt, tadā kimarthaṃ pravartsyati? kimarthaṃ vā na pravartsyatīti, pravṛttyabhāve 'pi janmāpi na syāt| dharmādharmopabhogārthaṃ hi prāṇināṃ janma| dharmādharmau tu pravṛttimantareṇa na staḥ| dharmādharmānupravṛttiḥ pṛthakpṛthag daśadhā| sā tu abhihitā purastāt pravṛttirūpadharmaprastāva1 iti nehocyate |
janmābhāve tu duḥkhamapi na bhavati| yataḥ 'ṣaḍindriyāṇi' ityādyekaviṃśatiprabhedaṃ duḥkhaṃ, tacca janmābhāve śarīrādivirahāt nirāśrayaṃ nirupalambhaṃ nirhetukaṃ kasya syāditi, yeyamapunarbhāvādātyantikī duḥkhaprahāṇirniḥśreyasaṃ tadadhigamaśca jñānānmokṣa iti| tacca tat jñānaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ ca yathāvidyamadhigantavyam |
mokṣavidyāvidāṃ hi tattvajñāne niḥśreyase ca vipratipattiḥ| tatra—
tattvajñāne ekaṃ, dve, trīṇi, catvāri, pañca, ṣaṭ, ṣoḍaśa ca tattvānīti| tatra—
ekaṃ yathā— 'ekamakṣaramupāsīta' iti (chāndogye), 'ātmaivedaṃ sarvam' (bṛhadāraṇyake), 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti (śāṇḍilyavidyā),'na tu dvayamasti' iti, 'vedo 'khilo dharmamūlam' iti (manusmṛ. 2.6) |
dve yathā— dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe vidyā cāvidyā ca, sambhūtirvināśaśca, (lolībhāvaḥ?)2 pakvāvabodhaśca, sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca, prakṛtiḥ puruṣaśca iti |
trīṇi yathā— vyaktirākṛtirjātiriti, vyaktamavyaktaṃ vyaktāvyaktamiti, heyamupādeyamupekṣaṇīyamiti, tattvamātmā śarīramiti, jñānaṃ kriyā daivatamiti, śivaḥ śaktiḥ puruṣa iti |
1. purastāt— aṣṭādaśe prakāśe dharmaśrṛṅgāraprastāve| pṛ॰ 994 | 2. asmatkṛtā pūrtiriyam|
catvāri yathā— pramāṇaṃ, prameyaṃ, pramātā, pramitiriti| jātirguṇaḥ, kriyā, dravyaṃ (mābhā. 1.1.3) ceti| vaikharī, madhyamā, paś‍yantī, sūkṣmeti| bahiḥprajñā, antaḥprajñā, suṣup‍taṃ, turīyamiti| piṇḍaḥ, padaṃ, rūpaṃ, rūpātītamiti| tattvaṃ, bhāvo, bhūtaṃ, saṃvananamiti| dīkṣā, jñānaṃ, kriyā, caryeti| yogaḥ, sādhanaṃ, vibhūtiḥ, kaivalyamiti| pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti |
pañca yathā— pṛthivyāpastejo vāyurākāśamiti| prakṛtiḥ, puruṣo, mātrā, śaktiḥ, śiva iti| pañcabrahmārthaparijñānamiti| jāgrat, svapnaṃ, suṣup‍taṃ, turyaṃ, turyātītamiti| rūpaṃ, vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskāro, vijñānamiti |
ṣaḍ yathā— brahma khānilatejāṃsi jalaṃ bhūriti| dravyaṃ, guṇāḥ karma, sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāḥ, samavāya iti| tattvāni, padāni, bhuvanāni, varṇā, mantrāḥ, kālā iti| guṇā, gahanaṃ, granthiḥ, mūlaṃ, śaktiḥ, śiva iti| mūlajālamadhimoktṛcetanā jñānametadadhināyakāḥ (dra. pṛ. 403)1, 'śaktayaḥ śaktināyakāḥ' iti| pāśāḥ paśavo vidyā vidyeśvarāḥ śaktiḥ śiva iti| jīvāḥ pudgalāḥ kāla ākāśo dharmo 'dharma iti |
ṣoḍaśa yathā— pramāṇāni, prameyaḥ, saṃśayaḥ, prayojanaṃ, dṛṣṭāntaḥ, siddhāntaḥ, avayavāḥ, (tarkaḥ) nirṇayaḥ, vādaḥ, jalpo, vitaṇḍā, hetvābhāsāḥ, chalaṃ jātayaḥ, nigrahasthānānānīti ||
atha niḥśreyase—
1. 'cida‍ghanamānandaṃ brahma' iti,
2. 'tadā dṛṣṭṛsvarūpe 'vasthānam' iti,
3. 'sarvakarmabhirasaṃsparśādaudāsīnyam' iti,
4. 'guṇapuruṣāntaravivekadarśanāt prakṛteranupasarpaṇam' iti,
5.'buddhyādīnāmātyantikaḥ santānocchedaḥ' iti,
6. 'tattvajñānādātyantikī duḥkhaprahāṇiḥ' iti,
7.'nivartakadharmo'X X X lpa X X X kaivalyāvāp‍ti' iti,
1. mūlajālamadhibhok‍tṛcetanā śaktyastvadabhibhok‍tṛsaṃhatiḥ | jñānametadadhināyakavrajastvatsmṛtau yugapadeva bhāsate ||
8. 'malapariṇatestīvraśaktinirmitaśarīrādivirahaḥ' iti,
9. 'dīkṣitasya nādho nirīkṣaṇam' iti,
10. 'sā 'krameṇa niḥśreṇikrameṇa vā śivapadāvāp‍tau śivasamānatā' iti,
11. 'kriyāyogānmaheśvaraguṇasaśraṅkrāntiḥ' iti,
12. 'avidyocchedād vidyāprakāśaḥ' iti,
13. 'samalacittavināśairnirmalacittotpādaḥ' iti,
14. 'samyaksandarśanajñānacāritraiḥ kṛtsnakarmapramokṣaḥ' iti,
15. 'jalabud‌budavajjīvāḥ madaśaktivad vijñānam' iti,
16. 'jñānamiti jñānāt pretyāpunarbhā(rbha)vaḥ' iti|
(mokṣaśrṛṅgāraḥ)
tadetadubhayamapyupāyanamantareṇa na prāpyata ityupāyapradarśakaṃ śāstraṃ, śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvāt| puruṣasya ca śāstroktairupāyaistattvajñānādibhirniḥśreya— samīhamānasya gārhasthye 'pi tadadhigatatābhimāno mokṣaśrṛṅgāraḥ| tathāpi — asti me mokṣādhigame yogyatā, adhītāni mayā mokṣaśāstrāṇi, nirantarā nivartakadharmotpattihetavaḥ kriyākalāpāḥ, na pī/vīyate1 nityanaimittikāni, prasīdanti cittavṛttayaḥ, prāp‍to nirālambanaḥ sālambano vā yogaḥ, svādhīnāni yogasādhanāni, sthiro hi bījaḥ nirbījaḥ sabījo vā samādhilābhaḥ, nivartante yogavighnāḥ, prakāśate pratyagjyotiḥ, unmīlayanti tattvasaṃvittayaḥ pratyāsīdanti jyotiṣmatyādayo yogāvasthāḥ, prādurbhavanti ca samastā yogarddhayaḥ'— ityādiyogyacetaso 'bhimānaḥ, sa mokṣaśrṛṅgāraḥ ityucyate| tannivṛttau ca asyāhaṅkāravirahānmokṣa eveti, yāvadahaṅkāravāṃstāvadayaṃ mokṣaśrṛṅgārī, virahitāhaṅkārastu mukta eveti| yathā—
tvāmātmānaṃ varada! paramānandabodhasvarūpaṃ ye budhyante vigalitajagadbhedamāyāprapañcam/ñcāḥ |
rāgatyāgastimitamanaso deva! jīvanta eva truṭyanmāyāvikaṭanibiḍagranthayaste vimuktāḥ || 5 ||
yathā ca—
1. vīyate = vi + īyate = nāpagacchanti|
mayi jīvatyahaṅkāre puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ |
tattvajñānopapanno 'pi na mokṣaṃ gantumarhati || 6 ||
tatra sāttvatī vṛttiḥ, āvantyā pravṛttiḥ, lāṭīyā rītiḥ, svakīyā nāyikā, dhīrapraśāntaśca nāyaka iti| teṣu—
sāttvatī va़ṛttistadanurūpasvarūpāṅgatvāt; tathāhi—(nāśā. 20.36)
yā sāttvateneha guṇena yuktā tyāgena vṛttena samanvitā ca |
harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhāvā sā sāttvatī sattvavatīhā vṛttiḥ || 7 ||
tadaṅgāni utthāpakaḥ, parivartakaḥ, saṃlāpakaḥ, saṅghātyaka iti| sā tu 'yā sāttvateneha guṇena yuktā' ityanena sattvataḥ = satkāravato dhīrapraśāntādernāyakasya mokṣaśrṛṅgārādhikāriṇo ye guṇāstadupalakṣitāṃ ceṣṭāmācaṣṭe| sattvavanto hi satkāravanto mokṣaśrṛṅgārādhikāriṇa evocyante |
yathā— (manusmṛ. 1.96, 97)
bhūtānāṃ prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhijīvinaḥ |
buddhimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ || 8 ||
brāhmaṇeṣu ca vidvāṃso vidvatsu kṛtabuddhayaḥ |
kṛtabuddhiṣu kartāraḥ kartṛṣu brahmavādinaḥ || 9 || iti|
'tyāgena vṛttena samanvitā ca' ityanena sāttvatena tyāgena sāttvatena vṛttena ca samanviteti vyākhyām asyaiva dravyotsargasatkārapūrvakatvaphalanirapekṣamavṛthādānaṃ ca sūcayati| satkārapūrvakadānaṃ hi tyāgaḥ, sa ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ mi ca(?) vṛttamiti| cakārāt tu laukikācāraparityāgamapi kathayati |
'harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhāvā' ityanena brahmānandopalambhādaśeṣaduḥkha— kṣayamupalakṣayati |
'sā sāttvatī sattvavatīha vṛttiḥ' ityanenānvarthasaṃjñāyogaṃ viśuddhasattvānāyakāśrayaṃ ca dyotayati |
aṅgeṣu — utthāpakena tattvajijñāsubhiḥ sandhāya sambhāṣayā vivādaṃ bodhayati| parasparaspardhayā artheṣūtthāpanaṃ hi utthāpakaḥ |
parivartakena kupathaparityāgāt sanmārgagrahaṇamabhidhatte | prastutārthaparityāgādanyārtha- bhajanaṃ hi parivartakaḥ |
saṃlāpakena vigṛhya paribhāṣayā jalpakathāyāṃ parapakṣadūṣaṇamupadiśati | sadasi nānā vākyairmitho 'dhikṣepo hi saṃlāpakaḥ |
saṅghātyakena sādhakabādhakapramāṇopapattibhiḥ svapakṣasthāpanayā parapakṣaṃ pratikṣipati | kāryamantrārthaprabhāvadaivādibhirhi saṅghātabhedaḥ saṅghātyakaḥ |
seyaṃ caturaṅgā 'pi sāttvatī vṛttiḥ lāṭīyānuprāsayogiyogarụ̄dhigarbhā tattvajñānā(n‍niśreyasa)heturmokṣaśṛṅgārasya aṅgam |
āvantyā pravṛtti., śucivratastu śuddhojjvalānulbaṇaśāntaveṣarūpatvān mumukṣubhirapyādṛteti mokṣaśṛṅgārādhikāriṇo dhīrapraśāntaḥ(sya praśamaḥ)1 śṛṅgārasyāṅgam | yathā— (kusaṃ. 6.6)
muktāyajñopavītāni bibhrato haimavalkalāḥ |
rat‍nākṣasūtrāḥ pravrajyāṃ kalpavṛkṣā ivāśritāḥ || 10 ||
lāṭīyā rītiḥ, mokṣaśāstrānurupasaṃdarbhatvāt | tathāhi— yadīṣatsamastamanati— sukumārabaddhaṃ nātyupacāravṛttimallāṭīyānuprāsayogi yogarụ̄dhigarbhaṃ vacaḥ sā lāṭīyā | sā tu prāyo mokṣaśāstreṣu duśyata iti mokṣaśṛṅgārāṅgam |
svakīyā nāyikā; mokṣaśṛṅgārādhikāriṇo dhīrapraśāntanāyakasya lokayātrārthaṃ kriyāpravṛttihetutvāt | mumukṣūṇāmapi hi lokayātrānuyāyināṃ dharmapat‍nyaḥ śrutyādiṣu śrūyante, 'yājñavalkyasya hi dve pat‍nyau babhūvatuḥ' iti (bṛhadāraṇyake) |
tasmin saṃyamināṃ mānye jāte pariṇayonmukhe |
jahuḥ parigrahavrīḍāṃ prājāpatyāstapasvinaḥ || 11 || (kusaṃ. 6.34) iti |
ataḥ svakīyaiva nāyikā mokṣaśṛṅgārāṅgam |
dhīrapraśāntaśca nāyaka iti | tasyaiva mokṣe tadadhigame yogyatābhimānāt | sa guṇaprakṛtipravṛttiparigrahabhedād dhīrodāttavad aṣṭaprakāraḥ tatra guṇataḥ samastajātyādi— guṇasampadyogāduttamaḥ, pravṛtteranukūlo dakṣiṇaśca, parigrahādasādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇaśca | tadetad vṛttiḥ pravṛttiriti, nāyikānāyakabhedaḥ | idametallakṣaṇodāharaṇaiḥ pūrvameva2 nirṇītam ||
1. 'cittadharma' iti śeṣaḥ | dra. pṛ. 1001 | 2. pṛ. 861–863 |
(praśāntadhairyam)
athedānīṃ nāyakavyapadeśaheturdhairyaṃ vicāryate | tad dhīrapraśāntasya śāntaṃ bhavati, yatprabhāvāt sukhaduḥkhayormādhyasthyaṃ, vyasanotsavayoraviśeṣaḥ, indriyārtheṣvanāsthā, vilāseṣūpahāsaḥ, śarīrādāvanātmabuddhiḥ, praśaṃsāsu notkarṣaḥ, nindāsvapi na kopaḥ, bhavyaprāṇiṣu pramodaḥ, sarvabhūteṣvanukampā, sādhujaneṣu maitrī, adhārmikeṣūpekṣā, sadācāreṣvādaraḥ, sarvakarmasu phalānīpsā, rāgādibhirna dharmabādhā, karmātiśayairavismayaḥ, jātyādibhirnābhimāna iti | tatra—
1. sukhaduḥkhayormādhyasthaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 11.26)
kṛtavānanyadeheṣu kartā ca vidhuraṃ manaḥ |
apriyairiva saṃyogo viprayogaḥ priyaiḥ saha || 12 ||
2. vyasanotsavayoraviśeṣo yathā—(kirātā. 11.22)
yā gamyāḥ satsahāyānāṃ yāsu khedo bhayaṃ yataḥ |
tāsāṃ kiyanna duḥkhāya vipadāmiva sampadām || 13 ||
3. indriyārtheṣvanāsthā yathā—
ekaikaśo vinigh‍nanti viṣayā viṣasannibhāḥ |
kṣemī tu sa kathaṃ nu syād yaḥ samaṃ pañca sevate || 14 ||
4. vilāseṣūpahāso yathā—
etat tad vaktramatra k‍va tadadharamadhu ? k‍vāyatāste kaṭākṣāḥ ? k‍vālāpāḥ komalāste ? k‍va sa madanadhanurbhaṅguro bhrūvilāsaḥ ? |
itthaṃ khaṭvāṅgakoṭau prakaṭitadaśanaṃ mañjuguñje samīraṃ rāgāndhānāmivoc‍cairupahasati mahāmohajālaṃ kapālam || 15 ||
5. śarīrādāvanātmabuddhiryathā—
yadā śarīrasya śarīriṇaśca pṛthaktvamekāntata eva bhāvi |
āhāryayogena vimucyamānaḥ pareṇa ko nāma bhavet saśokaḥ || 16 ||
6. praśaṃsāsu notkarṣo yathā—
abruvan kasyacinnindāmahṛṣyannātmanaḥ stave |
ātmanā guṇasampannaḥ pumān nairguṇyamarhati || 17 ||
7. nindāsvapi na kopo yathā—
jāṇa asamevi vihiā jāaï ṇiṃdāsamā salāhā vi |
ṇiṃdā vi tehiṃ vihiā ṇa tŏṇa maṃṇe kilāmei || 18 ||
(yeṣāmasame 'pi vihitā jāyate nindāsamāślāghā 'pi |
nindāpi tairvihitā na teṣāṃ manye klāmyati ||)
8. bhavyaprāṇiṣu pramodo yathā—(kirātā. 3.12)
tathā 'pi nigh‍naṃ nṛpa! tāvakīnaiḥ prahvīkṛtaṃ me hṛdayaṃ guṇoghaiḥ |
vītaspṛhāṇāmapi muktibhājāṃ bhavanti bhavyeṣu hi pakṣapātāḥ || 19 ||
9. sarvabhūteṣvanukampā yathā—
yat kṛtvā bhagavaṃstava stavamimaṃ bhakta‍yā trilokīguroḥ puṇyaṃ kiñcidavāp‍tavānahamiha kleśaughavidhvaṃsinaḥ |
tasmāt (spraṣṭumimān sahe na viṣayān)1 bhogātmano hāriṇo nirbādhasthiti nirvṛteḥ padamatha prāp‍taṃ jagac‍ceṣṭatām ? || 20 ||
10. sādhujaneṣu maitrī yathā—
yadi satsaṅganirato bhaviṣyasi bhaviṣyasi |
athāsajjanagoṣṭhīṣu patiṣyasi patiṣyasi || 21 ||
11. adhārmikeṣūpekṣā yathā—(rāmāyaṇe 2.21.14)
gurorapyavalip‍tasya kāryākāryamajānataḥ |
utpathaṃ pratipannasya kāryaṃ bhavati śāsanam || 22 ||
12. sadācāreṣvādaro yathā—(nītiśa. 51)
mādhuryaṃ pramadājaneṣu lalitaṃ, dākṣiṇyamārye jane vidyāyāṃ vyasanaṃ, svayoṣiti ratirlokāpavādād bhayam |
bhaktiḥ śūlini, śaktirātmadamane, saṃsaktimuktiḥ khale yeṣvete nivasanti nirmalaguṇāstebhyo narebhyo2 namaḥ || 23 ||
1. iyamasmatkṛtā ' 'pūrttiḥ | 2. narebhyo rā., mahad‍bhyo jo. |
13. sarvakarmasu1 phalānīp‍sā ; yathā—
ślāghyaṃ yad vai2 kṛpaṇamanasāṃ sap‍talokādhipatyaṃ yā mṛgyante taralamatibhiḥ siddhayaścāṇimādyāḥ |
etat sarvaṃ madanadahana! tvatpadaprāp‍tibhājāṃ tattvajñānāmṛtarasajuṣāṃ yogināmantarāyaḥ || 24 ||
14. rāgādibhirna dharmabādhā; yathā—
na kāmānna ca saṃrambhānnāpi lokād vibhīṣaṇāt |
na hetuvādānmohād vā vidvān svaṃ dharmamutsṛjet || 25 ||
15. karmātiśayairavismayo yathā—(vairāgyaśa॰ 67) —
bhuktāḥ śriyaḥ sakalakāmadughāstataḥ kiṃ ? santarpitāḥ praṇayinaḥ svadhanaistataḥ kim ? |
dattaṃ padaṃ śirasi vidviṣatāṃ tataḥ kiṃ ? kalpaṃ sthitaṃ tanubhṛtāṃ tanubhistataḥ kim ? || 26 ||
16. jātyādibhirnābhimānaḥ; yathā—
kulājjñānāt tathaiśvaryānmadaḥ sañjāyate nṛṇām |
etaireva vinītānāṃ damaḥ samupajāyate || 27 ||
dhairyapraśamahetavaścāṣṭau viśeṣaṇuṇāḥ — 'kṣamā, vaśitvaṃ, santoṣaḥ, praśamaḥ, śaucam, ārjavaṃ, veśāradyaṃ, vairāgyami'ti |
1. akopanatvaṃ kṣamā ; yathā—
atathyenocyamānasya kaḥ kopo yanna tat tathā |
tathye cāvihitaḥ kopo yadanukte 'pi tat tathā || 28 ||
2. jitendriyatā vaśitvaṃ ; yathā—(kirātā. 11.32)
jīyantāṃ durjayā dehe ripavaścakṣurādayaḥ |
jiteṣu teṣu loko 'yaṃ nanu kṛts‍nastvayā jitaḥ || 29 ||
3. anākāṅkṣā santoṣaḥ ; yathā—
sarvāḥ sampattayastasya viviktaṃ yasya mānasam |
upānad‍gūḍhapādasya nanu carmāstṛtaiva bhūḥ || 30 ||
1. sarva = '......gā vidhīya | sarvakarmasu' — rā. | 2. tat rā. jo. |
4. viṣayavyāvṛttiḥ praśamaḥ ; yathā—
yadā ' 'sīdajñānaṃ smaratimirasaṃskārajanitaṃ tadā dṛṣṭaṃ nārīmayamidamaśeṣaṃ jagadapi |
idānīmasmākaṃ paṭutaravivekāñjanajuṣāṃ samībhūtā dṛṣṭistribhuvanamapi brahma manute || 31 ||
5. malapramoṣaḥ śaucam ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.5)
āplutāstīramandārakusumotkaravīciṣu |
ākāśagaṅgāsrotassu diṅnāgamadagandhiṣu || 32 ||
6. amāyāvitvamārjavam ; yathā—
anyad vāci manasyanyat karmaṇyanyad durātmanām |
mahātmanāṃ tu yad vāci tanmanaḥkarmaṇorapi || 33 ||
7. vicāraparatā vaiśāradyam ; yathā—
ucch‌vāsāvadhayaḥ prāṇāḥ sa cocch‌vāsaḥ samīraṇaḥ |
samīraṇāc‍calaṃ nāsti yajjīvati tadadbha‍utam || 34 ||
8. bhogeṣvanīpsā vairāgyam; yathā—(vairāgyaśatake 93)
mātarlakṣmi! bhajasva kañcidaparaṃ matkāṅkṣiṇī mā sma bhū— rbhogebhyaḥ spṛhayālavastava vaśe, kā niḥspṛhāṇāmasi ? |
sadyaḥsyūtapalāśapatrapuṭikāpātre pavitrīkṛtai— rbhikṣāsak‍tubhireva samprati vayaṃ vṛttiṃ samīhāmahe || 35 ||
so 'yamasya svābhāviko niratiśaya āntaro nityaścālaṅkāraḥ, yatprabhāvāt tadanurūpā eva ratyādayo jāyante | te cāsya dhīrodāttavat sarva evāvagantavyāḥ |
tadetanmokṣaśṛṅgārasvarūpamupavarṇitam |
niḥśreyasaparatvena tattvajñānābhimāninām || 36 ||
iha pravṛttirāvantyā, sāttvatī vṛttiriṣyate |
lāṭīyā rītirātmīyā kāntā, śāntaśca nāyakaḥ || 37 ||
vṛtte dhīrapraśāntasya mokṣaśṛṅgāragocare |
careyuḥ ke 'pi tattvajñāḥ sarvajñasyābhyanujñayā || 38 || iti |
(nāyakabhedāḥ)
so 'yaṃ dharmaśṛṅgārādyadhikārabhedānnāyakaprabhedaścaturdhā—
dhīrodāttaḥ, dhīroddhataḥ, dhīralalitaḥ, dhīrapraśāntaśceti |
athaiṣa pratyekamapi caturdhā bhidyate—
nāyakaḥ, upanāyakaḥ, anunāyakaḥ, pratināyaka iti |
(1. nāyakaḥ)
tat tridhā (tatra kathā ?)śarīravyāpī yathoktaguṇayukto nāyakaḥ | sa—
dhīrodātto yathā—
ikṣvākuvaṃśatilakaḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivyāmavyāhataprasarapauruṣadurnivāraḥ |
rāmaḥ sa eṣa nṛpakaṇṭhakaṭhoradhāraḥ kuṇṭho munerapi hi yena kṛtaḥ kuṭhāraḥ || 39 ||
dhīroddhato yathā—(kirātā. 14.22)
vayaṃ k‍va varṇāśramarakṣiṇo nṛpāḥ k‍va jātihīnā mṛgajīvitacchidaḥ |
sahāva/pakṛṣṭairmahatāmasaṃgataṃ bhavanti gomāyusakhā na dantinaḥ || 40 ||
dhīralalito yathā—(śāku. 3.18)
kiṃ śītalaiḥ klamavinodibhirārdravātaiḥ sañcālayāmi nalinīdalatālavṛntaiḥ |
aṅke nidhāya karabhoru ! yathāsukhaṃ te saṃvāhayāmi caraṇāvuta padmatāmrau || 41 ||
dhīrapraśānto yathā—
asmān no nṛvarān vettha vetthārthān vettha bhāṣitum |
yadyadasmaddhitaṃ kṛṣṇa ! tattad vācyaḥ suyodhanaḥ || 42 ||
(2. upanāyakaḥ)
nāyakābhyarhaṇīyaḥ sama utkṛṣṭo vā 'navāp‍tapada upanāyakaḥ; teṣu—
dhīrodātto yathā—(mavīca. 5.51)
khyātā eva vayaṃ jagatsu caritairvāgbhiḥ, kimākhyāyate saṃyatto bhava, sattvamasti bhavataḥ, satyaṃ manuṣyo bhavān |
śastrairavyavadhīyamānavijayāḥ prāyo vayaṃ teṣu ced grāhaste sukhamāśvasanti girayo yairvānarāḥ śastriṇaḥ || 43 ||
dhīroddhato yathā—(māgha. 14.16)
yastaveha savane na bhūpatiḥ karma karmakaravat kariṣyati |
tasya neṣyati vapuḥ kabandhatāṃ bandhureṣa jagatāṃ sudarśanaḥ || 44 ||
dhīralalito yathā—(māgha. 2.14)
tataḥ sapat‍nāpanayasmaraṇānuśayasphurā |
oṣṭhena rāmo rāmoṣṭhabimbacumbanacuñcunā || 45 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 2.21)
jagāda vadanacchadmapadmaparyantapātinaḥ |
nayan madhulihaḥ śvaityamudaṃśudaśanāṃśubhiḥ || 46 ||
dhīrapraśānto yathā—
sampratyeva hi gograhe yadabhavat tat tāvadākarṇyatām॰ || 47 ||(pṛ.632) ityādi |
(3. anunāyakaḥ)
nāyakāt kiñcidūnaḥ kathāśarīre viśeṣopayogavān anunāyakaḥ | tatra— dhīrodātto yathā—(urā. 6.13)
śaktyā vakṣasi mag‍nayā saha mayā mụ̄dhe plavaṅgādhipe vidrāṇeṣu ca vidravatsu kapiṣu prāp‍tāvakāśe dviṣi |
mā bhaiṣṭeti nirundhataḥ kapibhaṭānasyodbhaṭabhrūsthite— rmarmacchedavisaṃsthulākṣarajaḍā vācastvayā na śrutāḥ || 48 ||
dhīroddhato yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.33)
śokaṃ srīvannayanasalilairyat parityājito 'si bhrāturvakṣaḥsthalavighaṭane yac‍ca sākṣīkṛto 'si |
āsīdetat tava kurupate/kunṛpate ? kāraṇaṃ jīvitasya kruddhe yuṣmatkulakamalinīkuñjare bhīmasene || 49 ||
dhīralalito yathā—(māmā. 1.34)
yā kaumudī nayanayorbhavataḥ sujanmā tasyā bhavānapi manorathabandhabandhuḥ |
tatsaṅgamaṃ prati sakhe! nahi saṃśayo 'sti yasmin vidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogaḥ || 50 ||
dhīrapraśānto yathā—(kāvyādarśe 2.276)
adya yā mama govinda! jātā tvayi gṛhāgate |
kālenaiṣā bhavet prītistavaivāgamanāt punaḥ || 51 ||
(4. pratināyakaḥ)
nāyakapratikūlavṛttistaducchedārhaḥ pratāpābhimānārthasāhasādiguṇotkarṣī dhīroddhata— prāyaḥ pratināyakaḥ | tatra—
dhīrodātto yathā—
pātre purāvartini viśvanāthe kṣodīyasi kṣmāvalaye ca deye |
vrīḍāsmitaṃ tasya tadā tadāsīc‍camatkṛto yena sa eva devaḥ || 52 ||
dhīroddhato yathā—(pṛ. 843)
nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ॰ || 53 || ityādi |
dhīralalito yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.9)
kiṃ kaṇṭhe śithilīkṛto bhujalatāpāśaḥ pramādānmayā ? nidrācchedavivartaneṣvabhimukhaṃ nādyāpi/si sambhāvitā |
anyastrījanasaṅkathālaghurahaṃ svap‍ne tvayā lakṣito doṣaṃ paśyasi kiṃ priye! parijanopālambhayogye mayi || 54 ||
dhīrapraśānto yathā—
rathasthamāruhya rathāṅgapāṇiṃ sthāne sthitā śrīriti so 'bhyanandat |
vairāṇi kāryopanibandhanāni nirmatsarā eva guṇeṣu santaḥ || 55 ||
uttamamadhyamakaniṣṭhādibhedāścaiṣāmapi yathāsambhavamabhyūhanīyāḥ |
(nāyikābhedāḥ)
atha nāyikāprabhedāḥ pradarśyante | sā 'pi nāyikā caturdhā— udāttā, uddhatā, lalitā, śāntā ca | dhairyamāsāmavivakṣitam; adhīrāṇā(manāyikātvāt) |
tā api pratyekaṃ punaścaturdhā — nāyikā, upanāyikā, anunāyikā, pratināyikā ceti | tatra—
udāttā yathā—(gāsa. 1.88)
jāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ aṇuṇaa—viddaviamāṇa—parisesaṃ |
païrik‍kammi vi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa c‍cia kuṇaṃtī || 56 ||
(jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam |
vijane 'pi vinayāvalambanaṃ saiva kurvantī ||)
uddhatā yathā—(gāsa. 1.48)
aṇṇadaïāpasaṃgaṃ de devva! kuṇajja majjha daïassa |
pulisā ek‍kaṃtarasā ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti || 57 ||
(anyadayitāprasaṅgaṃ he deva! kuruṣva mama dayitasya |
puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇau vijānanti ||)
lalitā yathā—(gaüḍava. 690, gāsa. 933ve.)
uvvahaï daïagahiāharoṭṭhajhijjaṃtarosapaḍirāaṃ |
pāṇosaraṃtamaïraṃ va phalihacasaaṃ muhaṃ bālā || 58 ||
(udvahati dayitagṛhītādharoṣṭhakṣīyamāṇaropratirāgam |
pānāpasaranmadiramiva sphaṭikacaṣakaṃ mukhaṃ bālā ||)
śāntā yathā—(gāsa. 3.3)
ahavā guṇa c‍cia lahuā ahavā guṇaaṇṇuo ṇa so loo |
ahava hmi ṇigguṇā vā bahuguṇo kkhu aṇṇo jaṇo tassa || 59 ||
(athavā guṇā eva laghavo 'thavā guṇajño na sa lokaḥ |
athavā 'smi nirguṇā vā bahuguṇopapanno janastasya ||)
(1. nāyikā)
nāyikāsu udāttā yathā—(jāha. 10.50)
dvitrāṇyatha rathād bhūmau padānyādhāya nissahā |
yeyamadya kiyad dūramiti papraccha maithilī || 60 ||
uddhatā yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.16)
yad vaidyutamiva jyotirārye krodhena sambhṛtam |
tat prāvṛḍiva kṛṣṇeyaṃ nūnaṃ saṃvardhayiṣyate || 61 ||
lalitā yathā—(raghu. 6.80)
tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ mṛdūkṛtya narendraputrī |
dṛṣṭ‍yā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ paryagrahīt saṃvaraṇasrajeva || 62 ||
śāntā yathā—(raghu. 2.2)
tasyāḥ khuranyāsapavitrapāṃsumapāṃsulānāṃ dhuri kīrtanīyā |
mārgaṃ manuṣyeśvaradharmapat‍nī śruterivārthaṃ smṛtiranvagacchat || 63 ||
(2. upanāyikā)
upanāyikāsu udāttā yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.20)
bhrūbhaṅge sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā, muktaśca na praśrayaḥ ||64||
uddhatā yathā—
śarmiṣṭhāyā samālokya patyustat premagauravam |
devayānī bhṛśaṃ kruddhā jagāma piturantikam || 65 ||
lalitā yathā—(līlāva. 433)
to tassa maalaṃchaṇassa karaphaṃsasamuggaeṇa seeṇa |
sasimaṇighaḍiā vābullia vva vārīmaī jāā || 66 ||
(tatastasya mṛgalāñchanasya karasparśasamudgatena svedena |
śaśimaṇighaṭitā puttalikeva/putrikeva vārīmayī jātā ||)
śāntā yathā—(kādakasāre)
nave ca vayasi prāp‍tavairāgyābhyāsavāsanā |
vyāloki kanyakā tena dhṛtapāśupatavratā || 67 ||
(3. anunāyikā)
anunāyikāsu udāttā yathā—(mavīca. 1.20)
lāṅgalollikhyamānāyā yajñabhūmeḥ samudgatā |
sīteyamūrmileyaṃ tad‍dvitīyā janakātmajā || 68 ||
uddhatā yathā—(raghu. 12.4)
tasyābhiṣekasambhāraṃ kalpitaṃ krūraniścayā |
dūṣayāmāsa kaikeyī śokoṣṇairnayanāmbubhiḥ || 69 ||
lalitā yathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yat sarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅgaiḥ || 70 ||
śāntā yathā—(raghu. 10.57)
sā hi praṇayavatyāsīt sapat‍nyorubhayorapi |
bhramarī vāraṇasyeva madaniṣyandarekhayoḥ || 71 ||
(4. pratināyikā)
pratināyikāsu udāttā yathā—(harivijaye)
āṇiapulaübbheo savattipaṇaaparidhūsarammi vi garue |
piadaṃsaṇe pavaḍḍhaï maṇṇuṭṭhāṇe vi ruppiṇīa pahariso || 72 ||
(ānītapulakodbhedaḥ sapat‍nīpraṇayaparidhūsare 'pi guruke |
priyadarśane pravardhate manyusthāne 'pi rukmiṇyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||)
uddhatā yathā—(harivi.)
kuviā a saccabhā/hāmā samevi vahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
pāaḍia—hiaa—sāro pemmāsaṃghasariso pavaḍḍhaï/ṭṭaï maṇṇū || 73 ||
(kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi vadhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |
prakaṭitahṛdayasāraḥ premāśvāsasadṛśaḥ pravarta/rdhate manyuḥ ||)
lalitā yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.1)
dullahajaṇāṇurāo lajjā garuī paravvaso appā |
piasahi! visamaṃ pemmaṃ maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavari ekkaṃ || 74 ||
(durlabhajanānurāgo lajjā gurvī paravaśa ātmā |
priyasakhi! viṣamaṃ prema maraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ kevalamekam ||)
śāntā yathā—(gāsa. 2.31)
vāharaü maṃ sahīo! tissā gotteṇa kiṃ ttha bhaṇieṇa? |
thirapeṃmo hou jahiṃ tahiṃ pi, mā kiṃ pi ṇaṃ bhaṇaha || 75 ||
(vyāharatu māṃ sakhyaḥ! tasyā gotreṇa kimatra bhaṇitena? |
sthirapremā bhavatu yatra tatrāpi, mā kimapyenaṃ bhaṇata ||)
evaṃ nāyikāprakāraḥ ṣoḍaśadhā|
uttamamadhyamakaniṣṭhādibhedāśca sarvāsāmapi yathāsambhavaṃ prāgvadevābhyūhanīyāḥ |
(nāyakānunāyakaguṇāḥ —24)
uttamatvādihetavaśca nāyakānāṃ sāmānyaguṇā jātyādayaścaturviṃśatiḥ, nāyikānāṃ mahākulīnatādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa |
anunāyakaguṇāstāvat jātiḥ, anvayaḥ, abhijanaḥ, nivāsaḥ, āspadaṃ, padaṃ, pitarau, prabhāvaḥ, prajñā, śāstrajñānaṃ, adīnavākyatā, vāggmitvaṃ, deśakālāvabodhaḥ, iṅgitākārajñatā, dākṣyaṃ, kalāvaidagdhyaṃ, caturatā, rūpasampat saubhāgyaṃ, tyāgaḥ, sauhārdaṃ, mahārambhatā, śaktiḥ, śauryam iti| teṣu—
1. jātiryathā—
tasmādajāyata manurnavarājabījaṃ yasyānvaye sa sagaraśca bhagīrathaśca |
ekena yena jaladhiḥ parikhānito 'yamanyena sindhusaritā paripūritaśca || 76 ||
2. anvayo yathā—(raghu. 1.12)
tadanvaye śuddhimati prasūtaḥ śuddhimattaraḥ |
dilīpa iti rājendurinduḥ kṣīranidhāviva || 77 ||
3. abhijano yathā—(tilakamañjarī 39)
vāsiṣṭhaiḥ sma kṛtodbhavo varaśatairastyagnikuṇḍodbhavo bhūpālaḥ paramāra ityadhipatiḥ sap‍tābdhikāñcerbhuvaḥ |
adyāpyudgataharṣagadgadagiro gāyanti tasyārbude viśvāmitrajayorjitasya bhujayorvisphūrjitaṃ gūrjarāḥ || 78 ||
4. nivāso yathā—(raghu. 9.1)
pituranantaramuttarakosalān samadhigamya samādhijitendriyaḥ |
daśarathaḥ praśaśāsa mahāratho yamavatāmavatāṃ ca dhuri sthitaḥ || 79 ||
5. āspadaṃ yathā—
śriyaḥ padaṃ dvāravatīti nāmnā purī parītā lavaṇārṇavena |
astyāvṛtevāmararājadhānī nistriṃśanīlena nabhastalena || 80 ||
6. padaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.76)
putro raghustasya padaṃ praśāsti mahākratorviśvajitaḥ prayoktā |
caturdigāvarjitasambhṛtāṃ yo mṛtpātraśeṣāmakarod vibhūtim || 81 ||
7. pitarau yathā—
kṛṣṇāgarudrumataleṣu surāṅganābhi— rāmodigandhamṛgagandhiṣu gītakīrttiḥ |
śaurervarāhavapuṣo jagatīkalatre prāgjyotiṣādhipatireṣa sutaḥ kilābhūt || 82 ||
8. prabhāvo yathā—(raghu. 2.14)
śaśāma vṛṣṭayā 'pi vinā davāgnirāsīd viśeṣā phalapuṣpavṛddhiḥ |
ūnaṃ na sattveṣvadhiko bavādhe tasmin vanaṃ gop‍tari gāhamāne || 83 ||
9. prajñā yathā—(bārā. 4.15)
upadiśati samānaṃ karma kṛtsnaṃ pinākī samamapi ca yatante karmamārge samete |
tadapi bhṛgukulenduḥ kāmamutkṛṣyate 'sau nanu bhavati vinītaṃ dravyameva kriyābhiḥ || 84 ||
10. śāstrajñānaṃ yathā—(raghu. 3.30)
dhiyaḥ samagraiḥ sa guṇairudāradhīḥ kramāccatastraścaturarṇavopamāḥ |
tatāra vidyāḥ pavanātipātibhirdiśo haridbhirharitāmiveśvaraḥ || 85 ||
11. adīnavākyatā yathā—(mavīca. 5.51)
khyātā eva vayaṃ jagatsu caritairvāgbhiḥ kimākhyāyate? saṃyatto bhava, sattvamasti bhavataḥ, satyaṃ manuṣyo bhavān |
śastrairavyavadhīyamānavijayāḥ prāyo vayaṃ teṣu ced grāhaste sukhamastu santi girayo yairvānarāḥ śastriṇaḥ || 86 ||
12. vāggmitvaṃ yathā—(raghu. 2.56)
bhavānapīdaṃ paravānavaiti mahān hi yat‍nastava devadārau |
sthātuṃ niyokturyadi śakyamagre vināśya rakṣyaṃ svayamakṣatena || 87 ||
13. deśakālāvabodho yathā—(kirātā. 2.46)
abhiyoga imān mahībhujo bhavatā tasya kṛtaḥ kṛtāvadheḥ |
pravighāṭayitā samutpatan haridaśvaḥ kamalākarāniva || 88 ||
14. iṅgitākārajñatā yathā—(śāku. 1.28)
vācaṃ na miśrayati yadyapi mad‍vacobhiḥ karṇaṃ dadātyavahitā mayi bhāṣamāṇe |
kāmaṃ na tiṣṭhati madānanasammukhīnā bhūyiṣṭhamanyaviṣayā na tu dṛṣṭirasyāḥ || 89 ||
15. dākṣyaṃ yathā—(rāmaca. 1.47)
ātatāyī sa vijñāto jīvatyāryeti ca śrutam |
prāp‍to yātrāsahaḥ kālaḥ kālakṣepasya ko guṇaḥ? || 90 ||
16. kalāvaidagdhyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 19.14)
sa svayaṃ prahatapuṣkaraḥ kṛtī lolamālyavalayo 'haranmanaḥ |
nartakīrabhinayātilaṅghinīḥ pārśvavartiṣu guruṣvalaṅghayat || 91 ||
17. caturatā yathā—(kirātā. 1.10)
sakhīniva prītiyujo 'nujīvinaḥ samānamānān suhṛdaśca bandhubhiḥ |
sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ kṛtādhipatyāmiva sādhu bandhutām || 92 ||
18. rūpasampad yathā—(urāca. 6.20)
aho prāsādikaṃ rūpamanubhāvaśca pāvanaḥ |
sthāne rāmāyaṇakavirdaivīṃ vācamadīdiśat || 93 ||
19. saubhāgyaṃ yathā—
dhanyāstā guṇarat‍narohaṇabhuvo yāsve—(tadā)—sāditaṃ dhātrā vismayakāri cāru ghaṭito yenāyameko yuvā |
dṛṣṭe yatra galanti (madhya)—raśanādāmāni vāmabhruvāṃ santrāsād dviṣatāṃ dhanūṃṣi vibhavairarthavyathāścārthinām || 94 ||
20. tyāgo yathā—
pātraṃ te sarva evārthī deyaṃ svamapi jīvitam |
dātā tvameko loke 'smin sarvo 'dya kṛpaṇo janaḥ || 95 ||
21. sauhārdaṃ yathā—
prāṇairapi hite vṛttiradroho vyājavarjanam |
ātmanīva priyādhānametat te śrīmahāvratam || 96 ||
22. mahārambhatā yathā—(raghu. 12.89)
jetāraṃ lokapālānāṃ te mukhairarciteśvaram |
rāmastulitakailāsamarātiṃ bahvamanyata || 97 ||
23. śaktiryathā—(śāku. 3.1)
kā kathā bāṇasandhāne jyāśabdenaiva dūrataḥ |
huṅkāreṇeva dhanuṣaḥ sa hi vighnān vyapohati || 98 ||
24. śauryaṃ yathā—(raghu. 7.55)
pareṇa bhagne 'pi bale mahaujā yayāvajaḥ pratyarisainyameva |
dhūmo nivartyeta samīraṇena yato hi kakṣastata eva vahniḥ || 99 ||
(nāyikāguṇāḥ —16)
atha nāyikāguṇāḥ ṣoḍaṣa— 'mahākulīnatā, rūpasampattiḥ, yauvanaṃ, suveṣatā, saubhāgyaṃ, śucitā, śīlasampat, priyaṃvadatā, cāturyaṃ, vāggmitā, śāstrajñānaṃ, adīnavākyatā, avikatthanatvaṃ, mānitā, kṛtajñatā, dṛḍhabhaktitvam' iti| tatra—
1. mahākulīnatā yathā—(śāku. 1.21)
mānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya sambhavaḥ? |
na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātalāt || 100 ||
2. rūpasampad yathā—
tatrānudevaparamāṇudalaṃ vidhāturānandakāri yadabhūdupayogi tasyāḥ |
yasmānna tādṛśamasau vihitaśramo 'pi rūpaṃ kadācidaparaṃ ghaṭayāñcakāra || 101 ||
3. yauvanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.31)
asambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgayaṣṭeranāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya |
kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sā 'tha vayaḥ prapede || 102 ||
4. suveṣatā yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.53)
aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgamākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram |
muktākalāpīkṛtasindhuvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī || 103 ||
5. saubhāgyaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.69)
pāṇiggahaṇe ccia pavvaīeṁ ṇāaṃ sahīhiṃ sohaggaṃ |
pasuvaïṇā vāsuikaṃkaṇammi osārie dūraṃ || 104 ||
(pāṇigrahaṇe eva pārvatyāḥ jñātaṃ sakhībhiḥ saubhāgyam |
paśupatinā vāsukikaṅkaṇe 'pasārite dūram ||)
6. śucitā yathā—
caccaraghariṇī piadaṃsaṇā a vālā paütthavaïā a |
asaī saajjhiā duggaā a ṇa hu khaṃḍiaṃ sīlaṃ || 105 ||
(catvaragṛhiṇī priyadarśanā ca bālā proṣitapatikā ca |
asatī prātiveśmikā durgatā ca na khalu khaṇḍitaṃ śīlam ||)
7. śīlasampad yathā—(gāsa. 3.26)
diahaṃ khuḍuṃkiāe saalaṃ/tīe kāūṇa gehavāvāraṃ |
garue vi maṃtudukkhe bharimo pāaṃtasuttassa || 106 ||
(divasaṃ roṣamūkāyāḥ sakalaṃ kṛtvā gehavyāpāram |
guruke 'pi mantuduḥkhe smarāmaḥ pādāntasup‍tasya ||)
8. priyaṃvadatā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.45)
svareṇa tasyāmamṛtastruteva prajalpitāyāmabhijātavāci |
apyanyapuṣṭā pratikūlaśabdā śroturvitantrīriva tāḍyamānā || 107 ||
9. cāturyaṃ yathā—(pṛ. 1132)
ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamād dūrataḥ || 108 || ityādi |
10. vāggmitā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.75)
uvāca cainaṃ paramārthato haraṃ na vetsi nūnaṃ yata evamāttha mām |
alokasāmānyamacintyahetukaṃ dviṣanti mandāścaritaṃ mahātmanām || 109 ||
11. śāstrajñānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.30)
tāṃ haṃsamālāḥ śaradīva gaṅgāṃ mahauṣadhiṃ naktamivātmabhāsaḥ |
sthiropadeśāmupadeśakāle prapedire prāktanajanmavidyāḥ || 110 ||
12. adīnavākyatā yathā—
kārāgṛhe tvamuṣitaścirameva yasya nirvāpitaḥ sa vinayena sahastrabāhuḥ |
tasyāpi re! purabhidā 'khilamastravedamadhyāpitasya vijayī mama jīvanāthaḥ || 111 ||
13. avikatthanatvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.64)
yathā śrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara! tvayā jano 'yamuccaiḥpadalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 112 ||
14. mānitā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.6)
kadācidāsannasakhīmukhena sā manorathajñaṃ pitaraṃ manasvinī |
ayācatāraṇyaniketamātmanaḥ phalodayāntāya tapassamādhaye || 113 ||
15. kṛtajñatā yathā—(gāsa. 3.46)
māmi! hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇīe |
ṇhāṇahalid‍dākaḍuaṃ aṇusottajalaṃ piaṃteṇa || 114 ||
(mātulāni! hṛdayamiva pītaṃ tena yūnā majjantyāḥ |
snānaharidrākaṭukamanustroto jalaṃ pibatā ||)
16. dṛḍhabhaktitvaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.82)
alaṃ vivādena yathāśrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 115 ||
ya ete ṣoḍaśa proktā nāyakā nāyikāśca yāḥ |
teṣāṃ ye cottamatvādihetorjātyādayo guṇāḥ || 116 ||
yuktastairuttamasteṣāṃ pādahānyā tu madhyamaḥ |
ardhahānyā kaniṣṭhaḥ syāt nāyikāsvapyayaṃ vidhiḥ || 117 ||
udāttā gūḍhamānā syād viruddhā mānaśālinī |
lalitā sādhyamāneha śāntā nirmānamānasā || 118 ||
manasiśayamahāstraṃ śāstrasarvasvametannirupamaramaṇīyaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ nāyakānām |
kathitamatha yathāvat kāmaścaṅgārasāre punarapi tadavasthāvasthitaṃ varṇayāmaḥ || 119 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe mokṣaśrṛṅgāraprakāśano nāma
|| ekaviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 21 ||
mokṣasya sarvavidhalakṣaṇalekhayạ̄dhyamekaṃ saviṃśamimamạ̄dhyataraṃ prakāśam |
ekonaviṃśayutapadyaśataṃ prakāśya sāhityaśāstramasamaṃ hyatanonnṛpo 'sau ||
abhinava iti saṃjñayā samṛddhaḥ ka iva babhūva yathārthayā svakāle |
iti vadata vivicya vid‍vareṇyā nṛpatirasāvathavā sa ko 'pi gup‍taḥ ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe dvāviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
anurāgasthāpanaprakāśaḥ
iha khalu sakalasattvopakārakṣamadvitīyāśramanivāsibhiścaturbhirapi varṇairbrāhmaṇā— dibhirubhayalokasiddhaye sevyamāno dharmārthakāmalakṣaṇastrivarṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ|
evamarthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ cāpyācaran naraḥ |
ihāmutra ca niśśalyamatyantasukhamaś‍nute || 1 || (kāmasū. 1.2.49)
yathā ca—
yasya trivargaśūnyāni dinānyāyānti yānti ca |
sa lohakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati || 2 ||
tatrāpi dharmārthaśrṛṅgārayorhetubhūtatvāt kāmaśrṛṅgāra eva phalabhūtatvāt pradhānam | kāmastu sāmānyarūpo viśeṣarūpo vā sukhamevābhidhīyate, ityuktaṃ 1purastāt, iha tu upacārāt—
saṅkalparamaṇīyasya prītisambhogaśobhinaḥ |
kumārasyā/rucirasyābhilāṣasya nāma kāma iti smṛtam || 3 ||
ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yastasya nāsti pratikriyā |
sa hi snehātmakastanturantarbhūtāni sīvyati || 4 || (urāca. 2.17)
uktaṃ ca— (urāca. 6.12, māmā. 1.27)
vyatiṣajati padārthānāntaraḥ ko 'pi hetu— rna khalu bahirupādhīn prītayaḥ saṃśrayante |
vikasati hi pataṅgasyodaye puṇḍarīkaṃ dravati ca himaraśmāvud‍gate candrakāntaḥ || 5 ||
taṃ ca anurāga ityācakṣate| tataśca—(urāca. 2.19, 6.5)
akiñcidapi kurvāṇaḥ saukhyairduḥkhānyapohati |
tat tasya kimapi dravyaṃ yo hi yasya priyo janaḥ || 6 ||
1. dra. atraiva pṛ. 1049
yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 7 ||
śūnyamākīrṇatāmeti tulyaṃ vyasanamutsavaiḥ |
vipralambho 'pi lābhāya sati priyasamāgame || 8 || (kirātā. 11.27)
tadā ramyāṇyaramyāṇi priyāḥ śalyaṃ tadā 'savaḥ |
tadaikākī sabandhuḥ sanniṣṭena rahito yadā || 9 || (kirātā. 11.28)
(anurāgaḥ –64)
tamabhilāṣādibhedāt catuṣṣaṣṭiprakāraṃ vyāharanti| tad yathā—
1. abhilāṣaḥ 17. āśā 33. mohaḥ 49. dākṣiṇyam
2. ākāṅkṣā 18. āśīḥ 34. ākūtam 50. anugrahaḥ
3. apekṣā 19. āśaṃsā 35. kutūhalam 51. vātsalyam
4. utkaṇṭhā 20. manorathaḥ 36. vismayaḥ 52. anukrośaḥ
5. īpsā 21. āsthā 37. rāgaḥ 53. viśvāsaḥ
6. lipsā 22. abhiniveśaḥ 38. vegaḥ 54. vistrambhaḥ
7. icchā 23. anubandhaḥ 39. adhyavasāyaḥ 55. vaśīkāraḥ
8. vāñchā 24. āgrahaḥ 40. vyavasāyaḥ 56. praṇayaḥ
9. tṛṣṇā 25. vimarśaḥ 41. kāmanā 57. prāp‍tiḥ
10. lālasā 26. manīṣā 42. vāsanā 58. paryāp‍tiḥ
11. spṛhā 27. abhiprāyaḥ 43. smaraṇam 59. samāp‍tiḥ
12. laulyam 28. pakṣapātaḥ 44. saṅkalpaḥ 60. abhimānāp‍tiḥ
13. gardhaḥ 29. lobhaḥ 45. bhāvaḥ 61. snehaḥ
14. śraddhā 30. āsaṅgaḥ 46. hāsaḥ 62. premā/prema
15. ruciḥ 31. abhiṣvaṅgaḥ 47. ratiḥ 63. āhlādaḥ
16. dohadam 32. saktiḥ 48. prītiḥ 64. nirvṛtiḥ, iti |
ete bhedāścatuṣṣaṣṭiranurāgasya nāmataḥ |
udāharaṇamālaiṣāṃ rūpavyaktyai nidarśyate || 10 ||
1. tatra kṛtābhilāṣā yathā—(śāku. 2.20)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhaiḥ anāviddhaṃ/muktaṃ rat‍naṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamapi ca tad‍rūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha/va samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 11 ||
2. ākāṅkṣā yathā—(gāsa. 4.42)
ekkakkama—saṃdesāṇurāa—vaḍḍhaṃta—kouhallāiṃ |
dukkhaṃ asamattamaṇorahāiṁ acchaṃti mihuṇāiṁ || 12 ||
(anyonyasandeśānurāgavardhamānakautūhalāni |
duḥkhamasamāp‍tamanorathāni tiṣṭhanti mithunāni ||)
3. apekṣā yathā—(gāsa. 2.100)
bhadda! puloaa imaṃ vihasiavaaṇā païssa oppei |
jāā suapaḍhamubbhiṇṇadaṃtajualaṃkiaṃ boraṃ || 13 ||
(bhadraṃ! pralokaya imaṃ vihasitavadanā patyurarpayati |
jāyā sutaprathamodbhinnadantayugalāṅkitaṃ badaram ||)
4. utkaṇṭhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.73)
jaṃ jaṃ so ṇijjhāaï aṃgoāsaṃ mahaṃ aṇimisaccho |
pacchāemi a taṃ taṃ icchāmi a teṇa dīsaṃtaṃ || 14 ||
(yaṃ yaṃ sa nidhyāyati aṅgāvakāśaṃ mamānimiṣākṣaḥ |
pracchādayāmi ca taṃ tam icchāmi ca tena dṛśyamānam ||)
5–7. na labdhāni . . . . . . . . . . . . |
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . .. . ||
7. vāñchā yathā—(gāsa. 3.21)
tā kiṃ kareu jaṃ jaïsi tīa vaïveḍhavelilaathaṇīe |
pāaṃguṭṭhaddhakkhittaṇīsahaṃgīe vi ṇa i diṭṭho || 15 ||
(tat kiṃ karotu yadi tvaṃ asi tayā vṛtiveṣṭanapreritastanayā |
pādāṅguṣṭhārdhakṣip‍tanissahāṅgayā 'pi na dṛṣṭaḥ ||)
9. tṛṣṇā yathā—(gāsa. 1.93)
aviaṇhapecchaṇijjeṇa takkhaṇaṃ māmi! teṇa diṭṭheṇa |
siviṇaapīeṇa va pāṇieṇa taṇha c‍cia ṇa phiṭṭhā || 16 ||
(avitṛṣṇaprekṣaṇīyena tatkṣaṇaṃ mātulāni! tena dṛṣṭena |
svap‍napīteneva pānīyena tṛṣṇaiva na mṛṣṭā ||)
10. lālasā yathā—
ghaḍiūrusaṃpuḍaṃ ṇavavahūe jahaṇaṃ varo puloei |
saṃdaṭṭha—ṇava—kapāḍaṃ dāraṃ piva sagga—ṇaarassa || 17 ||
(ghaṭitorusaṃpuṭaṃ navavadhvā jaghanaṃ varaḥ pralokayati |
sandaṣṭanavakavāṭaṃ dvāramiva svarganagarasya ||)
11. spṛhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.75)
kassa karo bahupuṇṇapphalekkataruṇo tuhaṃ visaṃmihaï |
thaṇapariṇāhe vaṃmaha—ṇihāṇa—kalase vva pāroho || 18 ||
(kasya karo bahupuṇyaphalaikatarostava viśramiṣyati |
stanapariṇāhe manmathanidhānakalaśa iva prarohaḥ ||)
12. laulyaṃ yathā—
vaṃciapiāṇaṇā viaamassa lolaï sahimuhe diṭṭhī |
līlaṃ rahassabahulaṃ saho/sā hu viārei kāmassa || 19 ||
(vañcitapriyānanā priyatamasya lolati sakhīmukhe dṛṣṭiḥ |
līlāṃ rahasyabahulāṃ sā khalu vikārayati kāmasya ||)
13. gardhā yathā—
dhariuṃ kaha ṇu tīraï haadiṭṭī vallahesu ṇivaḍaṃtī |
gāi vva hārahāī sarase javavallare luddhā || 20 ||
{dhartuṃ kathamapi na pāryate hatadṛṣṭirvallabheṣu nipatantī |
gauriva bhārahārī sarase yavavallare lubdhā ||}
14. śraddhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.50ve)
saddho me tujjha piattaṇassa kaha taṃ ti ṇea āṇāmo |
de pasia tumaṃ cia sikkhavesu jaha te piā homi || 21 ||
{śraddhā me tava priyatvasya kathaṃ taditi naiva jānīmaḥ |
prārthaye prasīda tvameva śikṣaya yathā te priyā bhavāmi ||}
15. ruciryathā—(karpūrama. 2.49)
bālāo hoṃti koūhaleṇa emea cabalacittāo |
daralhasiathaṇīsu puṇo ṇivasaï maaraddhaa—rahasso || 22 ||
(bālā bhavanti kautūhalena evameva capalacittāḥ |
daralasitastanīṣu punaḥ nivasati makaradhvajarahasyam ||)
16. dohado (dohadam) yathā—(gāsa. 1.15)
kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï? sahīhiṃ ia pucchiāeṁ muddhāe |
paḍamulla/ggaadohaliṇie ṇavaraṃ daïaṃ gaā diṭṭhī || 23 ||
(kiṃ kiṃ te pratibhāsate? sakhībhiriti pṛṣṭāyā mugadhāyāḥ |
prathamodgatadohadinyāḥ kevalaṃ dayitaṃ gatā dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
17. āśā yathā—(gāsa. 4.28)
ṇīāiṁ ajja ṇik‍kava! piṇaddhaṇavaraṃgaeṁ varāīe |
gharaparipāḍīa paheṇaāi tuha daṃsaṇāsāe || 24 ||
(nītāni adya niṣkṛpa! pinaddhanavaraṅgakayā varākyā |
gṛhaparipāṭyā praheṇakāni tava darśanāśayā ||)
18. āśīryathā—
janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamuca— stathāvasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu śubhaiḥ śuktivadane |
tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindati yayā ruciṃ tanvan pīnastani! hṛdi tavāyaṃ viluṭhati || 25 ||
19. āśaṃsā yathā—
hojja vaṇe, so diaho! jattha vi āmaliakusumadhammillā |
patte raāvasāṇe pucchijja pavāsaduk‌khāiṃ || 26 ||
(bhavatu vane, sa divaso yatrā 'pyāmṛditakusumadhammillā |
prāp‍te ratāvasāne pṛccheyaṃ pravāsaduḥkhāni ||)
20. manoratho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.64)
yathā śrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara! jano 'yamuccaiḥ—padalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 27 ||
21. āsthā yathā—(kirātā. 9.34)
sadmanāṃ viracanāhitaśobhairāgatapriyakathairapi dūtyam |
sannikṛṣṭaratibhiḥ suradārairbhūṣitairapi vibhūṣaṇamīṣṭe || 28 ||
22. abhiniveśo yathā—(gāsa. 6.30)
loo jūraï jūraü vaaṇijjaṃ hoi hou taṃ ṇāma |
ehi ṇimajjasu pāse pupphavaï! ṇa ei me ṇiddā || 29 ||
(lokaḥ khidyati khidyatu vacanīyaṃ bhavati bhavatu tannāma |
ehi niṣīda pārśve puṣpavati! naiti me nidrā ||)
23. anubandho yathā—
ga/geṇhaï kaṃṭhammi, balā cuṃbaï ṇaaṇāi, haraï me siaaṃ |
paḍhamasuraammi raaṇī varassa emea bolei || 30 ||
(guh‍ṇāti kaṇṭhe, balāccumbati nayane, harati me sicayam |
prathamasurate rajanī varasya evameva vyavalīyate ||)
24. āgraho yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 31 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
āryā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe kurute ||)
25. vimarśo yathā—(śāku. 5.13)
kāsvidavakuṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralāvaṇyā |
madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayamiva pāṇḍupatrāṇām || 32 ||
26. manīṣā yathā—(śāku. 1.19)
asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ |
satāṃ hi sandehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || 33 ||
27. abhiprāyo yathā—
bālaa re! vaṃcijjasi lolira-mahu-āṇa-saddhapasarāo |
puphphavaī—muhacuṃbaṇa—sahāsa—kaṃṭhaggaha—suhāo || 34 ||
(bālaka! re vañ‍cyase lolitamadhupānaśraddhāprasarāt |
puṣpavatī—mukhacuṃbana—sahāsa—kaṇṭhagraha—sukhāt ||)
28. pakṣapāto yathā—(seba. 12.13)
vīsaṃbha vaḍ‍‌̣dhiarasaṃ raï/aïrāu-kkhalia-sesa-saṃṭhia-rasaṇaṃ |
vialiamaapatta/ttuṭṭhaṃ paccūsaraaṃ paosadūrabbhahiaṃ || 35 ||
{visrambhavardhitarasaṃ rati/atirāgotkhalitaśeṣasaṃsthitaraśanam |
vigalitamadena nipuṇaṃ madaprāp‍tatuṣṭiṃ pratyūṣarataṃ pradoṣadūrābhyadhikam ||}
29. lobho yathā—
huṃ huṃ de bhaṇasu puṇo ṇa muaṃ ti karei kālavikkhevaṃ |
ghariṇī hiaasuhāiṃ païṇo kaṇṇe bhaṇaṃtassa || 36 ||
(huṃ/huṃ he bhaṇa punaḥ na śruta/jñātamiti karoti kālavikṣepam |
gṛhiṇī hṛdayasukhāni patyuḥ karṇe bhaṇataḥ ||)
30. āsaṅgo yathā—(māmā. 1.26)
santāpasantatimahāvyasanāya tasyā— mādhatta me tadanapekṣitahetu cetaḥ |
prāyaḥ śubhaṃ ca vidadhātyaśubhaṃ ca jantoḥ sarvaṃkaṣā bhagavatī bhavitavyataiva || 37 ||
31. abhiṣvaṅgo yathā—(gāsa. 276 ve.)
daḍhamūḍhabaddhagaṃṭhi vva moiā kaha vi teṇa me bāhū |
amhehi vi tassa ure khutta vva samukhkhaā thaṇaā || 38 ||
(dṛḍhamūḍhabaddhagranthī iva mocitau kathamapi tena me bāhū |
asmābhirapi tasyorasi khāta iva samutkhātau stanau ||)
32. saktiryathā—(gāsa. 878 ve.)
kālakkharadūsikkhia bālaa! re ehi lagga kaṃṭhaṃmi |
doṇha vi ṇaraaṇivāso sāmaaĕ jaï hoi tā u || 39 ||
(kālākṣaraduśśikṣita bālaka! re ehi lagasva kaṇṭhe |
dvayorapi naraka/nirayanivāso samakaṃ yadi bhavati tad bhavatu ||)
33. moho yathā—(gāsa. 361ve)
ṇīsāsuk‍kaṃpapuloiehi jāṇaṃti pecciuṃ dhaṇṇā |
aṃhārisāṇa diṭhṭhe piaṃmi appā vi pamhasaï || 40 ||
(niḥśvāsotkampitapralokitairjānanti prekṣituṃ dhanyāḥ |
asmādṛśāṃ dṛṣṭe priye ātmā 'pi prasmaryate ||)
34. ākūtaṃ yathā—
tāva chivaï, tā ṇiacchaï, tā kuṇaï raaṃ pi tāva cuṃbeī |
aṃgehi kīraï paī kāmottattasīalo tissā(yāvat) || 41 ||
(tāvat spṛśati tāvanniyacchati, tāvat karoti, ratamapi, tāvaccumbati |
aṅgaiḥ kriyate patiḥ kāmottap‍taśītalastasyāḥ(lo yāvat) ||)
35. kutūhalaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.21)
asamattamaṃḍaṇa c‍cia vac‍ca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa |
bolāvia—halahalaassa putti! citte ṇa laggihisi || 42 ||
{asamāp‍tamaṇḍanaiva vraja gṛhaṃ tasya sakautūhalasya |
vyavalīnautsukyasya putri! citte na lagiṣayasi ||}
36. vismayo yathā—(sūmu. 16)
kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām |
sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam? || 43 ||
37. rāgo yathā—(gāsa. 6.61)
ghariṇighaṇatthaṇapellaṇasuhellipaḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃ—gāraa—vāraviṭhṭhi—diahā suhāveṃti || 44 ||
{gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhayanti ||)}
38. vegau yathā—
jāṇāmi jaṇo ṇiuṇo guruaṇamajjhammi saṃṭhiā a ahaṃ |
tā kiṃ karemi piasahi! dhariāvi balā valaï diṭṭhī || 45 ||
(jānāmi jano nipuṇo gurujanamadhye saṃsthitā cāham |
tat kiṃ karomi priyasakhi! dhṛtā 'pi balād valate dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
39. adhyavasāyo yathā—(māmā. 4.4)
samānapremāṇaṃ janamasulabhaṃ prārthitavato vidhau vāmārambhe mama samucitaiṣā pariṇatiḥ |
tathā 'pyevaṃ nindāśravaṇasamaye 'syāḥ pravigalat— prabhaṃ prātaścandradyuti vadanamantardahati mām || 46 ||
40. vyavasāyo yathā—(gāsa. 3.31)
tassa/tujjha a sohaggaguṇaṃ amahilasarisaṃ ca sāhasaṃ majjha |
jāṇaï golāūro vāsārattaddharatto a || 47 ||
{tasya(tava) ca saubhāgyaguṇam amahilāsadṛśaṃ ca sāhasaṃ mama |
jānāti godāpūro varṣārātrārdharātrañca ||}
41. kāmanā yathā—(līlāvatī. 1258)
acchīhiṃ cia sā teṇa piaamā ṇeha-ṇibbhara-maṇeṇa |
āhāsia va ūhia vva rabhia/ramia/rate vva pīa vva || 48 ||
(akṣibhyāmeva sā tena priyatamā s‍nehanirbharamanasā |
ābhāṣiteva upagụ̄dheva rateva pīteva ||)
42. vāsanā yathā—
āṇiapulaübbheo savattipaṇaapaḍipūraṇaṃmi/paridhūsarammi vi garue |
piadaṃsaṇe pavaṭṭa/ḍ‍ḍhaï maṃtuṭṭhāṇe vi ruppiṇīe pahariso || 49 ||
{ānītapulakodbhedaḥ sapat‍nīpraṇayapratipūraṇe 'pi/paridhūsare 'pi guruke |
priyadarśane pravarta/rdhate mantu/nyusthāne 'pi rukmiṇyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||}
43. smaraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.68)
bharimo se saaṇaparaṃmuhīe vialaṃtamāṇapasarāe |
kaïava-suttu-vvattaṇa-thaṇa-kalasu haru/bhara—ppellaṇasuhelliṃ || 50 ||
(smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāṅmukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ |
kaitava—sup‍todvartana—stanabhara—kalasa—preraṇa—sukhakelim ||)
44. saṅkalpo yathā—
pihite kārāvāsāgāre manasi sa ca sūcīmukhāgranirbhedyam/dye |
apica nimīlitanayane tathā 'pi kāntānanaṃ vyaktam || 51 ||
45. bhāvo yathā—
diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi dha/tharaharasi piaṃmi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe |
taha/tuha saṃbhāsaṇaseulliphaṃsaṇe kiṃ vilijjihisi || 52 ||
{dṛṣṭe yat pralokiṣyasi dharadharasi priye yatsamāsanne |
tathā/tava saṃbhāṣaṇasvedārdrasparśane kiṃ vilajjiṣyase ||}
46. rāgo (hāsaḥ) yathā—
taha tīe suharaso pahariso a muhapaṃkaaṃmi papphurio |
samaaṃ jaha viasia—maüliāi ja—āi acchīi || 53 ||
(tathā tasyāḥ sukharasaḥ praharṣaśca mukhapaṅkaje prasphuritaḥ |
samakaṃ yathā vikasitamukulite jāte akṣiṇī ||)
47. ratiryathā—(gāsa. 2.25)
accheraṃ va ṇihi vvia sagge rajjaṃ va amaapāṇaṃ va |
āsi mha taṃ muhuttaṃ viṇiaṃsaṇa—daṃsaṇaṃ tissā/tīe || 54 ||
(āścaryamiva nidhiriva svargo rājyamiva amṛtapānamiva |
āsīnmama tanmuhūrtaṃ vinivasanadarśanaṃ tasyāḥ ||)
48. prītiryathā—
avihāviakkharavaā cireṇa aṇubaṃdhapucchiapalattā |
ṇavavahupaḍhamullāvā varassa hiae ṇa māeṃti || 55 ||
{avibhāvitākṣaravacasaḥ/padāḥ cireṇa anubandhapṛṣṭapralapitāḥ/pravṛttāḥ |
navavadhūprathamollāpā varasya hṛdaye na mānti ||}
49. dākṣiṇyaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.22)
ṇavavahupeṃmataṇuio paṇaaṃ paḍhamaba/ghariṇīeĕ rakkhanto |
alihia—duppariallaṃ pi ṇei raṇṇaṃ dhaṇuṃ vāho || 56 ||
(navavadhūprematanūkṛtaḥ praṇayaṃ prathamagṛhiṇyā rakṣan |
alikhitadurākarṣamapi nayatyaraṇyaṃ dhanurvyādhaḥ ||)
50. anugraho yathā—(gāsa. 3.99)
khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhavei gimhāvaraṇharamiassa |
ollaṃ galaṃtapu/upphaṃ ṇhāṇasuaṃdhaṃ cihurabhāraṃ || 57 ||
(khinnasyorasi patyuḥ sthāpayati grīṣmāparāṇharamitasya |
ārdraṃ galatpuṣpaṃ s‍nānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||)
51. vātsalyaṃ yathā—
jhatti samuṭṭhia-maṇahara-siri-vaaṇa-vilāsa-saṃbhamāuliaṃ |
bhua-juala-gahia-ṇippaṃdamaṃdaraṃ ṇamaha mahumahaṇaṃ || 58 ||
(jhaṭiti samutthitamanohāriśrīvadanavilāsasaṃbhramākulitam |
bhujayugalagṛhītanissapandamandaraṃ namata madhumathanam ||)
52. anukrośo yathā—(gāsa. 6.66)
gajja mahaṃ c‍cia uariṃ savvatthāmeṇa lohahiaassa |
jalahara! laṃbālaïaṃ mā re mārehisi varāiṃ || 59 ||
(garja mamaivopari sarvasthām‍nā lohahṛdayasya |
jaladhara! lambālakāṃ mā re mārayiṣyasi varākīm ||)
53. viśvāso yathā—(gāsa. 967 ve.)
kelīgottakkhalaṇe/lie varassa paphphuḍuṃḍullaï dihiṃ dei |
bahuvāsaavāsaghare vahūe vāhulliā diṭṭhī || 60 ||
{kelīgotraskhalane varasya hindolitaṃ dhṛtiṃ dadhāti |
vadhūvāsakavāsagṛhe vadhvā bāṣpārdritā dṛṣṭiḥ ||}
54. visrambho yathā—
samaaṇa-ṇaaṇāloaṇa-sac‍caviaṇṇoṇṇa-maṇaharāā/lāvo |
paccūsa-raa-vilāso vīsaṃbhaṃ kahaï mihuṇāṇa || 61 ||
(samadananayanālokanasatyāpitānyonyamanoharālāpaḥ |
pratyūṣaratavilāso visraṃbhaṃ kathayati mithunānām ||)
55. vaśīkāro yathā—(gāsa. 2.30)
sāloe ccia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 62 ||
(sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
anicchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasantī hasataḥ ||)
56. praṇayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.86)
ekkaṃ paharuvviṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ muhamārueṇa vīaṃto |
so vi hasaṃtīeṁ maeṁ gahio bīeṇa kaṃṭhammi || 63 ||
(ekaṃ prahārodvig‍naṃ hastaṃ mukhamārutena vījayan |
so 'pi hasantyā mayā gṛhīto dvitīyena kaṃṭhe ||)
57. prāp‍tiryathā—
haṃho kaṇṇullīṇā bhaṇāmi re suhaa! kiṃ pi mā tūra |
ṇijjaṇapāṇaṭṭhī/ddhīsu/tu kahaṃ pi puṇṇehi laddho si || 64 ||
(haṃho karṇollīnā bhaṇāmi re subhaga! kimapi mā tvara |
nirjanapānagoṣṭhīsu rathyāsu kathamapi puṇyairlabdho 'si ||)
58. paryāp‍tiryathā—(rā.ku. asamarthau)
eeṇa c‍cia piasahi! pajjattaṃ kiṃ ṇa māṇuse loe? |
jaṃ tassa kae esā kisa tti savvo jaṇo bhaṇaï || 65 ||
(etenaiva priyasakhi ! paryāp‍taṃ kiṃ na mānuṣe loke? |
yat tasya kṛte eṣā kṛśeti sarvo jano bhaṇati ||)
59. samāp‍tiryathā—
asamattacittala................vapāuvo sasimuhīe |
muhuaṃdo pajjaṃtarahamahūsavaviḍattamuhamaüli acchijuo || 66 ||
(asamāp‍tacitta........................... śaśimukhyāḥ |
mukhacandraḥ paryantarathamahotsavārjitamukhamukulitamakṣiyugam ||)
60. abhimānāp‍tiryathā—(gāsa. 3.29)
savvassammi vi daḍ‌̣dhe gahavaïdhūāe ṇivvudi c‍cea |
jaṃ teṇa gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio || 67 ||
(sarvasve 'pi dagdhe gṛhapatiduhiturnirvṛtireva |
yat tena grāmadāhe hastāhastikayā kuṭo/ghaṭo gṛhītaḥ ||)
61. s‍neho yathā—
hiaabbhaṃtarapasaraṃtaṇeharasavisarapūriā purao |
piadaṃsaṇaṃmi diṭṭhī maṃcaï/majjha vi ṇavakaṃdalāi vva || 68 ||
(hṛdayābhyantaraprasarats‍neharasavisarapūritā purataḥ |
priyadarśana dṛṣṭirmamāpi navakandale iva ||)
62. prema yathā—
māe! kajjāraṃbhā phalasaṃpattīe hoṃti viṇiattā |
ṇa samappaṃti samattā vi daḍ‍ḍhapemmassa vāvārā || 69 ||
(mātaḥ! kāryārambhāḥ phalasaṃpattyā bhavanti vinivṛttāḥ |
na samāpyante samastā api dagdhapremṇo vyāpārāḥ ||)
63. āhlādo yathā—(gāsa. 2.68)
acchaü tāva maṇaharaṃ piāi muhadaṃsaṇaṃ aïmahagghaṃ |
taggāmacche/kkhettasīmā vi jhatti diṭhṭhā suhāvei || 70 ||
(astu tāvanmanoharaṃ priyāyā mukhadarśanamatimahārgham |
tad‍grāmakṣetrasīmā 'pi jhaṭiti dṛṣṭā sukhayati ||)
64. nirvṛtiryathā—(gāsa. 1.85)
dakkhiṇṇeṇa vi eṃto suhaa! suhāvesi amha hiaāiṃ |
ṇikkaïavāṇuratto si jāṇa kā ṇivvuī tāṇaṃ? || 71 ||
(dākṣiṇyenāpyāyan subhaga! sukhayasyasmākaṃ hṛdayāni |
niṣkaitavānurakto 'si yāsāṃ kā nirvṛtistāsām? ||)
so 'yamanurāgacatuṣṣaṣṭiprakāro 'pi pratiprakāraṃ aṣṭadhā saṃbhavati—
1.1 nityānurāgaḥ.
1.2 naimittikānurāgaḥ,
1.3 sāmānyānurāgaḥ,
1.4 viśeṣānurāgaḥ,
1.5. prakāśānurāgaḥ,
1.6. pracchannānurāgaḥ,
1.7. akṛtrimānurāgaḥ,
1.8. kṛtrimānurāgaḥ, iti |
teṣu —
kālādikāraṇaviśeṣānapekṣo nityaḥ,
tad‍‌viparīto naimittikaḥ,
jātiviṣayaḥ sāmānyaḥ,
vyaktiviṣayo viśeṣaḥ,
svāṅganādigocaraḥ prakāśaḥ,
parāṅganādiviṣayaḥ pracchannaḥ,
prayojananirapekṣo 'kṛtrimaḥ,
tad‍‌viparītaḥ prayat‍nanirvartyaḥ kṛtrimaḥ |
(1.1 nityānurāgaḥ —24)
tatra — nityaḥ viṣaya—āśraya—ālambana—uddīpana—sthāna—saṃsthāna—rūpa—svarūpāṇāṃ pṛthak traividhyāt caturviṃśatidhā |
1.1.1 tatra anurāgo yasminnupajāyate sa viṣayaḥ |
1.1.2 yasya jāyate sa āśrayaḥ |
1.1.3 yadālambate tadālambanam |
1.1.4 yaduddīpayati taduddīpanam |
1.1.5. yatra avatiṣṭhate tat sthānam |
1.1.6 yena suśliṣṭo bhavati(?) tat saṃsthānam |1
1.1.7 yena śobhate tat rūpam |
1.1.8 yena nirūpyate tat svarūpam | teṣu—
1. jo. pāṭha eṣaḥ | rā. pāṭhastu 'ṣṭe......patita patati(?) tat'
1.1.1 viṣayānurāgaḥ— (ka) uc‍caḥ, (kha) nim‍naḥ, (ga) samaḥ iti,
1.1.2 āśrayānurāgaḥ— (ka) uttamaḥ, (kha) madhyamaḥ, (ga) kanīyān iti,
1.1.3 ālambanānurāgaḥ— (ka) śīghraḥ, (kha) madhyamaḥ, (ga) ciraḥ iti,
1.1.4 uddīpanānurāgaḥ— (ka) mṛduḥ, (kha) madhyaḥ, (ga) caṇḍaḥ iti,
1.1.5 sthānānurāgaḥ— (ka) sadṛk, (kha) visadṛśaḥ, (ga) asadṛkṣaḥ/śaḥ iti,
1.1.6 saṃsthānānurāgaḥ— (ka) samyak, (kha) mithyā, (ga) atiśāyī iti,
1.1.7 rūpānurāgaḥ— (ka) cāruḥ, (kha) acāruḥ (ga) ubhayātmā iti,
1.1.8 svarūpānurāgaḥ— (ka) gabhīraḥ, (kha)(anu)utkaṭaḥ, (ga) prakaṭaḥ iti,
tatra—
1.1.1 (ka) uc‍cajātau ya upajāyate sa uc‍caḥ ; yathā—
kaalīgabbhasaricche ūrū daṭ‍ṭhūṇa haliasoṇhāe |
ullasaï ṇaharaṃjaṇaṃ caṃḍi/ḍulassa1 seolliakarassa || 72 ||
(kadalīgarbhasadṛkṣe ūrū dṛṣṭvā hālikas‍nuṣāyāḥ |
ullasati nakharañjanaṃ nāpitasya svedārdrakarasya ||)
1.1.1 (kha) nim‍najātau nim‍naḥ ; yathā—
golāṇaīṇa tūhe mohaṃ via kurukurāamāṇabhaṭṭassa |
soddha/jjhaa-dhūāmuhapecchirassa ṇa samappae saṃjjhā || 73 ||
(godānadyāstīrthe moghameva kurukurāyamāṇabhaṭṭasya |
rajakaduhitṛmukhaprekṣaṇaśīlasya na samāpyate saṃdhyā ||)
1.1.1 (ga) samajātau samaḥ ; yathā—
saṃkea-ūsua-maṇo gahavaï-dhūā-kaḍakkha-sac‍cavio |
taṃbaṃ gaaṃ ṇa veaï vīḍāro/govālo aṃbaraṃ duhaï || 74 ||
(saṃketotsukamanā gṛhapatiduhitṛkaṭākṣasatyāpitaḥ |
gāṃ gatāṃ na vetti vrīḍālurambaraṃ dogdhi ||)
1.1.2 (ka) strīpuṃsayoḥ parasparānurāge uttamaḥ ; yathā—(gāsa. 1.98)
ramiūṇa paaṃ vi/pi gao jāhe uvaūhiuṃ paḍiṇiutto |
ahaaṃ paütthapaï/a vva takkhaṇaṃ so pavāsi vva || 75 ||
1. caṇḍilo nāpita iti deśīnāmamālāvyākhyā |
(rantvā padamapi gato yadopagūhituṃ pratinivṛttaḥ |
ahaṃ proṣitapatikeva tatkṣaṇaṃ sa pravāsīva ||)
1.1.2 (kha) yoṣidanurāge madhyamaḥ ; yathā—(gāsaḥ 2.94)
sā tui sahatthadiṇṇaṃ ajja vi o suhaa! gaṃdharahiaṃ pi |
uvvasia—ṇaaragharadevaa vva ṇo/omāliaṃ vahaï || 76 ||
(sā tāṃ svahastadattāmadyāpi re subhaga! gandharahitāmapi |
udvāsitanagaragṛgadevateva avamālikāṃ vahati ||)
1.1.2 (ga) puruṣānurāge kanīyān ; yathā—(gāsa. 1.84)
so tuha kaeṇa suṃdari! taha jhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto |
jaha se macchariṇīe vi doc‍caṃ jāāeṁ paḍivaṇṇaṃ || 77 ||
(sa tava kṛtena sundari! tathā kṣīṇaḥ sumahilo hālikaputraḥ |
yathā tasya matsariṇyā 'pi dūtyaṃ jāyayā pratipannam ||)
1.1.3. (ka) prakṛtivaśājjane śīghraṃ kālamālambamānaḥ śīghraḥ ; yathā—(gāsa.5.62)
