hatthapphaṃseṇa jaraggaī/vī vi paṇhavaï dohaaguṇeṇa |
avaloia—paṇhuiriṃ puttaa dukkhehi pāvihisi || 78 ||
(hastasparśena jaradgavyapi pras‍nauti dohadaguṇena |
avalokitapras‍navaśīlāṃ putraka! duḥkhaiḥ prāpsyasi ||)
1.1.3 (kha) madhyakālālambano madhyaḥ ; yathā—(śāku. 1.20)
calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ |
karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara! hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī || 79 ||
1.1.3 (ga) cirakālālambanaś‍ciraḥ ; sa yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.61)
na vedmi sa prārthitadurlabhaḥ kadā sakhībhirasrāntaravīkṣitāmimām |
tapaḥkṛśāmabhyupapatsyate sakhīṃ vṛṣeva sītāṃ tadavagrahakṣatām || 80 ||
1.1.4 (ka) rāgānuguṇyānmṛdūpakramo mṛduḥ ; sa yathā—(māgha. 10.17)
mandamandavigalat‍trapamīṣac‍cakṣurullasitapakṣma dadhatyā |
vīkṣyate sma śanakairnavavadhvā kāmino mukhamadhomukhayaiva || 81 ||
1.1.4 (kha) madhyopakramo madhyaḥ ; sa yathā—(kirātā. 9.47)
loladṛṣṭi vadanaṃ dayitāyāś‍cumbati priyatame rabhasena |
vrīlayā saha vinīvi nitambādaṃśukaṃ śithilatāmupapede || 82 ||
1.1.4 (ga) caṇḍopakramaḥ caṇḍaḥ ; yathā—(sūmu. 15)
dhanyāḥ sthayāḥ kathayatha priyasaṅgame 'pi visrabdhacāṭukaśatāni ratāntareṣu |
nīvīṃ prati praṇihitaśca karaḥ priyeṇa sakhyaḥ! śapāmi yadi kiñcidapi smarāmi || 83 ||
1.1.5 (ka) guṇādhike puṃsi yoṣiti vā samupajāyamānaḥ sadṛk ; yathā—
sthāne tapo duścarametadarthamaparṇayā komalayā 'pi tap‍tam |
yā dāsyamapyasya labheta nārī sā syāt kṛtārthā kimutāṅkaśayyām || 84 ||
(kusaṃ. 7.65)
1.1.5 (kha) tadviparīto visadṛśaḥ ; yathā—(rāmacarite 12.79)
paravatyaparicchade kapau kṛpaṇe 'smin mayi ko 'yamādaraḥ ? |
mṛgayasva mṛgekṣaṇe! kamapyanurūpaṃ visadṛṅ na śobhate || 85 ||
1.1.5 (ga) guṇānāmekasya bhūyastve parasya ca alpīyastve tat asadṛśaḥ ;
yathā—(māmā—2.6)
idamiha madanasya jaitramastraṃ sahajavilāsanibandhanaṃ śarīram |
asadṛśavarasamprayogaśocyaṃ viphalaguṇātiśayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti || 86 ||
1.1.6 (ka) parasparasyānurāgādisāmye samyak ; yathā—(bā.rā. 5.17)
samapemmarasaṃ samarūpajauvaṇaṃ samavilāsaveaḍ̣dhiṃ |
samasuhadukkhaṃ a jaṇaṃ samapuṇṇo jaï jaṇo lahaï || 87 ||
(samapremarasaṃ samarūpayauvanaṃ samavilāsavaidagdhyam |
samasukhaduḥkhaṃ ca janaṃ samapuṇyo yadi jano labhate ||)
1.1.6 (kha) ekasya prātikūlye mithyā; yathā—(seba. 11.27)
abbhatthaṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï tīraï tihuaṇasirīa vi ṇa loheuṃ |
ṇa gaṇei sarīrabhaaṃ kaha maṇṇe hojja jāṇaī sāṇuṇaā || 88 ||
(abhyarthanāṃ na gṛh‍ṇāti śakyate tribhuvanaśriyā 'pi na lobhayitum |
na gaṇayati śarīrabhayaṃ kathaṃ manye bhavejjānakī sānunayā ||)
1.1.6 (ga) ekasyātiśayādhikye atiśāyī ; yathā—
diṭhṭhā kuviāṇuṇaā piā sahassajaṇapellaṇaṃ pi visahiaṃ |
jassa ṇisaṇṇāe ure sirīe pemmeṇa lahaïo appāṇo || 89 ||
(dṛṣṭā kupitānunayā priyā sahasrajanapreraṇamapi visoḍham |
yasya niṣaṇṇayā urasi śriyaḥ premṇā laghūkṛta ātmā ||)
1.1.7 (ka) vayorūpajātyādīnāṃ parabhāge cāruḥ ; yathā—(raghu. 6.65)
indīvaraśyāmatanurnṛpo 'sau tvaṃ rocanāgauraśarīrayaṣṭiḥ |
anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye vāṃ yogastaḍittoyadayorivāstu || 90 ||
1.1.7 (kha) tadviparyaye acāruḥ ; yathā—(māmā. 2.8)
rājñaḥ priyāya suhṛde sacivāya kāryād dattvā ' 'tmajāṃ bhavati/tu nirvṛtimānamātyaḥ |
durdarśanena ghaṭatāmiyamapyanena dhūmagraheṇa vimalā śaśinaḥ kaleva || 91 ||
1.1.7 (ga) guṇadoṣayoḥ sadbhāve ubhayātmā ; yathā—(bārā. 1.36)
ājñā śakraśikhāmaṇipraṇayinī, śāstrāṇi cakṣurnavaṃ, bhaktirbhūtapatau pinākini, padaṃ laṅketi divyā purī |
utpattirdruhiṇānvaye ca, tadaho nedṛg varo labhyate syāc‍cedeṣa na rāvaṇaḥ, k‍va nu punaḥ sarvatra sarve guṇāḥ ? || 92 ||
1.1.8 (ka) aprakāśo gabhīraḥ ; yathā—(gāsa. 6.10)
tuha daṃsaṇasaṃjaṇio vahūeṁ/imīeṁ lajjāluīeṁ aṇurāo |
duggaamaṇoraho via hiae c‍cia jāi pariṇāmaṃ || 93 ||
(tava darśanasaṃjanito 'syā lajjāloranurāgaḥ |
durgatamanoratha iva hṛdaya eva yāti pariṇāmam ||)
1.1.8 (kha) nātiprakāśo 'nutkaṭaḥ ; yathā—śāku. 2.11
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam |
vinayavāritavṛttiritastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 94 || ityādi |
1.1.8 (ga) atiprakāśaḥ prakaṭaḥ ; yathā—
iaro jaṇo ṇa āṇaï dhaṇṇāṇa saṃjamiāi pemmāiṃ |
amhaṃ maṇorahā dukkhaāṇa racchāsu gijjaṃti || 95 ||
(itaro jano na jānāti dhanyānāṃ susajjitāni premāṇi |
amṛta/taṃ manorathā duḥkhagā na rathyāsu gīyante/kīryante ||
(1.2 naimittikānurāgaḥ —24)
atha naimittikānurāgaḥ | so 'pi caturviṃśatidhā, kāla—samaya— velopādhi—sādhana—samāveśa—deśa—prakīrṇaka—traividhyāt | teṣu —
1.2.1. kālaḥ—hemanta—vasanta—varṣādiḥ | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.1. (ka) haimantikaḥ,
1.2.1. (kha) vāsantikaḥ,
1.2.1. (ga) vārṣikaḥ iti |
1.2.2. samayaḥ—pravāsārambhaḥ, pratyāgama; prathamasaṅgamādiḥ | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.2. (ka) prāvāsikaḥ,
1.2.2. (kha) prātyāgamikaḥ,
1.2.2. (ga) prāthamasaṅgamikaḥ iti |
1.2.3. velā—pradoṣaḥ, niśīthaḥ, prabhātam, iti | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.3. (ka) prādoṣikaḥ,
1.2.3. (kha) naiśīthaḥ,
1.2.3. (ga) prābhātikaḥ iti |
1.2.4. upādhiḥ—tamaḥ, candrodayaḥ, jyots‍nā, iti | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.4. (ka) tāmasaḥ,
1.2.4. (kha) cāndrodayaḥ,
1.2.4. (ga) jyauts‍naḥ iti |
1.2.5. sādhanam—s‍nānam, vilepanam, mālyam, iti | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.5. (ka) s‍nānīyaḥ,
1.2.5. (kha) vilepanīyaḥ,
1.2.5. (ga) mālīyaḥ iti |
1.2.6. sakti(?) samāveśaḥ—upasaraḥ, prāsādaḥ, madaḥ, iti | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.6. (ka) aupasaraḥ,
1.2.6. (kha) prāsādikaḥ,
1.2.6. (ga) madajaḥ iti |
1.2.7. deśaḥ—viviktaḥ, gahanaḥ, sevyaḥ, iti | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.7. (ka) viviktanimittaḥ,
1.2.7. (kha) gahananimittaḥ,
1.2.7. (ga) sevyanimittaḥ iti |
1.2.8. gītanimittam, utsavaḥ, cūtādayaḥ iti prakīrṇakāni | tannimittaḥ—
1.2.8. (ka) gītanimittaḥ,
1.2.8. (kha) autsavaḥ,
1.2.8. (ga) kṣaṇaprabhavaḥ (cūtādinimittaḥ ?) iti |
1.2.1 (ka) haimantiko yathā—(gāsa. 745 ve)
kassa ṇa saddhā garuattaṇaṃmi païṇā pasajjamāṇassa |
jaï māṇabhaṃjaṇīo ṇa hoṃti hemaṃtarāīo || 96 ||
(kasya na śraddhā gurutve patyā prasādyamānasya |
yadi mānabhañjinyo na bhavanti hemantarātryaḥ ||)
1.2.1. (kha) vāsantiko yathā—(gāsa. 543 ve.)
dīsaï ṇa cūamuulaṃ attā! ṇa a vāi malaagaṃdhavaho |
eṃtaṃ vasaṃtamāsaṃ sāhaï ukkaṃṭhiā ceaṃ || 97 ||
(dṛśyate na cūtamukulaṃ śvaśrūḥ! na ca vāti malayagandhavahaḥ |
eṣyantaṃ vasantamāsaṃ katha/sādhayatyutkaṇṭhitaṃ cetaḥ ||)
1.2.1. (ga) vārṣiko yathā—(gāsa. 706, 711ve)
jaṃ mucchiāe ṇa sudaṃ/muaṃ kalaṃbagaṃdheṇa tagguṇe paḍiaṃ |
iharā gajjiasaddo jīeṇa viṇā ṇa bolaṃto || 98 ||
{yanmūrcchitayā naṃ śrutaṃ/jñātaṃ kadambagandhena tad‍guṇe patitam |
itarathā garjitaśabdo jīvena vinā nāpakrā/mati ||}
1.2.2. (ka) prāvāsiko yathā—(gāsa. 1.46)
kallaṃ kira kharahiao pavasihaï pio tti suvvaï jaṇaṃmi |
taha vaḍḍha bhaavaï ṇise! jaha se kallaṃ cia ṇa hoi || 99 ||
(kalyaṃ kila kharahṛdayaḥ pravatsyati priya iti śrūyate jane |
tathā vardhasva bhagavati niśe! yathā tasya kalyameva na bhavati ||)
1.2.2. (kha) prātyāgamiko yathā—
sahasā mā sāhivvaï piāgamo tīeṁ virahakisiāe |
ac‍catapahariseṇa vi jā a maā sā maa c‍cea || 100 ||
(sahasā mā sādhyatāṃ priyāgamastasyā virahakṛśāyāḥ |
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā ca mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||)
1.2.2. (ga) prāthamasaṅgamiko yathā—
tharaharaï ūrujualaṃ jhijjaï vaaṇaṃ sasajjhasaṃ hiaaṃ |
bālāe paḍhamasurae kiṃ kiṃ ṇa kuṇaṃti aṃgāiṃ || 101 ||
(tharatharāyate ūruyugalaṃ kṣīyate vadanaṃ sasādhvasaṃ hṛdayam |
bālāyāḥ prathamasurate kiṃ kiṃ na kurvantyaṅgāni ||)
1.2.3. (ka) prādoṣiko yathā—
pattapaoso paḍivaṇṇamaṃḍalo/ṇo ghaḍiadūisaṃcāro |
thoāvasesagholiramaṇoraho hoi juaïjaṇo || 102 ||
(prāp‍tapradoṣaḥ pratipannamaṇḍano ghaṭitadūtīsañcāraḥ |
stokāvaśeṣaghūrṇaśīlamanoratho bhavati yuvatijanaḥ ||)
1.2.3. (kha) naiśītho yathā—(amaruka. 71)
k‍va prasthitā 'si karabhoru! ghane niśīthe prāṇeśvaro vasati yatra manaḥpriyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle! nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 103 || ityādi |
1.2.3. (ga) prābhātiko yathā—(seba. 12.12)
pialaṃbheṇa paoso jāo diṇṇapphalo raïsuheṇa ṇisā |
āṇiavirahukkaṃṭho galaï aṇivviṇṇavammaho paccūso || 104 ||
(priyalambhena pradoṣo jāto dattaphalo ratisukhena niśā |
ānītavirahotkaṇṭho galatyanirviṇṇamanmathaḥ pratyūṣaḥ ||)
1.2.4. (ka) tāmaso yathā—(gāsa. 5.15)
coriaraasaddhālui mā putti! bhamasu andhaārammi |
ahiaaraṃ lakkhijjasi tamaharie dīvaasihe vva || 105 ||
(cauryarataśraddhālo mā putri! bhramāndhakāre |
adhikataraṃ lakṣiṣyase tamobhṛte dīpakaśikheva ||)
1.2.4. (kha) cāndrodayo yathā—(seba. 10.81)
caṃdujjoeṇa mao maeṇa caṃdāavo a vaḍ̣dhiappasaro |
dohiṃ vi tehiṃ ṇu maaṇo maaṇeṇa ṇu do vi te ṇiā aïbhūmiṃ || 106 ||
(candrod‍dyotena mado madena candrātapaśca vardhitaprasaraḥ |
dvābhyāmapi tābhyāṃ nu madano madanena nu dvāvapi tau nītāvatibhūmim ||)
1.2.4. (ga) jyauts‍no yathā—
aṇuṇaa-suhaṃ ṇa pattaṃ piāhi daïesu khijjao vvi ṇa calaaṃ/calaṇo |
osāriaṃmi paḍhamaṃ dūīe vva dosiṇāe māṇaggahaṇe || 107 ||
(anunayasukhaṃ na prāp‍taṃ priyābhirdayiteṣu khidyete api na caraṇau |
apasārite prathamaṃ dūtyeva jyots‍nayā mānagrahaṇe ||)
1.2.5. (ka) s‍nānīyo yathā—(gāsa. 7.83)
avaraṇhāaajāmāuassa viuṇei mohaṇukkaṃṭhaṃ |
vahuāe gharaparohaḍamajjaṇamuhalo valaasaddo || 108 ||
(aparāh‍ṇāgatajāmāturdviguṇayati mohanotkaṇṭhām |
vadhvā gṛhapaścād‍bhāgamajjanamukharo valayaśabdaḥ ||)
1.2.5. (kha) vilepanīyo yathā—
boheva/i vva pasuttaṃ maaṇaṃ mihuṇāṇa pariaṇakarehiṃ |
vajjaṃtasusiṇa(suṇha)-gholirabāhulaā-valaa-ṇigghoso || 109 ||
(bodhayati/tīva prasup‍taṃ madanaṃ mithunānāṃ parijanakaraiḥ |
vādyamānasusvara(suṇha) ghūrṇaśīlabāhulatāvalayanirghoṣaḥ ||)
1.2.5. (ga) mālīyo yathā—(gāsa. 783 ve)
kāraṇagahiaṃ pi imā māṇaṃ moei māṇiṇiajaṇassa |
sahaāramaṃjarī piasahi vva kaṇṇe samullīṇā || 110 ||
(kāraṇagṛhītamapyeṣā mānaṃ mocayati māninījanasya |
sahakāramañjarī priyasakhīva karṇe/karṇo samāśritā/samullīnā ||)
1.2.6. (ka) aupasaro yathā—
pialaṃbhaja—vihalaṃghala—sāhulipaṃḍarāe jahaṇabharamaṃdagamaṇāe |
ahidhāviūṇa chiphphaṃ pupphapphalaāe dhaṇṇo si || 111 ||
(priyalambhajasādhvasavihvalāṅgavas‍trapāṇḍarayā jaghanabharamandagamanayā |
abhidhāvya spṛṣṭaṃ puṣpaphalakayā dhanyo 'si ||)
1.2.6. (kha) prāsādiko yathā—
ṇimmaviasaṃdhiaṃmā tāva a dūrapaḍibaddhavammahapasarā |
garuaṃ suraücchāhaṃ dāūṇa sahi vva jāmiṇī gaā tīe || 112 ||
(nirmāpitasandhikarmā tāvac‍ca dūrapratibaddhamanmathaprasarā |
gurukaṃ suratotsāhaṃ dattvā sakhīva yāminī gatā tasyāḥ ||)
1.2.6. (ga) madajo yathā—
oloiaṃmi tuliāṃ piāhi gahiammi saṃbhameṇa valaïaṃ |
paḍicakkhiammi kaaṃ ca pa/pie susaṃdhia—saraṃ aṇaṃgeṇa dhaṇuṃ || 113 ||
(avalokane tulitaṃ priyābhirgṛhīte sambhrameṇa valayitam |
āsvādite/pratyākhyāte kṛtaṃ ca saṃhitaśaramanaṅgena dhanuḥ ||)
1.2.7. (ka) vivikto yathā—
niryatā parijanena bodhitaḥ pūryamāṇa/sphūrjamāna—rucirullasada‍daśaḥ/ n dṛśaḥ |
dvārasaṃvalanamāṃsalo 'dhikaṃ dīpakaśca madanaśca diś‍yate/didyute || 114 ||
1.2.7 (kha) gahananimitto yathā—
jhiṇṇaṃti jhaḍaṃtehiṃ pallaviā hoṃti pallavaṃtehiṃ |
gāmāsaṇṇapalāsehiṃ paṃsulī—hiaa—sabbhāvā || 115 ||
(kṣīṇāḥ kṣīyamāṇaiḥ pallavitā bhavanti pallavadbhiḥ |
grāmāsannapalāśaiḥ pāṃsulā—hṛdaya—sadbhāvāḥ ||)
1.2.7 (ga) sevyanimitto yathā—
pu/phullaṃtaṇiraṃtara—taruṇa—vījulā—vaṇa—siṇiddhakūlāe |
golāṇaī ṇiaḍa—vasiri saï tti mā putti! pattiasu || 116 ||
(phullannirantarataruṇavañjulavanas‍nigdhakūlāyāḥ |
godānadyā nikaṭavāsinī satīti mā putri! pratīhi ||)
1.2.8 (ka) gītanimitto yathā—
keṇāvi ajja gose kaṃpi/aṃbavaṇe vallahaṃ mharaṃteṇa |
dūsaha—maaṇa—sarāhaa—hiaavaṇa—pphoḍaṇaṃ gīaṃ || 117 ||
(kenāpyadya prabhāte kāmāpi vane vallabhāṃ smaratā |
aho madanaśarāhatahṛdayavraṇasphoṭanaṃ gītam ||)
1.2.8 (kha) utsavanimitto yathā—(gāsa. 1.39)
sāhiṇe pi piaame patte vi chaṇe ṇa maṃḍio appā |
duggaa—paüttha—vaïaṃ—saajjhiaṃ saṃṭhavaṃtīe || 118 ||
(svādhīne 'pi priyatame prāp‍te 'pi kṣaṇe na maṇḍita ātmā |
durgataproṣitapatikāṃ prativeśinīṃ saṃsthāpayantyā ||)
1.2.8 (ga) cūtanimitto yathā—(sūmu.20)
kiṃ dvāri daivahatike! sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |
asmin manāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasannipātāḥ || 119 ||
(1.3 sāmānyānurāgaḥ —24)
sāmānyānurāgo 'pi caturviṃśatiprakāraḥ—
1. dravyagocaraḥ 7. vyastaḥ 13. alpaviṣayaḥ 19. sambandhajanmā
2. guṇagocaraḥ 8. śuddhaḥ 14. deśahetuḥ 20. prākṛtaḥ
3. karmagocaraḥ 9. saṅkīrṇaḥ 15. kālahetuḥ 21. vaikṛtaḥ
4. saṃkṣip‍taḥ 10. sādharmyakṛtaḥ 16. dharmaviṣayaḥ 22. vayaḥkṛtaḥ
5. vikṣip‍taḥ 11. vaidharmyakṛtaḥ 17. dharmiviṣayaḥ 23. vaidagdhyakṛtaḥ
6. samastaḥ 12. mahāviṣayaḥ 18. samayajanmā 24. saubhāgyakṛtaḥ, iti |
sa tu —
1.3.1 dravyagocaro yathā—(gāsa. 3.58)
kari-kalabha-kuṃbha-saṇṇiha-thaṇabhara-bhajjaṃta-taṇua-majjhāo |
saṃsāraṃmi asāre sāraṃ sāraṃgaṇaaṇāo || 120 ||
(karikalabha-kumbhasannibha-stanabhara-bhajyamāna-tanukamadhyāḥ |
saṃsāre asāre sāraṃ sāraṅganayanāḥ ||)
1.3.2guṇagocaro yathā—(gāsa. 3.88)
tāvaṃ avaṇei ṇa tahā caṃdaṇapaṃko vi kāmimihuṇassa |
jaha dūsahe vi gimhe aṇṇuṇṇāliṃgaṇasuhellī || 121 ||
(tāpamapanayati na tathā candanapaṅko 'pi kāmimithunasya |
yathā dussahe 'pi grīṣme anyonyāliṅganasukhakeliḥ ||)
1.3.3. karmagocaro yathā—(gāsa.3.74)
ṇa vi taha chearaāiṁ vi haraṃti puṇaruttarāarasiāiṃ |
jaha jaddha va taddha va, jaha va taha va, sabbhāvaramiāiṃ || 122 ||
(nāpi tathā cchekaratānyapi haranti punaruktarāgarasitāni |
yathā yatra vā tatra vā, yathā vā sadbhāvaratāni ||)
1.3.4saṃkṣip‍to yathā—
jaṃ taṃ rūvaṃ jaṃ taṃ paaṃpiaṃ jaṃ pi taṃ pi ṇevacchaṃ |
taruṇīaṇasaṃbaddhaṃ aṇṇaṃ via kiṃ pi taṃ hoi || 123 ||
(yat tad rūpaṃ, yat tat prajalpitaṃ yadapi tadapi nepathyam |
taruṇījanasaṃbaddhaṃ anyadiva kimapi tad bhavati ||)
1.3.5 vikṣip‍to yathā—
aṃgāi/ hasiāi samālasa/ samaṃsala—komalāi vīsaṃbhakomalaṃ bhaṇiaṃ |
sabbhāvakomalaṃ pulaïaṃ a ṇamimo sumahilāṇaṃ || 124 ||
(aṅgāni/hasitāni śramālasasamāṃsala—komalāni vistraṃbhakomalaṃ bhaṇitam |
sadbhāvakomalaṃ pralokitaṃ ca namāmaḥ sumahilānām ||)
1.3.6 samasto yathā—(gāsa. 5.73)
āaṃ/taṃbaloaṇāṇaṃ ollaṃsuapāaḍoru—jahaṇāṇaṃ |
avaraṇhamajjarīṇaṃ kae ṇa kāmo vahaï cāvaṃ || 125 ||
(ātāmralocanānām ārdrāṃśukaprakaṭorujaghanānām |
aparāh‍ṇamajjanaśīlānāṃ kasyai na kāmo vahati cāpam ||)
1.3.7 vyasto yathā—
līlā—velakkha—vilāsa—masiṇa—baṃdhura—muhāraviṃdāiṃ |
raaocchaaṃmi vilāsiṇīṇa sohaggahasiāiṃ || 126 ||
(līlāvailakṣyavilāsamasṛṇabandhuramukhāravindāni |
rataocchiammi vilāsinīnāṃ saubhāgyahasitāni ||)
1.3.8 śuddho yathā—
tāu/va guṇiuṃ u mariuṃ u bahuhi jammehi jīveiṃ |
jāva jaṇeṇa sikkhiaṃ piavioe vi saṃsaraṇaṃ || 127 ||
{tāvad guṇāyituṃ ca martuṃ ca bahubhirjanmabhirjīvaiḥ |
yāvajjanena śikṣitaṃ priyaviyoge 'pi saṃsaraṇam ||}
1.3.9 saṃkīrṇo yathā—
vaṇṇolliraa/ rahasaddho vosariaṇibhu/huvaṃ ṇiaṃtīṇa |
koūhalaṃmi kulavāliāṇa iha iccia visesaṃ || 128 ||
{praṇoditarahaśśraddhaḥ apasṛtanibhṛtaṃ paśryantīnām |
kautūhale kulapa/bālikānāṃ iha iṣṭaviśeṣam ||}
1.3.10 sādharmyakṛto yathā—
parimaliasuṃdarāiṃ dūrapahuppaṃtakouhallāiṃ |
puṇaruttaramiavvāi hoṃti muddhāṇa suraāīṃ || 129 ||
{parimṛditasundarāṇi dūraprabhavatkautūhalāni |
punaruk‍ta—rantavyāni bhavanti mugdhānāṃ suratāni ||}
1.3.11 vaidharmyakṛto yathā—
poḍhamalilāṇaṁ jaṃ jaṃ susikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei |
jaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇaṁ taṃ taṃ raïṃ dei || 130 ||
(prauḍhamahilānāṃ yad yat suśikṣitaṃ tad rate sukhayati |
yad yadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhūnāṃ tattad ratiṃ dadāti ||)
1.3.12 mahāviṣayo yathā—
kuviāo pasaṇṇāo oruṇṇamuhīo vihasamāṇāo |
jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ haraṃti ucchiṇṇamahilāo || 131 ||
(kupitāḥ prasannāḥ avaruditamukhyo vihasamānāḥ |
yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo/utsanna—mahilāḥ ||)
1.3.13alpaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 6.45)
gāmataruṇīoṃ hiaaṃ haraṃti cheāṇĕthaṇaharillīo |
maaṇe kusuṃbharāillakaṃcu/iābharaṇamettāo || 132 ||
(grāmataruṇyo hṛdayaṃ haranti chekānāṃ stanabhāravatyaḥ |
madane kusumbharañjitakañcukitābharaṇamātrāḥ ||)
1.3.14deśaheturyathā—
ṇiddā—virāma—māṇuvvalie muha—bāhu—kaṃṭha—ṇamirāṇaṃ |
tivalī—vihāe muralīṇa viṃbhio ko ṇa pulaei? || 133 ||
(nidrā—virāmamānodvalite mukha—bāhu—kaṇṭhanamantīnām |
trivalivibhāge maralīnāṃ vismito kaḥ na pulakayati ||)
1.3.15 kālaheturyathā—
diṇṇataṇuaṃjaṇāiṃ juaïjaṇassa dararattataṃbaoṭṭhāiṃ |
āsaṇṇaraïsuhāiṃ ahivāsijjaṃti vammaheṇa muhāiṃ || 134 ||
{dattatanvañjanāni yuvatijanasya . . . dayitatāmroṣṭhāni |
āsannaratisukhāni adhivāsyante manmathena mukhāni ||}
1.3.16 dharmaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 891ve, gaüḍavaho 959)
sāmaṇṇasuṃdarīṇaṃ vibbhamamāvahaï aviṇao ccea |
dhūmo ccia pajjaliāṇaṃ bahumao surahidārūṇaṃ || 135 ||
(sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamā vahatyavinaya eva |
dhūma eva prajvalitānāṃ bahumataḥ surabhi—dārūṇām ||)
1.3.17 dharmiviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 891ve.)
mohei vīaṃbhaṇa-ṇamia-paṭṭhi-cala-veṇi |
ārohiavaṃmahadhaṇulaaṃvahaṇakaṇṇadhavalacchī || 136 ||
(mohayati vijṛmbhaṇanamitapṛṣṭhacalaveṇī |
āropitamanmathadhanurlatāvahanakarṇadhavalākṣī ||)
1.3.18 samayajanmā yathā—(gāsa.7.14)
daravevirorujualāsu ṇīalaacchīsu luliacihurāsu |
purisāirīsu kāmo piāsu sajjāuho vasaï || 137 ||
(īṣad‍vepanaśīloruyugalāsu nīcā/ nīlākṣīṣu lulitacikurāsu |
puruṣāyitaśīlāsu kāmaḥ priyāsu sajjāyudho vasati ||)
1.3.19sambandhajanmā yathā—
taha u/lajjuaṃ vi rasiaṃ caḍuparihīṇaṃ vi diṇṇasabbhāvaṃ |
vīsaṃbhe vi ॰ ॰ ॰ ghariṇīraaṃ ṇa saṃtaraï || 138 ||
(tathā ṛjukaṃ/lajjākaṃ api rasitaṃ caṭuparihīnamapi dattasadbhāvam |
vistrambhe 'pi ॰ ॰ ॰ gṛhiṇīrataṃ na saṃtarati ||)
1.3.20prākṛto yathā—(gāsa. 6.13)
hasiehiṃ uvālaṃbhā accuaācārehiṃ raa/rusiavvāiĕ/lajjiavvāiĕ |
aṃsūhi maṃ/ bhaḍaṇāiṃ eso māṇo/ maggo sumahilāṇaṃ || 139 ||
(hasitairupālaṃbhā atyupacārairlajjitavyāni |
aśrubhirmaṇḍanāni eṣa mānaḥ/mārgaḥ sumahilānām ||)
1.3.21 vaikṛto yathā—(gāsa. 949ve)
maliṇavasaṇāṇa kaaveṇiāṇa āpaṃḍugaṃḍavāsāṇaṃ/pālīṇaṃ |
pupphavaïāṇa kāmo aṃgesu kaāuho vasaï || 140 ||
(malinavasanānāṃ kṛtaveṇikānāmāpāṇḍugaṇḍapārśvānām/pālīnām |
puṣpavatīnāṃ kāmaḥ aṅgeṣu kṛtāyudho vasati ||)
1.3.22 vayaḥkṛto yathā—
jaha jaha vi kāmiṇīṇaṃ sudovihalaā avāṇasiri ahide |
॰ ॰ ॰ avvamaṃḍala taha viha tāruṇṇaaṃ tāo || 141 ||
{yathā yathā 'pi kāminīnāṃ su ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ maṇḍala tathā 'pi ha tāruṇyakaṃ tā ॰ ॰ ||}
1.3.23 vaidagdhyakṛto yathā—
sabbhāvagabbhiṇaṃ pāaḍaṃti taha kiṃ pi vammaharahassaṃ |
mahilāo jaha ṇa viramaṃti pattasokkhāi vi raāi || 142 ||
(sadbhāvagarbhitaṃ prakaṭayanti tathā kimapi manmatharahasyam |
mahilāḥ; yathā na viramanti prāp‍tasaukhyānyapi ratāni ||)
1.3.24 saubhāgyakṛto yathā—(gāsa. 2.56)
ṇaṃdaṃtu suraasarabhasataṇhāvaharāi saalloassa |
bahumaggaviṇimmaviāi vesavilaāṇa hiaāiṃ/pemmāiṃ || 143 ||
(nandantu suratasarabhasatṛṣṇāpaharāṇi sakalalokasya |
bahumārgavinirmitāni veśyāvanitānāṃ hṛdayāni/ premāṇi ||)
(1.4. viśeṣānurāgaḥ —24)
viśeṣānurāgo 'pi caturviṃśatiprakāraḥ—
1. jātikṛtaḥ 7. pratīyamānaḥ 13. svaprakāśaḥ 19. naisargikaḥ
2. kriyākṛtaḥ 8. abhidhīyamānaḥ 14. anyābhibhāvī 20. sāṃsargikaḥ
3. guṇakṛtaḥ 9. bāhyaḥ 15. ullekhavān 21. svasaṃmataḥ
4. dravyakṛtaḥ 10. ābhyantaraḥ 16. anullekhaḥ 22. stokasaṃmataḥ
5. sādhāraṇaḥ 11. sadṛśaḥ 17. atiriktaḥ 23. bahusaṃmataḥ
6. asādhāraṇaḥ 12. asadṛśaḥ 18. anatiriktaḥ 24. sarvasaṃmataḥ iti |
tatra —
1.4.1 jātikṛto yathā—(śāku. 1.13)
mānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya sambhavaḥ |
na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātalāt || 144 ||
1. 4.2 kriyākṛto yathā—
taha valiaṃ ṇaaṇajuaṃ gahavaïdhūāe raṃgamajjhaṃmi |
jaha te vi ṇaḍā ṇaḍapecchaā vi/muhapecchaā jāā || 145 ||
(tathā valitaṃ nayanayugaṃ gṛhapatiduhitū raṅgamadhye |
yathā te 'pi naṭāḥ naṭaprekṣakā api /iva mukhaprekṣakā jātāḥ ||)
1.4.3 guṇakṛto yathā—(gāsa. 1.88)
jāiṇa jāṇāveuṃ aṇuṇaavidda—via—māṇaparisesaṃ |
païrikkaṃmi vi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇaṃtī || 146 ||
(jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam |
vijane 'pi vinayāvalambanaṃ saiva kurvatī ||)
1.4.4 dravyakṛto yathā—(gāsa. 826ve)
chaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahumaataṃbacchi kuvalaāharaṇe |
kaṇṇarikaacūamaṃjari taruṇi! /putti tue maṃḍio gāmo || 147 ||
(kṣaṇapiṣṭadhūsarastani madhumadatāmrākṣi kuvalayābharaṇe |
karṇakīkṛtacūtamañjari taruṇi!/ putri tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||)
1.4.5 sādhāraṇo yathā—
ṇaccihii ṇaḍo pecchihii jaṇavao ho/bhoio vi dūsihii |
jaï raṃgavihaḍhaṇaarī gahavaïdhūā ṇa dūṣayiṣyati/vaccihii || 148 ||
(nartiṣyate naṭaḥ prekṣiṣyate janapadaḥ bhogiko 'pi |
yadi raṅgavighaṭanakarī gṛhapatiduhitā na vrajiṣyati ||)
1.4.6 asādhāraṇo yathā—(gāsa. 2.83)
khaṇamettaṃ vi ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiaviiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā |
pacchaṇṇapāvasaṃka vva sāmalī majjha hiaāhi || 149 ||
(kṣaṇamātramapi na bhraś‍yati anudivasaṃ dattagurukasaṃtāpā |
pracchannapāpaśaṅkeva śyāmalā mama hṛdayāt ||)
1.4.7 pratīyamāno yathā—(gāsa. 7.49)
jāiĕ vaaṇāiĕ ahme vi jampimo jāi jampaï jaṇo vi |
tāi ccia teṇa paajappiāi hiaaṃ suhāveṃti || 150 ||
(yāni vacanāni vayamapi jalpāmo yāni jalpati jano 'pi |
tānyeva tena prajalpitāni hṛdayaṃ sukhāpayanti ||)
1.4.8 abhidhīyamāno yathā—(gāsa. 5.70)
aṇṇāṇa vi atthi(hoṃti) muhe pamhaladhavalāi dīhakasaṇāi |
ṇaaṇāiṁ suṃdarīṇaṃ tahaüṇa daṭṭhuṃ ṇa āṇaṃti || 151 ||
(anyāsāmāpi staḥ mukhe pakṣmaladhavale dīrghakṛṣṇe |
nayane sundarīṇāṃ tathā punardraṣṭuṃ na jānanti ||)
1.4.9 bāhyo yathā—
darasuṃdaramahurullāvirīe hallaṃtathorathaṇiāe |
sotthāe(sojjhaa)suāe kkhu kao titthāvāsāoṃ jaṇo savvo || 152 ||
(īṣatsundaramadhurollāpanaśīlayā kampamānasthūlastayā |
rajaka sojjhārasutayā kṛtastīrthāvāsako janaḥ sarvaḥ ||)
1.4.10 ābhyantaro yathā—(gāsa. 7.77)
aï ujjue! ṇa lajjasi pucchantī maha piassa cariāiṃ |
savvaṃgasurabhiṇo maruaassa kiṃ kusumariddhīe? || 153 ||
(ayi /ti ṛjuke! na lajjase pṛcchantī mama priyasya caritāni |
sarvāṅgasurabhermaruvakasya kiṃ kusumarddhibhiḥ/ddharyā ||)
1.4.11 sadṛśo yathā—
rehaï viaḍa-viaṃbhaṇa-sālasa-bhua-juala-valaa-maṃḍaliaṃ |
bālāe vaaṇakamalaṃ kaa-pariveso miaṃko vva || 154 ||
(rājate vikaṭa-vijṛmbhaṇa-sālasa-bhujayugalavalayamaṇḍalitam |
bālāyāḥ vadanakamalaṃ kṛtaḥ pariveṣo mṛgāṅka iva ||)
1.4.12 asadṛśo yathā—(gāsa. 4.3)
eddahamettammi jae suṃdaramahilāsahassamajjhammi |
aṇuharaï ṇavara tissā vāmaddhaṃ dāhiṇaddhassa || 155 ||
(etāvanmātre jagati sundaramahilāsahastramadhye |
anuharati kevalaṃ tasyā vāmārdhaṃ dakṣiṇārdhasya ||)
1.4.13 svaprakāśo yathā—(māmā. 1.39)
jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilocanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaḥ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 156 || ityādi |
1.4.14 anyābhibhāvī yathā—
kā a ṇa ruṇṇā juarī/ī ko a/u juā dharahareṇa ṇālịdho/lị̄dho |
ābaddhaṃmaṃḍala ccia gahavaïdhūādhaappaṃke || 157 ||
(kā ca na ruditā yuvatiḥ kaś‍ca yuvā 'dharabhareṇa nālīḍhaḥ |
ābaddhamaṇḍaleva gṛhapatiduhitṛdhvajapaṅke ||)
1.4.15 ullekhavān yathā—(vikramo. 2.3)
ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 158 || ityādi |
1.4.16 anullekho yathā—(gāsa. 3.13)
caṃdasarisaṃ muhaṃ se amaa—sariccho— a muharaso tissā |
sakaa-ggaha-rahasujjala-cuṃbaṇaaṃ kassa sarisaṃ se? || 159 ||
{candraharidraṃ mukhaṃ tasyāḥ sadṛśo 'mṛtasya mukharasastasyāḥ |
sakacagraharabhasojjvalacuṃbanakaṃ kasya sadṛśaṃ tasyāḥ? ||}
1.4.17atirikto yathā—(gāsa. 969ve.)
aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇaṃ cia kāvi vaṭṭaṇacchāā |
sāmā/sā sāmaṇṇa—paāvaïssa reha ccia ṇa hoi || 160 ||
(anyat laṭabhatvaṃ anyaiva kāpi vartanacchāyā |
ś‍yāmā sāmānyaprajāpateḥ rekhaiva na bhavati ||)
1.4.18 anatirikto yathā—
pallaviaṃ piva karapallavehiṃ papphulliaṃ va ṇaaṇehiṃ |
phaliaṃ via pīṇapaoharehiṃ ajjāe lāaṇṇaṃ || 161 ||
(pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullita/ phultamiva nayanābhyām |
phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāṃ āryāyā lāvaṇyam ||)
1.4.19 naisargiko yathā—
aṇavaṭṭhieṇa visameṇa hāriṇā duṇṇivārapasareṇa |
ṇavajovvaṇeṇa ajjā ṇaï vva pūreṇa ucchaliā || 162 ||
{anavasthitena viṣameṇa hāriṇā durnivāraprasareṇa |
navayauvanena āryā nadīva pūreṇa ucchaliā ||}
1.4.20 sāṃsargiko yathā—(gāsa. 1.44)
akkhaḍaï piā hiae aṇṇaṃ mahilāaṇaṃ ṇiataṃssa |
diṭṭhe sarisammi guṇe sarisammi guṇe a—īsaṃte || 163 ||
(āskhalati priyā hṛdaye anyaṃ mahilājanaṃ paś‍yataḥ |
dṛṣṭe sadṛśe iva guṇe sadṛśe iva guṇe adṛś‍yamāne ||)
1.4.21 sa/svasammato yathā—॰ ॰ || 164 ||
1.4.22 stokasammato yathā—
pīlei valaṃtuṃ tuṃha ghoraghaṇaaïsaṃṇamiataṇumajjhā |
vasathaṃ hojjaï/sojjhaa dhūā hiaehi samaṃ juāṇāṇaṃ || 165 ||
{pīḍayati valamānān yuṣmān sthūlastanātisannamitatanumadhyā |
॰ ॰ ॰ bhaviṣyati (?) duhitā hṛdayaiḥ samaṃ yūnām ||}
1.4.23 bahusaṃmato yathā—
vāhollavialieṇaṁ gāmaṇidhūāeṁ uttarijjeṇa |
thaṇa-daṃsaṇa-rahasottāṇa-ṇiccalaccho kao gāmo || 166 ||
(bāṣpārdravigalitena grāmaṇīduhituruttarīyeṇa |
stanadarśanarabhasottānaniścalākṣaḥ kṛtoḥ grāmaḥ ||)
1.4.24 sarvasaṃmato yathā—(gāsa. 3.34)
jassa jahiṃ cia paḍhamaṃ tissā aṃgammi ṇivaḍiā diṭṭhī |
tassa tahiṃ cea ṭhiā savvaṃgaṃ keṇa vi ṇa diṭṭha || 167 ||
(yasya yatraiva prathamaṃ tasyā aṅge nipatitā dṛṣṭiḥ |
tasya tenaiva sthitā sarvāṅgaṃ kenāpi na dṛṣṭā ||)
(1. 5 prakāśānurāgaḥ —24)
atha prakāśānurāgaḥ| so 'pi caturviṃśatiprakāraḥ—
1. svakīyāviṣayaḥ 9. svādhīnabhartṛkāviṣayaḥ 17. jyeṣṭhā(viṣayaḥ)
2. svayaṃvarāviṣayaḥ 10. proṣitapatikāviṣayaḥ 18. kaniṣṭhā(viṣayaḥ)
3. kanyāviṣayaḥ 11. virahotkaṇṭhitāviṣayaḥ 19. subhagāviṣayaḥ
4. punarbhūviṣayaḥ 12. kalahāntaritāviṣayaḥ 20. śuddhāntacāriṇīpracāraḥ
5. veś‍yāviṣayaḥ 13. khaṇḍitāviṣayaḥ 21. dharmānubandhaḥ
6. sāmānyọdhāviṣayaḥ 14. vāsakasajjāviṣayaḥ 22. arthānubandhaḥ
7. navọdhāviṣayaḥ 15. ekacāriṇīviṣayaḥ 23. kāmānubandhaḥ
8. praụdhāviṣayaḥ 16. sapat‍nī(viṣayaḥ) 24. niranubandhaḥ, iti |
tatra—
1.5.1 svakīyāviṣayo yathā—(urāca. 1.38)
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo— rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahalaścandanarasaḥ |
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 168||
1.5.2. 'svayaṃvarā' — viṣayo yathā—(raghu. 6. 80)
tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ mṛdūkṛtya narendraputrī |
dṛṣṭayā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ pratyagrahīt saṃvaraṇastrajeva || 169 ||
1.5. 3 kanyāviṣayo yathā—(mavīca. 1. 30)
kanyāratnamayonijanma bhavatāmāste, vayaṃ cārthino ratnaṃ yat kvacidasti tat pariṇamatyasmāsu śakradapi |
kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā, tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā, pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca sambandhinaḥ || 170 ||
1.5.4 pūnarbhūviṣayo yathā—(sūmu, 92)
ke vaikaṭanitambena girāṃ gumphena rañjitāḥ |
nindanti nijakāntānāṃ na maugdhyamadhuraṃ vacaḥ || 171 ||
1.5.5 veś‍yāviṣayo yathā—(gaüḍavaho 957, gāsa. 891 vo.)
samāṇṇasuṃdarīṇaṃ vibīmamāvahaï aviṇao ccia |
dhūmo ccia pajjaliāṇaṃ bahumao surabhidārūṇaṃ || 172 ||
(sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamāvahati avinaya eva |
dhūma eva prajvalitānāṃ madhuro bhavati surabhidārūṇām ||)
1.5.6 sāmānyọdhāviṣayo yathā—
diaro pariṇihaï phuḍaṃ suṇhā suṇiuṁ khu dukkhiā jāā |
sesiagharavāvārā oruṇṇamuhī paribbhamaï || 173 ||
{devaraḥ pariṇeṣyati sphuṭaṃ snuṣā śrutvā suduḥkhitā jātā |
śeṣitagṛhavyāpārā avaruditamukhī paribhramati ||}
1.5.7 navọdhāviṣayo yathā—(sūmu. 2.)
dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭimadhyo dadāti, kurute nālāpamābhāṣitā śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati, balādāliṅgitā vepate |
niryāntīṣu sakhīṣu vāsabhavanānnirgantumevehate jātā vāmatayaiva samprati mama prītyai navọdhā vadhūḥ || 174 ||
1.5.8 praụdhāviṣayo yathā—(amaru. 18)
ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamād dūrataḥ, tāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśrleṣo 'pi saṃvighnitaḥ |
ālāpo 'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyā 'ntike kāntaṃ pratyupacāraścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ || 175 || ityādi|
1.5. 9 svādhīnabhartṛkāviṣayo yathā—(urāca. 1.35)
viniścetuṃ śakyo na sukhamiti vā duḥkhamiti vā pramoho nidrā vā kimu viṣavisarpaḥ? kimu madaḥ? |
tava sparśesparśe mama hi parimụ̄dhendriyagaṇo vikāraśrcaitanyaṃ bhramayati ca, sammohayati ca || 176 || ityādi|
1.5.10 proṣitapatikāviṣayo yathā—(megha. 101)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena tap‍taṃ sāstreṇāstradravamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena |
uṣṇoccha‍vāsaṃ samadhikataroccha‍vāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpaistairviśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ || 177 ||
1.5.11 virahotkaṇṭhitāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.29)
ajja mae teṇa viṇā aṇuhūasuhāiṁ saṃbharaṃtīe |
ahiṇavamehāṇaṁ ravo ṇisāmio vajjhapaḍaho vva || 178 ||
(adya mayā tena vinā anubhūtasukhāni saṃsmarantyā |
abhinavameghānāṃ ravo niśāmito vadhyapaṭaha iva ||)
1.5.12 kalahāntaritāviṣayo yathā—
mayā tāvad gotraskhalanahatakopāntaritayā na ruddho nirgacchannanunayavilakṣaḥ priyatamaḥ |
ayaṃ tvākūtajñaḥ pariṇatiparāmarśakuśalaḥ sakhīloko 'pyāsīllikhita iva citre; kathamidam ? || 179 ||
1.5.13 khaṇḍitāviṣayo yathā—(amaru. 60)
lākṣālakṣma lalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayostāmbūlarāgo 'paraḥ |
dṛṣṭvā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyaso līlātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāp‍tiṃ gatāḥ || 180 ||
1.5.14 vāsakasajjāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 4.85)
ehisi tumaṃ/ehati pio tti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīeṁ paḍhamaddhaṃ |
sesaṃ saṃtāvaparavvasāeṁ varisaṃ va bolīṇaṃ || 181 ||
(eṣyati priya iti nimiṣa iva jāgaritaṃ yāminyāḥ prathamārdham |
śeṣaṃ santāpaparavaśāyā varṣa iva vyapalīnam ||)
1.5.15 ekacāriṇīviṣayo yathā—
atithibhirgatameva divā ' 'gatairapathikāgamanā ca niśīthinī |
tadadhunā pratijāgṛhi putrakān praviśa veś‍ma kuṭumbini! śemahe || 182 ||
1.5.16 sapatnīviṣayo yathā—(māgha. 3.16)
yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarākṣīṃ sā sā hniyā namramukhī babhūva |
niśśaṅkamanyāḥ samamāhiterṣyāḥ tatrāntare jaghnuramuṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ || 183 ||
1.5.17 jyeṣṭhāviṣayo yathā—(havi.)
taṃ tiasakusumadāmaṃ hariṇā ṇiṃmahiasurabhigaṃdhāmoaṃ |
appaṇaïaṃ vi dūmiapaṇaïṇihiaeṇa ruppiṇīa viiṇṇaṃ || 184 ||
{tat tridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirgata(nirmathita)surabhigandhamodam |
ātmanā ' 'nītamapi duḥkhitapraṇayinīhṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam ||}
1.5. 18 kaniṣṭhāviṣayo yathā—(havi.)
kuviā a saccahāmā same vi bahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
pāaḍiahiaasāro pemmāsaṃghasariso paaṭṭaī maṇṇū || 185 ||
(kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi vadhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |
prakaṭitahṛdayasāraḥ premāśaṃsāsadṛśaḥ pravartate manyuḥ ||)
1.5.19 subhagāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.20)
ukkhippaï maṃḍalimārueṇa gehagaṃṇāo vāhīe |
sohaggadhaapaḍāa vva uvaha dhaṇuruṃpariṃcholī || 186 ||
(utkṣipyate mārutamaṇḍalena gehāṅgaṇād vyādhyāḥ |
saubhāgyadhvajapatākeva paś‍yata dhanussūkṣmapaṅktiḥ ||)
1.5.20. śuddhāntacāriṇīpracāro yathā—(daa. 2. 7/8)
snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā, vāro 'ṅgarājasvasur, dyūte rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā, devī prasādyā 'dya ca |
ityantaḥpurasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāya vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitā nāḍikāḥ || 187 ||
1.5.21 dharmānubandho yathā—(kusaṃ. 1. 18)
sa mānasīṃ merusakhaḥ pitṛṇāṃ kanyāṃ kulasya sthitaye sthitijñaḥ |
menāṃ munīnāmapi mānanīyāmātmānurūpāṃ vidhinopayeme || 188 ||
1.5.22 arthānubandho yathā—(ratnā. 4.20)
yāto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ, prāp‍teyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāptyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca, bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe, yasmin(yasmai) karomi spṛhām || 189 ||
1.5.23 kāmānubandho yathā—(māmā. 6.20)
āmūlakaṇṭakitakomalabāhunālamārdrāṅgulīdalamanaṅganidāghatap‍tam |
asyāḥ kareṇa karamākalayāmi kāntamāraktapaṅkajamiva dviradaḥ sarasyāḥ || 190 ||
1.5. 24 niranubandho yathā—(havi.)
ṇāraaṇo tti pariṇaavaāṃhiṁ sirivallaho tti taruṇīhiṃ |
bālāhiṃ uṇa koūhaleṇa emea saccavio || 191 ||
(nārāyaṇa iti pariṇatavayobhiḥ śrīvallabha iti taruṇībhiḥ |
bālābhiḥ punaḥ kautūhalena evameva satyāpitaḥ ||)
(1. 6 pracchannānurāgaḥ —24)
pracchannānurāgo 'pi caturviṃśatiprakāraḥ—
1. parāṅganāviṣayaḥ 2. svāṅganāviṣayaḥ 3. svairiṇīviṣayaḥ
4. kumārīviṣayaḥ 5. dhīrāviṣayaḥ 6. adhīrāviṣayaḥ
7. vipralabdhāviṣayaḥ 8. abhisārikāviṣayaḥ 9. sulabhaḥ
10. durlabhaḥ 11. sannikṛṣṭaḥ 12. viprakṛṣṭaḥ
13. saṃbaddhaḥ 14. asaṃbaddhaḥ 15. sāpadeśaḥ
16. nirapadeśaḥ 17. bhayanimittaḥ 18. lajjānimittaḥ
19. kālāniyataḥ 20. deśaniyataḥ 21. nāgaraḥ
22. upanāgaraḥ 23. grāmyaḥ 24. prakīrṇaḥ, iti |
tatra—
1.6.1 parāṅganāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 865 ve.)
emea maṃda—puṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjissaṃ |
jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa || 192 ||
(evameva mandapuṇyā aprāp‍tamanorathā vipatsye |
janavādo 'pi na jātastena samaṃ hālikaputreṇa ||)
1.6.2. svāṅganāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.99)
paṇaaṃ paḍhamapiāe rakkhiukāmo vi muharamahurehiṃ |
cheavaro vi ṇiṇadajjaï ahiṇava—vahuā—vilāsehiṃ || 193 ||
(praṇayaṃ prathamapriyāyā rakṣitukāmo 'pi madhuramadhuraiḥ |
chekavaro 'pi vyākulīkriyate abhinavavadhūvilāsaiḥ ||)
1.6.3 svairiṇīviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2. 87)
taha sā jāṇaï jāā loe pacchaṇṇamaviṇaaṃ kāuṃ |
jaha paḍhamaṃ cia likkhaï majjhe cārittavattīṇa || 194 ||
{tathā sā jānāti jāyā loke pracchannamavinayaṃ kartum |
yathā prathamameva likhyate madhye cāritravatīnām ||}
1.6.4 kumārīviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 4.18)
ajja mae māucchā sojjhaagehe maṇorahabbhariaṃ |
gahavaïuttakaḍillaṃ diṭṭhaṃ ṇiarūvalāvaṇiaṃ || 195 ||
{adya mayā mātṛṣvasaḥ! upādhyāyagehe manorathaṃ bhramitam |
gṛhapatiputrakaṭivastraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nijarūpalāvaṇyam ||
1.6.5 dhīrāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.99)
pāaḍia—saṇeha—sabbhāva—vibbhamaṃ tīa jaha tumaṃ/ahaṃ diṭṭho |
saṃvaraṇa—vāvaḍāe aṇṇo vi jaṇo taha ccea || 196 ||
(prakaṭitasnehasadbhāvavibhramaṃ tayā yathā 'haṃ/tvaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
saṃvaraṇavyāpṛtayā anyo 'pi janastathaiva ||)
1.6.6 adhīrāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.87)
āassa kiṃ ṇu kāhaṃ kiṃ vocchaṃ kaha ṇu hohii imaṃ? ti |
paḍhamuggaa—sāhasa—āriāeṁ hiaaṃ tharaharei || 197 ||
(āgatasya kiṃ nu kariṣyāmiḥ? kiṃ vakṣyāmi? kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyatīdamiti |
prathamārdritasāhasakārikāyā hṛdayaṃ tharatharāyate ||)
1.6.7 vipralabdhāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 4.18)
aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ ccia vāṇīravaṇaṃmi cukkasaṃkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï paṁhaṭhṭha—ṇihāṇa—ṭhāṇaṃ va || 118 ||
{atha sā tatra tatrava vānīravane vismṛta/tyaktasaṃketā |
tava darśanaṃ vimārgati prabhraṣṭa/vismṛta—nidhānasthānamiva ||}
1. 6.8 abhisārikāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
bālā/ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparipāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 199 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
bālā/āryā nimīlitākṣī padapāripāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||)
1.6. 9 sulabho yathā—
saṃkeaūsuamaṇo gahavaï—dhūā—kaḍakkha—saṇṇaïo/saccavao |
taṃbaṃ gaaṃ ṇa veaï govālo aṃbaraṃ duhaï || 200 ||
(saṅketotsukamanā gṛhapatiduhitṛkaṭākṣasaṃjñāpitaḥ/dṛṣṭaḥ |
gāṃ gatāṃ na vetti gopālo 'mbaraṃ dogdhi ||)
1.6. 10 durlabhā yathā—
ekkaṃgaṇadulahe māṇusammi ujjhaï/daththaï jaṇo ṇiaṃto vi |
puṇaruttadaṃsaā sikkiā hi varaha/higgi pu/cuḍulaṃhi || 201 ||
(ekāṅgaṇadurlabhe mānuṣe ujjhati jano nirvṛto 'pi |
punarukta ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ||)
1.6. 11 sannikṛṣṭo yathā—(gāsa. 4. 35)
bahalaamā haarāī, ajja paüttho paī, gharaṃ suṇṇaṃ |
taha jaggejja saajjhia! ṇa jahā ahme musijjāmo || 202 ||
(bahalatamā hatarātriradya proṣitaḥ patirgṛhaṃ śūnyam |
tathā jāgṛhi prativeśin! na yathā vayaṃ muṣyāmahe ||)
1. 6.12 viprakṛṣṭo yathā—(gāsa. 6. 49)
poḍha/voḍasuṇao viaṇṇo attā mattā paheṇaa—surāe |
phalihaṃ a moḍiaṃ mahisaeṇa ko sāhaü tassa || 203 ||
{prauḍhavṛddhaśunako vipannaḥ attā/śvaśrūrmattā praphenaka—surayā |
karpāsakṣetraṃ ca moṭitaṃ mahiṣakeṇa, kastasya kathayatu? ||}
1.6.13 sambaddho yathā—
rattiṃ ṇiddaaramio diaro vahuāeṁ malia—vo/pottīe |
mā chivasu tti pahāe bhaṇio aṃtomuhaṃ hasaï || 204 ||
{rātriṃ nirdayaramito devaro vadhvā malinavastrayā |
mā spṛśeti prabhāte bhaṇito 'ntarmukhaṃ hasati ||}
1.6.14 asambaddho yathā—(gāsa. 6.57)
suppaṃ ḍaḍḍhaṃ caṇaā ṇa huggiā (bhajjiā) paṃthio a volīṇo |
attā gharaṃmi kuviā bhūāṇa vāio vaṃso || 205 ||
{śūrpaṃ dagdhaṃ caṇakā na bharjitāḥ pānthaśca vyati/vyapa—krāntaḥ |
śvaśrūḥ gṛhe kupitā bhūtāmiva vādito vaṃśaḥ ||}
1.6. 15 sāpadeśo yathā—(gāsa. 3.37)
païpurao ccia ṇijjaï vicchuaḍaṭṭha tti/ḍhakketti jāravejjaharaṃ |
ṇiuṇasahī—karadhariā bhuajualaaṃ—doliṇī bālā || 206 ||
(patipurata eva nīyate vṛścikadaṣṭeti jāravaidyagṛham |
sahṛdayasakhījanakaradhāritabhujalatāndolanī bālā ||)
1.6. 16 nirapadeśo yathā—
uggāhiekkahumaaṃ taṇu.hāsa.phuraṃta. dasaṇa. joṇhālaṃ |
kassa ṇa harei hiaaṃ coriadiṭhṭhaṃ maacchīe || 207 ||
(uda‍grāhitaikabhrukaṃ, tanu—hāsa—sphurad—daśana—jyotsnākam |
kasya ṇa harate hṛdayaṃ cauryadṛṣṭaṃ mṛgākṣīṇām ||)
1.6. 17 bhayanimitto yathā—
paṇaa—kkhalaṇā—saṃkāluāṇaṁ loāvavāa—bhīāṇaṃ |
lajjāluāṇa kālo evvameva a gao ṇiravaseso || 208 ||
{praṇayaskhalanāśaṅkalūnāṃ lokāpavādabhītānām(bhīruṇām) |
lajjālūnāṃ kālaḥ evameva hi gato niravaśeṣaḥ ||}
1.6.18 lajjānimitto yathā—
salilolladāruāiṁ va aṃto ccia simisimāamāṇāiṃ |
maaṇāṇaleṇa lajjāluāṇaṁ ḍajjhaṃti hiaāiṃ || 209 ||
{salilārdradārukāṇīva antareva simasimāyamānāni |
madanānalena lajjālūnāṃ dahyante hṛdayāni ||}
1.6. 19 kālaniyato yathā—(gāsa. 1.22)
āarapaṇāmioṭṭhaṃ aghaḍiaṇāsaṃ asaṃhaa—ṇiḍālaṃ |
vaṇṇagghia-tuppa-muhieṁ tīeṁ pariuṃbiaṃ bharimo || 210 ||
(ādarapraṇāmitoṣṭamaghaṭitanāsamasaṃhataniṭālam |
varṇaghṛtalip‍tamukhyāstasyā paricumbitaṃ smarāmaḥ ||)
1. 6.20 deśaniyato yathā—
jāṇāmi jaṇo ṇiuṇo gurujaṇamajjhaṃmmi saṃṭhiā a ahaṃ |
tā kiṃ karemi piasahi! dhariā vi balā valaï diṭṭhī || 211 ||
{jānāmi jano nipuṇo gurujanamadhye saṃsthitā (cāham) |
tat kiṃ karomi? priyasakhi! dhṛtā 'pi balād valate dṛṣṭiḥ ||}
1.6. 21 nāgaro yathā—(gāsa. 4.70)
kiṃ ṇa bhaṇio si bālaa! gāmaṇidhūāe guruaṇasamakkhaṃ |
aṇimisa-vaṃkka-valaṃtaa-āṇaṇa-ṇaaṇaddha-diṭṭehiṃ || 212 ||
{kiṃ na ga/bhaṇito 'si bālaka! grāmaṇīduhitrā gurujanasamakṣam |
animiṣa—vakra—valamānānana—nayanā 'rdhadṛṣṭaiḥ ||}
1.6.22 upanāgaro yathā—
gihalukkaviāsaī asarīra ṇiraṃgiveraṃtapesiaccijuaṃ |
addiṭhṭhāṇaḍuṃḍaṇaḍhapecchirīe dīsaṃta dhaṇṇo si || 213 ||
{gṛhalukkaviāśarīra niraṅgiparyantapreṣitākṣiyugam |
adṛṣṭa—ḍuṃḍaṇaḍha़(?) prekṣaṇaśīlayā dṛś‍yamāno dhanyo 'si ||}
1.6. 23 grāmyo yathā—(gāsa. 409 ve.)
daṭṭhuṃ ciraṃ ṇa laddho māmi! pio diṭṭhigoaragao pi |
daṃḍāhaa—valia—huaṃga—vaṃkka—racche haaggāme || 214 ||
{draṣṭuṃ ciraṃ na labdho mātulāni! priyo dṛṣṭigocaragato 'pi |
daṇḍāhatavalitabhujaṅgavakrarathye hatagrāme ||}
1.6.24 prakīrṇo yathā—(gāsa. 3.95)
cuṃbaï vāsiṇṇa/vosaṇṇamuhī daïakaolaṃ vva paṃḍuracchāaṃ |
asaī ṇihuvaṇavaḍapāavassa vāāṇiaṃ pattaṃ || 215 ||
{cumbati avasannamukhī dayitakapolamiva pāṇḍuracchāyam |
asatī nidhuvanavaṭāpādapasya vātānītaṃ patram ||}
(1. 7. akṛttrimānurāgaḥ — 24)
athākṛtrimaḥ| so 'pi caturviṃśatividhaḥ, sahaja—yauvanajāhāryaja—vistrambhajānāṃ bhedopabhedaprabhedasambhedavibhedabhedāt| ananyajāne(stvamī)1 tatra bhedāḥ sahajā eva| teṣu— 1.7.1 janmāntarānubhavajanmā niṣkāraṇameva pravṛttaḥ prakarṣagāmī sahajaḥ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.53)
iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaś‍caturdigīśānavamatya māninī |
arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patimāp‍tumicchati || 216 ||
1.7.2 sa upabhedato dvedhā, ekaviṣayo 'nekaviṣayaśca| tatraikaviṣayo yathā—(raghu. 15.61)
śrlāghyastyāgo 'pi vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāgvaṃśavāsinaḥ |
ananyajāneryasyāsīt saiva jāyā hiraṇmayī || 217 ||
1.7.3. anekaviṣayo yathā—(gārako. 697)
asaīṇa ṇamo tāṇaṃ dappaṇasarisesu jāṇa hiaesu |
jo ccea ṭhāi purao sahasā so ccea saṃkamaï || 218 ||
(asatīnāṃ namastāsāṃ darpaṇasadṛśeṣu य़āsāṃ hṛdayeṣu |
ya eva tiṣṭhati purataḥ sahasā sa eva saṅkrāmati ||
1.7. 4. tāruṇyodrekādupaciteṣu upacīyamāneṣu śarīradhātuṣu darpātirekād ya upajāyate, sa yauvanajaḥ| yathā—(gāsa. 954 ve.)
aṇudiahakaāhoā jaha jaha thaṇaā viṇiṃti kumarīṇaṃ |
taha taha laddhoāso vva vammaho hiaamāvisaï || 219 ||
1. 'jānevyā tatra bhedāḥ sahajāḥ ? ya eva'—joḥ; 'jāne(ra)pyā(?) tatra bhedā sahajā. . . . eva'—rā.
(anudivasakṛtābhogā yathā yathā stanā viniryānti kumārīṇām |
tathā tathā labdhāvakāśa iva manmatho hṛdayamāviśati ||)
1.7.5 so 'pi dvidhā—śārīro mānasaśca | tatra
adyo yathā—
jaṃ vahaï vīakaṃḍaṃ majjha suo ekkapaharaviṇivāiṁ |
taṃ kuladūsaṇi soṇhe ! thaṇāṇa tuha matthae paḍaï/u || 220 ||
{yad vahati vītakāṇḍaṃ mama sutaḥ ekaprahāravinipātam |
tat kuladūṣaṇi s‍nuṣe ! stanayostava mastake patati/tu ||}
1.7. 6. dvitīyo yathā—
ṇaaṇāṇaṁ iṣavo ṇu abhihaṃti ujjuapahaṃ pavaṭa‍ṭaṃtā |
ia sikkhaṃti vva taṃsāva loaṇaṃ hoṃtataruṇīo || 221 ||
(nayanānīṣavo nvabhigh‍nanti ṛjukapathaṃ pravartamānāḥ |
iti śikṣamāṇamiva tryastrāvalokanaṃ bhaviṣyattaruṇyaḥ ||)
1.7.7. cakṣuḥprītimātre vā sati upacāraiḥ yaḥ prakarṣamāpadyate sa āhāryajaḥ; yathā—
ghariṇīe akaïavvaṃ caḍuaṃmaṃ piaame kuṇaṃtaṃmi |
akaatthāe vi jāāi jhatti sịdhilāi aṃgāi || 222 ||
(gṛhiṇyā akaitavaṃ cāṭukarma priyatame kurvati |
akṛtārthāyā api jātāni jhaṭiti śithilāni aṅgāni ||)
1.7.8. so 'pi dvidhā—sthiro bhaṅguraśca |
sthiro yathā—(gāsa. 3.46)
māmi! hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juvāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe |
ṇhāṇahaliddākaḍuaṃ aṇusottajalaṃ piaṃteṇa || 223 ||
(mātulāni! hṛdayamiva pītaṃ tena yūnā majjantyāḥ |
s‍nānaharidrākaṭukaṃ anustrotojalaṃ pibatā ||)
1.7.9. bhaṅguro yathā—(gāsa. 6.24)
lajjā chattā, sīlaṃ ca khaṃḍia, ajasaghosaṇā diṇṇā |
jassa kae ṇaṃ piasahi! so ccea jaṇo jaṇo jāo || 224 ||
(lajjā tyaktā, śīlaṃ ca khaṇḍitam, ayaśoghoṣaṇā dattā |
yasya kṛte nanu priyasakhi! sa eva jano jano jātaḥ ||)
1.7.10. kālakrameṇa prarūḍhaviśvāsayoryaḥ prakarṣamārahaṇopacārādinādriyate sa vistrambhajaḥ ; yathā— (urāca. 1.39)
advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranugataṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad vistrambho hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kānenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yat premasāre sthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi tat prārthyate || 225 ||
1.7.11. so 'pi dvidhā— mugdhaḥ pragalbhaśca |
mugdho yathā—(gāsa. 3.93)
jaha jaha jarāpariṇao hoi paī duggao virūo a |
kulavāliāṇa taha taha ahiaaraṃ vallaho hoi || 226 ||
(yathā yathā jarāpariṇato bhavati patirdurgato virūpaśca |
kulapālikānāṃ tathā tathā adhikataraṃ vallabho bhavati ||)
1.7.12. pragalbho yathā— (havi.)
ṇāariāpemma viaṇho vi sabbhāvamettasārāi |
kaṇho rāhāeṁ samamujjuāi bharaï ccia raāiṁ/ ālaṃiṃ || 227 ||
(nāgarikāpremṇo vitṛṣṇo 'pi sadbhāvamātrasārāṇi |
kṛṣṇo rādhayā samaṃ smaratyevākālam ||)
1.7.13. prabhedataḥ —
sahajayauvanajaḥ, sahajāhāryajaḥ, sahajavistrambhajaḥ, yauvanajāhāryajaḥ, yauvanajavistrambhajaḥ, āhāryavistrambhajaḥ iti | tatra—
sahajayauvanajo yathā—(urāca. 6.35)
tadā/yadā kiñcit kiñcit kṛtapadamahobhiḥ katipayai— stadetad vistāri stanayugalamāsīnmṛgadṛśaḥ |
vayass‍nehākūtavyatikaraghano yatra madanaḥ pragalbhavyāpārāścarati hṛdi, mugdhaśca vapuṣi || 228 ||
1.7.14. sahajāhāryajo yathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yatsarasaprahāra— mālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭi— rāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairapāṅgaiḥ || 229 || ityādi |
1.7.15. sahajavistrambhajo yathā—(raghu. 7.67)
itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrān vaidarbhi! paś‍yānumatā mayā 'si |
evaṃ vidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ || 230 ||
1.7.16. yauvanajāhāryajo yathā—(gāsa. 2.19, vajjā. 206)
ajja kaïmo vi diaho, vāhavahū garua/rūvajovvaṇummattā |
sohaggaṃ dhaṇuruṃpacchaleṇa racchāsu vikkhiraï || 231 ||
(adya katamo 'pi divaso vyādhavadhūḥ guruka/rūpayauvanonmattā |
saubhāgyaṃ dhanustaṣṭatvaka‍cchalena rathyāsu vikirati ||)
1.7.17. yauvanajavistrambhajo yathā—(gāsa. 3.54)
taha soṇhāe puloio daravaliāvaṃgatāraaṃ pahio |
jaha dhāḍio/vārio vi gharasāmieṇa oliṃdae vasio || 232 ||
(tathā s‍nuṣayā pralokito daravalamānavakratārakaṃ pathikaḥ |
yathā tāḍito/vārito 'pi gṛhasvāminā 'lindake uṣitaḥ ||)
1.7.18. āhāryavistrambhajo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.86)
adya prabhṛtyanupamāṅgi! tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau |
ah‍nāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte || 233 || ityādi |
1.7.19. saṃbhedattaḥ — nissahajaḥ niryauvanajaḥ nirāhāryajaḥ nirvistrambhaja iti |
nissahajo yathā—(māmā. 7.2)
rambhoru! saṃhara bhayaṃ kṣamate vikāramutkampitastanabharasya na madhyabhāgaḥ |
itthaṃ tvayaiva kathitapraṇayaprasādasaṅkalpanirvṛtiṣu saṃstuta eṣa dāsaḥ || 234 ||
1.7.20. niryauvanajo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.79)
tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitahriyorniṣya/cchatoḥ śayanamiddharāgayoḥ |
sā babhūva vaśavartinī dvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca || 235 ||
1.7.21. nirāhāryajo yathā—(sūmu. 41)
mā garvamuda‍vaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti |
ādya/anyā 'pi kiṃ sakhi! na bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na ced bhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 236 ||
1.7.22. nirvistrambhajo yathā—(māmā. 7.4)
adyorjitaṃ vijitameva mayā kimanyadasyotsavaḥ phalavato mama yauvanasya |
yasya prasādasumukhena samuddha‍ṛteyaṃ devena bāndhavadhurā makaradhvajena || 237 ||
1.7.23. vibhedaḥ— sahajādisamūhaḥ sahajāviparyayaja iti | tatra
ādyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.15)
bhāvasūcitarahasyavikriyaṃ cāṭumat kṣaṇaviyogakātaram |
kaiścideva divasaistathā tayoḥ prema rūḍhamitaretarāśrayam || 238 ||
1.7.24. dvitīyo yathā—(gāsa. 4.90)
pāapaḍiaṃ ahavve! kiṃ dāṇiṃ ṇa uṭ‌ṭhavesi bhattāraṃ |
eaṃ via avasāṇaṃ dūraṃ pi gaassa pemmassa || 239 ||
(pādapatitamabhavye! kimidānīṃ notthāpayasi bhartāram |
etadevāvasānaṃ dūramapi gatasya premṇaḥ ||)
(1.8 kṛttrimānurāgaḥ —24)
atha kṛtrimaḥ | pūrvamavidyamānaḥ kāryahetorya upāyaiḥ pravartyate sa kṛtrimaḥ; so 'pi caturviṃśatiprakāraḥ—
1. nityānukārī 2. naimittikānukārī 3. sāmānyānukārī
4. viśeṣānukārī 9. āhāryānukārī 10. vistrambhānukārī
11. sālambanaḥ 12. nirālambanaḥ 17. saprayojanaḥ
18. anyaprayojanaḥ 19. sapratibhedaḥ 20. niṣpratibhedaḥ
5. prakāśānukārī 13. prasiddhaviṣayaḥ 21. strīkṛtaḥ
6. pracchannānukārī 14. aprasiddhaviṣayaḥ 22. puruṣakṛtaḥ
7. sahajānukārī 15. suprayuktaḥ 23. ubhayakṛtaḥ
8. yauvanajānukārī 16. duṣprayuktaḥ 24. anubhayakṛtaḥ, iti |
tatra—
1.8.1. nityānukārī yathā—
ajja suraammi piasahi! tassa vilakkhattaṇaṃ haraṃtīe |
akaatthāeĕ kaattho pio mae uṇiaṃ/ṇiuṇaṃ uvaụ̄dho || 240 ||
{adya surate priyasakhi! tasya vilakṣatvaṃ harantyā |
akṛtārthayā kṛtārthaḥ priyo mayā punarapyupa/nipuṇamupagūḍhaḥ ||}
1.8.2. naimittikānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.78)
tamasau sahakāramañjarīmavamanvānamivādarārpitām |
aruṇāgradalairatāḍayat taruṇī stokamaśokapallavaiḥ || 241 ||
1.8.3. sāmānyānukārī yathā—
māaṃgī hojja vaṇe mā vesā eddha māṇuse loe |
sabbhāveṇa vi ramio to vi jaṇo kattimaṃ bhaṇaï || 242 ||
(māaṃgī bhūyāsaṃ/bhaveyaṃ vane mā veśyā atra mānuṣe loke |
sadbhāvenāpi ramitaḥ, tato 'pi janaḥ kṛtrimaṃ bhaṇati ||
1.8.4. viśeṣānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.54)
vikasatkalikānukāriṇīmanulīlāṃ lalitairlateva sā |
virarāja vilāsapallavaiḥ plavagaṃ taṃ prati niṣphalairapi || 243 ||
1.8.5. prakāśānukārī yathā—(sūmu. 7)
dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini! kṣaṇamihāpyasmin gṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati |
ekākinyapi yāmi tad vanamitaḥ strotastamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ punarālikhantu jaraṭhacchedā nalagranthayaḥ || 244 ||
1.8.6. pracchannānukārī yathā—
kiṃ ṇīlakaṃṭha! gajja/cchasi kiṃ vā sutto si jaṇamaṇāṇaṃda |
tujjha kae iha āā viddhāhaṃ maaṇabāṇehiṃ || 245 ||
(kiṃ nīlakaṇṭha! garjasi/gacchasi kiṃ vā sup‍to 'si janamana ānanda |
tava kṛte iha āgatā, viddhā 'haṃ madanabāṇaiḥ ||)
1.8.7. sahajānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.59)
sphuṭanābhitalā talodarī tanucch‌vāsitanirmukhastanī |
valitaikavilocanā babhau tamabhi vyājavijṛmbhitodbha‍ujā || 246 ||
1.8.8. āhāryānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.64)
viṣasāda viśeṣavihvalā mumude mīlitalocanā muhuḥ |
kilakiñcitakelipaṇḍitā kimakāṇḍe na cakāra taṃ prati || 247 ||
1.8.9. yauvanajānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.53)
vapurapratikarmasundaraṃ pratipannapratikarma bibhratī |
vitatāna vidagdhakāminījanayogyāsu kalāsu kauśalam || 248 ||
1.8.10. visrambhajānukārī yathā—(rāca. 12.57)
avalambya latāṃ nirāyatāmathā sā saṃstavaśālinīva tam |
apacetumayācatāgrataḥ kalikāmutkalikābalātkṛtā || 249 ||
1.8.11. sālambano yathā—
gharasāmiassa rāaṃ jaṇei sijjaṃtavevirullasiā |
asaī hiaabbhaṃtarabhāviajārā ṇihuvaṇammi || 250 ||
(gṛhasvāmino rāgaṃ janayati svidyadvepitodvepanaśīlo—llasitā |
asatī hṛdayābhyantarabhāvitajārā nidhuvane ||)
1.8.12. nirālambano yathā—(rāca. 12.63)
niṣasāda niśīthamallikāśithilāśrustabakāñcitastanī |
tadanu kramaśaḥ kapolayorupanītobhayapāṇipallavā || 251 ||
1.8.13. prasiddhaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.56)
ṇaṃdaṃtu suraasarabhasataṇhāvaharāi saalaloassa |
bahumaggaviṇimmaviāi vesavilaāṇa hiaāiṃ || 252 ||
(nandantu suratarasabhasatṛṣṇāpaharāṇi sakalalokasya |
bahumārgavinirmitāni veśavanitānāṃ hṛdayāni ||)
1.8.14. aprasiddhaviṣayo yathā—(vajjā. 475)
pecchaha halā aṇu cojjaṃ/mahāṇucojjaṃ, kāṇa—mahilāe jaṃ kaaṃ tīe |
sajjakkhicuṃbaṇeṇaṃ jhaḍatti ṇīsārio jāro || 253 ||
(prekṣadhvaṃ mahadāścaryaṃ, kāṇamahilayā yat kṛtaṃ tayā |
sadyo 'kṣicumbanena jhaṭiti nissārito jāraḥ ||)
1.8.15. suprayukto yathā—
eeṇaṃ cea guṇeṇa kiṃ ṇa vesāṇa dijjae appā |
vese vva pie vva jaṇe jaṃ muharāo samo c‍cea || 254 ||
(etenaiva guṇena kiṃ na veś‍yānāṃ dṛś‍yate/diyate ātmā |
dveṣya/veṣa iva priya iva jane yanmukharāgaḥ sama eva ||)
1.8.16. duṣprayukto yathā—(kirātā. 10.40)
munimabhimukhatāṃ ninīṣavo yaṃ/yāḥ samupayayuḥ kamanīyatāguṇena |
madanamupadadhe sa eva tābhyo duradhigamādhi/hi gatiḥ prayojanānām || 255 ||
1.8.17. saprayojano yathā—
voḍhavareṇa vi taha teṇa rāmiā ṇiaakajjaṇiuṇeṇa |
jaha mud‌‍dhāeĕ vi ramio muddhati vahūeṁ ṇīsaṃkaṃ || 256 ||
(prauḍhavareṇāpi tathā tena ramitā nijakakāryanipuṇena |
yathā mugdhayā 'pi ramito mugdha iti vadhvā niśśaṃkam ||)
1.8.18. anyaprayojano yathā—(kuṭṭanī. 134)
mā 'tra kariṣyasi khedaṃ niṣṭhuramukto 'si yanmayā subhaga! |
yūnāṃ hi raktataruṇīparuṣavacaḥ prathamamābharaṇam || 257 ||
1.8.19. sapratibhedo yathā—(gāsa. 1.33)
uṇhāiṁ ṇīsasaṃto āliṃgasi kīsa maṃ parāhuttiṃ |
hiaaṃ palīviuṃ vi aṇusaeṇa puṭaṭhiṃ palīvesi || 258 ||
(uṣṇāni niḥśvasan āliṅgasi kimiti māṃ/kasmānmāṃ parāṅmukhīm |
hṛdayaṃ pradīpitamapi anuśayena/pradīpyānuśayena pṛṣṭhaṃ pradīpayasi ||)
1.8.20. niṣpratibhedo yathā—
aphaḍe/kavaḍe/leṇa upakappieṇa/maü—mahura jaṃpieṇa kajjassa aṃtagamaṇeṇa |
suraarahasseṇa haraṃti jeṇa hiaāi vesāo || 259 ||
(aphalena upakalpitena/mṛdumadhurajalpitena kāryasyāntagamanena |
suratarahasyena haranti yena hṛdayāni veś‍yāḥ ||)
1.8.21. strīkṛto yathā—
kāūṇa thira/dhīra—jahaṇaṃ, pajjattaraāeṁ vesavilaāe |
taha kaha vi pulaïaṃ jaha puṇo vi maaṇo uvaṭ‍ḍhavio || 260 ||
(kṛtvā sthira/dhīra—jaghanaṃ paryāp‍taratayā veśavanitayā |
tathā kathamapi pralokitaṃ yathā punarapi madana upasthāpitaḥ ||)
1.8.22. puruṣakṛto yathā—
hoṃtavaro taha taha he gohiṇīe caḍuaṃmavāvaḍo hoi |
jaha jaha ia saṇṇoṃi huvaṃti vārejja diahāiṃ || 261 ||
(bhaviṣyadvaro tathā tathā gohinyāścāṭukarmavyāpṛto bhavati |
yathā yathā iti sanno bhavanti vāre 'dya divasāni ||)
1.8.23. ubhayakṛto yathā—
dhiṃgaḍi dhāvaï sammuhī dhiṃgu pasāraï vāha |
kuṭṭiṇi rovaï aṃsuahiṃ dhutta pamellaï dhāha || 262 ||
(dhṛṣṭā taruṇī sammukhā dhṛṣṭaḥ taruṇaḥ prasārayati bāhū |
kuṭṭinī rodityaśrubhirdhurtā pramuñcatyārtanādam ||)
1.8.24. anubhayakṛto yathā—
urapellia—vaï—kārillaïāiṁ uc‍cesi daïa—vacchalie! |
kaṃṭaa—vilihiapīṇuṇṇaa—thaṇi! uttamma ettāhe || 263 ||
(uraḥpreritavṛtikāravellīphalānyuc‍cinoṣi dayitavatsale! |
kaṇṭakavilikhitapīnonnatastani! uttāmya idānīm ||)
dvādaśaivaṃ sahasrāṇi sāṣṭāśītiśatadvayī |
bhavanti kāmaśṛṅgāre mūlaprakṛtayaḥ pṛthak || 264 ||
vyatiṣaṅgādamūṣāṃ tu sāmyādhikyālpatākṛtaḥ |
na paryānto vikalpānāmekadvitryādiyogataḥ || 265 ||
catuṣṣaṣṭiṃ paś‍yā 'samasamabhilāṣaprabhṛtikā— natho 'ṣṭau nityādīn pṛthagapi caturviṃśatividhān |
mitho 'mīṣāmīṣat samadhikasamatvāni vimṛśan kaviḥ kuryāt sroto 'nuguṇamanurāgavyatikaram || 266 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe anurāgasthāpano nāma
|| dvāviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 22 ||
niviś‍yā 'ntardhātūnatha viṣamatāṃ vīkṣya puruṣa— s‍triyostattadabhāvāntaragatavapuṣkāṃ sahṛdayaḥ |
imā yā vai vyākhyad bhida iha kathaṃ kaś‍cana bhave— nna mag‍naś‍citrābdhau nijamabudhatāṃ saṃpariharan ||
catuṣṣaṣṭiṃ paś‍yannayamiha padārtheṣu nikhile— ṣvavaś‍yaṃ dhāreśo 'pyabhavadiva tanmātrakavayāḥ |
sarasvatyai kaṇṭhābharaṇamavadhāvatra ca dadau prakāśaṃ kṛtvā yo vyavṛṇuta ca sāhityabhuvanam ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe trayoviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
sambhoga—vipralambhaprakāśaḥ
1so 'vasthādvitayabhedād dviprakāraḥ — 1. sambhogaśṛṅgāraḥ, 2. vipralambhaśṛṅgāraśca |
1. abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmavāp‍tau sambhogaḥ | sa caturdhā—
1.1. prathamānurāgānantaraḥ
1.2. mānānantaraḥ
1.3. pravāsānantaraḥ
1.4. karuṇānantaraḥ, iti |
2. teṣāmevānavāp‍tau vipralambhaḥ | so 'pi caturdhā—
2.1. prathamānurāgaḥ
2.2. mānaḥ
2.3. pravāsaḥ
2.4. karuṇaḥ, iti | tatra—
2.1. strīpuṃsayoḥ parasparamapūrvādidarśanaśravaṇajanmā rupaguṇavayassampadukāropekṣaḥ tadanapekṣo vā manaḥpakṣapātaviśeṣaḥ prathīyān prathamānurāgo vipralambhaḥ |
1.1. sati caitasmin tayoreva prathamasaṅgamādau abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādilābhaḥ prathamānurāgānantaraḥ sambhogaḥ |
(1.2, 2.2 lup‍tāviva)
2.3. satyanurāge devadurvipākādijanmā tayoḥ vidūradeśavāso vipralambhaḥ |
1.3. tadabhivṛddhau pravṛddhotkaṇṭhayoreva bhūyassamāgame abhilāṣādiniṣpattiḥ pravāsā— nantaraḥ sambhogaḥ |
2.4. prarūḍhas‍nehayorekavinipāte anyasya duḥkhātireko hṛdayadāruṇaḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaḥ |
1.4. tayorevādṛṣṭaviśeṣādisampadā tadunmajjanajanmā manaḥpramodātiśayo viśeṣavān karuṇānantaraḥ sambhogaḥ, iti |
1. kāmaśṛṅgāraḥ dra. pṛ. 1052 |
prathamānurāgādīnāṃ vipralambhānāṃ tadanantarāṇāṃ ca sambhogānāṃ pṛthakpṛthak caturṇāṁ samavāye pūrvaḥ pūrvo vicitraḥ, paraḥ paro rāgavardhanaḥ, iti |
vaiciñye rāgavardhanatve vā 'pi vipralambhaḥ sambhogāt sarvataḥ sarvo balīyān iti |
evaṃ nityān naimittikaḥ, sāmānyād viśeṣaḥ, prakāśāt pracchannaḥ, kṛtrimādakṛtrimaḥ,rāvardhanatve;
vaiciñye tu akṛtrimāt kṛtrimaḥ, pracchannāt prakāśaḥ, viśeṣāt sāmānyaḥ, nityānnaimittiko balīyān iti (dra. pṛ. 1161) |
nityasāmānyaprakāśakṛtrimāṇāṃ pūrvaḥ rāgavardhanaḥ, paraḥ paro vicitraḥ iti |
naimittikaviśeṣapracchannākṛtrimāṇāṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvo vicitraḥ, paraḥ paro rāgavardhanaḥ iti |
evaṃ mṛdoścāṭuḥ, samīco 'tiśāyī, vāsantād vārṣikaḥ, prāsādikānmadajaḥ, samayajanmanaḥ sambandhajanmā, (sāmānyād) guṇagocaraḥ, sādhāraṇādasādhāraṇaḥ,sāṃsargikā— nnaisargikaḥ, praụdhāviṣayād navọdhāviṣayaḥ, proṣitapatikāviṣayād virahotkaṇṭhitāviṣayaḥ, svāṅganāviṣayāt parāṅganāviṣayaḥ, sulabhād durlabhaḥ, āhāryād vistrambhajaḥ, nityānukāriṇo naimittikānukārī, prakāśānukāriṇaḥ, pracchannānutārī balīyān ityādiprabhedeṣu krameṇa rāgavardhanatve 'pi, atikrameṇa tu vaiciñye ityatrāpi yathāyathaṃ yojanīyāmiti |
prāk‍prapañcitānurāgānurūpāśca prathamānurāgamānapravāsakaruṇavipralambhāḥ | tadānantaryānukāriṇaśca tadanantarāḥ sambhogāḥ, bhāvajanmānubandhaprakarṣānurūpāstadavasthāḥ samṛddhayaḥ, nāyakaprakṛtyanurūpāstadanubhāvasampadaḥ1, uttamatvamugdhatvādyanurūpāṇi teṣāṃ rāmaṇīyakādīni2, balābalānurūpāḥ samparkānugamabhaktayaḥ3, saṃvidhānakānurūpāsteṣāṃ saṃvidaḥ4, sannikarṣaviprakarṣaprakarṣāpakarṣavatyo vyatikarapraklṛp‍tayaḥ5 iti | tatra sambhogaḥ—
(1. sambhogaḥ)
1. svāṅganāviṣayaḥ 5. madhyamāviṣayaḥ 9. pragalbhāviṣayaḥ
2. parāṅganāviṣayaḥ 6. kaniṣṭhāviṣayaḥ 10. sarva/rvāviṣayaḥ
3. sāmānyāviṣayaḥ 7. mugdhāviṣayaḥ 11. sarvakālaviṣayaḥ
4. uttamāviṣayaḥ 8. madhyāviṣayaḥ 12. sarvartucaryāviṣayaḥ
ityevamādiranekaprakāraḥ | tatpratyanīkatayā vipralambho 'pi tāvatprakāra eva | kevalamasya prathamānurāgādiṣu pūrvakālabhāvitā, sambhogasya tu anantarakālabhāviteti viśeṣaḥ |
1. dra. pṛ. 1163, 2. dra. pṛ. 1165, 3. dra. pṛ. 1167, 4. dra. pṛ. 1168, 5. dra. pṛ. 1171
1.1. tatra sambhogaḥ svāṅganāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.23)
āṇāsaāiṁ deṃtī, tuha surae harisa-viasia-kavolā |
gose vi oṇaamuhī, aha! setti piāṃ ṇa saddhahimo || 1 ||
(ājñāśatāni dadatī tathā surate harṣavikasitakapolā |
gosarge/ prabhāte 'pyavanatamukhī aho! seti priyāṃ na śraddadhmaḥ ||)
1.2. parāṅganāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 4.33)
muha-vijjhavia-paīvaṃ ūsasia-ṇiruddha-saṃkiullāvaṃ |
savaha-saa-rakkhio coriaramiaṃ suhāvei || 2 ||
(mukhavidhmāpitapradīpaṃ ucchasitaniruddhaśaṅkitollāpam |
śapathaśatarakṣitoṣṭhaṃ caurīrataṃ sukhayati ||)
1.3. sāmānyāviṣayo yathā—(kirātā. 8.2)
yathāyathaṃ tāḥ sahitā nabhaścaraiḥ prabhābhiruddhāsitaśaulavīrudhaḥ |
vanaṃ viśantyo vanajāyatekṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇadyutīnāṃ dadhurekarūpatām || 3 ||
1.4. uttamāviṣayo yathā—
harisullāvā kulapāliāṇa lajjākaḍacchie surae |
kaṃṭhabbhaṃtarabhamiā ahare ccia huruhurāaṃti || 4 ||
(harṣollāpāḥ kulabālikānāṃ lajjākadarthite surate |
kaṇṭhābhyantarabhramitā adhara eva huruhurāyante ||)
1.5. madhyamāviṣayo yathā—
suraāvasāṇavalioṇaāo seullavaaṇa—kamalāo |
addhacchipecchirīo piāo dhaṇṇā puloaṃti || 5 ||
(suratāvasānavalitāvanatāḥ svedārdravadanakamalāḥ |
ardhākṣiprekṣaṇaśīlāḥ priyāḥ dhanyāḥ pralokayanti ||)
1.6. kaniṣṭhāviṣayo yathā—
pajjattaṃmi vi surae vialiabaṃdhaṃ a saṃjamaṃtīe |
vibbhamahasiehi kao puṇo vi maaṇāuro daïo || 6 ||
(paryāp‍te 'pi surate vigalitabandhaṃ ca saṃyamayantyāḥ|
vibhramahasitaiḥ kṛtaḥ punarapi madanāturo dayitaḥ ||)
1.7. mugdhāviṣayo yathā—(saka. 3.57, 5. 224)
poḍhamahilāṇa jaṃ jaṃ susikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei |
jaṃ jaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇaṃ taṃ taṃ raïṃ dei || 7 ||
(prauḍhamahilānāṃ yadhat suśikṣitaṃ tad rate sukhayati |
yadhadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhunāṃ tatad dhṛtiṃ dadāti ||)
1. 8. madhyāviṣayo yathā—
pariosia hyi sahi! tammi gāḍhapariraṃbhamāmuaṃtaṃmi |
aṇumagga—samūsasaṇā—ṇubaṃdha—phaṃsehiṃ thaṇaehiṃ || 8 ||
(paritoṣitā 'smi sakhi! tasmin gāḍhaparirambhamāmuñcati |
anumārgasamu‍cch‌vasanānubandhasparśābhyāṃ stanābhyām ||)
1. 9. pragalbhāviṣayo yathā—
sabbhāvagabbhiṇaṃ pāaḍaṃti taha kiṃ vi vammaharahassaṃ |
ramaṇīo jaha ṇa viramaṃti patta—sokkhāi vi raāiṃ || 9 ||
(sadbhāvagarbhitaṃ prakaṭayanti tathā kimapi manmatharahasyam |
ramaṇyo yathā na viramanti prāp‍tasaukhyānyapi ratāni ||)
1.10. sarvā viṣayo yathā—
ghettuṃ muccaï aharo aṇṇatto valaï pocchiuṃ diṭṭhī |
ghaḍiuṃ vihaḍaṃti bhuā raammi suraāa vīsāso || 10 ||
(grahītuṃ mucyate adharaḥ anyatroda‌valati prekṣituṃ dṛṣṭiḥ |
ghaṭituṃ vighaṭete bhujau rate suratāya viśvāsaḥ ||)
1.11. sarvakālaviṣayeṣu prabhātaviṣayo yathā—(kirātā. 9.75)
nidrāvinoditanitāntarataklamānāmāyāmimaṅgalaninādavibodhitānām |
rāmāsu bhāvivirahākulitāsu yūnāṃ tatpūrvatāmiva samādadhire ratānina || 11 ||
1. 12 (ka) sarvartucaryāviṣayeṣu vasantacaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 6.45)
daïa—kaaggaha—lulio dhammillo sīhugaṃdhiaṃ vaaṇaṃ |
saaṇammi ettiaṃ cia pasāhaṇaṃ sahaï taruṇīṇaṃ || 12 ||
(dayitakacagrahalulito dhammillaḥ śīdhugandhi vadanam|
śayana etāvadeva prasādhanaṃ sahate taruṇīnām||)
1.12. (kha) grīṣmaviṣayo yathā—
daïassa gimhavammahasaṃdāve do vi jhati avaṇei |
majjaṇajaladdacaṃdaṇasisirā āliṃgaṇeṇa vahū || 13 ||
(dayitasya grīṣmamanmathasantāpau dvāvapi jhaṭityapanayati |
majjanajalārdracandanaśiśirā āliṅganena vadhūḥ ||)
1.12. (ga) varṣartuviṣayo yathā—
dhārānipātaravabodhitapañjarasthadātyūhaḍambarakarambitakaṇṭhakūjāḥ |
aṭṭeṣu kāṇḍapaṭavāritaśīkareṣu dhanyāḥ pibanti mukhātāmarasaṃ taruṇyāḥ || 14 ||
1.12. (gha) śaraccaryāviṣayo yathā—
kalahoujjalagoraṃ kalahoasiāsu saraarāīsu |
cuṃbaṃti viasiacchaṃ viaddhajuvaīmuhaṃ dhaṇṇā || 15 ||
(kaladhautojjvalagauraṃ kaladhautasitāsu śaradarātriṣu |
cumbanti vikasitākṣaṃ vidagdhayuvatīmukhaṃ dhanyāḥ ||)
1.12. (ṅa) hemantaviṣayo yathā—(gārako. 672)
hemaṃte daḍha—pīlaṇa—thaṇapuḍa—saṃkaṃtakuṃkuma—pphaṃso |
mihuṇāṇa galaï seo ruhiruggāro vva sīassa || 16 ||
(hemante dṛḍhapīḍanastanapuṭasaṅkrāntakuṅkumasparśaḥ |
mithunānāṃ galati svedo rudhirodrāra iva śītasya ||)
1.12 (ca) śiśiracaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 772ve.)
kiṃ tassa pāvareeṇaṃ? kimaggiṇā? kiṃ va gabbagharaeṇa? |
jassa urammi ṇisammaï umhāaṃtatthaṇī jāā || 17 ||
(kiṃ tasya prāvāreṇa? kimagninā ? kiṃ vā garbhagṛheṇa? |
yasyorasi niṣīdati ūṣmāyamāṇastanī jāyā ||)
1.12. (cha) ādigrahaṇāt prakīrṇāviṣayo yathā—(sūmu. 6)
madhu ca vikasitotpalāvataṃsaṃ śaśikarapallavitaṃ ca saudhapṛṣṭham |
madanajanitavibhramā ca kāntā sukhamidamarthavatāṃ vibhūtayo 'nyāḥ || 18 ||
(2. vipralambhaḥ)
atha vipralambhaḥ| so 'pi sambhogavadeva |
tatra—
2.1. svāṅganāviṣayo yathā—
piā addāaṃ dei (ṇia)-gahavaïṃ pulaaseasaṃvaliā |
ajjeva tassa diṭṭhī paḍipalihii ettha biṃbammi || 19 ||
(priyā ādarśaṁ dadā(dhā)ti gṛhapatipulakasvedasaṃvalitā |
adyaiva tasya dṛṣṭiḥ pratiphaliṣyatyatra bimbe ||)
2.2. parakīyāviṣayo yathā—
appattadaṃsasaüttammirīe bālaa! tumaṃmi bolīṇe |
païpurao ccia sāsehi khaṃḍakhaṃḍehi ṇīsasiaṃ || 20 ||
(aprāp‍tadarśanottāmyantyā bālaka! tvayi vyapakrānte |
patipurata eva śvāsaiḥ khaṇḍakhaṇḍaiḥ viniḥśvasitam ||)
2.3. sāmānyāviṣayo yathā—
maṇṇubbhariā ṇa ruaï saṃdisaï ṇa ṇehaṇibbhatisiaṃti | (khaṇḍita)
manyūda‌bharitā na roditi sandiśati na snehanirbharitā || 21 ||
(2.4) (2.5) khaṇḍitau |
2. 6 kaniṣṭhāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 3.75)
ujjhasi piāi samaaṃ taha vi hu re bhaṇasi kīsa kisiatti |
uari bhareṇa a aṇṇua muaï vaïllo vi aṃgāiṁ || 22 ||
(uhyase priyayā samaṃ tathāpi khala re bhaṇasi kasmāt kṛśeti |
upari bhareṇa tu ajña! muñcati balīvardo 'pyaṅgani ||)
2.7. mugdhāviṣayo yathā—(vala. 379)
kaïā gao pio? ajja putti! ajjeṇa kaï diṇā hoṃti? |
ekko, eddahametto bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā bālā || 23 ||
(kadā gataḥ priyaḥ? adya, putri! adyeti kati dināni bhavanti ? |
ekaḥ, etāvanmātraṃ bhaṇitvā mohaṃ gatā bālā ||)
2. 8. madhyamāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 929 ve.)
taṇuāiā varāī diahediahe miaṃkaleha vva |
bahulapaoseṇa va tue ṇisaṃsa aṃdhāriamuheṇa || 24 ||
(tanukāyitā varākī divasedivase mṛgāṅkalekheva |
bahulapradoṣeṇeva tvayā nṛśaṃsa! andhakāritamukhena ||)
2.9. pragalbhāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 2.33)
saaṇe ciṃtāmaïaṃ kāūṇa piaṃ ṇimīliacchīe |
appāṇo uvaụ̄dho pasịdhilavalaāhiṃ vāhāhiṃ || 25 ||
{śayane cintāmayaṃ/malinaṃ kṛtvā priyaṃ nimīlitākṣyā |
ātmā upagūḍhaḥ prasithilavalayābhyāṃ bāhubhyām ||}
2.10. sarvaviṣayo yathā—
aṃgāi kilāmijjaṃti vibbhalijjaṃti ṇijjhavijjaṃti |
kallolijjaṃti jaṇassa via dullahe jaṇe diṭṭhe || 26 ||
{aṅgāni klāmyanti virajyante nityaṃ pīyante(?) |
kallolanti janasyeva durlabhe jane dṛṣṭe ||}
2.11 prabhātaviṣayo yathā—(kirātā. 9.78)
gatavati nakhalekhālakṣyatāmaṅgarāge samadadayitapītātāmrabimbādharoṣṭhyāḥ |
virahavidhuramiṣṭā satsakhīvāṅganāyāḥ hṛdayamavalalambe rātrisambhogalakṣmīḥ || 27 ||
2.12. (ka) vasantacaryā yathā—(gāsa. 5.99)
khemaṃ? katto khemaṃ? jo so khujjaṃbao gharaddāre |
tassa ira matthaāo ko vi aṇattho samuppaṇṇo || 28 ||
(kṣemaṃ? kutaḥ kṣemaṃ? yo 'sau kubjāmrako gṛhadvāre |
tasya kila mastakāt ko 'pyanarthaḥ samutpannaḥ ||)
2.12. (kha) grīṣmacaryāviṣayo yathā—
gihmaṃ gamei kahakahavi viraha—sihi—tāviā vi pahiavahū |
avirala—paḍaṃta—ṇibbhara—vāha—jalollo—varilleṇa || 29 ||
(grīṣmaṃ gamayati kathaṃ kathamapi virahaśikhitāpitā 'pi pathikavadhūḥ | avirala—patannirbhara—bāṣpajalārdrau—paritanena vastreṇa ||)
2.12. (ga) varṣatucaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1. 29)
ajja mae teṇa viṇā aṇuhūasuhāiṁ saṃbharatīe |
ahiṇavamehāṇaṁ ravo ṇisāmio vajjhapaḍaho vva || 30 ||
(adya mayā tena vinā anubhūtasukhāni saṃsmarantyā |
abhinavameghānāṃ ravo niśamito vadhyapaṭaha iva ||)
2.12. (gha) śaraccaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 5.12)
suppaü taïo vi gao jāmo tti sahīoṃ! kīsa maṃ bhaṇaha? |
sehāliāṇa gaṃdho ṇa dei sottuṃ, suaha tumhe || 39 ||
(svapa tṛtīyo 'pi gato yāma iti sakhyaḥ! kasmānmāṃ bhaṇatha? |
śephālikānāṃ gandho na dadāti svap‍tuṃ, svapata yūyam ||)
2.12. (ṅa) hemantacaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 774ve.)
hemaṃte himaraadhūsarassa o asaraṇassa pahiassa |
sumaria—jāā—muha—sijjirassa sīaṃ cia paṇaṭṭhaṃय़ || 32 ||
(hemante himarajodhūsarasya aho aśaraṇasya/ aprāvaraṇasya pathikasya |
smṛtajāyāmukhasvedaśīlasya śītameva pranaṣṭam ||)
2.12. (ca) śiśiracaryāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 9.25ve.)
caralacchi! caṃdavaaṇe! pīṇatthaṇi! karikaroru! taṇumajjhe! |
dīhā vi samappaï sisirajāmiṇī, kaha ṇu de māṇo? || 33 ||
(taralākṣi! candravadane! pīnastani! karikaroru! tanumadhye! |
dīrghā 'pi samāpyate śiśirayāmīni, kathaṃ nu te mānaḥ? ||)
2.12. (cha) ādigrahaṇāt prakīrṇaviṣayo yathā—
vilimpatyetasmin malayajarasārdreṇa mahasā diśāṃ cakraṃ candre sukṛtamatha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
dṛśorbāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanamasavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare hṛdi tvaṃ hnīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 34 ||
prathamānurāgādīnāmanantarāṇāṃ ca vistarataḥ prapañcamagrataḥ1 krameṇa varṇayiṣyāmaḥ | iha tu diṅa‌‌mātramupalakṣaṇārthamudāhniyate | tatra—
1. prathamānurāgo yathā—(gāsa. 1. 93)
aviaṇhapecchaṇijjeṇa takkhaṇaṃ māmi! teṇa diṭṭheṇa |
siviṇaa—pīeṇa va pāṇieṇa taṇhā cia ṇa phiṭṭā || 35 ||
(avitṛṣṇaprekṣaṇīyena tatkṣaṇaṃ mātulāni! tena dṛṣṭena |
svapnapīteneva pānīyena tṛṣṇaiva na bhraṣṭā ||)
1.1. prathamānurāgānantaro yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.1)
pāṇipīḍanavidherantaraṃ śailarājaduhiturharaṃ prati |
bhāvasādhvasaparigrahādabhūt kāmadohadamanoharaṃ vapuḥ || 36 ||
2. māno yathā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe nanu vayam || 37 ||
2.1. mānānantaro yathā—(urā. 1. 1)
paulastyapīnamujasampadudasyamānakailāsasambhramaviloladṛśaḥ priyāyāḥ |
śreyāṃsi vo diśatu nirhṛtakopacihnamāliṅganotpulakamāsitamindumauleḥ || 38 ||
3. pravāso yathā—(amaru. 99)
deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanai—
ryat‍nenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
uda‍grīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvā 'śrupūrṇe dṛśau
tāmāśāṃ pathikastathā 'pi kimapi dhyāyan muhurvīkṣate || 39 ||
3.1. pravāsānantaro yathā—(sūmu. 4)
āyāte dayite marusthalebhuvāṃ sañcintya durlaṅghatāṃ gehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ mukhe |
dattvā pīluśamīkarīrakabalān svenāñcalenādarā— dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhāsyakesarasaṭābhārāgralagnaṃ rajaḥ || 40 ||
1. caturviṁśaḥ prakāśaḥ dra. pṛ. 1158
4. karuṇo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.286)
yasyāḥ kusumaśayyā 'pi komalā 'syā rujākarī |
sā 'dhiśete kathaṃ devī hutāśanavatīṃ citām || 41 ||
4.1. karuṇānantaro yathā—(māmā. 10.15)
bhavati vitataśvāsonnāhapraṇunnapayodharaṃ hṛdayamapi ca snigdhaṃ cakṣurnijaprakṛtau sthitam |
vadanamadikaṃ mūrcchācchedāt prasādi virājate parigatamiva prārambhe 'hnaḥ śriyā sarasīruham || 42 ||
teṣāṃ samavāye pūrvaḥ pūrvo vicitra iti karuṇānantarat pravāsānantaro vicitraḥ |
yathā—
dṛṣṭirvandanamālikā, stanayugaṃ lāvaṇyapūrṇau ghaṭau śubhrāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitaṃ sumanasāṃ, vaktraprabhā darpaṇaḥ |
romāñcodgama eṣa sarṣapakaṇāḥ, pāṇī tathā pallavaḥ svāṅgaireva gṛhaṃ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅgalam || 43 || (saka. 3.108)
pravāsānantarād mānānantaraḥ; sa yathā—(saka. 5. 285)
na spṛṣṭo 'pi tridaśasaritā dūramīrṣyānubandhā— nnāpyunmṛṣṭo bhujagapatinā tarjanābhirjayāyāḥ |
mānasyānte nayanasalilaiḥ kṣālitaḥ śailapuñyāḥ patyurmaulau natijuṣi jayatyātmanaḥ pādapāṃsuḥ || 44 ||
mānānantarāt prathamānurāgānantaraḥ; sa yathā—(nāgā. 3.4)
dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭimadho dadhāti, kurute nālāpamābhāṣitā śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati, balādāliṅgitā vepate |
niryāntīṣu sakhīṣu vāsabhavanānnirgantumevehate jātā vāmatayaiva samprati mama prītyai navọdhā priyā || 45| |
paraḥ paro rāgavardhana' iti prathamānurāgānantarānmānānantaraḥ; sa yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃ hu muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 46 ||
mānānantarāt pravāsānantaraḥ; sa yathā—(saka. 5.54)
sahasā mā sāhijjaü piāgamo tīeṁ virahakisiāe |
accaṃtapahariseṇa vi jā a maā sā maa ccea || 47 ||
(sahasā mā kathyatāṃ priyāgamastasyā virahakṛśāyāḥ |
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā ca mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||)
pravāsānantarāt karuṇānantaraḥ; sa yathā—(urāca. 3. 39)
ālimpannamṛtamayairiva pralepairantarvā bahirapi vā śarīradhātūn |
saṃsparśaḥ punarapi jīvayannakasmādānandādaparavidhaṃ tanoti moham || 48 ||
evaṃvipralambheṣvapi karuṇāt pravāso vicitraḥ | sa yathā—(megha. 100)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena taptaṃ || 49 || ityādi |
pravāsānmānaḥ sa yathā—(amaru. 97)
bhrubhedo 'ruṇitaściraṃ nayanayoratyantamīlanaṃ roddhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune 'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
dhairyaṁ dhartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcinmayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ, siddhistu daive sthitā || 50 ||
mānāt prathamānurāgaḥ sa yathā—
kvākṛtyaṃ? śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ ? bhūyo 'pi dṛś‍yeta sā ro(do)ṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutamaho kopo 'pi kāntaṃ mukham |
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo rekhaiva sā 'nyādṛśī cetaḥ! svāsthyamupaihi, kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati?|| 51 ||
rāgavardhanatvena prathamānurāgānmānaḥ; sa yathā—(gāsa. 1.19)
dūmeṃti je muhuttaṃ kuviaṃ dāsa vva je pasāaṃti |
te ccia mahilāṇa piā sesā sāmi ccia varāā || 52 ||
(dūnayanti ye muhurttaṁ kupitaṃ dāsā iva ye prasādayanti |
ta eva mahilānāṃ priyāḥ śeṣāḥ svāmina eva varākāḥ ||)
mānāt pravāsaḥ ; sa yathā—(gāsa. 1.46, vala. 365)
kallaṃ kira kharahiao pavaccasihi daïo tti suvvaï jaṇaṃmi |
taha vaḍḍha bhaavaï ṇisa! jaha se kallaṃ tia ṇa hoi || 53 ||
(kalyaṃ kila kharahṛdayaḥ pravatsyati dayita iti śrūyate jane |
tathā vardhasva bhagavati niśe! yathā tasya kalyameva na bhavati ||)
pravāsāt karuṇaḥ ; sa yathā—(gāsa. 2.42)
samadukkhasokkhaparivaḍ‌̣dhiāṇa kāleṇa rūḍhapaṇaāṇa |
mihuṇāṇa maraï jaṃ taṃ khu jīaï, iaraṃ maaṃ hoi || 54 ||
(samaduḥkhasukhaparivārdhitānāṃ kālena rūḍhapraṇayānām |
mithunānāṃ mriyate yat tat khalu jīvati, itaranmṛtaṃ bhavati ||)
(vicitrarāgavardhanaḥ)
vaicitrye rāgavardhanatve vā sambhogād vipralambho balīyāniti | tatra— vaicitrye prathamānurāgānantarāt prathamānurāgaḥ | sa yathā—(sūmu. 4)
induryatra na nindyate, na madhuraṃ dūtīvacaḥ śrūyate, nālāpā nipatanti bāṣpakaluṣāḥ, nopaiti kārśyaṃ vapuḥ |
svādhīnāmanukūlitāṃ svagṛhiṇīmāliṅgya yat supyate kiṃ tat prema gṛhāśramavratamidaṃ kaṣṭaṃ samācaryate || 55 ||
rāgavardhanatve sa yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.95)
paśupatirapi tānyahāni kṛcchrādagamayadadrisutāsamāgamotkaḥ |
kamaparamavaśaṃ na viprakuyurvibhumapi taṃ yadamī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ || 56 ||
vaicitrye mānānantaramānaḥ ; sa yathā—(gāsa. 829ve., vajjā. 333)
jattha ṇa ujjāgarao jattha ṇa īsā visūraṇaṃ māṇaṃ |
sabbhāvacāḍuaṃ jattha ṇatthi, ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi || 57 ||
(yatra nojjāgarakaṃ yatra nerṣyākhedo mānaḥ |
sadbhāvacāṭukaṃ yatra nāsti s‍nehastatra nāsti ||)
rāgavardhanatve sa eva yathā—
aṇavaraa—keli—pasaraṃta—sokkha—pabbhāra—īsi—kuṃṭhaïaṃ |
māṇaṇisā—ṇaa—ṇicchiaṃ hoi puṇo ahiṇavaṃ pemmaṃ || 58 ||
(anavaratakeliprasaratsaukhyaprāgbhāreṣatkuṇṭhitam |
mānaniśātamiva bhavati punarabhinavaṃ prema ||)
pravāsānantarāt pravāso balīyān | sa vaicitrye yathā—(raghu. 13.28)
pūrvānubhūtaṃ smaratā ca rātrau kampottaraṃ bhīru! tavopagūḍham |
guhāvisārīṇyativāhitāni mayā kathañcid ghanagarjitāni || 59 ||
sa eva rāgavardhanatve yathā—(urāca. 1.33)
śailaḥ so 'yaṃ kakubhasurabhirmālyavān nāma yasmin nīlaḥ s‍nigdhaḥ śrayati śikharaṃ nūtanastoyavāhaḥ |
āryeṇāsmin; virama viramātaḥ paraṃ na kṣamo 'smi pratyāvṛttaḥ punariva sa me jānakīviprayogaḥ || 60 ||
karuṇānantarāt karuṇo balīyān | sa vaicitrye yathā—(śāku. 7.25)
mohānmayā sutanu! pūrvamupekṣitaste yo baddhabinduradharaṃ paribādhamānaḥ |
taṃ tāvadākuṭilapakṣmavilag‍namadya bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya vigatānuśayo bhavāmi || 61 ||
sa eva rāgavardhanatve yathā—(śāku. 7.21)
vasane paridhūsare vasānā niyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṛtaikaveṇiḥ |
atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghāṃ virahavyathāṃ bibharti || 62 ||
evaṃ mānānantarapravāsānantarakaruṇānantarebhyaḥ prathamānurāgaḥ, prathamānurāgānantara— pravāsānantarakaruṇānantarebhyo mānaḥ, mānānantarakaruṇānantaraprathamānurāgānantarebhyaḥ karuṇo balīyāniti, vaicitrye rāgavardhanatve ca yathādarśanamudāharaṇīyam | evaṃ nityānnaimittiko balīyān | sa—
rāgavardhanatve yathā—(gāsa. 4.55)
mā vac‍ca pupphalāī/lāvira devā uaaṃjalīhiṃ tūsaṃti |
golāṇaīeĕ puttaa! sīlummūlāiṁ kūlāiṁ || 63 ||
{mā vraja puṣpalāvin/lavanaśīla! devā udakāñjalibhistuṣyanti |
godānadyāḥ pratraka! śīlonmūlakāni kūlāni ||}
sāmānyād viśeṣaḥ | so 'pi rāgavardhanatve yathā—(raghu. 6.69)
taṃ vīkṣya sarvāvayavānavadyaṃ vyāvartatānyopagamāt kumārī |
na hi praphullaṃ sahakārametya vṛkṣāntaraṃ kāṅkṣati ṣaṭpadālī || 64 ||
prakāśāt pracchanno balīyān | so 'pi tatraiva, yathā—
savvāāramaṇaharaṃ bhaṇaï païṃ aḍaaṇā puloaṃtī |
jārattaṇeṇa vihiṇā maha eso kiṃ ṇa ṇiṃmavio? || 65 ||
{sarvākāramanoharaṃ bhaṇati patiṃ! asatī pralokayantī |
jāratvena vidhinā mamaiṣa kiṃ na nirmāpitaḥ/nirmitaḥ ||}
kṛtrimādakṛtrimo balīyān | so 'pi tatraiva, yathā—
yadahamanayā grāmāyaṇyā jhaṭityavalokito madhura—madhura—s‍nigdhas‍nigdhojjvalojjvalayā dṛśā |
kapaṭacaṭula x x x x x x x x x x x x ||66||
yathā—(jāha. 10.86)
ekasmin śayane mayā mayasutāmāliṅgaya nidrālasām ||67|| ityādi |
tamaḥprakṛteḥ kaniṣṭhakaniṣṭhasya vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.12)
yasmiṃścirapraṇayanirbharabaddhabhāvamāvedito rahasi matsuratopabhogaḥ |
tatraiva duścaritamadya nivedayantī hrītā 'si pāpahṛdaye na sakhījane 'smin || 68 ||
asyaiva sambhoge yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.13)
diṣṭayā 'rdhaśrutavipralambhavacanaḥ krodhādahaṃ nodgato diṣṭayā no paruṣaṃ ruṣā 'rdhakathite kiñcinmayā vyāhṛtam |
māṃ pratyāyayituṃ vimūḍhahṛdayaṃ diṣṭyā gatā 'ntaṃ kathā mithyā dūṣitayā 'nayā virahitaṃ diṣṭyā na jātaṃ jagat || 69 ||
tatra dhīrottamāyā vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—
ṇa kao vi vāha/rāha—mokkho māṇakkhalaṇe vi ṇa paḍio c‍cia bāho |
tīeṁ ṇavaraṃ piaamo gata iti aïttaloaṇaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 70 ||
(na kṛto 'pi rāga/bāṣpamokṣo mānaskhalane 'pi na patita eva bāṣpaḥ |
tayā kevalaṃ priyatame gata iti āyattalocanaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
tasyā eva sambhoge yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.1)
atha viśvātmane gaurī sandideśa mithaḥ sakhīm |
dātā me bhūbhṛtāṃ nāthaḥ pramāṇīkriyatāmiti || 71 ||
dhīramadhyāyā vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—(saka. 5.492).
dhīreṇa māṇabhaṃgo māṇakkhalaṇeṇa garuadhīrāraṃbhe |
ullalaï tulijjaṃte ekammi vi se thiraṃ ṇa lagaï hiaaṃ || 72 ||
(dhairyeṇa mānabhaṅgo mānaskhalanena gurukadhairyārambhaḥ |
ullalati tolyamāne ekasminnapyasyāḥ sthiraṃ na lagati hṛdayam ||)
tasyā eva sambhoge yathā—(havi.)
to se rubbhaṃta c‍cia hiaaviaṃbhaṃtaharisa—veucchaliā |
pāapaḍiassa hariṇo paḍiā puṭṭhīe vāhasalilatthe || 73 ||
(tatastasyā rudhyamānā eva hṛdayavijṛmbhamāṇaharṣavegocchalitāḥ |
pādapatitasya hareḥ patitāḥ pṛṣṭhe bāṣpasalilabindavaḥ ||)
adhīrottamāyā vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—
jāva a ṇa dei ohiṃ pariraṃbhaṃ jāva ṇea sịdhilei |
maraṇeṇa puṇo aaṃ maha tāvaggaruāvio appā || 74 ||
(yāvacca na dadātyavadhiṃ parirambhaṃ yāvannaipa śithilayati |
maraṇena punarayaṃ mama tāvad gurūkṛta ātmā ||)
tasyā eva sambhoge yathā—(saka. 5.148)
diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi tharaharasi piammi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe |
tuha saṃbhāsaṇa—seulli—phaṃsaṇe kiṃ vi lajjihisi || 75 ||
(dṛṣṭe yat pulakāyase tharaharāyase priye yat samāsanne |
tathā saṃbhāṣaṇasvedārdrīkṛtasparśe kimiva lajjiṣyase? ||)
adhīramadhyamāyā vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—(gāsa. 743ve.)
bhiuḍīe pulohassaṃ ṇibbhacchissaṃ parammuhī hossaṃ |
jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahio! jaï taṃ ṇa pecchissaṃ || 76 ||
{bhrukuṭyā pralokayiṣye nirbhartsye parāṅmukhī bhaviṣyāmi |
yad bhaṇata tat kariṣye sakhyo yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ||}
tasyā eva sambhoge yathā—(gāsa. 5.65)
pāa—paḍaṇāṇaṃ muddhe! rahasabalāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ |
daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri cukkā bahuāṇa sokkhāṇa || 77 ||
{pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe! rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasanne! cyutā bahūnāṃ saukhyānām ||}
adhīrakaniṣṭhāyā vipralambhe 'nubhāvasampad yathā—(gāsa. 4.14)
acchīiṁ tā thaïssaṃ dohiṃ pi hatthehiṃ tammi diṭṭhammi |
agaṃ kalaṃvakusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kahaṃ ṇu ḍhak‍kissaṃ || 78 ||
(akṣiṇī tāvat sthagayiṣyāmi dvābhyāmapi hastābhyāṃ tasmin dṛṣṭe |
aṅgaṃ kadambakusumamiva pulakitaṃ kathaṃ nu chādayiṣyāmi? ||)
tasyā eva sambhoge yathā—(gāsa. 4.61)
ṇīsāsuk‍kaṃpapuloiehiṁ jāṇaṃti ṇac‍ciuṃ dhaṇṇā |
amhārisīhiṃ diṭṭhe piammi appā vi pammusaï || 79 ||
(niḥśvāsotkampapralokitairjānanti nartituṃ dhanyāḥ |
asmādṛśīnāṃ/bhiḥ dṛṣṭe priye ātmā 'pi pramuṣyate ||)
uttamatvamugdhatvānurūpāṇi rāmaṇīyakāni | tatrottamatvaṃ mugdhāmadhyāpragalbhāsu, mugdhatvamuttamāmadhyākaniṣṭhāsu rāmaṇīyakaheturiti | tatra—
mugdhāyā uttamatvaṃ sambhoge yathā—(saka. 5.385)
bālattaṇadullaliāe ajja aṇajjaṃ kaaṃ ṇavavahūe |
bhāāmi ghare eāiṇi ti ṇiṃto paī ruddho || 80 ||
(bālatvadurlalitayā adyānārya kṛtaṃ navavadhvā |
bibhemi gṛhe ekākinīti niryan patī ruddhaḥ ||)
vipralambhe yathā—(gāsa. 967 ve.)
kelīgottakkhalaṇe varassa ḍuṃḍullaïṁ dihiṃ dei |
bahuvāsaavāsahare bahue vāholliā diṭṭhī || 81 ||
(kelīgotraskhalane varasya kampitāṃ dhṛtiṃ dadā/dhāti |
bahuvāsakavāsagṛhe vadhvā bāṣpārdritā dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
madhyāyā uttamatvaṃ sambhoge yathā—
suraāvasāṇavilioṇaāo seullava—aṇa—kamalāo |
addhacchipecchirīo piāo dhaṇṇā puloaṃti || 82 ||
(suratāvasānavalitāvanatāḥ svedārdravadanakamalāḥ |
ardhākṣiprekṣaṇaśīlāḥ priyāḥ dhanyāḥ pralokayanti ||)
vipralambhe yathā—(gāsa. 1.88)
jāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ aṇuṇaaviddaviamāṇaparisesaṃ |
