sa ca vyalīkādijanmabhirīrṣyāyitādibhirupajāyamāno viruddha eva bhavati | tatra— prakṛtyartho yathā—
sodvegasya skhalitavacaso yat‍nasaṃstambhitāśroḥ sāvegasya śramajalabhṛto durnimittasmitasya |
bhūyobhūyaḥ kṛtakaghaṭitabhrūlatābhaṅgaheto— rmānasyāsyā rahasi kathitāpahnutasyāsti nārghaḥ || 3 ||
1. mevādānaṃ=mevāvadātaṃ jośeraḥ, rāghavaḥ | mūlaṃ tu mūlānusāri asmadupakalpitam | 2. tāpa=moha rā.jo.
upasargārtho yathā—
līlāvatī caraṇacumbitamaulimagre kāntaṃ vidhūya vihitāgasamuc‍cacāla |
atrāntare mukharanūpurayugmamasyāḥ saubhāgyagandhagajaḍiṇḍimatāṃ jagāma || 4 ||
(3. kālaharaṇam)
kālaharaṇamityayaṃ prakṛtyartho vyāviddhamityayaṃ copasargārthaḥ pravāse 'nuṣajyate | tatra hi deśaviprakarṣāt tadaivāliṅganādīnāmanavāp‍tiḥ kālaharaṇam |
tac‍ca kālaviprakarṣotkaṇṭhādibhiratyāyataṃ vyāviddhameva bhavati | tatra— prakṛtyartho yathā—(megha. 108)
śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau || 5 || ityādi |
upasargārtho yathā—(megha. 103)
tvāmālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiśśilāyām || 6 || ityādi |
(4. pratyādānam)
pratyādānamityayaṃ prakṛtyartho vipratiṣiddhamityayaṃ copasargārthaḥ karuṇe sambadhyate | tatra daivameveṣṭasaṅgamādimācchinatti ||
yathocyate—(urāca. 4.15)
suhṛdiva prakaṭayya sukhapradāṃ prathamamekarasāmanukūlatām |
punarakāṇḍavivartanadāruṇaḥ pariśinaṣṭi vidhirmanaso rujam || 7 ||
tac‍ca kasyacidapi kadācidapi mā bhūyāditi viśeṣeṇa pratiṣidhyamānaṃ vipratiṣiddhameva bhavati || tatra—
prakṛtyartho yathā—(raghu. 8.67)
gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithaḥ priyaśiṣyā lalite kalāvidhau |
karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvāṃ vada kiṃ na me hṛtam? || 8 ||
upasargārtho yathā—(raghu. 8.66)
dhṛtirastamitā ratiś‍cyutā galitaṃ geyamṛturnirutsavaḥ |
gatamābharaṇaprayojanaṃ pariśūnyaṃ śayanīyamadya me || 9 ||
nanu ca pratiśrutyā 'dānādayaścatvāro 'pi prakṛtyarthāḥ, vividhamityādayaścatvāro 'pi ca upasargārthāḥ prathamānurāgādiṣu caturṣvapi vyavasthāsamplavābhyāmupalabhyante |
tat katham?
ucyate pratiśrutyā 'dānamityādayo yathāyathamupasargā aviśiṣṭāḥ prathamānurāgādiṣu vyavatiṣṭhante, iti | tathāhi—
(prathamānurāge pratiśrutyādānādayaḥ)
(vyavasthā)
prathamānurāge pratiśrutyā 'dānaṃ vividhamapi dṛśyate; yathā—(visā. 1.18)
kathaya kimiha bāle! kā tvamityullapaṃstāṃ jhaṭiti kila dukūlasyāñcale dhārayāmi |
agamadatha niketaṃ k‍vāpyasau śārayantī nava—kuvalaya—mālā—māṃsalairdṛṣṭipātaiḥ || 10 ||
vividhamapi ca yathā—(māmā. 1.29)
yāntyā muhurvalitakandharamānanaṃ ta— dāvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibhaṃ vahantyā |
digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 11 ||
tatraiva kālayāpanamapi vyāviddhamapi ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.1)
atha viśvātmane gaurī sandideśa mithaḥ sakhīm |
dātā me bhūbhṛtāṃ nāthaḥ pramāṇīkriyatāmiti || 12 ||
vyāviddhamapi ca yathā—(māmā. 6.3)
mālatyāḥ prathamāvalokadivasādārabhya vistāriṇo bhūyaḥ s‍nehaviceṣṭitairmṛgadṛśā nītasya koṭiṃ parām |
adyāntaḥ khalu sarvathā 'sya madanāyāsasya me sarvataḥ kalyāṇaṃ vidadhātu vā bhagavatī nītirviparyetu vā || 13 ||
tatraiva pratyādānamapi pratiṣiddhamapi yathā—(māmā. 1.22)
yad vismayastimitamastamitānyabhāvamānandamandamamṛtaplavanādivāsīt |
tatsannidhau tadadhunā hṛdayaṃ madīyamaṅgāracumbitamiva vyathamānamāste || 14 ||
vipratiṣiddho 'pi yathā—(kādakasā. 4.111)
gatvā tamahamadrākṣaṃ tatkṣaṇotkrāntajīvitam |
cirāt tvamāgatā 'sīti ruṣitvevamavasthitam || 15 ||
(māne pratiśrutyādānādayaḥ)
evaṃ māne 'pi pratiśrutyādāne vividhaṃ yathā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā || 16 || ityādi
vividhaṃ yathā—(amaru. 14)
kṛto dūrādeva smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ śirasyājñā nyastā prativacanamapyānatimati |
na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti santāpayati māṃ nigụ̄dhāntaḥkopā kaṭhinahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam || 17 ||
tatraiva visaṃvādanamaviruddhaṃ; yathā—
tvayā kṣāntaṃ kṣāntaṃ kuru mukhamito māṃ pratikṛtiḥ nidhehīmaṃ pṛṣṭhe mama karamapakrāntanihitaḥ |
sakhīnāṃ nirbandhānmama ca dhṛtapāṇeḥ praṇamataḥ priye kākuprītestava paramagūḍhaṃ mayi ruṣaḥ || 18 ||
viruddhaṃ yathā—(amaru. 80)
anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanāpṛcch‌ya suhṛda— stvayā darpānmānaḥ kimiti sarale! preyasi kṛtaḥ |
samākṛṣṭā hyete virahadahanodbhāsura—śikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunā 'raṇyaruditaiḥ || 19 ||
tatraiva kālaharaṇaṃ vyāviddham; yathā—(amaru. 49)
dūrādutsukamāgate vila/kasitaṃ, sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ, gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūlatam |
māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇaṃ kṣaṇā— c‍cakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi || 20 ||
vyāviddhaṃ yathā—
kṛśaprāyā rātriḥ kṛśatanu! śanairyena vinama— tpradīpo 'yaṃ nidrāvaśamupagato ghūrṇata iva |
praṇāmānto mānastyajasi na tathā 'pi krudhamaho! kucapratyāsattyā hṛdayamapi te caṇḍi! kaṭhinam || 21 ||
tatraiva pratyādānamapi pratiṣiddhaṃ ; yathā—(amaru. 38)
kopo yatra bhrukuṭiracanā vigrahaḥ || 22 || ityādi
vipratiṣiddhaṃ yathā—(amaru. 60)
lākṣālakṣma lalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale || 23 || ityādi
(pravāse pratiśrutyādānādayaḥ)
atha pravāse 'pi pratiśrutyādānaṃ vividhaṃ; yathā—(mavīca. 5.28)
priye! hāhā k‍vāsi prakira madhurāṃ vācamadhunā parābhūtairitthaṃ vilapanavinodo 'pyasulabhaḥ |
anindyaḥ paulastyo vrajatu parivādo mayi jarāṃ yato rụ̄dhe vaire bahuguṇamanena pratikṛtam || 24 ||
vividhaṃ yathā—
kṛtakaruci/ditairbāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitai— rvanamasi gatā yasya prītyā tathā 'pi dhṛtā 'mbayā |
navajaladharaśyāmāḥ paśyan diśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye! sa tava priyaḥ || 25 ||
tatraiva visaṃvādanamaviruddhaṃ; yathā—(sūmu. 24)
tanvaṅgyāstvamiti prasādaviśadaṃ, nāstīti khedālasaṃ cakṣurdvārapathāvatāriṇi jane vyāpārayantyā muhuḥ |
harṣārtiprabhavāḥ pratikṣaṇabhavasvedāmbudāhajvare bāṣpāmbhaḥkaṇikāḥ payodharataṭe puṣyanti śuṣyanti ca || 26 ||
viruddhaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.133)
dūre priyatamaḥ so 'yamāgato jaladāgamaḥ |
dṛṣṭāśca phullā niculā na mṛtā 'smīti kiṃnvidam? || 27 ||
(saṃplavaḥ)
tatraiva kālaharaṇamavyāviddhaṃ; yathā—(amaru. 12)
praharaviratau madhye vā 'hnastato 'pi pare 'tha vā kimuta sakale yāte 'pyahni priya! tvamihaiṣyasi |
iti dinaśataprāpyaṃ deśaṃ priyasya yiyāsato harati gamanaṃ bālā ' 'lāpaiḥ sabāṣpajhalajjhalaiḥ || 28 ||
vyāviddhaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 847ve.)
cirajīvittaṇakiṃkhiri! mā tamma rasāaṇehi athirehi |
virahaṃ pavajja, jāaṃti jeṇa jua—dīharā diahā || 29 ||
(cirajīvitvakāṅkṣiṇi ! mā tāmya rasāyanairasthiraiḥ |
virahaṃ prapadyasva jāyante yena yugadīrghā divasāḥ ||)
tataiva pratyādānamapratiṣiddhaṃ yathā—
ua hujjaṃti piucchā jāi piasaṃgamammi sokkhāiṁ |
tāiṁ viraheṇa pisuṇeṇa dhuggaliāi kīraṃti || 30 ||
(paśya bhaviṣyanti pitṛṣvaso yāni priyasaṅgame saukhyāni |
tāni viraheṇa piśunena gālitāni kriyante ||)
pratiṣiddhaṃ yathā—
mugdhe! preṣaya yāmi yānti pathikāḥ kālo 'vadhiḥ kathyatā— mudvig‍nā kimakāṇḍa eva bhavatī tūṣṇīṃ kimevaṃ sthitā? |
pūrvoktoparatāṃ priyeṇa dayitāmāśliṣya tattatkṛtaṃ datto yena samastapāntha—nivaha—prāṇāntako ḍiṇḍimaḥ || 31 ||
(karuṇe pratiśrutyādānādayaḥ)
tathā karuṇe pratiśrutyādānaṃ vividhaṃ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.2)
avadhānapare cakāra sā pralayāntonmiṣite vilocane |
na viveda tayoratṛp‍tayoḥ priyamatyantavilup‍tadarśanam || 32 ||
vividhaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.9)
hṛdaye vasasīti matpriyaṃ yadavocaḥ || 33 || ityādi
tatraiva visaṃvādanamaviruddhaṃ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.7)
upamānamabhūd vilāsināṃ karaṇaṃ yat tava kāntimattayā |
tadidaṃ gatamīdṛśīṃ daśāṃ na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ || 34 ||
viruddhaṃ yathā—(māmā. 9.12, urāca. 3.21)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhod‍vegād, dvidhā tu na bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ, na muñcati cetanām |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ, karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī, na kṛntati jīvitam || 35 ||
tatraiva kālayāpanamavyāviddham; yathā—(raghu. 8.92)
tenāṣṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathañcid bālatvādavitathasūnṛtena sūnoḥ |
sādṛśyapratikṛtidarśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svap‍neṣu kṣaṇikasamāgamotsavaiśca || 36 ||
vyāviddhaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.33)
devyā śūnyasya jagato dvādaśaḥ parivatsaraḥ |
praṇaṣṭamiva nāmāpi na ca rāmo na jīvati || 37 ||
tatraiva pratyādānamapratiṣiddham; yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.73)
tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || 38 ||
pratiṣiddhaṃ yathā—(urāca. 1.28)
athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathā vṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi |
janasthāne śūnye vikalakaraṇairāryacaritai— rapi grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam || 39 ||
atha prathamānurāge visaṃvādanamapi vividham; yathā—(śāku. 3.22)
muhuraṅgulisaṃvṛtādharoṣṭhaṃ pratiṣedhākṣaraviklavābhirāmam |
mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ, na cumbitaṃ tu || 40 ||
kālaharaṇamapyaviruddham ; yathā—(śāku. 2.12)
darbhāṅkureṇa caraṇaḥ kṣata ityakāṇḍe tanvī sthitā katicideva padāni gatvā |
āsīd vivṛttavadanā ca vimocayantī śākhāsu valkalamasaktamapi drumāṇām || 41 ||
māne pratiśrutyādānamapi vyāviddham ; yathā—(amaru. 18)
ekatrāsanasaṃsthiti; parihṛtā pratyudgamāt || 42 || (pṛ.1133) ityādi
apratiṣiddhamapi visaṃvādanam ; yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.21)
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ || 43 || ityādi |
pravāse pratyādānamapi vividham; yathā—(rāmābhyudaye)
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile mag‍naṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
ye 'pi tvadgamanānusārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā— stvatsādṛś‍yavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 44 ||
visaṃvādanamapi vyāviddhaṃ; yathā—(amaru. 76)
ādṛṣṭiprasarāt priyasya padavīmālokya nirviṇṇayā viśrānteṣu pathiṣvahaḥpariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati |
dattvaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyā 'smin kṣaṇe mā bhūdāgata ityamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitam || 45 ||
karuṇe kālaharaṇamapyaviruddhaṃ ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.46)
atha madanavadhūruplavāntaṃ vyasanakṛśā pratipālayāñcakāra |
śaśina iva divātanasya rekhā kiraṇaparikṣayadhūsarā pradoṣam || 46 ||
visaṃvādanamapi vividhaṃ, yathā—(saka. 5.430)
tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairātaṅkaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā |
vinā vācā naitat kṣamamiti vidhāyānanamadhaḥ patada‍bāṣpāmbhobhirlikhitamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 47 ||
evamanye 'pi prakṛtyarthopasargārthānāṃ vyavasthāsamplavāḥ saṃdṛś‍yante |
(rāgānurāgayoḥ prakṛtipratyayavivecanam)
atrocyate | saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yathākathañcid vyutpattidarśane rụ̄dhirviṣayamapaharati | tena vyutpatti ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰(ni)yamo nopapadyate | sa tatraiva vyavahriyate | na cāsāvanyatra nāsti | na cānye tatra na santi | tad yathā—paṅkeruhaṃ sarasijamiti | na hi tataḥ paṅkaṃ eva kevale rohati, api tu sajale | na kevalaṃ sarasyeva jāyate, api tu vāpyāmapi | na ca paṅke payasi sarasi vā paṅkajameva kevalama, api tu kaśeruka—makara—matsya— mustādi apīti | tadvadihāpi draṣṭavyam ||
kiñca, yadyapi pratiśrutyādānamityādayo 'rthā mānādiṣvapi saṃbhavanti, tathā 'pi yathā prathamānurāge, pratiśrutyādānaṃ vaividhyaṃ ca saṃvidhānakeṣu nirūpyate, naivamanyeṣu | yadyapi ca visaṃvādanādayo 'pi virodhādisahakṛtāstatra vidyante, tathā 'pi yathā pritaśrutyādānaṃ vaividhyaṃ ca, naivamete ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ṇetyabhiprāyeṇoktam 'pratiśrutyādānamityayaṃ prakṛtyarthaḥ, vividhamityayaṃ copasargārthaḥ prathamānurāge ghaṭate' iti ||
etena mānādiṣvapi vipralambhaśabdasya yathoktaniruktayo vyākhyātāḥ |
kaḥ prathamānurāgādisaṃjñādīnāmanvarthatāyāṃ prakṛtyupasargārthapratyayārthavibhāgaḥ? |
ucyate | 'rañja rāge' ityasmāt 'rājṛ dīp‍tau' ityetasmād vā bhāvakaraṇayorghañi rāga iti rūpaṃ bhavati | tataśca
1. anugato 'nurūpo vā rāgaḥ anurāgaḥ iti karaṇasādhanapratyayotpattipakṣe 'nunā samāsaḥ |
2. anu=paścāt saha vā rāgaḥ anurāgaḥ iti bhāvasādhanapratyayotpattipakṣe 'nunā samāsaḥ | rañjayatiścehānuṣaktivacano varṇāntarāpattivacanaśca gṛhyate | yathā anurakto bhojane, kaṣāyeṇa raktaṃ vastram (kāśikā 4.2.1) iti |
kathaṃ tarhi rakto varṇaḥ, pārthivaṃ raja iti ? |
upacārād rakta iva raktaḥ | tatra prādhānyena kusumbhalākṣādinā ca raktaṃ raktamucyate | yathā— 'raktaṃ vastramavidhavā strī dhārayet' (kāśikā 4.2.1) iti; tadvat svabhāvato 'pi yo bhavet so 'pi rakta ityucyate | yathā ka/kāṣāyo /yau gardabhasya karṇau, hāridrau kukkuṭasya pādau' (kāśikā 4.2.1) iti |
evaṃ raja iva rajaḥ | yathā rajo nāma guṇaviśeṣaḥ pratyātmamanuṣajyate, evaṃ pṛthvīparāgaḥ yaḥ sarvatrānuṣaṅgī sa evamucyate |
rājatiḥ punariha śobhāvacanaḥ samṛddhivacanaśca ||
yathā—(māmā. 10.4)
ujjvalālokayā s‍nigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate |
malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayeva sā || 48 ||
yathā ca—
yeneṣṭaṃ rājasūyena sarvabhūmīśvaraśca yaḥ |
śāsti yaścājñayā rājñaḥ sa samrāṭ kathyate budhaiḥ || 49 ||
asmād bhāvakaraṇayoranyatra ghañutpattiriṣyate, rañjestu bhāvakaraṇayoreva ghañi nalopaḥ; tataścāyamarthaḥ saṅgacchate |
rajyati anuṣajyate viṣayeṣvaneneti rāgaḥ rūpalāvaṇyādirviṣayadharmaḥ, prakṛtyādirāśrayadharmo vā |
rājatyanena pratiyoginamātmānaṃ vā rāgaḥ rūpalāvaṇyādirāśrayadharmo viṣayadharmo vā |
rājyate = svedaromāñcavaivarṇyādibhirvarṇāntaramāpadyate viṣaya āśrayo vā yena sa rāga ucyate |
ubhayorvaktravīkṣitādibhiśceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ pramodaviśeṣo rājate śobhate 'nena samānaśīlaguṇavayovidyāvyasaneṣviti rāgaḥ | uttamaprārthanīyatādibhiranurūpuprārthanādibhirvā ubhayagato viśeṣaḥ |
rājate = dīpyate samudyate paraṃ prakarṣamāpadyate ratirateneti rāgaḥ — ubhayagata iṅgitākārādiviśeṣaḥ, kālayāpananepathyavilepanādiruddīpanaviśeṣo vā |
bhāvasādhanapakṣe tu ratirekā evaṃprakārā rāgaśabdenābhidhīyate | tasya ca yadanunā sahārthena saha samāsastadā striyāḥ puruṣasya ca tulyakāla eva ratyutpattāvuttamaḥ | yathā— (raghu. 7.22)
abhūd varaḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ || 50 || ityādi
yadā anurāgaśabdasya paścādarthena anunā samāsastadā puṃsaḥ paścādutpattau madhyamaḥ |
yathā— (kusaṃ. 5.86)
adyaprabhṛtyanavamaṅgi! tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau |
ahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte || 51 ||
striyā paścādutpattau kaniṣṭhaḥ | yathā— (gāsa. 3.46)
māmi! hiaaṃ pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe |
ṇhāṇahaliddākaḍuaṃ aṇusottajalaṃ piaṃteṇa || 52 ||
(mātulāni! hṛdayamiva pītaṃ tena yūnā majjantyāḥ |
s‍nānaharidrākaṭukaṃ anusrotojalaṃ pibatā ||)
karaṇasādhanapratyayotpattipakṣe tu yadā 'nurūpo rāgaḥ anurāga ityanurūpārthenānunā samāsaḥ, tadā tadudgatasya lāvaṇyādeḥ prasiddhādervā siddhamuttamatvam |
yathocyate— (gāsa. 1.12)
sac‍caṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhuṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo |
maraü, ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ, maraṇaṃ vi salāhaṇijjaṃ se || 53 ||
(satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇamapi ślāghanīyamasyāḥ ||)
yadā punaranugatārtho 'nunā samāsastadā striyāḥ puruṣecchānuvṛttau madhyamaḥ |
yathā— (kusaṃ. 7.65)
sthāne tapo duścarametadarthamaparṇayā komalayā 'pi tap‍tam |
yā dāsyamapyasya labheta nārī sā syāt kṛtārthā, kimutāṅkaśayyām? || 54 ||
puruṣasya strīcchānuvṛttau kaniṣṭhaḥ | yathā— (gāsa. 1.84)
so tuha kaeṇa suṃdari! taha jhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto |
jaha se mac‍cariṇīeṁ vi doc‍caṃ jāāeṁ paḍivaṇṇaṃ || 55 ||
(sa tava kṛte sundari! tathā kṣīṇaḥ sumahilo hālikaputraḥ |
yathā 'sya matsariṇyā api dūtyaṃ jāyayā pratipannam ||)
etena anyatarānicchāyāmanurāgābhāse 'pyānurūpyaṃ vyākhyātam | tatra puruṣasyānicchāyām uttamaḥ | yathā—(kirātā. 10.50)
tadanagha! tanurastu sā sakāmā vrajati purā hi parāsutāṃ tvadarthe |
punarapi sulabhaṃ tapo 'nurāgī yuvatijanaḥ khalu nāpyate 'nurūpaḥ || 56 ||
s‍triyā anicchāyāṃ madhyamaḥ | yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 57 ||
s‍triyā evātyā/nyānurāgatastad‍dveṣe kaniṣṭhaḥ | yathā—(urā. 5.21)
śvāsāliṅganadhūsareṇa sumukhī bimbādhareṇāmunā paryantāruṇatāṃ dṛśorvidadhato(tī) bāṣpairavicchedibhiḥ |
kṣāmakṣāmakapolamaṇḍalapatad‍vyālolalambālakai— raṅgairujjhitabhūṣaṇaiḥ kathamiyaṃ dhatte navaṃ maṇḍanam? || 58 ||
(prathamānurāgaḥ)
evamavasthite 'tyarthavatyanurāgaśabde prathamaśabdena samāsaḥ — pratamaścāsāvanurāgaśca prathamānurāgaḥ, prathamaṃ vā 'nurāgaḥ prathamānurāga iti bhāvasādhanapakṣe | yathocyate— (māmā. 3.11/12)
tadevaṃ prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ kadācidanyatrāparikliṣṭapūrvastapasvī, yato 'dhunā 'śakyamanena maraṇamapyabhavitum iti |
karaṇasādhanapratyayotpattipakṣe tu prathamāyāmanyasyāmatyurāgaḥ prathamānurāgaḥ, prathame utkṛṣṭe 'dvitīye vā 'nurāgaḥ prathamānurāgaḥ | yathocyate—(kāsū. 5.19)
"eka eva sārvavarṇiko nāyakaḥ, pracchannaśca dvitīyo viśeṣalābhāt" iti |
(mānaḥ)
so 'yamanurāgaḥ premagateḥ svabhāvakuṭilatvāt kuṭilatāmālambamāno māna ityucyate | kā punarmāne niruktiḥ ?
ucyate | māna pūjāyām mana jñāne, 'manu (ava)bodhane' māṅa‍māne ityetebhyo bhāvakaraṇādiṣveva ghañlyuṭormāna iti rūpaṃ bhavati | tathā hi—
1. mānyate pūjyate 'neneti mānaṃ(naḥ) | yathocyate—(gāsa. 5.65)
pāapaḍaṇāṇa muddhe! rahasabalāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ |
daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri! cukkā bahuāṇa sokkhāṇaṃ || 59 ||
(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe! rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasanne vañcitā bahūnāṃ saukhyānām ||)
2. manyate duḥkhaikahetumapi sukhasādhanamevainamiti mānaḥ | yathocyate—(māgha. 10.21)
mā punastamabhisīsaramāgaskāriṇaṃ madavimohitacetāḥ |
yoṣidityabhilalāṣa na hālāṃ dustyajaḥ khalu sukhadabhi/ pi mānaḥ || 60 ||
3. manute budhyate 'smāt premāstitvamiti mānaḥ | yathā—(gāsa. 829)
jattha ṇa ujjāgarao jattha ṇa īsā visūraṇaṃ māṇaṃ |
sabbhāvacāḍuaṃ jattha ṇatthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi || 61 ||
{yatra nojjāgaro yatra nerṣyā visūraṇaṃ mānaḥ |
sadbhāvacāṭukaṃ yatra nāsti s‍nehastatra nāsti ||}
4. mimīte pari(cchi)natti premṇaḥ pramāṇamasāviti mānaḥ | yathā—(havi.)
kuviā a sac‍cabhāmā same vi vahuāṁṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
pāaḍiahiaasāro pemāsaṃghasariso paaṭṭaï maṇṇū || 62 ||
(kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi vadhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |
prakaṭitahṛdayasāraḥ premāśaṃsāsadṛśaḥ pravartate manyuḥ ||)
kathaṃ punarmāna iti lyuḍantasya puṃsi prayogaḥ ?
śiṣṭaprayogadarśanāt |
yathā ' 'ha mahābhāṣyakāraḥ — (mabhā. 1.3.1)
asti kriyā, kiṃ tu sādhanebhyaḥ pṛthāgākhyātumaśakyam, anirluṭhitagarbhavat |
"sā 'sāvanumānagamyā |
ko 'sāvanumānaḥ?
yat sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadācit pacatītyetad bhavati, kadācinna bhavati (mabhā. 1.3.1)|" iti |
(pravāsaḥ)
athānurāga eva deśāntaravyavadhāne pravāsākhyāṃ labhate |
kā punaḥ pravāse niruktiḥ?
vasa nivāse, vasa ācchādane ityetayoḥ prapūrvayorbhāvakaraṇādiṣveva ghañi pravāsa iti rūpaṃ bhavati | tatra —
1. vaseḥ prapūrvasya tadviparītārthavācitve pravasanaṃ pravāsaḥ | yathā—(megha. 1.1)
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ || 63 || ityādi
2. prakarṣeṇa vāsayati anurañjayati tanmayatāṃ nayati kāminaścittamiti vā pravāsaḥ |
yathā—(megha. 100)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhaṃ || 64 || ityādi
3. yadi vā prapūrvo vasirṇijantaḥ pramāpaṇe vartate; yathā tūṣṇīmenaṃ pravāsayet iti |
tataśca pravāsyante hanyante viyogina iti pravāsaḥ | yathā—(amaru. 131)
grāme 'smin pathikāya pāntha! vasatirnaivādhunā dīyate rātrāvatra vihāramaṇḍapatale pānthaḥ prasup‍to yuvā |
tenotthāya khalena garjati ghane smṛtvā priyāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yenādyāpi karaṅkadaṇḍapatanāśaṅkī janastiṣṭhati || 65 ||
ete trayo 'pi vatasyarthāḥ |
4. atha vasterarthaḥ | āvasate ācchādayantyasmin viyoginyo viśeṣaveṣādikamiti pravāsaḥ | yathā—(śāku. 7.21)
vasane paridhūsare vasānā niyamakṣāmatanuḥ kṛśaikaveṇiḥ |
atiniṣkaruṇasya śuddhaśīlā mama dīrghāṃ virahavyathāṃ bibharti || 66 ||
(karuṇaḥ)
anurāga evānyataravināśe duḥkhānubhavādibhiḥ karuṇasaṃjño bhavati |
kā punaḥ karuṇe niruktiḥ?
ucyate | karoteḥ kiratervā 'kṝvṛtṛdāribhya unan' ityauṇādike kartaryunanpratyaye karuṇa iti rūpaṃ bhavati | tatrāyaṃ karotirabhūtaprādurbhāvoc‍cāraṇanikṣepābhyaṅgeṣu vartate | yathā—ghaṭaṃ karoti, paṭaṃ karoti; abhūtamutpādayatīti gamyate | coraṃkāramākrośati, dasyuṅkāramākrośati; coro 'si dasyurasītyuc‍cārya krośatīti gamyate |
ghaṭe kuru, vṛtaḥ, ghaṭe/kaṭe kuru, kṛtānaṃ/uttānaṃ, aś‍mānamitaḥ kuru nikṣipeti gamyate | pādau kuru, pṛṣṭhaṃ, kuruḥ ghṛtena tailena vā unmṛdāneti gamyate ||
kiratistu vikṣepe paṭhyate | viśiṣṭasya kṣepo vikṣepaḥ; viśeṣāstu asya vaividhyaṃ viruddhatā, vyāviddhatvam, pratiṣedha iti | tatra
1. yadā kirateḥ karuṇa iti rūpaṃ, tadā vividho vyāviddho vipratiṣiddhaśca dīrghaśoka eva karuṇaśabdenocyate | sa hi prāṇinaṃ sāṃsārikebhyaḥ sukhebhyo vikṣipati |
yathā— (bārā.)
hṛdayānnāpayāto 'si dikṣu sarvāsu dṛś‍yase |
vatsa rāma! gato 'sīti santāpādanumīyase || 67 ||
prāṇāḥ prayānti paritastamasā ' 'vṛto 'smi marmacchido mama rujaḥ pratarantyapūrvāḥ |
akṣṇormukhendumupadhehi, giraṃ ca dehi hā putra! mayyakaruṇaḥ sahasaiva mā bhūḥ || 68 || (mavīca. 4.55)
2. yadā tu karoterabhūtaprādurbhāvanādyarthavācinaḥ karuṇa iti rūpaṃ, tadā s‍trīpuṃsaviṣaya āyojitakāmasūtraḥ punassamāgamaphalo 'nurāga eva karuṇaśabdenocyate | tad yathā— duḥkhātirekān bhūtān karoti prādurbhāvayatīti karuṇaḥ | yathā—(māmā. 9.20)
mātarmātardalati hṛdayaṃ, dhvaṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviratajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅ‍mohaḥ sthagayati, kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi? || 69 ||
3. karoti uc‍cārayati vilāpādibhistadguṇamiti karuṇaḥ | yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.4)
atha sā punareva vihvalā || 70 || ityādi
4. karoti sthāpayatyanena maraṇajīvitayorekatreti karuṇaḥ | yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.46)
itthaṃ rateḥ kimapi bhūtamadṛś‍yarūpaṃ mandīcakāra || 71 || ityādi
5. karoti abhyañjayati bahirantaśca vyāp‍noti visrambhotpattyā strīpuṃsayoranyatarasyāyaṃ hṛdayamiti karuṇaḥ | yathā—(urāca. 3.23)
vilulitamapi pūrairbāṣṣamānandaśoka— prabhavamavasṛjantī pakṣmalottānadīrghā |
s‍napayati hṛdayeśaṃ s‍nehaniṣyandinī te dhavalamadhūramugdhā dugdhakulyeva dṛṣṭiḥ || 72 ||
so 'yaṃ vipralambhādiṣūpasarjanīkṛtapratyayārthaḥ prakṛtyartha upavarṇitaḥ |
(vipralambhasya pratyayārthaḥ)
athopasarjanīkṛtaprakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārtho varṇyate | tatra bhāvaḥ, karma, karaṇaṃ sampradānaṃ, apādānaṃ, adhikaraṇaṃ, kartā, hetukartā, bhāvakartā, karmakartā, kartṛkarma, bhāvakarmeti pratyayārthāḥ | teṣu —
bhāvo yathā—
avacanaṃ vacanaṃ priyasannidhāvanavalokanameva vilokanam |
avayavāvaraṇaṃ hi yadaṃśukavyatikareṇa tadaṅgasamarpaṇam || 73 ||
karma yathā—(māmā. 1.40)
paśyāmi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścā— dantarbahiḥ parita eva ca vartamānām |
udbuddhamugdhakanakābjanibhaṃ vahantī— māsaṅgi tiryagapavartitadṛṣṭi vaktram || 74 ||
karaṇaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.16)
aviralamiva dām‍nā pauṇḍarīkeṇa naddhaḥ s‍napita iva ca dugdhasrotasā nirbhareṇa |
kabalita iva kṛts‍na cakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabhamamṛtamegheneva sāndreṇa siktaḥ || 75 ||
sampradānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.7)
kṛtavānasi vipriyaṃ na me pratikūlaṃ ca na te mayā kṛtam |
kimakāraṇameva darśanaṃ vilapantyai rataye na dīyate || 76 ||
apādānaṃ yathā—(amaru. 118)
kiñcinmudritapāṃsavaḥ śikhikūlaiḥ sānandamālokitā bhag‍nāvāsarudaddaridragṛhiṇīśvāsānilairjarjarāḥ |
ete te nipatanti nūtanaghanāt prāvṛḍbharārambhiṇo vicchāyīkṛtaviprayuktavanitāvak‍trendavo bindavaḥ || 77 ||
adhikaraṇaṃ yathā—(urāca. 2.28)
yasyāṃ te divasāstvayā saha tathā nītāḥ punaḥ sve gṛhe yatsambaddhakathābhireva suciraṃ dīrghābhirasthīyata |
ekaḥ samprati nāśitapriyatamastāmeva pāpaḥ kathaṃ rāmaḥ pañcavaṭīṃ vilokayatu vā gacchatvasaṃbhāvya vā || 78 ||
kartā yathā—
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile mag‍naṃ tadindīvaraṃ || 79 || ityādi (pṛ. 1181)
hetukartā yathā—(urāca. 2.26)
cirād vegārambhī vikṛta iva tīvro viṣarasaḥ kutaścit saṃvegāt pracala iva śalyasya śakalaḥ |
vraṇo rūḍhagranthiḥ sphuṭita iva hṛnmarmaṇi punaḥ purā/parāvṛttaḥ śoko vikalayati māṃ nūtana iva || 80 ||
bhāvakartā yathā—
kucadvandve tasmin dvipakalaśa/kalabha—kumbhasthalatulāṃ dadhāne 'smin kasyā yuvatiṣu na cittasya rujati |
tathorvoryugme vā drutaruciracāmīkararuci vikarṣatyūṣmāṇaṃ kamiva na yuvānaṃ jvarayati? || 81 ||
karmakartā yathā—
tānyetāni śikhaṇḍitāṇḍavagurūnambhodharānambare tanvānāni dināni nūnamamṛtasyandīni vandāmahe |
udgạ̄dhā navanīlanīrajadṛśāmatyantamāyāmino bhidyante svayameva yeṣu viṣamā mānagrahagranthayaḥ || 82 ||
karmakartṛ yathā—
garjante 'bhinavaṃ vraṇaṃ vikirate cūteṣu patrotkaraḥ puṣpairbhūṣayate 'pamānaviṭapīvāpyāṃ mano rajyati |
brūte vāk svayameva kokilamukhe mānagraho mokṣate sampratyeṣa yathā tathā priyasakhi! praụdhirmadhormūrcchati || 83 ||
bhāvakarma yathā—(śāku. 2.11)
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitam || 84 || (pṛ. 1115) ityādi
(pratyayotpattikālāḥ)
atha pratyayotpattikālāḥ|
ke punaste ?
bhūto, bhaviṣyan, vartamāno 'vyakta iti |
bhūtaḥ dvidhā— parokṣabhūto, bhūtānadyatana iti |
bhaviṣyan tridhā— bhaviṣyan, bhūtabhaviṣyan, bhaviṣyadadyatana iti |
vartamānastridhā— vartamāno bhūtasāmīpyo bhaviṣyatsāmīpya iti |
avyaktastridhā— avyaktaḥ, atipannaḥ, saṅkīrṇa iti | teṣu
luṅādivācyo bhūto yathā— (urāca. 2.22)
etat punarvanamaho! kathamadya dṛṣṭaṃ yasminnabhūma cirameva vayaṃ vasantaḥ |
āraṇyakāśca gṛhiṇaśca ratāḥ svadharme sāṃsārikeṣu ca sukheṣu vayaṃ rasajñāḥ || 85 ||
liṅādivācyaḥ parokṣo yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilalāpa sa bāṣpagadgadam || 86 || (pṛ. 1054) ityādi
laṅādivācyo bhūtānadyatano yathā—(urāca. 3.25)
karakamalaviśī/tīrṇairambunīvāraśaṣpai— staruśakunikuraṅgān maithilī yānapuṣyat |
bhavati mama vikārasteṣu dṛṣṭeṣu ko 'pi drava iva hṛdayasya pras‍navodbhedayogyaḥ || 87 ||
lṛṅgādivācyo bhaviṣyan yathā—
pratyāgamiṣyasi bhaviṣyati saṅgamo 'pi sampatsyate ca hṛdayābhimato 'bhilāṣaḥ |
eṣā gatā na punareṣyati jīviteśa ! vidyud‌vilāsataralā navayauvanaśrīḥ || 88 ||
'āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac‍ca' (3.3.132) iti bhūtabhaviṣyan yathā—(rudraṭa. 7.60)
aviralavilolajaladaḥ kuṭajārjunanīpasurabhivanavātaḥ |
ayamāyātaḥ kālo hanta hatāḥ pathikagohinyaḥ || 89 ||
luṅādivācyo bhaviṣyadadyatano yathā—
bhūmiḥ kaṇṭakinī puro viṭapinaḥ prāyo bahūpadravā bhūyaḥ saiṣa divākaro mṛgayate sandhyāvadhūsaṅgamam |
kā vā te pathika! tvarā 'dya gamane grāmye vidheye jane prātaḥ śrāntavinoditena manasā sthātāsi gantāsi vā || 90 ||
laṅādivācyo vartamāno yathā—(māmā. 1.44)
prasarati parimāthī ko 'pyayaṃ dehadāha— stirayati karaṇānāṃ grāhakatvaṃ pramohaḥ |
raṇaraṇakavivṛddhiṃ bibhradāvartamānaṃ jvalati hṛdayamantastanmayatvaṃ ca dhatte || 91 ||
sa eva bhūtāsanno bhūtasāmīpyo yathā—(urāca. 6.30 )
vinā sītādevyā kimiva hi na duḥkhaṃ raghupateḥ priyānāśe puṃsāṃ jagadidamaraṇyaṃ hi bhavati |
sa ca s‍nehastāvānayamapi viyogo niravadhiḥ kimevaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchasyanadhigatarāmāyaṇa iva || 92 ||
bhaviṣyadāsanno bhaviṣyatsāmīpyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 4.20 )
iyametya pataṅgavartmanā punaraṅkāśrayinī bhavāmi te |
caturaiḥ surasundarījanaiḥ priya! yāvanna vilobhyase divi || 93 ||
liṅādivācyo 'vyaktaḥ| yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.19 )
prasīdeti brūyāmidamasati kope na ghaṭate kariṣyāmyevaṃ no punariti, bhavedabhyupagamaḥ |
na me doṣo 'stīti tvamidamapi vijñāsyasi mṛṣā kimetanme vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi priyatame! || 94 ||
lṛṅgādivācyo 'tipannaḥ | yathā— (mavīca. 1.27)
rāmāya puṇyamahase sadṛśāya sītā dattaiva dāśarathicandramase 'bhaviṣyat |
āropaṇena paṇamapratikāryamārya— straiyambakasya dhanuṣo yadi nākariṣyat || 95 ||
dhātusambandhotpannapratyayavācyaḥ saṅkīrṇaḥ | yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.14)
atandritā sā svayameva vṛkṣakān ghaṭastanaprastravaṇairvyavardhayat |
guho 'pi yeṣāṃ prathamāp‍tajanmanāṃ na putravāllabhyamapākariṣyati || 96 ||
(kriyāparicchedinaḥ kālāḥ —12)
ta ete dravyātmānaḥ kriyātmāno vā kriyāparicchedinaḥ kālāḥ |
athāpare dravyātmānaḥ kriyāsādhanarūpā vidyante |
ke punaste ?
nityo, naimittikaḥ, svabhāviko vaiparāmarśika iti | teṣu —
1. nityaḥ — śāśvatiko, vaikalpiko, naiyogikaśca |
2. naimittikaḥ — audyogika, aupabhogikaḥ, prāyogikaśca |
3. svabhāvikaḥ — āgantuko, naisargikaḥ, sāṃsargikaśca |
4. vaiparāmarśaḥ — saṅkīrṇaḥ, prakīrṇo, viprakīrṇaśca,
iti pratyekaṃ traividhyāc‍catvāro 'pi te dvādaśa bhavanti | teṣu —
(1. nityaḥ —3)
1. (1.1) lavakāṣṭhākṣaṇanimeṣanāḍikāmuhūrtapraharāhorātrarūpaḥ śāśvatikaḥ|
sa yathā—
kṣaṇe nimeṣe nāḍyāṃ vā muhūrte prahare 'pi vā |
gate tvameṣyasītyukte ruroda pathikapriyā || 97 ||
2. (1.2) dinarātripakṣamāsartvayanarūpo vaikalpikaḥ|
yathā—(megha. 10 7)
saṃkṣipyeta kṣaṇamiva kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā sarvavasthāsvaharapi kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt |
ittaṃ cetaścaṭulanayane! durlabhaprārthanāṃ me gạ̄dhoṣṇābhiḥ kṣatamaśaraṇaṃ tvad‌viyogavyathābhiḥ || 98 ||
3. (1.3) saṃvatsarayugakalpamanvantarapralayamahāpralayarūpo naiyogikaḥ|
sa yathā—(raghu. 8.92)
tenāṣṭau parigamitāḥ samāḥ kathañcid bālatvādavitathasūnṛtena sūnoḥ |
sādṛś‍yapratikṛtidarśanaiḥ priyāyāḥ svap‍neṣu kṣaṇikasamāgamotsavaiśca || 99 ||
te 'mī trayo 'pi nityabhedāḥ; nityarūpeṇaivānivāritapravṛttitvāt |
(2. naimittikaḥ — 4)
4. (2.1) prātaḥ pratyūṣaprāh‍ṇamadhyāhnāparāh‍ṇasandhyārūpa audyogikaḥ |
yathā—(saka. 4.179) (pṛ. 283)
śayyante hataśāyikāḥ pathi tarucchāyāniṣaṇṇādhvagaiḥ śrīkaṇṭhāyataneṣu dhārmikajanairāsyanta uṣṭrāsikāḥ |
śūnye te 'tra(tatra?) nikuñjaśāyini sakhi! grīṣmasya madhyandine sajjānāṃ dayitābhisāraṇavidhau ramyaḥ kṣaṇo vartate || 100 ||
5. (2.2) niśāmukhapradoṣaniśīthāpararātracandrodayandrāstamayarūpa aupabhogikaḥ|
yathā—(saka.5.137)
vilimpatyetasmin malayajarasārdreṇa mahasā diśāṃ cakraṃ candre sukṛtamayi/matha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
dṛśorbāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanamasavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare hṛdi tvaṃ hriḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 101 ||
6. (2.3) śaraddhemantaśiśiravasantagrīṣmavarṣārūpaḥ) prāyogikaḥ|
yathā—(vikra. 2.6)
idamasulabhavastuprārthanādurnivāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti |
kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupatrai— rupavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅkureṣu || 102 ||
te 'mī trayo 'pi naimittikabhedāḥ |
(3. svabhāvikaḥ —4)
7. (3.1) nityatve 'pyeṣāmupabhogādernimittatvād madapramadābhyudayotsavavyasanaparihārādirūpa āgantuḥ | yathā—(amaru. 41)
paṭālag‍ne patyau namayati mukhaṃ jātavinayā haṭhāśleṣaṃ vāñchatyapaharati gātrāṇi śanakaiḥ |
na śak‍notyākhyātuṃ smitamukhasakhīdattanayanā hriyā tāmyatyantaḥ prathamaparihārā navavadhūḥ || 103 ||
8. (3.2) bālyakaumārayauvamaugdhyamādhyasthyaprāgalbhyarūpo naisargikaḥ|
yathā—(māmā. 1.35)
mā mūmuhat khalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikāraghanā matirbhūt |
ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmāt kāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca || 104 ||
9. (3.3) parāparayaugapadyāyaugapadyacirakṣiprarūpaḥ sāṃsargikaḥ | yathā—
ādau tāvannayanagamanasvāgatādikriyāstāḥ paścādīṣatprahasitakathābhāvasampreṣitāni |
bhāvenāntarmanasi ghaṭitaḥ prītivistrambhayogo vistrambhāt tu prasarati śanaiḥ sarvagātreṣvanaṅgaḥ || 105 ||
te 'mī trayo 'pi svābhāvikabhedāḥ, svabhāvata eva pravartamānatvāt |
(4. vaiparāmarśaḥ —4)
10. (4.1) deś‍yakrīḍākelidyūtavratagoṣṭhīprekṣādirūpaḥ saṅkīrṇaḥ | yathā—
sakhi ! sa vijito vīṇādyūte kayā 'pi khalu striyā paṇitamabhavat tasyāṃ tasmin niśālalitaṃ dhruvam |
kathamitarathā śephālīṣu skhalatkusumāsvapi sthitavati nabhomadhyepīndau priyeṇa vilambyate? || 106 ||
11. (4. 2) viviktadīrghikodyānasaudhakrīḍādidarśanādirūpaḥ prakīrṇaḥ | yathā—
pāntha! dvāravatīṃ prayāsi yadi he! taddevakīnandano vaktavyaḥ smaramantramohavivaśā gopyo na nāmojjhitāḥ |
etāḥ ketakapuṣpadhūlipaṭalairālokya ramyā diśaḥ kālindītaṭabhūmayo 'pi tava re! no yānti cintāspadam || 107 ||
12. (4.3) aṣṭamīcandrakendrotsava—yakṣarātrika—kundacaturthī—suvasantaka—madanatrayodaś‍yā— dirūpo viprakīrṇaḥ | sa yathā—(saka. 5.406)
asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yat kāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri! nirannayā, tadadhunā kiñcinmukhe dīyatām |
ityukte jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste 'hani kalpitaśca kabalo dhautaśca dhāraśrubhiḥ || 108 ||
4. te 'mī trayo 'pi vaiparāmarśikabhedāḥ, viparāmṛś‍ya svecchayā pravartamānatvāt |
sa eva kālaḥ kārtsyena dvirūpa upadarśitaḥ |
kriyāpadaikavācyo 'yaṃ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ ca yaḥ || 109 ||
pratyayārtho dvayaṃ caitat samavetamudāhṛtam |
prakṛtyarthānurodhena vipralambhe caturvidhe || 110 ||
yo vipralambhaḥ prathamānurāgo mānaḥ pravāsaḥ karuṇaḥ sa eva |
sādharmyavaidharmyavaśena caiṣāmabhedabhedāvatha tau vadāmaḥ || 111 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe vipralambhānvarthaprakāśano nāma
|| caturviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 24 ||
sanātanenāsya nitāntasūkṣmavimarśaramyasya paricchidaiva |
vyavadhāyyanucchedaparicchidābhiraśuddhaśuddhyā ca nitāntakāmyaiḥ ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe pañcaviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
sādharmyavaidharmyaprakāśaḥ
tatra vaidharmyāt sādharmyameva prāgabhidhātavyaṃ bhavati, mahāviṣayatvāt |
kiṃ punaḥ prathamānurāgasya sādharmyaṃ, kiṃ vā vaidharmyam? iti | tatra —
sādharmyaṃ caturṇāmapi vipralambhabhedānāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇayogaḥ |
vaidharmyaṃ tu sajātīyebhyo vijātīyebhyaśca bhedapratipādako viśeṣalakṣaṇayogaḥ iti |
tatra sādharmyasūtrasya catvāro 'rthaskanthāḥ—
1. bhāvaskandhaḥ
2. bhāvajanmaskandhaḥ
3. bhāvānubandhaskandhaḥ
4. bhāvaprakarṣaskandhaḥ iti | teṣu —
nāyakayoḥ prāgasaṅgatayoḥ mitho darśanaśravaṇābhyāmavasthitābhimānajanmā parasparānurāgaḥ anyatarānurāgo veti bhāvaskandhaḥ |
abhilaṣaṇīyāliṅganādīnāmanavāp‍tau satyāṃ samupajāyamānaistaistairutkaṇṭhādi— bhirvyabhicāribhāvairiti bhāvajanmaskandhaḥ |
manovāgbuddhijanmabhiścānubhāvairanubandha iti bhāvānubandhaskandhaḥ |
prāp‍taprāpyaprakarṣāvastho 'pi vipralambhaśṛṅgārākhyāṃ labhata iti, bhāvaprakarṣaskandha iti |
etenaitaduktaṃ bhavati,
viṣayāśrayālambanasaṃyogo bhāvaskandhaḥ,
paścādādarābhyāsapratyayotpattisaṃyogo bhāvajanmaskandhaḥ,
vegabhāvanāsthitasthāpakākhyavāsanāsaṃyogo bhāvānubandhaskandhaḥ,
vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogo bhāvaprakarṣaskandhaḥ |
taduktam 'bhāvajanmānubandhaprakarṣānurūpāstāvadavasthāḥ samṛddhaya'1 iti |
1. bhāvajanmeti | bhāvānāṃ pañcāvasthāḥ 13–14 prakāśayorvarṇitoḥ | tadanusāreṇātra 'bhāvajanmānubandha— prakarṣānuvartanasampṛktayaḥ avasthāḥ' iti paṭhituṃ yuktamiti rāghavaḥ | bhāvānāṃ janmānubandhapravṛddhi—
tatra bhāvaskandhe 'nāyakayormithodarśanaśravaṇābhyām' ityanenāsya savikalpaka— pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdaitihyārthāpattisambhavābhāvapramāṇavyāpārāgocaravastuviṣayatāmupadiśati | nirvikalpakapratyakṣo 'nena pratyuktaḥ, tena vyavahārād bhāvād dṛśiriha jñānavacano 'darśanārthaḥ; tena pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattisambhavā 'bhāvānāṃ darśanākhyā, śabdaitihya—śrutānumāna— śrutopamānuśrutārthāpatti—śruti(ta) sambhavānāṃ śravaṇākhyā, ubhayeṣāmubhayākhyeti siddhaṃ bhavati | tathāhi—(vāpa. 1.123)
na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte |
anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gamyate || 1 ||
tataścopajāyamānaḥ parasparāśrayo 'nyatarāśrayo vā mithoviṣayaḥ ekaviṣayo vā dṛgālambanaḥ śrutyālambano vā pramāṇabhedaḥ prathamānaḥ prathate | tatra—
darśanataḥ ṣọdhā 'pratyakṣānurāgo 'numānānurāgaḥ, upamānānurāgo 'rthāpattyanurāgaḥ, sambhavānurāgo 'bhāvānurāga' iti |
śravaṇate 'pi tāvadeva 'śabdānurāgaḥ, aitihyānurāgaḥ, śrautānumānikaḥ, śrautopamānikaḥ, śrautārthāpannaḥ, śrautasambhava' iti |
(1. dṛgālambanānurāgaḥ)
(1.1 pratyakṣānurāgaḥ —6)
tatrākṣamakṣaṃ prati gataṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam |
tadapi ṣọdhā 'sākṣāt—pratibimba—pratibhā—utprekṣā—smṛti—svap‍na' bhedāt | tatra—
1. prativiṣayādhyavasāyaḥ sākṣātpratyakṣam, yathā—(gāsa. 1.93)
aviaṇhapecchaṇijjeṇa takkhaṇaṃ māmi diṭṭheṇa |
siviṇaapīeṇa va pāṇieva tah‍ṇa c‍cia ṇa phiṭṭhā || 2 ||
(avitṛṣṇaprekṣaṇīyena tatkṣaṇaṃ mātulāni! dṛṣṭena |
svap‍napīteneva pānīyena tṛṣṇaiva na mṛṣṭā ||)
saṃpṛktyanuvṛttisaṃjñikās‍trayodaśe prakāśe, caturdaśe punarjanmānubandhaprakarṣasaṃparkānugamasaṃjñikāḥ pañca pañcāvasthāḥ pratipāditacarāḥ | iha tvanugamaḥ pṛthaṅnoktaḥ, tasya prakarṣeṇaiva saṃgrahāt | yaś‍ca bhāva— skandhastasyāpi bhāvajanmaskandhena gatārthayituṃ śakyatve tisra evāvasthāḥ syuḥ |
2. pratyakṣasyaiva deśamātrānyatvapratibhāsaḥ pratibimbaṃ ; yathā—(gāsa. 1.42)
ṇac‍caṇa—salāhaṇa—ṇiheṇa pāsaparisaṃṭhiā ṇiuṇagovī |
sarisagoviāṇaṁ cuṃbaï kavolapaḍimāghaaṃ kaṇhaṃ || 3 ||
(nartanaślāghananibhena pārśvaparisaṃsthitā taruṇagopī |
sadṛg‌gopīnāṃ cumbati kapolapratimāgataṃ kṛṣṇam ||)
3. bāhyendriyanirapekṣamadṛṣṭaprabhavamākasmikamananubhūtānubhūtaviṣayajñānaṃ pratibhānaṃ ; yathā—
(śāku. 1.20)
asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ |
satāṃ hi sandehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || 4 ||
4. parokṣe 'pi pratyakṣaviṣaye pramāṇādhigatavastudharmādhyāropaṇamutprekṣā; yathā—
aha sā hiaeṇa hariṃ a diṭṭhā ārapaa vilāsaṃ pi |
jahapaḍivaṇṇu ppekkhā ṇisavaṇṇarūaṃ pi aṃtei/maṃtei? || 5 ||
(atha sā hṛdayena hariṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āropya vilāsamapi |
yathāpratipannotprekṣā niṣaṇṇarūpamapi manyate ||)
5. pramāṇānubhūtasya vastuno manasi pratibimbanaṃ smṛtiḥ; yathā—(gāsa. 6.30)
jaṃ jaṃ pulaemi disaṃ purao lihio vva dīsase tatto |
tuha paḍimāḍivāḍiṃ pavahaï va saalaṃ disāvalaaṃ || 6 ||
(yāṃ yāṃ pralokayāmi diśaṃ purato likhita iva dṛś‍yase tatra |
tava pratimāparipāṭīṃ vahatīva sakalaṃ diśāvalayam ||
6. aviṣayendriyavyāpāramindriyeṇeva viṣayeṣu yadanubhavaṃ mānasaṃ sa svap‍na | yathā—
(visā. 1.15)
jāne svap‍navidhau mamādya culukotsekyaṃ purastādabhūt pratyūṣe pariveṣamaṇḍalamiva jyots‍nāsapat‍naṃ mahaḥ |
asyāntarnakhanistuṣīkṛtaśarac‍candraprabhairaṅgakai— rdṛṣṭā kā 'pyabalā balātkṛtavatī sā manmathaṃ manmatham || 7 ||
svap‍nādayaḥ pramāṇābhāsatvādapramāṇamiti cet,
tatra, prathamānurāgotpattau pramāṇatadābhāsayoraviśeṣāt |
(1.2 anumānānurāgaḥ —6)
liṅgadarśanālliṅgipratipattiranumānam | taduktam— (prapābhā.)
anumeyena sambaddhaṃ prasiddhatvaṃ/ddhaṃ ca tadanvaye |
tadabhāve tu yannāsti talliṅgamanumāpakam || 8 ||
viparītamato yat syādekena dvitayena vā |
viruddhāsiddhasandigdhamaliṅgaṃ kāś‍yapo 'bravīt || 9 ||
vayaṃ tu liṅgamātrameva brūmaḥ | tadābhāsasyāpi prathamānurāganimittatvāt |
tadapi ṣọdhā—
1. sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ, 2. viśeṣato dṛṣṭaṃ, 3. pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ
4. parokṣato dṛṣṭaṃ, 5. vidyamānaviṣayam 6. avidyamānaviṣayaṃ ca |
yathā— kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ, svareṇa putram, kṛttikodayena rohiṇyudayam, ॰ ॰ ॰ deśāntaraprāptyā ādityagatiṃ, dhūmenāg‍ni, nimittena bhāvinamarthaṃ jānāti | tatra—
1. sāmānyena (gṛhīta)vyāptikaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam, yathā—śāku. 3.12
'unnamitaikabhrūlatamānanamasyāḥ' || 10 || ityādi (pṛ. 822)
2. viśeṣeṇa gṛhītavyāptikaṃ viśeṣato dṛṣṭam ; yathā—(śāku. 3.7)
abhyunnatā purastādavagạ̄dhā jaghanagauravāt paścāt |
dvāre 'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktirdaś‍yate 'bhinavā || 11 ||
3. pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītavyāp‍tikaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭam ; yathā—(māmā. 3.4)
āvirbhavantī prathamaṃ priyāyāḥ socch‌vāsamantaḥkaraṇaṃ karoti |
santāpadagdhasya śikhaṇḍiyūnordṛṣṭeḥ purastādaciraprabheva || 12 ||
4. parokṣeṇa gṛhītavyāp‍tikaṃ parokṣato dṛṣṭam; yathā—(saka. 2.28)
etāni nissahatanorasamañjasāni śūnyaṃ manaḥ piśunayanti padāni tasyāḥ |
ete ca mārgataravaḥ kathayanti tāpamālambitojjhitapariglāpitaiḥ pravālaiḥ || 13 ||
5. vartamānavastugocaro vidyamānaviṣayam, yathā—
aśokatarurujjvalastabakamālabhārī yathā yathā kurabakastanūmatakorakairarcati |
yathā ca tilakadrumaḥ sṛjati mañjarījālakaṃ tatheha purato vane pūravadhūjanaḥ krīḍati || 14 ||
